attributes.description: A slave of the dark arts, this sorcerer is a master of life-extinguishing spells.

attributes.name: Last Will
attributes.description: If a monster on your side of the field was sent to your Graveyard this turn, you can Special Summon 1 monster with an ATK of 1500 points or less from your Deck once during this turn. Then shuffle your Deck.

attributes.name: Waboku
attributes.description: Make all Battle Damage inflicted by monsters on your opponent's side of the field 0 during this turn.

attributes.name: Soul Exchange
attributes.description: Select 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field. This turn, if you would Tribute a monster on your side of the field, Tribute the selected monster instead. You cannot conduct your Battle Phase during the turn that you activate this card.

attributes.name: Card Destruction
attributes.description: You and your opponent discard your entire hands and draw the same number of cards from your respective Decks that you discarded.

attributes.name: Trap Master
attributes.description: FLIP: Select 1 Trap Card on the field and destroy it. If the selected card is Set, pick up and see the card. If it is a Trap Card, it is destroyed. If it is a Spell Card, return it to its original position.

attributes.name: Dragon Capture Jar
attributes.description: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, all face-up Dragon-Type monsters are changed to Defense Position and cannot change their Battle Position.

attributes.name: Yami
attributes.description: Increase the ATK and DEF of all Fiend and Spellcaster-Type monsters by 200 points. Decrease the ATK and DEF of all Fairy-Type monsters by 200 points.

attributes.name: Man-Eater Bug
attributes.description: FLIP: Destroy 1 monster on the field.

attributes.name: Reverse Trap
attributes.description: All increases and decreases to ATK and DEF are reversed for the turn in which this card is activated.

attributes.name: Remove Trap
attributes.description: Select 1 face-up Trap Card on the field and destroy it.

attributes.name: Castle Walls
attributes.description: Increase a selected monster's DEF by 500 points during the turn this card is activated.

attributes.name: Ultimate Offering
attributes.description: By paying 500 Life Points, Normal Summon or Set 1 extra monster. You can only activate this effect during your Main Phase or your opponent's Battle Phase.

attributes.name: Red-Eyes Zombie Dragon
attributes.description: You can Tribute Summon this card in Attack Position by Tributing 1 Zombie-Type monster. When this card destroys a Zombie-Type monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon that monster to your side of the field.

attributes.name: Malevolent Mech - Goku En
attributes.description: You can Normal Summon this card without Tributing. If you do, this card is sent to the Graveyard during the End Phase if it is the only Zombie-Type monster on the field. When it it sent to the Graveyard by this effect, you take damage equal to its ATK.

attributes.name: Paladin of the Cursed Dragon
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Zombie-Type monster that was destroyed by battle from your opponent's Graveyard to your side of the field.

attributes.name: Zombie World
attributes.description: All monsters on the field and in any Graveyard become Zombie-Type monsters. Neither player can Tribute Summon monsters, except Zombie-Type monsters.

attributes.name: Spell Shattering Arrow
attributes.description: Destroy all face-up Spell Cards your opponent controls. For each destroyed Spell Card, inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Imperial Iron Wall
attributes.description: Cards cannot be removed from play.

attributes.name: Cyber-Stein
attributes.description: Pay 5000 Life Points. Special Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Fusion Deck to the field in Attack Position.

attributes.name: Des Volstgalph
attributes.description: Each time this card destroys an opponent's monster as a result of battle and sends it to the Graveyard, inflict 500 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points. Also, each time either player activates a Normal or Quick-Play Spell Card, increase the ATK of this card by 200 points until the end of the turn. (This effect is even applied during your opponent's turn.)

attributes.name: Shrink
attributes.description: Select 1 face-up monster on the field. The original ATK of that monster is halved until the end of this turn.

attributes.name: Crush Card Virus
attributes.description: Tribute 1 DARK monster with 1000 or less ATK. Check all monsters on your opponent's side of the field, your opponent's hand, and all cards they draw (until the end of your opponent's 3rd turn after this card's activation), and destroy all monsters with 1500 or more ATK.

attributes.name: Gold Sarcophagus
attributes.description: Select and remove from play 1 card in your Deck. During your second Standby Phase after this card's activation, add the removed card to your hand.

attributes.name: Doomcaliber Knight
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. When an Effect Monster's effect is activated, you must Tribute this card. Negate that effect's activation and destroy the monster.

attributes.name: Dark End Dragon
attributes.description: 1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner DARK monsters. Once per turn, you can have this card lose 500 ATK and DEF, and send 1 monster your opponent controls to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Kaiser Sea Horse
attributes.description: If you Tribute Summon a LIGHT monster, you can treat this 1 monster as 2 Tribute Monsters for the Tribute Summon.

attributes.name: Shadow Spell
attributes.description: Select 1 face-up monster on your opponent's side of the field. Decrease the ATK of the selected monster by 700 points. The monster cannot attack or change its battle position. When the selected monster is destroyed or removed from the field, this card is also destroyed.

attributes.name: Charcoal Inpachi
attributes.description: A wicked wooden spirit that has burned out. The barbecue grilled with this charcoal is so awesome that everybody thinks it's priceless.

attributes.name: Neo Aqua Madoor
attributes.description: The true nature of this wizard, who rules all water. It defends itself with a vast, impenetrable wall of ice.

attributes.name: Skull Dog Marron
attributes.description: A lost dog that wandered off 1000 years ago. He's still waiting for his master to come for him.

attributes.name: Goblin Calligrapher
attributes.description: A Goblin who devotes himself to mastering perfect calligraphy of the word "False". He gives his all to each stroke.

attributes.name: Ultimate Insect LV1
attributes.description: As long as this card remains face-up on your side of the field, it is unaffected by any Spell Cards. During your Standby Phase, send this face-up card to the Graveyard to Special Summon 1 "Ultimate Insect LV3" from your hand or Deck. (You cannot activate this effect the turn this card is Normal Summoned, Special Summoned, or flipped face-up.)

attributes.name: Horus The Black Flame Dragon LV4
attributes.description: As long as this card remains face-up on your side of the field, control of this card cannot switch. During the End Phase of a turn that this card destroyed a monster as a result of battle, send this card to the Graveyard to Special Summon 1 "Horus the Black Flame Dragon LV6" from your hand or Deck.

attributes.name: Horus the Black Flame Dragon LV6
attributes.description: As long as this card remains face-up on your side of the field, it is unaffected by any Spell Cards. During the End Phase of a turn that this card destroyed a monster as a result of battle, send this card to the Graveyard to Special Summon 1 "Horus the Black Flame Dragon LV8" from your hand or Deck.

attributes.name: Horus the Black Flame Dragon LV8
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by the effect of "Horus the Black Flame Dragon LV6". While this card remains face-up on your side of the field, you can negate the activation and effect of any Spell Cards and destroy them.

attributes.name: Dark Mimic LV1
attributes.description: FLIP: Draw 1 card from your Deck. Also, during your Standby Phase, send this face-up card to the Graveyard to Special Summon 1 "Dark Mimic LV3" from your hand or Deck.

attributes.name: Dark Mimic LV3
attributes.description: If this card is sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, the controller of this card draws 1 card from his/her Deck. If this card was Special Summoned by the effect of "Dark Mimic LV1", he/she draws 2 cards instead.

attributes.name: Mystic Swordsman LV2
attributes.description: If this card attacks a face-down Defense Position monster, destroy the monster immediately with this card's effect without flipping it face-up or applying damage calculation. During the End Phase of a turn that this card destroyed a monster as a result of battle, by sending this card to the Graveyard, Special Summon 1 "Mystic Swordsman LV4" from your hand or Deck.

attributes.name: Mystic Swordsman LV4
attributes.description: If you Normal Summon this card, you must place it in face-down Defense Position. If this card attacks a face-down Defense Position monster, destroy the monster immediately with this card's effect without flipping it face-up or applying damage calculation. During the End Phase of a turn that this card destroyed a monster as a result of battle, by sending this card to the Graveyard, Special Summon 1 "Mystic Swordsman LV6" from your hand or Deck.

attributes.name: Armed Dragon LV3
attributes.description: During your Standby Phase, send this face-up card to the Graveyard to Special Summon 1 "Armed Dragon LV5" from your hand or Deck.

attributes.name: Armed Dragon LV5
attributes.description: Send 1 Monster Card from your hand to the Graveyard to destroy 1 face-up monster on your opponent's side of the field with an ATK equal to or less than the ATK of the sent monster. During the End Phase of a turn that this card destroyed a monster as a result of battle, send this card to the Graveyard to Special Summon 1 "Armed Dragon LV7" from your hand or Deck.

attributes.name: Armed Dragon LV7
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by the effect of "Armed Dragon LV5". Send 1 Monster Card from your hand to the Graveyard to destroy all face-up monsters on your opponent's side of the field with an ATK equal to or less than the ATK of the sent monster.

attributes.name: Horus' Servant
attributes.description: As long as this card remains face-up on your side of the field, your opponent cannot designate "Horus the Black Flame Dragon" (of any LV) as the target of the effect of a Spell, Trap, or Monster Card.

attributes.name: Red-Eyes B. Chick
attributes.description: Send this face-up card on your side of the field to the Graveyard to Special Summon 1 "Red-Eyes B. Dragon" from your hand.

attributes.name: Malice Doll of Demise
attributes.description: If this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard by the effect of a Continuous Spell Card, Special Summon this card from the Graveyard during the Standby Phase of your turn.

attributes.name: Ninja Grandmaster Sasuke
attributes.description: If this card attacks a face-up Defense Position monster, destroy the monster with this card's effect without applying damage calculation.

attributes.name: Rafflesia Seduction
attributes.description: FLIP: Take control of 1 face-up monster on your opponent's side of the field until the end of the turn.

attributes.name: Ultimate Baseball Kid
attributes.description: Increase the ATK of this card by 1000 points for each FIRE monster on the field other than this card. Send a FIRE monster other than this card to the Graveyard to inflict 500 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Mobius the Frost Monarch
attributes.description: When this card is Tribute Summoned successfully, you can destroy up to 2 Spell or Trap Cards on the field.

attributes.name: Element Dragon
attributes.description:
This monster gets the following effect(s) while there is a monster(s) with the following Attribute(s) on the field:
- FIRE: Increase the ATK of this card by 500 points.
- WIND: If this card destroyed your opponent's monster as a result of battle, it can attack once again in a row.

attributes.name: Element Soldier
attributes.description:
This monster gets the following effect(s) while there is a monster(s) with the following Attribute(s) on the field:
- WATER: Control of this card cannot switch.
- EARTH: Negate the effect of an Effect Monster that is destroyed by this monster in battle.

attributes.name: Howling Insect
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, you can Special Summon 1 Insect-Type monster with an ATK of 1500 or less to your side of the field from your Deck. Then shuffle your Deck.

attributes.name: Masked Dragon
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, you can Special Summon 1 Dragon-Type monster with an ATK of 1500 or less to your side of the field from your Deck. Then shuffle your Deck.

attributes.name: Mind on Air
attributes.description: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, your opponent must continue to show his/her hand.

attributes.name: Unshaven Angler
attributes.description: If you Tribute Summon a WATER monster, you can treat this 1 monster as 2 Tribute Monsters for the Tribute Summon.

attributes.name: The Trojan Horse
attributes.description: If you Tribute Summon an EARTH monster, you can treat this 1 monster as 2 Tribute Monsters for the Tribute Summon.

attributes.name: Nobleman-Eater Bug
attributes.description: FLIP: Destroy 2 monsters on the field.

attributes.name: Enraged Muka Muka
attributes.description: Increase the ATK and DEF of this card by 400 points for each card in your hand.

attributes.name: Hade-Hane
attributes.description: FLIP: You can return up to 3 monsters on the field to the owner's hand.

attributes.name: Penumbral Soldier Lady
attributes.description: If this card battles with a LIGHT monster, increase the ATK of this card by 1000 points during the Damage Step.

attributes.name: OJAMA KING
attributes.description:
"Ojama Green" + "Ojama Yellow" + "Ojama Black"
Select up to 3 of your opponent's Monster Card Zones. As long as this card remains face-up on the field, the selected zones cannot be used.

attributes.name: Master of OZ
attributes.description: "Big Koala" + "Des Kangaroo"

attributes.name: Sanwitch
attributes.description: "Sangan" + "Witch of the Black Forest"

attributes.name: Dark Factory of Mass Production
attributes.description: Select 2 Normal Monsters from your Graveyard and add them to your hand.

attributes.name: Hammer Shot
attributes.description: Destroy 1 face-up Attack Position monster with the highest ATK on the field.

attributes.name: Mind Wipe
attributes.description: You can only activate this card if your opponent has 3 or less cards in his/her hand. Your opponent adds his/her hand to the Deck and shuffles it, then draws the same of number of cards he/she added to the Deck.

attributes.name: Abyssal Designator
attributes.description: Pay 1000 Life Points. Declare a Type and an Attribute. Your opponent must send 1 monster with both the Type and Attribute declared from his/her hand or Deck to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Level Up!
attributes.description: Send 1 face-up monster on your side of the field that has "LV" in its card name to the Graveyard to activate this card. Special Summon the monster that is written in the card text of that monster from your hand or Deck, ignoring the Summoning conditions.

attributes.name: Inferno Fire Blast
attributes.description: Select 1 face-up "Red-Eyes B. Dragon" on your side of the field to activate this card. Inflict damage to your opponent's Life Points equal to the original ATK of the selected "Red-Eyes B. Dragon". "Red-Eyes B. Dragon" cannot attack during the turn you use this card.

attributes.name: Ectoplasmer
attributes.description: Only once during each player's End Phase, the turn player Tributes 1 face-up monster on his/her side of the field and inflicts damage to the opponent's Life Points equal to half of the original ATK of the Tributed Monster.

attributes.name: The Graveyard in the Fourth Dimension
attributes.description: Add 2 monsters in your Graveyard that have "LV" in their card name to your Deck and shuffle it.

attributes.name: Two-Man Cell battle
attributes.description: During each player's End Phase, the turn player can Special Summon 1 Level 4 Normal Monster from his/her hand.

attributes.name: Big Wave Small Wave
attributes.description: Destroy all face-up WATER monsters on your side of the field. Then you can Special Summon WATER monsters from your hand, up to the same number of monsters destroyed by this effect.

attributes.name: Fusion Weapon
attributes.description: This card can only be equipped to a Fusion Monster of Level 6 or less. Increase the ATK and DEF of the equipped monster by 1500 points.

attributes.name: Ritual Weapon
attributes.description: This card can only be equipped to a Ritual Monster of Level 6 or less. Increase the ATK and DEF of the equipped monster by 1500 points.

attributes.name: Taunt
attributes.description: During your opponent's Main Phase 1, select 1 monster on your side of the field to activate this card. As long as the selected card remains on the field, if your opponent attacks with a monster(s) this turn, he/she must select the selected monster as the attack target.

attributes.name: Absolute End
attributes.description: You can only activate this card during your opponent's turn. This turn, the attacks from your opponent's monsters become direct attacks to your Life Points.

attributes.name: Spirit Barrier
attributes.description: As long as a monster(s) remain(s) on your side of the field, battle damage to the controller of this card becomes 0.

attributes.name: Ninjitsu Art of Decoy
attributes.description: Select 1 face-up monster on your side of the field that includes "Ninja" in its card name to activate this card. As long as this card remains face-up on the field, the selected monster is not destroyed as a result of battle (damage calculation is applied normally).

attributes.name: Enervating Mist
attributes.description: Your opponent's hand size limit becomes 5.

attributes.name: Heavy Slump
attributes.description: You can only activate this card when your opponent has 8 or more cards in his/her hand. Your opponent adds his/her hand to the Deck, shuffles it, and draws 2 cards.

attributes.name: Greed
attributes.description: Each time a player draws cards because of a card effect, he/she takes 500 points of damage during the End Phase for each card drawn by the card effect.

attributes.name: Mind Crush
attributes.description: Declare 1 card name. If your opponent has a declared card(s) in his/her hand, discard all of the declared card(s) to the Graveyard. Otherwise, you randomly discard 1 card from your hand.

attributes.name: Null and Void
attributes.description: You can only activate this card when an effect of drawing card(s) is activated. Both players see the cards drawn by the effect and discard them all to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Gorgon's Eye
attributes.description: Until the end of the End Phase, all effects of monsters on the field in Defense Position are negated.

attributes.name: Cemetery Bomb
attributes.description: Inflict 100 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points for each card in his/her Graveyard.

attributes.name: Hallowed Life Barrier
attributes.description: Discard 1 card from your hand. During this turn, any damage you take from your opponent becomes 0.

attributes.name: Uria, Lord of Searing Flames
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by sending 3 face-up Trap Cards from your side of the field to the Graveyard. Increase the ATK of this card by 1000 points for each Continuous Trap Card in your Graveyard. Once per turn, you can destroy 1 Set Spell or Trap Card on your opponent's side of the field. Spell and Trap Cards cannot be activated in response to this effect's activation.

attributes.name: Hamon, Lord of Striking Thunder
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by sending 3 face-up Continuous Spell Cards from your side of the field to the Graveyard. When this card destroys your opponent's monster as a result of battle and sends it to the Graveyard, inflict 1000 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points. While this card is in face-up Defense Position on your side of the field, your opponent cannot select another monster as an attack target.

attributes.name: Raviel, Lord of Phantasms
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by Tributing 3 Fiend-Type monsters on your side of the field. Each time your opponent Normal Summons a monster(s), Special Summon 1 "Phantasm Token" (Fiend-Type/DARK/Level 1/ATK 1000/DEF 1000) on your side of the field. This token cannot declare an attack. Once per turn, by Tributing 1 monster on your side of the field, increase the ATK of this card by the original ATK of the Tributed monster, until the End Phase of this turn.

attributes.name: Elemental Hero Neo Bubbleman
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by sending "Elemental Hero Bubbleman" on your side of the field and "Metamorphosis" in your hand to the Graveyard. This card's name is treated as "Elemental Hero Bubbleman" while it is face-up on the field. Destroy an opponent's monster that battles this card at the end of the Damage Step.

attributes.name: Hero Kid
attributes.description: When this card is Special Summoned, you can Special Summon any number of "Hero Kid"(s) from your Deck.

attributes.name: Cyber Barrier Dragon
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by the effect of "Attack Reflector Unit". Once per turn, while this card is in Attack Position, negate your opponent's first attack.

attributes.name: Cyber Laser Dragon
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by the effect of "Photon Generator Unit". You can destroy 1 monster with ATK or DEF equal to or higher than the ATK of this card. You can only use this effect once per turn.

attributes.name: Ancient Gear
attributes.description: While an "Ancient Gear" is face-up on your side of the field, you can Special Summon this card from your hand in Attack Position.

attributes.name: Ancient Gear Cannon
attributes.description: By Tributing this card, inflict 500 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points, and then neither player can activate Trap Cards during the Battle Phase of this turn.

attributes.name: Proto-Cyber Dragon
attributes.description: This card's name is treated as "Cyber Dragon" while it is face-up on the field.

attributes.name: Adhesive Explosive
attributes.description: If your opponent's monster attacks this face-down Defense Position card, this card becomes an Equip Card equipped to the attacking monster, without applying damage calculation. Destroy the equipped monster during the Standby Phase of your opponent's next turn.

attributes.name: Machine King Prototype
attributes.description: Increase the ATK and DEF of this card by 100 points for each Machine-Type monster on the field other than this card.

attributes.name: B.E.S. Covered Core
attributes.description: Put 2 counters on this card when you Normal Summon it. This card is not destroyed as a result of battle. If this card battles a monster, toss a coin and call it at the end of the Damage Step. If you call it wrong, remove 1 counter. If this card battles without a counter, destroy this card at the end of the Damage Step.

attributes.name: D.D. Guide
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned, control of this card shifts to your opponent. During each player's End Phase, your opponent selects 1 card from the Graveyard of this card's controller and removes it from play.

attributes.name: Chain Thrasher
attributes.description: In addition to a normal attack, this card can attack during the same Battle Phase as many times as the number of "Chain Thrasher"(s) in your Graveyard.

attributes.name: Disciple of the Forbidden Spell
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned, Flip Summoned, or Special Summoned, declare different Monster Card Attributes equal to the number of "Disciple of the Forbidden Spell"(s) in your Graveyard. If this card attacks a monster that has a declared Attribute, destroy the monster without applying damage calculation.

attributes.name: Tenkabito Shien
attributes.description: This card is unaffected by the effects of Trap Cards.

attributes.name: Parasitic Ticky
attributes.description: The ATK and DEF of this card are equal to the number of Tokens on the field x 500 points.

attributes.name: Gokipon
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed as a result of battle and sent to the Graveyard, add 1 Insect-Type monster with an ATK of 1500 or less from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Silent Insect
attributes.description: This card is changed to Defense Position when it is Normal Summoned or Flip Summoned. While this card is face-up on the field, negate the effects of all Continuous Spell Cards and Continuous Trap Cards.

attributes.name: Chainsaw Insect
attributes.description: If this card battles a monster, your opponent draws 1 card at the end of the Damage Step.

attributes.name: Anteatereatingant
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by sending 2 Spell or Trap Cards on your side of the field to the Graveyard. This card can destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card on your opponent's side of the field, but it cannot attack this turn if you activate this effect.

attributes.name: Saber Beetle
attributes.description: During battle between this attacking card and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of this card, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Doom Dozer
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by removing from play 2 Insect-Type monsters in your Graveyard. When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, send 1 card from the top of your opponent's Deck to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Treeborn Frog
attributes.description: If this card is in your Graveyard during your Standby Phase and there are no Spell or Trap Cards on your side of the field, you can Special Summon this card to your side of the field. This effect cannot be activated if there is a face-up "Treeborn Frog" on your side of the field.

attributes.name: Beelze Frog
attributes.description: Increase the ATK of this card by 300 points for each "T.A.D.P.O.L.E." in your Graveyard.

attributes.name: Princess Pikeru
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by the effect of "Trial of the Princesses". During your Standby Phase, increase your Life Points by 800 points for each monster on your side of the field.

attributes.name: Princess Curran
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by the effect of "Trial of the Princesses". During your Standby Phase, inflict 600 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points for each monster on your opponent's side of the field.

attributes.name: Memory Crusher
attributes.description: If this card attacks your opponent's Life Points directly, inflict damage to your opponent's Life Points equal to the number of cards in your opponent's Fusion Deck x 100 points.

attributes.name: Malice Ascendant
attributes.description: While this card is face-up on the field, during your opponent's Standby Phase, send a number of cards from the top of your opponent's Deck to the Graveyard equal to the number of "Malice Ascendant"(s) in your Graveyard.

attributes.name: Grass Phantom
attributes.description: Increase the ATK of this card by 500 points for each "Grass Phantom" in your Graveyard.

attributes.name: Sand Moth
attributes.description: When this face-down Defense Position card is destroyed and send to the Graveyard, except as a result of battle, switch the original ATK and DEF of this card, and Special Summon it to your side of the field.

attributes.name: Divine Dragon - Excelion
attributes.description:
When this card is Normal Summoned, it gets 1 of the following effects for each "Divine Dragon - Excelion" in your Graveyard when this effect resolves (your choice). These effects cannot accumulate.
- Increase the ATK of this card by 1000 points.
- If this card destroys your opponent's monster as a result of battle, it can attack once again in a row.
- When this card destroys a monster as a result of battle and sends it to the Graveyard, inflict damage to your opponent's Life Points equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster.

attributes.name: Ruin, Queen of Oblivion
attributes.description: This card can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "End of the World". If this card destroys your opponent's monster as a result of battle, it can attack once again in a row.

attributes.name: Demise, King of Armageddon
attributes.description: This card can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "End of the World". By paying 2000 Life Points, destroy all cards on the field except this card.

attributes.name: D.3.S. Frog
attributes.description:
"Des Frog" + "Des Frog" + "Des Frog"
A Fusion Summon of this card can only be conducted with the above Fusion Material Monsters. Increase the ATK of this card by 500 points for each "Treeborn Frog" in your Graveyard.

attributes.name: Hero Heart
attributes.description: Select 1 face-up monster on your side of the field that includes "Elemental Hero" in its card name to activate this card. This turn, the ATK of the selected monster is halved and it can attack twice during the same Battle Phase.

attributes.name: Magnet Circle LV2
attributes.description: Special Summon 1 Level 2 or lower Machine-Type monster from your hand.

attributes.name: Ancient Gear Factory
attributes.description: Select 1 monster in your hand that includes "Ancient Gear" in its card name (show the monster to your opponent). Remove from play cards in your Graveyard that include "Ancient Gear" in their card name(s) whose total Levels are equal to double the selected card's. You don't have to Tribute when you Normal Summon the selected card this turn.

attributes.name: Ancient Gear Drill
attributes.description: You can only activate this card by discarding 1 card from your hand while a monster that includes "Ancient Gear" in its card name is face-up on your side of the field. Select 1 Spell Card from your Deck and Set it on your side of the field. You cannot use that Spell Card this turn.

attributes.name: Phantasmal Martyrs
attributes.description: You can only activate this card while you have 2 or more cards in your hand, and have either "Uria, Lord of Searing Flames" or "Hamon, Lord of Striking Thunder" face-up on your side of the field. By sending your entire hand to the Graveyard, Special Summon 3 "Phantasmal Martyr Tokens" (Fiend-Type/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Attack Position on your side of the field.

attributes.name: Cyclone Boomerang
attributes.description: You can only equip this card to "Elemental Hero Wildheart". Increase the ATK of the equipped monster by 500 points. When the equipped monster is destroyed by a card effect and sent to the Graveyard, destroy all Spell and Trap Cards on the field. Inflict 100 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points for each Spell or Trap Card destroyed by this effect.

attributes.name: Symbol of Heritage
attributes.description: You can only activate this card while there are 3 monster cards with the same name in your Graveyard. Select 1 of those monsters, Special Summon it to your side of the field, and equip it with this card. When this card is destroyed, destroy the equipped monster.

attributes.name: Trial of the Princesses
attributes.description: You can only equip this card to "White Magician Pikeru" or "Ebon Magician Curran". Increase the ATK of the equipped monster by 800 points. During a turn that the equipped monster destroyed a Level 5 or higher monster as a result of battle, by Tributing the equipped monster and this card, Special Summon from your hand or Deck: 1 "Princess Pikeru" if you Tributed "White Magician Pikeru", or 1 "Princess Curran" if you Tributed "Ebon Magician Curran".

attributes.name: Photon Generator Unit
attributes.description: Tribute 2 "Cyber Dragon"s on your side of the field to activate this card. Special Summon 1 "Cyber Laser Dragon" from your hand, Deck, or Graveyard.

attributes.name: End of the World
attributes.description: This card can be used to Ritual Summon "Ruin, Queen of Oblivion" or "Demise, King of Armageddon". You must also Tribute monsters from the field or your hand whose total Levels equal the Level of the Ritual Monster you are attempting to Ritual Summon.

attributes.name: Ancient Gear Castle
attributes.description: Increase the ATK of each face-up monster on the field that includes "Ancient Gear" in its card name by 300 points. Each time a monster(s) is Normal Summoned or Set, put 1 counter on this card. If you Tribute Summon a monster that includes "Ancient Gear" in its card name, you can substitute this card for a Tribute(s), if the number of counters is equal to or greater than the number of required Tribute(s).

attributes.name: Samsara
attributes.description: Monster Cards Tributed for a Ritual Summon are returned to the owner's Deck instead of being sent to the Graveyard. Then shuffle the Deck.

attributes.name: Super Junior Confrontation
attributes.description: You can only activate this card when your opponent's monster declares an attack. Negate the battle, and 1 monster with the lowest ATK in face-up Attack Position on your opponent's side of the field battles against 1 monster with the lowest DEF in face-up Defense Position on your side of the field. After that battle ends, end the Battle Phase.

attributes.name: Miracle Kids
attributes.description: Decrease the ATK of 1 of your opponent's monsters by 400 points for each "Hero Kid" in your Graveyard, until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Attack Reflector Unit
attributes.description: Tribute 1 "Cyber Dragon" on your side of the field to activate this card. Special Summon 1 "Cyber Barrier Dragon" from your hand or Deck.

attributes.name: Damage Condenser
attributes.description: You can only activate this card by discarding 1 card from your hand when you take Battle Damage to your Life Points. Special Summon 1 monster from your Deck with ATK equal to or less than the Battle Damage you took, in Attack Position.

attributes.name: Karma Cut
attributes.description: Discard 1 card from your hand. Remove from play 1 face-up monster on your opponent's side of the field. If there is a card(s) in your opponent's Graveyard with the same name as the removed monster, also remove from play that card(s).

attributes.name: Next to be Lost
attributes.description: Select 1 face-up monster on your side of the field. Send 1 card from your Deck to the Graveyard with the same name as the selected card.

attributes.name: Generation Shift
attributes.description: Destroy 1 face-up monster on your side of the field. Add 1 card from your Deck to your hand with the same name as the destroyed card.

attributes.name: Full Salvo
attributes.description: After the activation of this card, send your entire hand to the Graveyard. Inflict 200 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points for each card you sent to the Graveyard by this effect.

attributes.name: Success Probability 0%
attributes.description: Send 2 random Fusion Monsters from your opponent's Fusion Deck to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Option Hunter
attributes.description: You can only activate this card when a monster on your side of the field is destroyed as a result of battle and sent to the Graveyard. Increase your Life Points by the original ATK of the destroyed monster.

attributes.name: Goblin out of the Frying Pan
attributes.description: Pay 500 Life Points. Negate the activation of a Spell Card and return it to the owner's hand.

attributes.name: Malfunction
attributes.description: Pay 500 Life Points. Negate the activation of a Trap Card and return it to its original position.

attributes.name: Mesmeric Control
attributes.description: During your opponent's next turn after you activate this card, your opponent cannot change the battle positions of monsters, except with a card effect.

attributes.name: Koa'ki Meiru Beetle
attributes.description: During each of your End Phases, destroy this card unless you send 1 "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru" from your Hand to the Graveyard or reveal 1 Insect-Type Monster in your hand. When a LIGHT or DARK monster is Special Summoned in face-up Attack Position, change the Summoned monster to Defense Position.

attributes.name: Majestic Dragon
attributes.description: This card cannot be used as a Synchro Material Monster, except for the Synchro Summon of a "Majestic" monster.

attributes.name: Stardust Xiaolong
attributes.description: When you Synchro Summon "Stardust Dragon", you can Special Summon this card from your Graveyard in face-up Attack Position. Once per turn, if this card would be destroyed by battle, it is not destroyed.

attributes.name: Max Warrior
attributes.description: When this card attacks an opponent's monster, it gains 400 ATK during damage calculation only. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle, this card's Level becomes 2 and its original ATK and DEF are halved until your next Standby Phase.

attributes.name: Quickdraw Synchron
attributes.description: You can send 1 monster from your hand to the Graveyard and Special Summon this card from your hand. You can substitute this card for any 1 "Synchron" Tuner for a Synchro Summon. This card cannot be used as a Synchro Material Monster, except for the Synchro Summon of a monster that lists a "Synchron" monster as a Tuner monster.

attributes.name: Level Eater
attributes.description: If this card is in the Graveyard, you can activate its effect by selecting 1 face-up Level 5 or higher monster you control. Reduce that monster's Level by 1. Special Summon this card from the Graveyard. This card cannot be Tributed except for a Tribute Summon.

attributes.name: Zero Gardna
attributes.description: You can Tribute this card to activate its effect. If you do, monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle, and you take no Battle Damage, during this turn. This effect can be activated during either player's turn.

attributes.name: Regulus
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can select 1 Field Spell Card in your Graveyard. Return it to the Deck.

attributes.name: Infernity Necromancer
attributes.description:
When this card is Normal Summoned, it is changed to Defense Position. While you have no cards in your hand, this card gains the following effect:
- Once per turn, you can Special Summon 1 "Infernity" monster from your Graveyard, except "Infernity Necromancer".

attributes.name: Fortune Lady Wind
attributes.description: This card's ATK and DEF are equal to its Level x 300. During each of your Standby Phases, increase the Level of this card by 1 (max 12). When this card is Normal Summoned, you can destroy a number of Spell or Trap Cards your opponent controls equal to the number of face-up "Fortune Lady" monsters you control.

attributes.name: Fortune Lady Water
attributes.description: This card's ATK and DEF are equal to its Level x 300. During each of your Standby Phases, increase the Level of this card by 1 (max 12). When this card is Special Summoned while you control a face-up "Fortune Lady" monster except "Fortune Lady Water", draw 2 cards.

attributes.name: Fortune Lady Dark
attributes.description: This card's ATK and DEF are equal to its Level x 400. During each of your Standby Phases, increase the Level of this card by 1 (max 12). When a face-up "Fortune Lady" monster you control destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, you can select and Special Summon 1 "Fortune Lady" monster from your Graveyard.

attributes.name: Fortune Lady Earth
attributes.description: This card's ATK and DEF are equal to its Level x 400. During each of your Standby Phases, increase the Level of this card by 1 (max 12). When the Level of this card increases, inflict 400 damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Solitaire Magician
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can select 1 face-up "Fortune Lady" monster you control and 1 other face-up monster on the field. Reduce the Level of the selected "Fortune Lady" monster by 3, and destroy the other selected monster.

attributes.name: Catoblepas and the Witch of Fate
attributes.description: When your opponent Special Summons a monster(s), you can remove from play 1 monster with ? ATK from your Graveyard to destroy that Special Summoned monster(s).

attributes.name: Dark Spider
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can increase the Level of 1 face-up Insect-Type monster you control by 2, until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Ground Spider
attributes.description: Once per turn, if you control this face-up Defense Position monster when your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster(s), you can change that monster(s) to Defense Position.

attributes.name: Relinquished Spider
attributes.description: If you have 4 or more Insect-Type monsters in your Graveyard, you can Tribute this card to destroy all face-up Defense Position monsters your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Spyder Spider
attributes.description: When this card destroys an opponent's Defense Position monster by battle, you can select and Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Insect-Type monster from your Graveyard.

attributes.name: Mother Spider
attributes.description: If you have only Insect-Type monsters in your Graveyard, you can send 2 face-up Defense Position monsters your opponent controls to the Graveyard and Special Summon this card from your hand.

attributes.name: Reptilianne Gorgon
attributes.description: If this card attacks an opponent's monster, after damage calculation the ATK of the attack target becomes 0, and it cannot change its battle position.

attributes.name: Reptilianne Medusa
attributes.description: Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard and select 1 face-up monster your opponent controls. The ATK of the selected monster becomes 0, and it cannot change its battle position.

attributes.name: Reptilianne Scylla
attributes.description: If this card destroys a monster with 0 ATK by battle, you can Special Summon that monster from the Graveyard to your side of the field in face-up Defense Position. The effect(s) of that monster is negated.

attributes.name: Reptilianne Viper
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned, you can select and take control of 1 face-up monster with 0 ATK your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Earthbound Immortal Ccarayhua
attributes.description: There can only be 1 face-up "Earthbound Immortal" monster on the field. If there is no face-up Field Spell Card on the field, destroy this card. Your opponent cannot select this card as an attack target. This card can attack your opponent directly. When this card is destroyed by a card effect, except by its own effect, destroy all cards on the field.

attributes.name: Earthbound Immortal Uru
attributes.description: There can only be 1 face-up "Earthbound Immortal" monster on the field. If there is no face-up Field Spell Card on the field, destroy this card. Your opponent cannot select this card as an attack target. This card can attack your opponent directly. Once per turn, you can Tribute 1 monster, except this card, to select and take control of 1 face-up monster your opponent controls, until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Koa'ki Meiru Sea Panther
attributes.description: During each of your End Phases, destroy this card unless you send 1 "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru" from your hand to the Graveyard or reveal 1 WATER monster in your hand. Once per turn, you can send 1 "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru" from your hand to the Graveyard to return 1 Spell Card from your Graveyard to the top of your Deck.

attributes.name: Koa'ki Meiru Rooklord
attributes.description: During each of your End Phases, destroy this card unless you send 1 "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru" from your hand to the Graveyard or reveal 1 Warrior-Type monster in your hand. You can Tribute Summon this card by Tributing 1 "Koa'ki Meiru" monster. When this card is Normal Summoned, you can remove from play 1 "Koa'ki Meiru" card in your Graveyard to destroy up to 2 cards your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Tuned Magician
attributes.description:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it be treated as an Effect Monster with this effect:
- While this card is face-up on the field, it is treated as a Tuner.

attributes.name: Crusader of Endymion
attributes.description:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it be treated as an Effect Monster with this effect:
- Once per turn, you can place 1 Spell Counter on a face-up card on the field that you can place a Spell Counter on. If you do, this card gains 600 ATK until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Woodland Archer
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by having 2 or more Normal Monsters in your Graveyard. You can Tribute this card to add 1 Gemini monster from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Knight of the Red Lotus
attributes.description: If you have exactly 3 Normal Monsters in your Graveyard, you can Special Summon this card from your hand by removing from play 2 Normal Monsters from your Graveyard. Once per turn, you can select and Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Normal Monster from your Graveyard.

attributes.name: Energy Bravery
attributes.description: Gemini monsters you control that are being treated as Effect Monsters cannot be destroyed by card effects.

attributes.name: Swap Frog
attributes.description: You can discard 1 WATER monster to Special Summon this card from your hand. When this card is Summoned, you can select and send 1 Level 2 or lower Aqua-Type WATER monster from your Deck or your side of the field to the Graveyard. Once per turn, you can return 1 monster you control to your hand to Normal Summon 1 "Frog" monster, except "Swap Frog" or "Frog the Jam", in addition to your Normal Summon or Set this turn.

attributes.name: Lord British Space Fighter
attributes.description:
If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle, select and activate 1 of these effects:
- You can attack once again in a row.
- Select and destroy 1 Set card on the field.
- Special Summon 1 "Multi Token" (Machine-Type/LIGHT/Level 4/ATK 1200/DEF 1200).

attributes.name: Oshaleon
attributes.description: While you control this face-up card, your opponent cannot select a monster other than "Ocealeon" as an attack target. When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can add 1 Reptile-Type monster with 500 ATK or less from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Djinn Releaser of Rituals
attributes.description: When you Ritual Summon a Ritual Monster, you can remove from play this card from your Graveyard as 1 of the monsters required for the Ritual Summon. While the monster Ritual Summoned using this card is face-up on the field, your opponent cannot Special Summon.

attributes.name: Djinn Presider of Rituals
attributes.description: When you Ritual Summon a Ritual Monster, you can remove from play this card from your Graveyard as 1 of the monsters required for the Ritual Summon. If the monster Ritual Summoned using this card destroys a monster by battle, the controller of the Ritual Monster draws 1 card.

attributes.name: Divine Grace - Northwemko
attributes.description: This card can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "Ritual of Grace". When this card is Ritual Summoned, select a number of face-up cards on the field (except this card), up to the number of monsters you used for the Ritual Summon. While any of the selected cards are face-up on the field, this card cannot be destroyed by card effects.

attributes.name: Blackwing - Silverwind the Ascendant
attributes.description:
1 "Blackwing" Tuner Monster + 2 or more non-Tuner monsters
When this card is Synchro Summoned, you can select and destroy up to 2 face-up monsters on the field with DEF lower than this card's ATK. You cannot conduct your Battle Phase the turn you activate this effect. The next time a "Blackwing" monster you control would be destroyed by battle during your opponent's turn, it is not destroyed; this effect only happens once.

attributes.name: Reptilianne Hydra
attributes.description:
1 "Reptilianne" Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner Monsters
When this card is Synchro Summoned, destroy all face-up monsters with 0 ATK that your opponent controls, and draw 1 card for each monster destroyed.

attributes.name: Black Brutdrago
attributes.description:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner Gemini monsters
Once per turn, you can send 1 Gemini monster from your hand to the Graveyard to select and destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card your opponent controls. When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, you can select 1 Gemini monster in your Graveyard and Special Summon it. The Special Summoned Gemini monster is treated as an Effect Monster, and gains its effect.

attributes.name: Explosive Magician
attributes.description:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner Spellcaster monsters
By removing 2 Spell Counters from your side of the field, destroy 1 Spell Card or Trap Card your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Spider Web
attributes.description: If a monster declares an attack, it is changed to Defense Position at the end of the Damage Step. It cannot change its battle position until the End Phase of its controller's next turn, while this card remains on the field.

attributes.name: Earthbound Whirlwind
attributes.description: Activate only while you control a face-up "Earthbound Immortal" monster. Destroy all Spell and Trap Cards your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Savage Colosseum
attributes.description: If a monster attacks, its controller gains 300 Life Points at the end of the Damage Step. All monsters must attack, if able. During the End Phase, destroy all face-up Attack Position monsters the turn player controls, that did not declare an attack.

attributes.name: Attack Pheromones
attributes.description: If a monster you control attacks a Defense Position monster, change that monster to face-up Attack Position at the end of the Damage Step if your attacking monster is Reptile-Type.

attributes.name: Molting Escape
attributes.description: Equip only to a Reptile-Type monster. Once per turn, if the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle, it is not destroyed. The equipped monster gains 300 ATK at the end of the Damage Step each time this effect is applied.

attributes.name: Reptilianne Spawn
attributes.description: Remove from play 1 "Reptilianne" monster from your Graveyard. Special Summon 2 "Reptilianne Tokens" (Reptile-Type/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) to your side of the field.

attributes.name: Fortune's Future
attributes.description: Select 1 of your removed from play "Fortune Lady" monsters and return it to the Graveyard. Then draw 2 cards.

attributes.name: Time Passage
attributes.description: Increase the Level of 1 face-up "Fortune Lady" monster you control by 3, until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Iron Core Armor
attributes.description: Equip only to a "Koa'ki Meiru" monster. During damage calculation only, monsters that battle with the equipped monster lose ATK equal to the equipped monster's Level x 100. If the equipped monster would be destroyed during the End Phase, you can send this card to the Graveyard instead.

attributes.name: Herculean Power
attributes.description: Once per turn, if your opponent controls a monster and you control no monsters, you can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Gemini monster from your hand.

attributes.name: Gemini Spark
attributes.description: Tribute 1 face-up Level 4 Gemini Monster and select 1 card on the field. Destroy the selected card and draw 1 card.

attributes.name: Ritual of Grace
attributes.description: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Divine Grace - Northwemko". You must also Tribute monsters whose total Levels equal 7 or more from the field or your hand. During your Main Phase, you can remove from play this card from your Graveyard to make 1 face-up Ritual Monster you control become un-targetable by effects this turn.

attributes.name: Preparation of Rites
attributes.description: Add to your hand 1 Level 7 or lower Ritual Monster Card from your Deck. Then you can add to your hand 1 Ritual Spell Card from your Graveyard.

attributes.name: Moray of Greed
attributes.description: Return 2 WATER monsters from your hand to your Deck and draw 3 cards.

attributes.name: Spiritual Forest
attributes.description: A face-up Plant-Type, Beast-Type, and Beast-Warrior-Type monster you control is not destroyed by battle once. This effect can only be used once per turn.

attributes.name: Raging Mad Plants
attributes.description: Face-up Plant-Type monsters you control gains 300 ATK for each Plant-Type monster in your Graveyard until the End Phase of this turn. At the End Phase of your turn, destroy all face-up Plant-Type monsters you control.

attributes.name: Insect Neglect
attributes.description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack, you can negate the attack by removing from play 1 Insect-Type monster in your Graveyard.

attributes.name: Faustian Bargain
attributes.description: Send 1 Special Summoned monster from the field to the Graveyard, and Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Normal Monster in your hand.

attributes.name: Slip Summon
attributes.description: Activate only if your opponent successfully Normal Summons, Flip Summons or Special Summons a monster. Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower monster from your hand in face-up Defense Position. The monster Summoned by this effect is returned to its owner's hand at the End Phase.

attributes.name: Synchro Barrier
attributes.description: Tribute 1 Synchro Monster. Until the End Phase of the next turn, all damage you take becomes 0.

attributes.name: Enlightenment
attributes.description: Activate only at the end of the Damage Step when a Spellcaster-Type monster you control attacked and destroyed an opponent's monster by battle. That Spellcaster-Type monster can attack one more time. You cannot Normal, Flip or Special Summon this turn.

attributes.name: Bending Destiny
attributes.description: Activate only when all face-up monsters you control are "Fortune Lady" monsters. Negate the activation of a Spell or Trap Card or the Normal Summon of your opponent's monster, and remove that card from play. At the End Phase, return the removed card to your opponent's hand.

attributes.name: Inherited Fortune
attributes.description: You can only activate this card during a turn in which a "Fortune Lady" monster you control was destroyed. During your next Standby Phase, you can Special Summon up to 2 "Fortune Lady" monsters from your hand.

attributes.name: Spider Egg
attributes.description: Activate only when your opponent declares a Direct Attack, and if you have 3 or more Insect-Type monster in your Graveyard. Negate that monster's attack and Special Summon 3 "Spider Tokens" (Insect-Type/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 100/DEF 100) to your side of field in Attack Position.

attributes.name: Wolf in Sheep's Clothing
attributes.description: Activate only when your opponent inflicts damage to your Life Points by a direct attack. Reveal 1 Level 1 monster from your hand in order to Special Summon it and 1 other monster of the same name from your deck.

attributes.name: Earthbound Wave
attributes.description: Activate only when you control an "Earthbound Immortal" monster. Negate the activation and effect of a Spell or Trap Card and destroy it.

attributes.name: Roar of the Earthbound
attributes.description: When your opponent declares an attack while you control a face-up "Earthbound Immortal" monster, if the ATK of the attacking monster is lower than the ATK of the "Earthbound Immortal" monster, destroy the attacking monster and inflict damage to your opponent's Life Points equal to half of the ATK of the destroyed monster. This effect can only be used once per turn.

attributes.name: Limit Impulse
attributes.description: Send 2 cards from your hand to the Graveyard to activate this card. Special Summon 2 "Soul Tokens" (DARK/Fiend-Type/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) to your side of the field. These tokens cannot be Tributed, except for a Tribute Summon.

attributes.name: Infernity Force
attributes.description: This card can only be activated when there are no cards in your hand and an "Infernity" monster is selected as an attack target. Destroy the attacking monster, and select 1 "Infernity" monster in your Graveyard and Special Summon it.

attributes.name: Nega-Ton Corepanel
attributes.description: When you control a "Koa'ki Meiru" monster and there is an "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru" card in your Graveyard, negate the activation of a monster's effect, and destroy it.

attributes.name: Gemini Counter
attributes.description: Change 1 face-up Gemini Monster you control to face-down Defense Position and negate the activation of an opponent's Spell Card and destroy it.

attributes.name: Gemini Booster
attributes.description: After the activation, this card becomes an Equip Card and is equipped to a face-up Gemini Monster you control. The equipped monster gains 700 ATK. If this card is destroyed while it is treated as an Equip Spell Card, select 1 face-up Gemini Monster and Gemini Summon it.

attributes.name: Ritual Buster
attributes.description: Activate when you Ritual Summoned a Ritual Monster. Until your next turn's Standby Phase, your opponent cannot use or activate the effects of Spell and Trap Cards.

attributes.name: Stygian Dirge
attributes.description: The levels of all face-up monsters your opponent controls are decreased by 1.

attributes.name: Seal of Wickedness
attributes.description: Once during each of your opponent's Standby Phases, select 1 face-up card on the field. During this turn, the effect of the selected card is negated. The controller of this card has to pay 500 Life Points during each of your Standby Phases or destroy this card.

attributes.name: Appointer of the Red Lotus
attributes.description: Activate by paying 2000 Life Points, and revealing all cards in your hand to your opponent. Look in your opponent's hand and select 1 card. Until your opponent's next End Phase, the selected card is removed from play.

attributes.name: Koa'ki Meiru Maximus
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by removing from play 1 "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru" from your hand. During each of your End Phase, destroy this card unless you send 1 "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru" or 1 "Koa'ki Meiru" monster from your hand to the Graveyard. Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can select and destroy 1 card your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Shire, Lightsworn Spirit
attributes.description: This card gains 300 ATK for each "Lightsworn" monster with a different name in your Graveyard. During each of your End Phases, send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Rinyan, Lightsworn Rogue
attributes.description: FLIP: Return 1 "Lightsworn" monster from your Graveyard to your Deck and draw 1 card.

attributes.name: Yellow Baboon, Archer of the Forest
attributes.description: When a Beast-Type monster you control is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can remove from play 2 Beast-Type monsters from your Graveyard to Special Summon this card from your hand.

attributes.name: Gemini Scorpion
attributes.description: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned, you can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Gemini Monster from your hand.

attributes.name: Metabo-Shark
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned, you can select and return 2 Fish-Type monsters from your Graveyard to the Deck.

attributes.name: Earthbound Revival
attributes.description: Discard 1 card. Select 1 "Earthbound Immortal" monster and 1 Field Spell Card in your Graveyard, and add them to your hand.

attributes.name: Reptilianne Poison
attributes.description: Activate only if you control a face-up "Reptilianne" monster. Change 1 Defense Position monster your opponent controls to face-up Attack Position and reduce its ATK to 0.

attributes.name: Gateway of the Six
attributes.description:
Each time a "Six Samurai" monster is Normal or Special Summoned, place 2 Bushido Counters on this card. You can remove Bushido Counters from your side of the field to apply the following effects.
- 2 Counters: Until the End Phase of this turn, 1 face-up "Six Samurai" or "Shien" Effect Monster gains 500 ATK.
- 4 Counters: Add 1 "Six Samurai" monster from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand.
- 6 Counters: Special Summon 1 "Shien" Effect Monster from your Graveyard.

attributes.name: Dark Rabbit
attributes.description: He leaps up, down, and all around! Nobody can lay a hand on this funny bunny.

attributes.name: Shine Palace
attributes.description: Equip only to a LIGHT monster. It gains 700 ATK.

attributes.name: Dark Simorgh
attributes.description: While this card is face-up on the field its Attribute is also treated as WIND. You can remove from play 1 DARK monster and 1 WIND monster from your Graveyard to Special Summon this card from your hand. You can remove from play 1 DARK monster and 1 WIND monster from your hand to Special Summon this card from your Graveyard. Your opponent cannot Set any cards on the field.

attributes.name: Victoria
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can select and Special Summon 1 Dragon-Type monster from your opponent's Graveyard to your side of the field. Your opponent cannot select another face-up Fairy-Type monster as an attack target.

attributes.name: Ice Queen
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned from the Graveyard. When this face-up card you control is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, if you have 3 or more Spellcaster-Type monsters in your Graveyard, you can select and add 1 Spell Card from your Graveyard to your hand.

attributes.name: Shutendoji
attributes.description:
Once per turn, you can select and activate 1 of the following effects:
- Remove 2 Zombie-Type monsters in your Graveyard from play. Draw 1 card.
- Return 1 of your removed from play Zombie-Type monsters to the top of your Deck.

attributes.name: Archlord Kristya
attributes.description: If you have exactly 4 Fairy-Type monsters in your Graveyard, you can Special Summon this card from your hand. When you do, add 1 Fairy-Type monster from your Graveyard to your hand. Neither player can Special Summon monsters. If this face-up card would be sent from the field to the Graveyard, it returns to the top of the owner's Deck, instead.

attributes.name: Guardian Eatos
attributes.description: If you have no monsters in your Graveyard, you can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can send 1 Equip Card equipped to this card to the Graveyard to select and remove from play up to 3 monsters in your opponent's Graveyard. This card gains 500 ATK for each monster removed by this effect, until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Clear Vice Dragon
attributes.description: You are unaffected by the effects of "Clear World". If this card attacks an opponent's monster, the ATK of this card becomes twice the ATK the attack target, during damage calculation only. If this card would be destroyed by an opponent's card effect, you can discard 1 card instead.

attributes.name: Clear World
attributes.description:
During each of your End Phases, pay 500 Life Points or destroy this card. Each player receives certain effects, depending on the monster Attributes they control:
- LIGHT: Play with your hand revealed at all times.
- DARK: If you control 2 or more monsters, you cannot declare an attack.
- EARTH: During your Standby Phase, destroy 1 face-up Defense Position monster you control.
- WATER: During your End Phase, discard 1 card.
- FIRE: During your End Phase, take 1000 damage.
- WIND: You must pay 500 Life Points to activate a Spell Card.

attributes.name: Hidden Soldiers
attributes.description: Activate only when your opponent Normal Summons or Flip Summons a monster. Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower DARK monster from your hand.

attributes.name: Cyber Harpie Lady
attributes.description: This card's name is treated as "Harpie Lady"

attributes.name: Amazoness Chain Master
attributes.description: When this monster is destroyed as a result of battle and sent to the Graveyard, by paying 1500 Life Points, look at your opponent's hand and select 1 Monster Card from it. Add the selected card to your hand, and you can use it in this Duel. (When the card is sent to the Graveyard, it is sent to the Graveyard of the owner.)

attributes.name: Embodiment of Apophis
attributes.description: You can only activate this card during a Main Phase. After activation, this card is treated as a Normal Monster Card (Reptile-Type/EARTH/Level 4/ATK 1600/DEF 1800), and is Special Summoned to your Monster Card Zone. (This card is also still treated as a Trap Card.)

attributes.name: Exchange of the Spirit
attributes.description: You can only activate this card by paying 1000 Life Points while there are 15 or more cards in your Graveyard. Both players swap the card(s) in their Graveyard with the card(s) in their Deck. Then, shuffle the card(s) in each new Deck and put it on the Deck Zone.

attributes.name: Ancient Lamp
attributes.description: When this face-down Defense Position card is attacked by your opponent's monster, you can make 1 opponent's monster (except the attacking monster) be attacked instead. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Special Summon 1 "La Jinn the Mystical Genie of the Lamp" from your hand.

attributes.name: Grandmaster of the Six Samurai
attributes.description: You can only have 1 "Grandmaster of the Six Samurai" monster on your side of the field. While you control a face-up "Six Samurai" monster, you can Special Summon this card from your hand. When this card is destroyed by your opponent's card effect, add 1 "Six Samurai" monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

attributes.name: Gene-Warped Warwolf
attributes.description: This warwolf was given incalculable strength through horrific genetic manipulation. Its gentle nature was completely wiped out, and it now lives only to unleash destruction.

attributes.name: Frostosaurus
attributes.description: This monster's metabolism enables it to endure long periods of cold, harnessing the power to become a creature of solid ice! Nothing else can withstand such temperatures, especially victims of its glacial rampage.

attributes.name: Spiral Serpent
attributes.description: When huge whirlpools lay cities asunder, it is the hunger of this sea serpent at work. No one has ever escaped its dreaded Spiral Wave to accurately describe the terror they experienced.

attributes.name: Neo-Spacian Air Hummingbird
attributes.description: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can gain 500 Life Points for each card in your opponent's hand.

attributes.name: Neo-Spacian Grand Mole
attributes.description: If this card attacks or is attacked by an opponent's monster, you can return both monsters to their owners' hands at the start of the Damage Step (without damage calculation).

attributes.name: Neo-Spacian Glow Moss
attributes.description:
When this card attacks or is attacked, your opponent draws 1 card. Reveal that card, and based on its type apply the proper effect:
- Monster: End the Battle Phase.
- Spell: You can change this attack to a direct attack instead.
- Trap: This monster is changed to Defense Position.

attributes.name: The Six Samurai - Yaichi
attributes.description: Once per turn, while you control another "Six Samurai" monster with a different name, you can destroy 1 Set Spell or Trap Card. This monster cannot declare an attack during the turn this effect is used. If this card would be destroyed, you can destroy another "Six Samurai" monster you control instead.

attributes.name: The Six Samurai - Kamon
attributes.description: Once per turn, while you control another "Six Samurai" monster with a different name, you can destroy 1 face-up Spell or Trap Card. This monster cannot declare an attack during the turn this effect is used. If this card would be destroyed, you can destroy another "Six Samurai" monster you control instead.

attributes.name: The Six Samurai - Yariza
attributes.description: While you control another "Six Samurai" monster with a different name, this card can attack your opponent directly. If this card would be destroyed, you can destroy another "Six Samurai" monster you control instead.

attributes.name: The Six Samurai - Nisashi
attributes.description: While you control another "Six Samurai" monster with a different name, this card can attack twice during the same Battle Phase. If this card would be destroyed, you can destroy another "Six Samurai" monster you control instead.

attributes.name: The Six Samurai - Zanji
attributes.description: While you control another "Six Samurai" monster with a different name, destroy any monster this card attacks at the end of the Damage Step. If this card would be destroyed, you can destroy another "Six Samurai" monster you control instead.

attributes.name: The Six Samurai - Irou
attributes.description: While you control another "Six Samurai" monster with a different name, if this card attacks a face-down Defense Position monster, destroy the monster immediately with this card's effect without flipping it face-up or applying damage calculation. If this card would be destroyed, you can destroy another "Six Samurai" monster you control instead.

attributes.name: Great Shogun Shien
attributes.description: If you control 2 or more "Six Samurai" monsters, you can Special Summon this card from your hand. Your opponent can activate only 1 Spell/Trap Card each turn. If this card would be destroyed, you can destroy a "Six Samurai" monster you control instead.

attributes.name: Shien's Footsoldier
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon 1 Level 3 or lower "Six Samurai" monster from your Deck.

attributes.name: Sage of Silence
attributes.description: If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle, your opponent cannot activate Spell Cards during the next turn.

attributes.name: Sage of Stillness
attributes.description: If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle, your opponent cannot activate Trap Cards during the next turn.

attributes.name: Reign-Beaux, Overlord of Dark World
attributes.description: If this card is discarded from the hand to the Graveyard by an opponent's card effect, Special Summon this card. If this card is Special Summoned this way, destroy all monsters OR all Spell and Trap Cards your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Kahkki, Guerilla of Dark World
attributes.description: If this card is discarded from the hand to the Graveyard by a card effect, destroy 1 monster on the field.

attributes.name: Gren, Tactician of Dark World
attributes.description: If this card is discarded from the hand to the Graveyard by a card effect, destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card on the field.

attributes.name: Fusion Devourer
attributes.description: When this card battles a Fusion Monster, the ATK of the Fusion Monster becomes 0 during the Damage Step only.

attributes.name: Electric Virus
attributes.description: By discarding this card from your hand to the Graveyard, take control of 1 face-up Machine or Dragon-Type monster your opponent controls until the end of this turn.

attributes.name: Puppet Plant
attributes.description: By discarding this card from your hand to the Graveyard, take control of 1 face-up Warrior or Spellcaster-Type monster your opponent controls until the end of this turn.

attributes.name: Marionette Mite
attributes.description: By discarding this card from your hand to the Graveyard, take control of 1 face-up Fiend or Zombie-Type monster your opponent controls until the end of this turn.

attributes.name: D.D. Crow
attributes.description: By discarding this card from your hand to the Graveyard, remove from play 1 card from your opponent's Graveyard. This effect can be activated during either player's turn.

attributes.name: Silent Abyss
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, destroy all face-down and non-WATER monsters.

attributes.name: Firestorm Prominence
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, destroy all face-down and non-FIRE monsters.

attributes.name: Raging Earth
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, destroy all face-down and non-EARTH monsters.

attributes.name: Destruction Cyclone
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, destroy all face-down and non-WIND monsters.

attributes.name: Radiant Spirit
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, destroy all face-down and non-LIGHT monsters.

attributes.name: Umbral Soul
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, destroy all face-down and non-DARK monsters.

attributes.name: Alien Psychic
attributes.description: This card is changed to Defense Position when it is Normal Summoned or Flip Summoned. Monsters with A-Counters cannot declare an attack.

attributes.name: Lycanthrope
attributes.description: This card can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "Synthesis Spell". When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, inflict 200 damage to your opponent for each Normal Monster in your Graveyard.

attributes.name: Cu Chulainn the Awakened
attributes.description: This card can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, Emblem of the Awakening. Once per turn, you can remove from play 1 Normal Monster from your Graveyard. This card gains ATK equal to that Normal Monster's ATK, until the Standby Phase of your next turn.

attributes.name: Elemental Hero Air Neos
attributes.description:
"Elemental Hero Neos" + "Neo-Spacian Air Hummingbird"
This card can only be Special Summoned from your Fusion Deck by returning the above cards you control to the Deck. (You do not use "Polymerization".) While your Life Points are lower than your opponent's, this card gains ATK equal to the difference. This card returns to the Fusion Deck during the End Phase.

attributes.name: Elemental Hero Grand Neos
attributes.description:
"Elemental Hero Neos" + "Neo-Spacian Grand Mole"
This card can only be Special Summoned from your Fusion Deck by returning the above cards you control to the Deck. (You do not use "Polymerization".) Once per turn, you can return 1 monster your opponent controls to its owner's hand. This card returns to the Fusion Deck during the End Phase.

attributes.name: Elemental Hero Glow Neos
attributes.description:
"Elemental Hero Neos" + "Neo-Spacian Glow Moss"
This card can only be Special Summoned from your Fusion Deck by returning the above cards you control to the Deck. (You do not use "Polymerization".) This card returns to the Fusion Deck during the End Phase. Once per turn, during your Main Phase 1, you can destroy 1 face-up card your opponent controls. Based on that card's type, apply the proper effect:
- Monster: This card cannot battle this turn.
- Spell: This card can attack your opponent directly this turn.
- Trap: This card is changed to Defense Position.

attributes.name: Ancient Rules
attributes.description: Special Summon 1 Level 5 or higher Normal Monster from your hand.

attributes.name: Dark World Dealings
attributes.description: Each player draws 1 card. Then each player discards 1 card.

attributes.name: Neos Force
attributes.description: Equip only to "Elemental Hero Neos". It gains 800 ATK. When it destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the original ATK of the destroyed monster. During the End Phase, shuffle this card into the Deck.

attributes.name: Legendary Ebon Steed
attributes.description: Equip only to a "Six Samurai" monster. It gains 200 ATK and DEF. If it would be destroyed, destroy this card instead.

attributes.name: "A" Cell Scatter Burst
attributes.description: Select 1 face-up "Alien" monster you control. Destroy it and distribute new A-Counters equal to its level among your opponent's face-up monsters.

attributes.name: Twister
attributes.description: Pay 500 Life Points. Destroy 1 face-up Spell or Trap card.

attributes.name: Synthesis Spell
attributes.description: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Lycanthrope". You must also Tribute monsters whose total Levels equal 6 or more from the field or your hand.

attributes.name: Emblem of the Awakening
attributes.description: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Cu Chulainn the Awakened". You must also Tribute monsters whose total Levels equal 4 or more from the field or your hand.

attributes.name: Advanced Ritual Art
attributes.description: Select 1 Ritual Monster in your hand. Send Normal Monsters from your Deck to the Graveyard whose total Levels are equal to that Ritual Monster's. Ritual Summon a card with the name of the selected Ritual Monster from your hand.

attributes.name: Card Trader
attributes.description: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase, you can shuffle 1 card from your hand into the Deck, then draw 1 card.

attributes.name: Shien's Castle of Mist
attributes.description: When a "Six Samurai" monster is attacked, the attacking monster loses 500 ATK during damage calculation only.

attributes.name: Skyscraper 2 - Hero City
attributes.description: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can Special Summon 1 "Elemental Hero" monster from your Graveyard that was destroyed by battle. (Only this card's controller can use this effect.)

attributes.name: Change of Hero - Reflector Ray
attributes.description: Activate only when an "Elemental Hero" Fusion Monster you control is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard. Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the destroyed Fusion Monster's Level x 300.

attributes.name: Hero Medal
attributes.description: When this Set card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard by a card effect controlled by your opponent, shuffle this card into the Deck. Then draw 1 card.

attributes.name: Return of the Six Samurai
