attributes.description: Special Summon 1 "Six Samurai" monster from your Graveyard. Destroy it at the end of this turn.

attributes.name: Eliminating the League
attributes.description: Discard 1 Spell Card. Destroy 1 face-up monster your opponent controls. Check your opponent's hand, and all cards in their hand with the same name as the destroyed card are sent to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Flashbang
attributes.description: Activate only after damage calculation when a monster your opponent controls made a direct attack. It is now the End Phase of this turn.

attributes.name: The Transmigration Prophecy
attributes.description: Select 2 cards from the Graveyard(s), and shuffle them into their owner's Deck(s).

attributes.name: Anti-Fusion Device
attributes.description: Destroy 1 face-up Fusion Monster on the field.

attributes.name: Ritual Sealing
attributes.description: Destroy 1 face-up Ritual Monster on the field.

attributes.name: Birthright
attributes.description: Select 1 Normal Monster from your Graveyard and Special Summon it in face-up Attack Position. When this card is removed from the field, destroy that monster. When that monster is removed from the field, destroy this card.

attributes.name: Swift Samurai Storm!
attributes.description: Each turn, after the first time a "Six Samurai" monster you control battles, all "Six Samurai" monsters you control gain 300 ATK until the end of this turn.

attributes.name: Cloak and Dagger
attributes.description: Declare 1 Monster Card name. If your opponent Normal Summons, Special Summons, or flips that monster(s) face-up, remove that monster(s) and this card from play.

attributes.name: Pulling the Rug
attributes.description: Negate the activation and effect of an Effect Monster whose effect activated when Normal Summoned, and destroy that monster.

attributes.name: Neo-Parshath, the Sky Paladin
attributes.description: You can Special Summon this card by Tributing 1 "Airknight Parshath". During battle between this attacking card and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of this card, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent. When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, draw 1 card. While "The Sanctuary in the Sky" is on the field and your Life Points are higher than your opponent's, this card gains ATK and DEF equal to the difference in Life Points.

attributes.name: Meltiel, Sage of the Sky
attributes.description: Each time a Counter Trap Card is activated, gain 1000 Life Points, and if "The Sanctuary in the Sky" is on the field, destroy 1 card your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Harvest Angel of Wisdom
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can add 1 Counter Trap Card from your Graveyard to your hand.

attributes.name: Freya, Spirit of Victory
attributes.description: While you control a Fairy-Type monster(s) other than "Freya, Spirit of Victory", this card cannot be selected as an attack target. All Fairy-Type monsters you control gain 400 ATK and DEF.

attributes.name: Nova Summoner
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon 1 LIGHT Fairy-Type monster with 1500 ATK or less from the Deck. If "The Sanctuary in the Sky" is on the field, you can Special Summon 1 "Airknight Parshath" instead.

attributes.name: Radiant Jeral
attributes.description: When this card is sent to the Graveyard (except if Destroyed by battle), gain 1000 Life Points if "The Sanctuary in the Sky" is on the field.

attributes.name: Gellenduo
attributes.description: This card cannot be destroyed by battle. When this card's controller takes any damage, destroy this card. If you Tribute Summon a LIGHT Fairy-Type monster, you can treat this 1 monsters as 2 Tribute Monsters for the Tribute Summon.

attributes.name: Aegis of Gaia
attributes.description: Gain 3000 Life Points. If this face-up card is removed from the field, lose 3000 Life Points.

attributes.name: Black Luster Soldier
attributes.description: This monster can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "Black Luster Ritual". You must also offer monsters whose total Level Stars equal 8 or more as a Tribute from the field or your hand.

attributes.name: Black Luster Ritual
attributes.description: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Black Luster Soldier". You must also offer monsters whose total Level Stars equal 8 or more as a Tribute from the field or your hand.

attributes.name: Gemini Summoner
attributes.description: Once per turn, during your opponent's End Phase, you can pay 500 Life Points to Normal Summon or Set 1 Gemini monster from your hand or Normal Summon 1 face-up Gemini monster you control. Once per turn, if this card would be destroyed by battle, it is not destroyed. (Damage calculation is applied normally).

attributes.name: Alien Shocktrooper
attributes.description: The Aliens have used a mysterious biological substance to create a supreme race of soldiers. They do not have the natural powers of the other Aliens, but can make stunning physical attacks.

attributes.name: Volcanic Rat
attributes.description: This mutated mouse dwells in the core of active volcanoes. No amount of heat is too much for it to bear.

attributes.name: Renge, Gatekeeper of Dark World
attributes.description: His renowned olympic physique has made him famous with the populace of Dark World. They call him "Iron Wall Renge" because no one can break through his incredible defenses.

attributes.name: Hunter Dragon
attributes.description: This dragon has taken down countless prey with its sharp fangs. It strikes very quickly, because if it does not strike first, it is vulnerable to a counter-attack.

attributes.name: Venom Cobra
attributes.description: Hard scales cover all parts of this gigantic cobra. It hunts by shooting out massive amounts of venom, but because of its large size, its attack pattern is easily predicted.

attributes.name: Rainbow Dragon
attributes.description:
This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except from your hand while you have 7 "Crystal Beast" cards with different names on the field or in your Graveyard. This card cannot activate its effects the turn it is Special Summoned.
- Send all "Crystal Beast" monsters you control to the Graveyard; this card gains 1000 ATK for each card sent. You can activate this effect during either player's turn.
- You can remove from play all "Crystal Beast" Monster Cards in your Graveyard to return all cards on the field to their owners' Decks.

attributes.name: Chrysalis Pantail
attributes.description: You can Tribute this card while "Neo Space" is on the field to Special Summon 1 "Neo-Spacian Dark Panther" from your hand or Deck.

attributes.name: Chrysalis Chicky
attributes.description: You can Tribute this card while "Neo Space" is on the field to Special Summon 1 "Neo-Spacian Air Hummingbird" from your hand or Deck.

attributes.name: Chrysalis Pinny
attributes.description: You can Tribute this card while "Neo Space" is on the field to Special Summon 1 "Neo-Spacian Glow Moss" from your hand or Deck.

attributes.name: Chrysalis Larva
attributes.description: You can Tribute this card while "Neo Space" is on the field to Special Summon 1 "Neo-Spacian Flare Scarab" from your hand or Deck.

attributes.name: Chrysalis Mole
attributes.description: You can Tribute this card while "Neo Space" is on the field to Special Summon 1 "Neo-Spacian Grand Mole" from your hand or Deck.

attributes.name: Necro Gardna
attributes.description: Remove from play this card in your Graveyard to negate 1 attack from a monster your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Vennominaga the Deity of Poisonous Snakes
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except with its own effect or with "Rise of the Snake Deity". This card gains 500 ATK for each Reptile-Type monster in your Graveyard. This card cannot be targeted and is unaffected by the effects of other Monsters, Spells, and Traps. When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can remove from play 1 other Reptile-Type monster from your Graveyard to Special Summon this card. When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, place 1 Hyper-Venom Counter on it. When 3 Hyper-Venom Counters are on this card, you win the Duel.

attributes.name: Vennominon the King of Poisonous Snakes
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned by another Effect Monster's effect. This card is unaffected by "Venom Swamp". This card gains 500 ATK for each Reptile-Type monster in your Graveyard. When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can remove from play 1 other Reptile-Type monster from your Graveyard to Special Summon this card.

attributes.name: Venom Snake
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can place 1 Venom Counter on 1 monster your opponent controls. If you activate this effect, this card cannot attack during this turn.

attributes.name: Venom Boa
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can place 2 Venom Counters on 1 monster your opponent controls. If you activate this effect, this card cannot attack during this turn.

attributes.name: Venom Serpent
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can place 1 Venom Counter on 1 monster your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Elemental Hero Neos Alius
attributes.description:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it be treated as an Effect Monster with this effect:
- This face-up card's name is treated as "Elemental Hero Neos".

attributes.name: Chthonian Emperor Dragon
attributes.description:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it be treated as an Effect Monster with this effect:
- This card can attack twice during the same Battle Phase.

attributes.name: Aquarian Alessa
attributes.description:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it be treated as an Effect Monster with this effect:
- When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, they discard 1 random card.

attributes.name: Lucky Pied Piper
attributes.description:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it be treated as an Effect Monster with this effect:
- When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, draw 1 card.

attributes.name: Grasschopper
attributes.description:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it be treated as an Effect Monster with this effect:
- This card can attack all monsters your opponent controls once each.

attributes.name: Goggle Golem
attributes.description:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it be treated as an Effect Monster with this effect:
- The original ATK of this card becomes 2100.

attributes.name: Dawnbreak Gardna
attributes.description:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it be treated as an Effect Monster with this effect:
- The original DEF of this card becomes 2300.

attributes.name: Doom Shaman
attributes.description:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it be treated as an Effect Monster with this effect:
- Once per turn, you can Special Summon 1 Fiend-Type monster from your hand or from either player's Graveyard. When this card is removed from the field, destroy all Fiend-Type monsters Special Summoned by this effect.

attributes.name: King Pyron
attributes.description:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it be treated as an Effect Monster with this effect:
- Once per turn, you can inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Shadow Delver
attributes.description:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it be treated as an Effect Monster with this effect:
- Once per turn, you can select 1 face-up Level 4 or lower DARK monster you control. It can attack your opponent directly this turn.

attributes.name: Flint Lock
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can equip a "Flint" on the field to this card. You can take any "Flint" equipped to this card and equip it to another face-up monster. This card can only be equipped with 1 "Flint" at a time. While equipped with "Flint", this card is unaffected by "Flint's" effect and cannot be destroyed by battle.

attributes.name: Gravitic Orb
attributes.description: FLIP: Change the Battle Positions of all face-up monsters your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Phantom Cricket
attributes.description: FLIP: Return 1 face-down monster from the field to the top of its owner's Deck.

attributes.name: Crystal Seer
attributes.description: FLIP: Pick up 2 cards from the top of your Deck. Select 1 of those cards and add it to your hand, and put the other card on the bottom of your Deck.

attributes.name: Neo Space Pathfinder
attributes.description: You can discard this card to the Graveyard to add 1 "Neo Space" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand.

attributes.name: Frost and Flame Dragon
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by removing from play 1 FIRE and 2 WATER monsters from your Graveyard. Once per turn, you can discard 1 card to destroy 1 monster on the field.

attributes.name: Desert Twister
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by removing from play 1 EARTH and 2 WIND monsters from your Graveyard. Once per turn, you can discard 1 card to destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card on the field.

attributes.name: Ritual Raven
attributes.description: If you Ritual Summon a DARK Ritual Monster, this 1 card can be used as the entire Tribute.

attributes.name: Razor Lizard
attributes.description: While you control another Reptile-Type monster, if this card attacks a face-down Defense Position monster, destroy the monster immediately with this card's effect without flipping it face-up or applying damage calculation.

attributes.name: Light Effigy
attributes.description: If you Tribute Summon a LIGHT Normal Monster, you can treat this 1 monster as 2 Tributes.

attributes.name: Dark Effigy
attributes.description: If you Tribute Summon a DARK Normal Monster, you can treat this 1 monster as 2 Tributes.

attributes.name: Zombie Master
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can send 1 Monster Card from your hand to the Graveyard to Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Zombie-Type Monster from either player's Graveyard.

attributes.name: Neo-Spacian Marine Dolphin
attributes.description: This card's name is also treated as "Neo-Spacian Aqua Dolphin". This card cannot be Special Summoned except with "NEX". Once per turn, you can discard 1 card to look at your opponent's hand and select 1 Monster Card in it. If you control a monster with ATK greater than or equal to the selected monster's, destroy the selected monster and inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Elemental Hero Marine Neos
attributes.description:
"Elemental Hero Neos" + "Neo-Spacian Marine Dolphin"
This card can only be Special Summoned from your Fusion Deck by returning the above cards you control to the Deck. (You do not use "Polymerization"). Once per turn, you can select 1 random card from your opponent's hand and destroy it.

attributes.name: Elemental Hero Darkbright
attributes.description:
"Elemental Hero Sparkman" + "Elemental Hero Necroshade"
This monster cannot be Special Summoned except by Fusion Summon. During battle between this attacking card and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of this card, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent. If this card attacks, it is changed to Defense Position at the end of the Damage Step. If this card is destroyed, destroy 1 monster your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Elemental Hero Magma Neos
attributes.description:
"Elemental Hero Neos" + "Neo-Spacian Flare Scarab" + "Neo-Spacian Grand Mole"
This card can only be Special Summoned from your Fusion Deck by returning the above cards you control to the Deck. (You do not use "Polymerization".) This card gains 400 ATK for each card on the field. This card returns to the Fusion Deck during the End Phase. When this card is returned to the Fusion Deck by this effect, return all cards on the field to their owners' hands.

attributes.name: Ojama Knight
attributes.description:
1 "Ojama" monster + 1 "Ojama" monster
Select up to 2 of your opponent's Monster Card Zones. The selected zones cannot be used.

attributes.name: Fifth Hope
attributes.description: Select 5 "Elemental Hero" cards from your Graveyard and shuffle them into the Deck. Then draw 2 cards. Draw 3 cards instead if you had no other cards on your side of the field and in your hand when you activated this card.

attributes.name: Reverse of Neos
attributes.description: Activate only when a face-up "Neos" Fusion Monster you control is destroyed. Special Summon 1 "Elemental Hero Neos" from your Deck in Attack Position. It gains 1000 ATK and is destroyed during the End Phase of this turn.

attributes.name: Convert Contact
attributes.description: Activate only while you control no monsters. Send 1 "Neo-Spacian" monster from your hand and 1 from your Deck to the Graveyard. Then draw 2 cards.

attributes.name: Cocoon Party
attributes.description: Special Summon 1 "Chrysalis" monster from your Deck for each "Neo-Spacian" monster with a different name in your Graveyard.

attributes.name: NEX
attributes.description: Send 1 face-up "Neo-Spacian" monster you control to the Graveyard. Special Summon 1 Level 4 monster with the same name from your Fusion Deck.

attributes.name: Cocoon Rebirth
attributes.description: You can Tribute 1 face-up "Chrysalis" monster you control to Special Summon 1 "Neo-Spacian" monster written in the card text of that card from either player's Graveyard.

attributes.name: Venom Swamp
attributes.description: Monsters lose 500 ATK for each Venom Counter on them. Destroy a monster if its ATK becomes 0 by this effect. During each player's End Phase, place 1 Venom Counter on each face-up monster, except "Venom" monsters.

attributes.name: Snake Rain
attributes.description: Discard 1 card. Select 4 Reptile-Type monsters from your Deck and send them to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Venom Shot
attributes.description: Activate only while you control a face-up "Venom" monster, "Vennominaga the Deity of Poisonous Snakes", or "Vennominon the King of Poisonous Snakes". Send 1 Reptile-Type monster from your Deck to the Graveyard and place 2 Venom Counters on 1 face-up monster your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Cyberdark Impact!
attributes.description: Return 1 "Cyberdark Edge", "Cyberdark Keel" and "Cyberdark Horn" from your side of the field, hand, or Graveyard to your Deck. Special Summon 1 "Cyberdark Dragon" from your Fusion Deck. (This Special Summon is treated as a Fusion Summon.)

attributes.name: Flint Missile
attributes.description: Destroy 1 monster equipped with "Flint". You can return this card to your Deck instead of sending it to the Graveyard after it resolves.

attributes.name: Double Summon
attributes.description: You can Normal Summon 1 additional time this turn. You can only gain this effect once per turn.

attributes.name: Summoner's Art
attributes.description: Add 1 Level 5 or higher Normal Monster from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Creature Seizure
attributes.description: Each player gives their opponent control of 1 of their monsters (controller's choice). You must choose a face-up Normal Monster.

attributes.name: Phalanx Pike
attributes.description: The equipped monster gains 900 ATK for each card in either Graveyard that has the same card name it does.

attributes.name: Symbols of Duty
attributes.description: Send 1 Normal Monster you control to the Graveyard. Select and Special Summon 1 monster from either Graveyard and equip it with this card. When this card is removed from the field, destroy the equipped monster.

attributes.name: Amulet of Ambition
attributes.description: Equip only to a Normal Monster. If it battles a monster with a higher Level, the equipped monster gains 500 ATK x the difference in Levels (during that battle only). When this card is sent to the Graveyard, you can return it to the top of the Deck.

attributes.name: Broken Bamboo Sword
attributes.description: The equipped monster gains 0 ATK.

attributes.name: Mirror Gate
attributes.description: Activate only when your opponent's monster declares an attack targeting a face-up "Elemental Hero" monster you control. Switch control of the opponent's attacking monster with the targeted monster you control, then calculate damage. Control of those monsters switches back during the End Phase of this turn.

attributes.name: Hero Counterattack
attributes.description: Activate only when an "Elemental Hero" monster you control is destroyed by battle. Your opponent selects 1 random card from your hand. If that card is an "Elemental Hero" monster, destroy 1 monster your opponent controls, then Special Summon the selected card.

attributes.name: Cocoon Veil
attributes.description: Activate by Tributing 1 face-up "Chrysalis" monster. This turn, any damage to a player caused by an effect becomes 0. Special Summon 1 "Neo-Spacian" monster written on the "Chrysalis" monster you Tributed from your hand, Deck or from either player's Graveyard.

attributes.name: Snake Whistle
attributes.description: Activate only when a Reptile-Type monster you control is destroyed. Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Reptile-Type monster from your Deck.

attributes.name: Damage = Reptile
attributes.description: Once per turn, when you take Battle Damage from a battle involving a Reptile-Type monster, you can Special Summon 1 Reptile-Type monster from your Deck with ATK less than or equal to the Battle Damage you took.

attributes.name: Snake Deity's Command
attributes.description: Activate by showing your opponent 1 "Venom" monster in your hand. Negate the activation and effect of an opponent's Spell Card, and destroy it.

attributes.name: Rise of the Snake Deity
attributes.description: Activate only when a face-up "Vennominon the King of Poisonous Snakes" you control is destroyed. Special Summon 1 "Vennominaga the Deity of Poisonous Snakes" from your hand or Deck.

attributes.name: Ambush Fangs
attributes.description: Activate only when a face-up "Venom" monster you control is declared as an attack target. Negate the attack and end the Battle Phase. Then place 1 Venom Counter on the monster that attacked.

attributes.name: Venom Burn
attributes.description: Select 1 monster with a Venom Counter(s). Remove all Venom Counters from that card, and inflict 700 damage to your opponent for each Venom Counter removed.

attributes.name: Common Charity
attributes.description: Draw 2 cards, then remove from play 1 Normal Monster Card from your hand. If you don't have any Normal Monster Cards in your hand to remove, send all cards in your hand to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Destructive Draw
attributes.description: If either player has no cards in their hand at the start of their Draw Phase, they can draw 1 more card in addition to their normal draw. This card's controller loses 700 Life Points during their End Phase. (If less than 700, they become 0 instead.) When this face-up card is removed from the field, inflict 3000 damage to the player who controlled it.

attributes.name: Shield Spear
attributes.description: Target monster gains 400 ATK and DEF until the end of this turn.

attributes.name: Strike Slash
attributes.description: Activate only when a monster you control declares an attack. Until the end of this turn, that monster gains 700 ATK, and during battle between that attacking monster and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of that card, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Spell Reclamation
attributes.description: Discard 1 card and chain this card to a Spell Card you activated. Whenever that Spell Card is sent to the Graveyard, return it to its owner's hand.

attributes.name: Trap Reclamation
attributes.description: Discard 1 card and chain this card to a Trap Card you activated. Whenever that Trap Card is sent to the Graveyard, return it to its owner's hand.

attributes.name: Gift Card
attributes.description: Your opponent gains 3000 Life Points.

attributes.name: The Gift of Greed
attributes.description: Your opponent draws 2 cards.

attributes.name: Counter Counter
attributes.description: Negate the activation of a Counter Trap Card, and destroy it.

attributes.name: Ocean's Keeper
attributes.description: During battle between this attacking card and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of this card, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent. When this card is destroyed by battle, add 1 "Thousand-Eyes Jellyfish" or 1 "Cranium Fish" from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Thousand-Eyes Jellyfish
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by Tributing 1 "Ocean's Keeper". Your opponent must play with their hand revealed.

attributes.name: Cranium Fish
attributes.description: You can Special Summon this card by Tributing 1 "Ocean's Keeper". You can discard 1 WATER monster to the Graveyard to destroy 1 face-down card.

attributes.name: Abyssal Kingshark
attributes.description: Once per turn, if this card would be destroyed by an effect that does not target it, it is not destroyed.

attributes.name: Mormolith
attributes.description: You can Tribute 1 EARTH monster to destroy all face-up monsters with DEF equal to or less than the ATK of the Tributed card.

attributes.name: Fossil Tusker
attributes.description: When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, inflict 400 damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Phantom Dragonray Bronto
attributes.description:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it be treated as an Effect Monster with this effect:
- The original ATK of this card becomes 2300. If this card attacks, it is changed to Defense Position at the end of the Battle Phase. This card's battle position cannot be changed until the end of your next turn, except with a card effect.

attributes.name: Il Blud
attributes.description:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it be treated as an Effect Monster with this effect:
- Once per turn, you can Special Summon 1 Zombie-Type monster from your hand or from either player's Graveyard. When this card is removed from the field, destroy all Zombie-Type monsters Special Summoned by this effect.

attributes.name: Blazewing Butterfly
attributes.description:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while it is face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it be treated as an Effect Monster with this effect:
- You can Tribute this card to Special Summon 1 Gemini monster from your Graveyard, except "Blazewing Butterfly". A Gemini monster Special Summoned by this effect is treated as an Effect Monster, and gains its effect.

attributes.name: Avenging Knight Parshath
attributes.description:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner LIGHT monsters
Once per turn, you can change the battle position of 1 face-up monster your opponent controls. During battle between this attacking card and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of this card, inflict the difference in Battle Damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Turbo Booster
attributes.description: If you Normal Summon a monster this turn, you can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can Tribute this card to destroy 1 monster your opponent controls that battled one of your monsters this turn.

attributes.name: Nitro Synchron
attributes.description: When this card is sent to the Graveyard for the Synchro Summon of a "Nitro" Synchro Monster, draw 1 card.

attributes.name: Quillbolt Hedgehog
attributes.description: If you control a face-up Tuner Monster, you can Special Summon this card from your Graveyard. If this card was Summoned this way, remove it from play when it is removed from the field.

attributes.name: Ghost Gardna
attributes.description: When a face-up monster you control is selected as an attack target, you can switch the attack target to this card. When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, decrease the ATK of 1 monster your opponent controls by 1000 until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Shield Warrior
attributes.description: During damage calculation you can remove this card in your Graveyard from play to prevent 1 monster you control from being destroyed by battle once.

attributes.name: Small Piece Golem
attributes.description: If you control a face-up "Big Piece Golem" when you Summon this card, you can Special Summon 1 "Medium Piece Golem" from your Deck. The effect of the monster Special Summoned this way is negated.

attributes.name: Medium Piece Golem
attributes.description: If you control a face-up "Big Piece Golem", when you Summon this card, you can Special Summon 1 "Small Piece Golem" from your Deck. The effect of the monster Special Summoned by this effect is negated.

attributes.name: Big Piece Golem
attributes.description: If your opponent controls a monster and you control no monsters, you may Normal Summon this card without Tribute.

attributes.name: Sinister Sprocket
attributes.description: If this card is sent to the Graveyard for the Synchro Summon of a DARK Synchro Monster, you can destroy 1 face-up Spell or Trap Card.

attributes.name: Dark Resonator
attributes.description: Once per turn, if this card would be destroyed by battle, it is not destroyed. (Damage calculation is applied normally).

attributes.name: Twin-Shield Defender
attributes.description: If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can halve the ATK of 1 monster your opponent controls until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Jutte Fighter
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can switch 1 face-up Attack Position Monster your opponent controls to Defense Position.

attributes.name: Handcuffs Dragon
attributes.description: If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, equip this card to the monster that destroyed it as an Equip Card. The equipped monster loses 1800 ATK. If this card is sent to the Graveyard by the equipped monster being destroyed, you can Special Summon this card to your side of the field.

attributes.name: Montage Dragon
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by sending 3 other monsters from your hand to the Graveyard. This card's ATK is equal to the combined Levels of the sent monsters x 300.

attributes.name: Gonogo
attributes.description: Monsters that battle this card are flipped face-down at the end of the Damage Step.

attributes.name: Mind Master
attributes.description: You can pay 800 Life Points and Tribute 1 other Psychic-Type monster you control to Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Psychic-Type monster from your Deck in face-up Attack Position.

attributes.name: Doctor Cranium
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can pay 800 Life Points to add 1 Psychic-Type monster from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Krebons
attributes.description: When this card is selected as an attack target, by paying 800 Life Points, negate the attack.

attributes.name: Mind Protector
attributes.description: This card's controller must pay 500 Life Points during each of their Standby Phases.  If they cannot, destroy this card.  Monsters with 2000 or less ATK cannot declare an attack, except for Psychic-Type monsters.

attributes.name: Psychic Commander
attributes.description: When a Psychic-Type monster you control battles, you can pay Life Points in multiples of 100 (max. 500). Target monster your opponent controls that is battling loses ATK and DEF equal to the value of Life Points paid until the end of the turn.

attributes.name: Psychic Snail
attributes.description: Pay 800 Life Points. Target Psychic-Type monster you control can attack twice during each Battle Phase. This card cannot attack during a turn in which you activate this effect.

attributes.name: Telekinetic Shocker
attributes.description: When a Psychic-Type monster(s) would be destroyed, you can pay 500 Life Points to destroy this card instead.

attributes.name: Destructotron
attributes.description: You can pay 1000 Life Points to destroy 1 face-down Spell or Trap Card your opponent controls. During the End Phase, if you control no Psychic-Type monsters other than this card, destroy this card.

attributes.name: Gladiator Beast Equeste
attributes.description: When this card is Special Summoned by the effect of a "Gladiator Beast" monster, select 1 "Gladiator Beast" card in your Graveyard and add it to your hand. If this card battles, by returning it to the Deck at the end of the Battle Phase, Special Summon 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster except "Gladiator Beast Equite" from your Deck.

attributes.name: Jenis, Lightsworn Mender
attributes.description: During the End Phase of a turn when card(s) were sent from your Deck to the Graveyard by the effect(s) of a "Lightsworn" card(s), inflict 500 damage to your opponent and you gain 500 Life Points.

attributes.name: Dharc the Dark Charmer
attributes.description: FLIP: Take control of 1 face-up DARK monster your opponent controls for as long as this card remains face-up.

attributes.name: Mecha Bunny
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon 1 "Mecha Bunny" from your Deck in face-down Defense Position. When this card is flipped face-up, select 1 card on the field and inflict 500 damage to the controller of that card.

attributes.name: Oyster Meister
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed (except by battle) and sent to the Graveyard, Special Summon 1 "Oyster Token" (Fish-Type/WATER/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0).

attributes.name: Twin-Barrel Dragon
attributes.description: When this card is Summoned, you can select 1 card your opponent controls. Toss 2 coins. If both coin tosses are Heads, destroy the selected card.

attributes.name: Izanagi
attributes.description: This card can be Special Summoned by removing from play 1 Spirit monster from your hand. Spirit monsters you control do not have to have their effects activated during the End Phase.

attributes.name: Kunoichi
attributes.description: When control of this card is switched, the controller of this card randomly discards 1 card.

attributes.name: Beast of the Pharaoh
attributes.description: When this card is sent to the Graveyard for the Synchro Summon of a Synchro monster, select 1 Level 4 or lower Zombie-Type monster from your Graveyard and Special Summon it.

attributes.name: Dark Hunter
attributes.description:
This card gains 1 of the following effects according to the number of DARK monsters in your Graveyard:
- 0 or 1: This card loses 400 ATK.
- 2, 3, or 4: This card gains 400 ATK.
- 5 or more: You can send this face-up card to the Graveyard to destroy all face-down monsters on the field.

attributes.name: Kinka-Byo
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card returns to the owner's hand during the End Phase of the turn that this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up. When this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up, select 1 Level 1 monster in your Graveyard and Special Summon it. When this card leaves the field, the monster Special Summoned this way is removed from play.

attributes.name: Yamato-no-Kami
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by removing from play 1 Spirit Monster in your Graveyard. This card returns to the owner's hand during the End Phase of the turn that this card is Special Summoned. If this card destroys a monster by battle, you may destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Silent Strider
attributes.description: Activate only by sending this card from your hand to the Graveyard. Decrease the Level of 1 monster on the field by 1 until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Noisy Gnat
attributes.description: Activate only by sending this card from your hand to the Graveyard. Target monster gains 1 Level until the End Phase of this turn.

attributes.name: Multiple Piece Golem
attributes.description:
"Big Piece Golem" + "Medium Piece Golem"
At the end of the Battle Phase you can return this card to the Extra Deck, and then Special Summon the Fusion Material Monsters used for the Fusion Summon of this card if they are present in your Graveyard.

attributes.name: Nitro Warrior
attributes.description:
"Nitro Synchron" + 1 non-Tuner monsters
Once per turn, during a turn in which you activated a Spell Card, this card gains 1000 ATK during damage calculation only. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle, you can switch 1 face-up Defense Position monster your opponent controls to Attack Position. Then this card attacks that monster once again in a row.

attributes.name: Goyo Guardian
attributes.description:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon that monster to your side of the field in face-up Defense Position.

attributes.name: Magical Android
attributes.description:
1 Tuner + 1 non-Tuner monsters
During your End-Phase, gain 600 Life Points for each face-up Psychic-Type monster you control.

attributes.name: Thought Ruler Archfiend
attributes.description:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle, gain Life Points equal to the original ATK of the destroyed monster. By paying 1000 Life Points, negate the activation and effect of a Spell or Trap Card that targets 1 face-up Psychic-Type monster you control and destroy it.

attributes.name: Fighting Spirit
attributes.description: The equipped monster gains 300 ATK for each monster your opponent controls. If the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle, destroy this card instead.

attributes.name: Domino Effect
attributes.description: When a monster your opponent controls is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, send 1 monster you control to the Graveyard to destroy 1 monster your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Junk Barrage
attributes.description: When the equipped monster destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, inflict damage to your opponent equal to half the destroyed monster's ATK.

attributes.name: Battle Tuned
attributes.description: Activate only by removing from play 1 Tuner Monster in your Graveyard. Target face-up monster you control gains ATK equal to the Tuner Monster that was removed from play.

attributes.name: De-Synchro
attributes.description: Return 1 Synchro monster on the field to the Extra Deck. In addition, if all the Synchro Material Monsters that were used for the Synchro Summon of that Synchro monster are in your Graveyard, you can Special Summon them all to the field.

attributes.name: Lightwave Tuning
attributes.description: Activate only by selecting 1 face-up Level 4 LIGHT monster you control. While that card remains face-up on the field, it is treated as a Tuner Monster.

attributes.name: Psi-Station
attributes.description: When you successfully Normal Summon a Psychic-Type monster, by paying 500 Life Points, that monster gains 1 Level and 300 ATK.

attributes.name: Psi-Impulse
attributes.description: Activate by Tributing 1 Psychic-Type monster you control. Your opponent adds their hand to their Deck and then draws 3 cards.

attributes.name: Emergency Teleport
attributes.description: Special Summon 1 Level 3 or lower Psychic-Type monster from your hand or your Deck. The monster Special Summoned this way is removed from play at the end of the turn.

attributes.name: Sword of Kusanagi
attributes.description: Equip only to a Spirit monster. During battle between the equipped monster and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of the equipped monster, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent. When the equipped monster is removed from the field and this card sent to the Graveyard, add this card to your hand.

attributes.name: Orb of Yasaka
attributes.description: Equip only to a Spirit monster. If the equipped monster destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, increase your Life Points by half of the original ATK of the destroyed monster. When the equipped monster is removed from the field and this card sent to the Graveyard, add this card to your hand.

attributes.name: Mirror of Yata
attributes.description: Equip only to a Spirit monster. During the End Phase, the effect of the equipped monster to return it to the hand is not activated. If the equipped monster is destroyed by battle, this card is destroyed instead.

attributes.name: Geartown
attributes.description: "Ancient Gear" monsters require 1 less Tribute to Tribute Summon. When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon 1 "Ancient Gear" monster from your hand, Deck or Graveyard.

attributes.name: Power Filter
attributes.description: Neither player may Special Summon monster(s) with 1000 ATK or less.

attributes.name: Lightsworn Sabre
attributes.description: Equip only to a "Lightsworn" monster. The equipped monster gains 700 ATK. When this card is sent from the Deck to the Graveyard, you can equip it to another "Lightsworn" monster.

attributes.name: Unstable Evolution
attributes.description: If your Life Points are lower than your opponent's, the equipped monster's original ATK becomes 2400. If your Life Points are higher than your opponent's, the equipped monster's original ATK becomes 1000.

attributes.name: Recycling Batteries
attributes.description: Add 2 Thunder-Type monster with 1500 ATK or less from your Graveyard to your hand.

attributes.name: Book of Eclipse
attributes.description: Flip all monsters on the field into face-down Defense Position. During the End Phase of this turn, flip all face-down monsters your opponent controls to face-up Defense Position, and your opponent draws 1 card for each monster flipped face-up.

attributes.name: Equip Shot
attributes.description: Activate only during you or your opponent's Battle Phase. Select 1 Equip Card equipped to a face-up Attack Position monster you control and 1 face-up Attack Position monster your opponent controls, and equip the selected Equip Card to the selected monster. Afterwards, your monster that was previously equipped with the selected Equip Card and the selected monster must battle.

attributes.name: Graceful Revival
attributes.description: Select 1 Level 2 or lower monster in your Graveyard and Special Summon it in Attack Position. If this card is removed from the field, destroy the Special Summoned monster. If the monster is removed from the field, destroy this card.

attributes.name: Defense Draw
attributes.description: Activate only during damage calculation during your opponent's Battle Phase. Reduce all Battle Damage to 0, then draw 1 card.

attributes.name: Remote Revenge
attributes.description: Activate only when a monster you control is targeted by a Spell, Trap or Effect Monster controlled by your opponent, which destroys 1 monster on the field. Switch the target to another correct target that your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Spacegate
attributes.description: Each time an opponent's monster battles, at the end of the Damage Step place 1 Gate Counter on this card. By sending this card to the Graveyard during your Standby Phase, Special Summon 1 monster from your hand with a Level equal to or lower than the number of Gate Counter(s) placed on this card.

attributes.name: Synchro Deflector
attributes.description: Activate only when a face-up Synchro monster you control is selected as an attack target. Negate the attack and destroy 1 monster your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Broken Blocker
attributes.description: Activate only when a Defense Position monster you control with higher DEF than ATK is destroyed by battle. Special Summon 2 cards with the same name as that monster from your Deck in face-up Defense Position.

attributes.name: Psychic Overload
attributes.description: Select 3 Psychic-Type monsters in your Graveyard, and shuffle them back to your Deck. Afterwards, draw 2 cards.

attributes.name: Psychic Rejuvenation
attributes.description: Gain 1000 Life Points for each face-up Psychic-Type monster you control.

attributes.name: Telepathic Power
attributes.description: Activate only when a face-up Psychic-Type monster you control is attacked and destroyed by battle by an opponent's monster. Destroy the monster that attacked it, and gain Life Points equal to the original ATK of the destroyed monster.

attributes.name: Mind Over Matter
attributes.description: Activate only by Tributing 1 Psychic-Type monster. Negate the activation of a Spell or Trap Card, or the Normal Summon or Special Summon of a monster and destroy that card.

attributes.name: Gladiator Beast Chariot
attributes.description: Activate only if you control a face-up "Gladiator Beast" monster. Negate the activation and effect of an Effect Monster and destroy it.

attributes.name: Lightsworn Barrier
attributes.description: When a "Lightsworn" monster you control is selected as an attack target, send 2 cards from your Deck to the Graveyard to negate the attack.

attributes.name: Intercept
attributes.description: Activate only when a monster is successfully Tribute Summoned with exactly 1 Tribute. Control of that monster is switched.

attributes.name: Judgment of Thunder
attributes.description: Activate only when a Thunder-Type monster is Summoned. Destroy 1 card your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Fish Depth Charge
attributes.description: Activate only by Tributing 1 Fish-Type monster. Destroy 1 card on the field, and draw 1 card.

attributes.name: Needlebug Nest
attributes.description: Send the top 5 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Overworked
attributes.description: Destroy all monsters with an ATK higher than their original ATK.

attributes.name: Counselor Lily
attributes.description: When this card is sent to the Graveyard for a Synchro Summon, you can pay 500 Life Points to have that Synchro Monster gain 1000 ATK until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Herald of Orange Light
attributes.description: You can send this card and 1 other Fairy-Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard to activate this effect. Negate the activation of an effect of an effect monster your opponent controls, and destroy it. You can activate this effect during either players turn.

attributes.name: Izanami
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card returns to its owner's hand during the End Phase of the turn it is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up. When this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up, you can discard 1 card to add 1 Spirit monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

attributes.name: Maiden of Macabre
