attributes.description: A pussy-fairy. Contrary to her lovely beauty, she claws on her enemies.

attributes.name: Burglar
attributes.description: A sly rat. He will come at you with his huge left claw.

attributes.name: Clown Zombie
attributes.description: A clown revived by the powers of darkness. Its deadly dance has sent many monsters to their graves.

attributes.name: D.D. Warrior
attributes.description: When this card battles a monster, after damage calculation remove from play that monster and this card.

attributes.name: Warrior Elimination
attributes.description: Destroy all face-up Warrior-Type monsters on the field.

attributes.name: Fortress Whale
attributes.description: This monster can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "Fortress Whale's Oath".

attributes.name: Fortress Whale's Oath
attributes.description: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Fortress Whale". You must also Tribute monsters whose total Levels equal 7 or more from the field or your hand.

attributes.name: Haniwa
attributes.description: An earthen figure that protects the tomb of an ancient ruler.

attributes.name: Prisman
attributes.description: This crystalline monster focuses light to create a lethal laser.

attributes.name: Millennium Golem
attributes.description: For nearly a millennium, this golem has served as guardian of an ancient treasure trove.

attributes.name: Dig Beak
attributes.description: This beast coils like a snake, and strikes quickly with its snapping beak.

attributes.name: Nekogal #2
attributes.description: A fast and lethal creature with very dangerous claws.

attributes.name: Magical Arm Shield
attributes.description: You can only activate this card when your opponent declares an attack. Take control of 1 of your opponent's face-up monsters, except the attacking monster, and this monster is attacked instead. At the end of the Battle Phase, return control of this monster to your opponent.

attributes.name: Dunames Dark Witch
attributes.description: Even when all odds are against this brave fairy, she will press onwards in battle and never retreat.

attributes.name: Garma Sword
attributes.description: This monster can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "Garma Sword Oath".

attributes.name: Garma Sword Oath
attributes.description: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Garma Sword". You must also Tribute monsters whose total Levels equal 7 or more from the field or your hand.

attributes.name: Gatekeeper
attributes.description: An indestructible mechanoid created for the sole purpose of guarding the gateways.

attributes.name: Behegon
attributes.description: With an enormous maw and massive teeth, this monstrosity is one dangerous and strange serpent from the deep.

attributes.name: Violent Rain
attributes.description: This monster can call forth sudden torrents of battering rain.

attributes.name: Temple of Skulls
attributes.description: A mysterious temple of skulls and bones that pulls in unsuspecting enemies.

attributes.name: Blocker
attributes.description: Constructed from several components, this monster can launch them in a pincer attack.

attributes.name: Wretched Ghost of the Attic
attributes.description: A harmless monster found lurking in just about any attic.

attributes.name: Sectarian of Secrets
attributes.description: This wizard worships the darkness, and is served by a sinister hand that drags its enemies into oblivion.

attributes.name: Necrolancer the Timelord
attributes.description: The one-eyed Necrolancer launches his onslaught from a dimensional ring that can appear out of thin air.

attributes.name: Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth
attributes.description: This monster cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by Tributing "Petit Moth" on the 6th of your turns after "Petit Moth" has been equipped with "Cocoon of Evolution".

attributes.name: Riryoku
attributes.description: Until the end of the turn, decrease the ATK of 1 monster by half and increase the ATK of another monster by the same amount.

attributes.name: Negate Attack
attributes.description: When your opponent attacks with a monster, negate the attack and make your opponent's Battle Phase end.

attributes.name: XX-Saber Boggart Knight
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned, you can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "X-Saber" monster from your hand. This card cannot be used as a Synchro Material Monster, except for the Synchro Summon of a "X-Saber" monster.

attributes.name: Blackwing - Ghibli the Searing Wind
attributes.description: When your opponent declares a Direct attack, you can Special Summon this card from your hand. Once per turn, you can switch this card's original ATK and DEF until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Blackwing - Gust the Backblast
attributes.description: If you control no cards, you can Special Summon this card from your hand. While this card is face-up on the field, if your opponent's monster attacks a "Blackwing" monster you control, the attacking monster loses 300 ATK during the Damage Step only.

attributes.name: Blackwing - Breeze the Zephyr
attributes.description: If this card is added from the Deck to your hand by a Spell, Trap, or Effect Monster's effect, you can Special Summon this card. This card cannot be used to Synchro Summon a Synchro Monster except a "Blackwing" monster.

attributes.name: Changer Synchron
attributes.description: If this card is sent to the Graveyard for a Synchro Summon, select 1 monster your opponent controls and change its battle position.

attributes.name: Card Breaker
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned in face-up Attack Position by sending 1 card from your Spell & Trap Card Zone to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Second Booster
attributes.description: You can Tribute this card to select 1 face-up Attack Position monster you control. The selected monster gains 1500 ATK until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Archfiend Interceptor
attributes.description: While you control this face-up Attack Position card, when an opponent's monster declares an attack, inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Dread Dragon
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can add 1 Level 3 or lower Dragon-Type monster from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Trust Guardian
attributes.description: This card cannot be used as Synchro Material Monsters except for the Synchro Summon of a Level 7 or higher Synchro Monster. Once per turn, that Synchro Monster cannot be destroyed by battle. Each time this effect is applied, that Synchro Monster loses 400 ATK and DEF at the end of the Damage Step.

attributes.name: Flare Resonator
attributes.description: When this monster is used for a Synchro Summon, the Summoned monster gains 300 ATK.

attributes.name: Synchro Magnet
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. When you Synchro Summon a Synchro Monster, you can Special Summon this card from your hand.

attributes.name: Infernity Mirage
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned from the Graveyard. If you have no cards in your hand, you can Tribute this card to select 2 "Infernity" monsters in your Graveyard. Special Summon those monsters.

attributes.name: Infernity Randomizer
attributes.description: Once per turn, while you have no cards in your hand, you can draw 1 card and reveal it. For a Monster Card drawn with this effect, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the Level of that monster x 200. For a Spell or Trap Card, you take 500 damage

attributes.name: Infernity Beetle
attributes.description: While you have no cards in your hand, you can Tribute this card to Special Summon up to 2 "Infernity Beetle" from your Deck.

attributes.name: Infernity Avenger
attributes.description: When a monster you control, except "Infernity Avenger", is destroyed by battle with an opponent's monster and sent to the Graveyard, while you have no cards in your hand, you can Special Summon this card from your Graveyard. In that case, the Level of this card is equal to the Level of your destroyed monster.

attributes.name: Revival Rose
attributes.description: If a Level 5 or higher Plant-type monster you control is destroyed, you can Special Summon this card from your Graveyard.

attributes.name: Morphtronic Vacuumen
attributes.description:
- While in Attack Position: You can send 1 card equipped to this card to the Graveyard to inflict 500 damage to your opponent.
- While in Defense Position: Once per turn, you can equip 1 face-up Attack Position monster your opponent controls to this card. (You can only equip 1 monster at a time to this card.)

attributes.name: Bird of Roses
attributes.description: When this face-up Attack Position card is attacked, and it is destroyed as a result of battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon 2 Plant-Type Tuner monsters from your Deck in face-up Defense Position.

attributes.name: Spore
attributes.description: If this card is in your Graveyard, you can remove from play 1 other Plant-Type monster from your Graveyard to Special Summon this card from your Graveyard, and increase its Level by the Level of the monster removed from play to activate this effect. Each player can only use the effect of "Spore" once per Duel.

attributes.name: Fairy Archer
attributes.description: During your Main Phase, you can inflict 400 damage to your opponent for each face-up LIGHT monster you control. This card cannot attack during the same turn you activate this effect. Only one "Fairy Archer" can have its effect activated per turn.

attributes.name: Biofalcon
attributes.description: When a Machine-Type monster you control is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard while this card is face-up on the field, you can add 1 Machine-Type monster with 1000 or less ATK from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Cherry Inmato
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon up to 2 "Inmato" monsters from your Deck. The monster(s) Special Summoned by this effect cannot be used as Synchro Material Monsters this turn.

attributes.name: Magidog
attributes.description: If this card is sent to the Graveyard for the Synchro Summon of a Spellcaster-Type Synchro Monster, you can add 1 Field Spell Card from your Graveyard to your hand.

attributes.name: Lyna the Light Charmer
attributes.description: FLIP: Take control of 1 LIGHT monster on your opponent's side of the field for as long as this card remains face-up on the field.

attributes.name: Wattgiraffe
attributes.description: This card can attack your opponent directly. When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent as a result of a direct attack, your opponent cannot activate the effects of any Spell, Trap, or Effect Monster Cards until the End Phase of this turn.

attributes.name: Wattfox
attributes.description: If this card is destroyed by your opponent's card (either by battle or by card effect), your opponent cannot Special Summon a monster, or activate Spells, Traps, Spell/Trap card effects, or Monster Card effects, for the rest of this turn.

attributes.name: Wattwoodpecker
attributes.description: This card can attack twice during the same Battle Phase. Monsters that battled with this card cannot change their Battle Position.

attributes.name: Koa'ki Meiru Sandman
attributes.description: During each of your End Phases, destroy this card unless you send 1 "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru" from your hand to the Graveyard or reveal 1 Rock-Type monster in your hand. You can Tribute this card to negate the activation of an opponent's Trap Card and destroy that card.

attributes.name: Memory Crush King
attributes.description: When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points by attacking directly, remove from play all Synchro Monsters in your opponent's Graveyard and inflict 1000 Damage for each card removed that way.

attributes.name: Delta Tri
attributes.description:
If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle, select and activate 1 of the these effects:
- Select 1 appropriate Union monster in your Graveyard and equip it to this card.
- Select 1 face-up LIGHT Machine-type monster you control, and return it to the Deck. Then draw 1 card.

attributes.name: Trigon
attributes.description: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can equip this card to a Machine-Type monster you control, OR unequip it to Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. While equipped to a monster by this effect, if the equipped monster destroys an opponent's monster by battle, select and Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower LIGHT Machine-Type monster from your Graveyard. (A monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the equipped monster would be destroyed, destroy this card instead.)

attributes.name: Testudo erat Numen
attributes.description: Neither player can Special Summon monsters with 1800 or more ATK.

attributes.name: Ronintoadin
attributes.description: This face-up card's name is treated as "Des Frog". You can remove from play 1 "Frog" monster in your Graveyard, except "Frog the Jam", to Special Summon this card from your Graveyard. This card cannot be used as a Synchro Material Monster.

attributes.name: Batteryman AAA
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up, you can Special Summon 1 "Batteryman AAA" from your hand or Graveyard.

attributes.name: Batteryman Fuel Cell
attributes.description: If you control 2 or more face-up "Batteryman" monsters, you can Special Summon this card from your hand. Once per turn, you can Tribute 1 other "Batteryman" monster to return 1 card your opponent controls to the owner's hand.

attributes.name: Key Mouse
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can add 1 Level 3 or lower Beast-Type monster from your deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Ally of Justice Core Destroyer
attributes.description: If this card attacks or is attacked by a LIGHT monster, destroy that monster at the start of the Damage Step (without damage calculation).

attributes.name: Hunter of Black Feathers
attributes.description: If your opponent controls 2 or more face-up monsters, and the Type of all these monsters are the same, send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard to select 1 face-up monster your opponent controls and destroy it.

attributes.name: Herald of Perfection
attributes.description: This card can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "Dawn of the Herald". You can send 1 Fairy-Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard to negate the activation of a Spell Card, Trap Card, or Effect Monster's effect and destroy it.

attributes.name: Black-Winged Dragon
attributes.description:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
Whenever you would take damage from a card effect, place 1 Black Feather Counter on this card instead. This card loses 700 ATK for each Black Feather Counter on it. Once per turn, you can remove all Black Feather Counters on this card to have 1 face-up monster your opponent controls lose 700 ATK for each Black Feather Counter, and inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK lost by that monster because of this effect.

attributes.name: Chaos King Archfiend
attributes.description:
1 Fiend-type Tuner monster + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
When this card attacks, you can switch the ATK and DEF of all face-up monsters your opponent controls until the end of the Battle Phase.

attributes.name: Infernity Doom Dragon
attributes.description:
1 DARK Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
While you have no cards in your hand, once per turn, you can destroy 1 monster your opponent controls and inflict damage equal to half of that monster's ATK to your opponent. This card cannot declare an attack the turn this effect is activated.

attributes.name: Splendid Rose
attributes.description:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
Once per turn, you can remove from play 1 Plant-Type monster in your Graveyard to halve the ATK of 1 face-up monster your opponent controls, until the End Phase of this turn. If this card attacks, during the same Battle Phase you can remove from play 1 Plant-Type monster in your Graveyard to halve the ATK of this card (until the End Phase) and attack once again.

attributes.name: Chaos Goddess
attributes.description:
1 LIGHT Tuner + 2 or more non-Tuner DARK monsters
Once per turn, you can send 1 LIGHT monster from your hand to the Graveyard to select 1 Level 5 or higher DARK monster from your Graveyard. Special Summon that monster. It cannot be used as a Synchro Material monster.

attributes.name: Black-Winged Strafe
attributes.description: Discard 1 "Blackwing" monster. Send 1 Defense Position monster your opponent controls to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Cards for Black Feathers
attributes.description: Remove from play 1 "Blackwing" monster in your hand to draw 2 cards. You cannot Special Summon during the same turn you activate this card. You can only activate 1 "Cards for Black Feathers" per turn.

attributes.name: ZERO-MAX
attributes.description: If there are no cards in your hand, select 1 "Infernity" monster in your Graveyard. Special Summon it, and destroy all face-up monsters on the field with lower ATK than it. You cannot conduct your Battle Phase this turn.

attributes.name: Infernity Launcher
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can send 1 "Infernity" monster from your hand to the Graveyard. If there are no cards in your hand, you can send this card to the Graveyard to select up to 2 "Infernity" monster(s) in your Graveyard and Special Summon them.

attributes.name: Into the Void
attributes.description: Activate only if you have 3 or more cards in your hand. Draw 1 card. During the End Phase of this turn, discard all the cards in your hand.

attributes.name: Intercept Wave
attributes.description: All Synchro Monsters on the field are changed to Defense Position. And then return all face-up Synchro Monsters to the Extra Deck during the End Phase.

attributes.name: Pyramid of Wonders
attributes.description: All face-up Zombie-Type monsters you control gain 200 ATK for each monster your opponent controls. If (exactly) 1 face-up Zombie-Type monster you control would be destroyed, you can send this card to the Graveyard instead.

attributes.name: The Fountain in the Sky
attributes.description: When a LIGHT monster is destroyed by battle and sent to your Graveyard, you can remove that monster from play to gain Life Points equal to its ATK.

attributes.name: Dragon Laser
attributes.description: Send 1 "Trigon" equipped to a "Deltatri" you control to the Graveyard. Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Wattcube
attributes.description: Equip only to a Thunder-Type monster. It gains 100 ATK for each Thunder-Type monster in your Graveyard. You can send this face-up card you control to the Graveyard to have a face-up Thunder-Type monster you control gain 1000 ATK.

attributes.name: Electromagnetic Shield
attributes.description: Level 3 or lower face-up Defense Position Thunder-Type monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle. Destroy this card if you control a face-up Attack Position monster.

attributes.name: Worm Call
attributes.description: If your opponent controls a monster(s), and you control no monsters, you can Special Summon 1 "Worm" Reptile-Type monster from your hand in face-down Defense Position. This effect can only be used once per turn.

attributes.name: Magic Triangle of the Ice Barrier
attributes.description: Reveal 3 "Ice Barrier" monsters with different names in your hand to select 1 card your opponent controls. Destroy the opponent's card and Special Summon 1 "Ice Barrier" monster from your hand.

attributes.name: Koa'ki Meiru Initialize!
attributes.description: Tribute 1 "Koa'ki Meiru" monster. Add 1 "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand.

attributes.name: Dawn of the Herald
attributes.description: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Herald of Perfection". You must also Tribute monsters whose total level equals 6 from the field or your hand. When "Herald of Perfection" is Summoned by the effect of this card, you can remove from play this card in your Graveyard to select 1 of the monsters used as a Tribute for the Ritual Summon, and add it from your Graveyard to your hand.

attributes.name: Forbidden Graveyard
attributes.description: Activate by discarding 1 card. Effects that activate in the Graveyard this turn are negated.

attributes.name: Leeching the Light
attributes.description: Select 1 face-up LIGHT monster your opponent controls. All face-up Attack Position monsters you control gain ATK equal to the ATK of the selected monster, until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Corridor of Agony
attributes.description: Monsters that were Special Summoned from the Main Deck cannot activate their effects, their effects are negated, and they cannot declare an attack, as long as they remain face-up on the field.

attributes.name: Power Frame
attributes.description: Activate only when a face-up monster you control is selected as an attack target by an opponent's monster with a higher ATK. Negate that attack, and equip this card to your monster that was being attacked. The equipped monster gains ATK equal to the difference in ATK between the two monsters.

attributes.name: Blackwing - Backlash
attributes.description: Activate only when your opponent declares a direct attack while there are 5 or more "Blackwing" monsters in your Graveyard. Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Blackwing - Bombardment
attributes.description: Select 1 Synchro Monster you control and Tribute 1 "Blackwing" monster you control. Increase the ATK of the selected Synchro Monster by the ATK of the tributed "Blackwing" monster.

attributes.name: Black Thunder
attributes.description: Activate when a "Blackwing" monster you control is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard. Inflict 400 points of damage to your opponent for each card they control.

attributes.name: Guard Mines
attributes.description: Activate only when a card is activated with an effect that would target and destroy a monster you control. Negate the effect and destroy that card. Then Inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Infernity Reflector
attributes.description: When 1 of your "Infernity" monsters is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, discard your entire hand to activate this card. Special Summon that 1 monster from your Graveyard, and inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Infernity Break
attributes.description: Activate only if you have no cards in your hand. Select 1 "Infernity" card in your Graveyard and remove it from play. Select 1 card your opponent controls and destroy it.

attributes.name: Damage Gate
attributes.description: Activate only when you take Battle Damage. Special Summon 1 monster from your Graveyard with ATK less than or equal to amount of damage you took.

attributes.name: Infernity Inferno
attributes.description: Discard up to 2 cards and send the same number of "Infernity" cards from your Deck to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Phantom Hand
attributes.description: Once per turn, if you control a face-up "Infernity" monster(s), you can remove from play all cards in your hand (face-down) until your next Standby Phase.

attributes.name: Assault Spirits
attributes.description: After activation, this card becomes an Equip Card and is equipped to 1 monster you control. Once per turn, if the equipped monster attacks, during the Damage Step you can send 1 monster with 1000 or less ATK from your hand to the Graveyard to increase the equipped monster's ATK by the sent monster's ATK until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Blossom Bombardment
attributes.description: When a Plant-Type monster you control destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the destroyed monster's ATK.

attributes.name: Morphtronics, Scramble!
attributes.description: Activate only when your opponent declares a direct attack while you control no monsters. Negate the attack and Special Summon 1 "Morphtronic" monster from your hand.

attributes.name: Power Break
attributes.description: Activate only while you control a "Power Tool Dragon". Return up to 3 Equip Cards from your field or graveyard to the Decks and inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each card returned.

attributes.name: Koa'ki Meiru Shield
attributes.description: If there are 2 or more "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru" in your Graveyard, you can activate this card when your opponent declares an attack with their monster. Destroy all face-up Attack Position monsters your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Crevice Into the Different Dimension
attributes.description: Activate by declaring 1 Attribute and selecting 2 target monsters from either players' Graveyard with the declared Attribute. Remove from play the target monsters.

attributes.name: Synchro Ejection
attributes.description: Select 1 Face-up Synchro Monster your opponent controls and remove it from play. Your opponent draws 1 card.

attributes.name: Chaos Trap Hole
attributes.description: Pay 2000 Life Points. Negate the Summon of a LIGHT or DARK monster, and remove it from play.

attributes.name: XX-Saber Darksoul
attributes.description: If this card you control is sent to the Graveyard, during the End Phase, you can add 1 "X-Saber" monster from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Koa'ki Meiru Prototype
attributes.description: If a face-up "Koa'ki Meiru" monster(s) on the field would be destroyed during the End Phase, you can destroy this card instead. When a face-up "Koa'ki Meiru" monster(s) on the field is destroyed during the End Phase, you can Special Summon 1 "Koa'ki Meiru" Token (Rock-Type/EARTH/Level 4/ATK 1800/DEF 1800).

attributes.name: Snyffus
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can Tribute 1 Plant-Type monster to select and destroy 1 face-up card your opponent controls. When a Plant-Type monster(s) on the field is destroyed while this card is in the Graveyard, you can Special Summon this card from the Graveyard. If you do, it is removed from play when it is removed from the field.

attributes.name: Nimble Sunfish
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, send 1 Fish-type monster from your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, you can Special Summon 1 "Nimble Sunfish" from your Deck.

attributes.name: Akz, the Pumer
attributes.description:
This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by removing from play 2 Beast-Warrior-Type monsters in your Graveyard. Once per turn, you can discard 1 Beast-Warrior-Type monster from your hand to activate 1 of the following effects:
- Double this card's ATK until the End Phase.
- This card can attack your opponent directly this turn.

attributes.name: Saber Vault
attributes.description: Each face-up "X-Saber" monster on the field gains 100 ATK x its Level, and loses 100 DEF x its Level.

attributes.name: Core Overclock
attributes.description: All face-up "Koa'ki Meiru" monsters you control gain 500 ATK. Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can discard 1 "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru" to have all face-up "Koa'ki Meiru" monsters you control gain 1000 ATK until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Wave-Motion Inferno
attributes.description: While you have no cards in your hand, face-up "Infernity" monsters you control gain 400 ATK and DEF. You can send this face-up card from the field to the Graveyard to send all cards from your hand to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Infernity Barrier
attributes.description: Activate only when your opponent activates a Spell Card, Trap Card, or Effect Monster's effect, if you control a face-up Attack Position "Infernity" monster and have no cards in your hand. Negate the activation and destroy that card.

attributes.name: Genex Controller
attributes.description: As a master of all powers of elements, this is one of the few Genex monsters that can communicate with its companions.

attributes.name: Genex Undine
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned, you can send 1 WATER monster from your Deck to your Graveyard to add 1 "Genex Controller" from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Genex Searcher
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon 1 "Genex" monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck in face-up Attack Position.

attributes.name: X-Saber Palomuro
attributes.description: When another "Saber" monster you control is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can pay 500 Life Points to Special Summon this card from the Graveyard.

attributes.name: X-Saber Pashuul
attributes.description: This card cannot be destroyed by battle. If this card is in face-up Defense Position, you take 1000 damage during each of your opponent's Standby Phases.

attributes.name: Hydro Genex
attributes.description:
"Genex Controller" + 1 or more WATER Non-Tuner monsters
When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, gain Life Points equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster.

attributes.name: Ally of Justice Light Gazer
attributes.description:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
This card gains 200 ATK for each LIGHT monster in your opponent's Graveyard.

attributes.name: Genex Neutron
attributes.description: During the End Phase of the turn that this card was Normal Summoned, you can add 1 Machine-Type Tuner monster from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Infernity Destroyer
attributes.description: While you have no cards in your hand, when this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, inflict 1600 damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Koa'ki Meiru Bergzak
attributes.description: During each of your End Phases, destroy this card unless you send 1 "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru" from your hand to the Graveyard or reveal 1 Warrior-Type monster from your hand. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle, it can attack once again in a row.

attributes.name: Tyler the Great Warrior
attributes.description: This monster cannot be Special Summoned. When this card destroys a monster as a result of battle and sends it to the Graveyard, inflict damage to your opponent's Life Points equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster.

attributes.name: Dragon Master Knight
attributes.description:
"Black Luster Soldier" + "Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon"
This monster cannot be Special Summoned except by Fusion Summon. This card gains 500 ATK for each Dragon-Type monster on your side of the field except this card.

attributes.name: Supersonic Skull Flame
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by removing 1 "Skull Flame" in your Graveyard from play. Once per turn, you can inflict 400 damage to your opponent for each "Burning Skull Head" in your Graveyard. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon 1 "Skull Flame" from the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Skull Flame
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can Special Summon 1 "Burning Skull Head" from your hand. You cannot conduct your Battle Phase the turn you activate this effect. You can add 1 "Burning Skull Head" from your Graveyard to your hand instead of conducting your normal draw during your Draw Phase.

attributes.name: Burning Skull Head
attributes.description: When this card is Special Summoned from your hand, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. You can remove from play this face-up card you control to return 1 removed from play "Skull Flame" to its owner's Graveyard.

attributes.name: Spell Striker
attributes.description: You can Special Summon this card from your hand by removing from play 1 Spell Card from your Graveyard. This card can attack your opponent directly. Any Battle Damage this card's controller takes from a battle involving this card becomes 0.

attributes.name: Exploder Dragon
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, destroy the monster that destroyed it. While this card is attacking, any Battle Damage either player takes from a battle involving this card becomes 0.

attributes.name: Destiny Hero - Disk Commander
attributes.description: When this card is Special Summoned from the Graveyard, draw 2 cards.

attributes.name: Deep Diver
attributes.description: If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, at the end of the Battle Phase select 1 Monster Card from your Deck, and place it on top of your Deck.

attributes.name: Burden of the Mighty
attributes.description: Each face-up monster your opponent controls loses 100 ATK x its own Level.

attributes.name: Dimensional Prison
attributes.description: Activate only when your opponent declares an attack.  Remove from play the attacking monster.

attributes.name: Infernity Archfiend
attributes.description: When you have no cards in your hand and draw this card, you can reveal it to Special Summon it. When this card is Special Summoned, if you have no cards in your hand, you can add 1 "Infernity" card from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Infernity Dwarf
attributes.description: While you have no cards in your hand, during battle between an attacking monster you control and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of the attacking monster inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Infernity Guardian
attributes.description: While you have no cards in your hand, this face-up card cannot be destroyed by battle or by card effects.

attributes.name: Samurai Sword Baron
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can select 1 Defense Position monster your opponent controls. Change it to face-up Attack Position.

attributes.name: Stygian Security
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, Special Summon 1 Level 1 Fiend-Type monster from your Deck.

attributes.name: Stygian Sergeants
attributes.description:
1 Fiend-Type Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, it can gain 800 ATK (until the end of the Battle Phase) and attack once again in a row.

attributes.name: Fairy King Truesdale
attributes.description: As long as this card remains in face-up Defense Position on the field, increase the ATK and DEF of all Plant-Type monsters on your side of the field by 500 points.

attributes.name: Kinetic Soldier
attributes.description: When this card battles with a Warrior-Type monster, increase the ATK and DEF of this monster by 2000 points only during damage calculation.

attributes.name: Slate Warrior
attributes.description: FLIP: Increase the ATK and DEF of this monster by 500 points. The ATK and DEF of a monster that destroys this monster as a result of battle is decreased by 500 points.

attributes.name: Silent Swordsman LV7
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by the effect of "Silent Swordsman LV5". As long as this card remains face-up on your side of the field, negate the effects of all Spell Cards on the field.

attributes.name: Kaibaman
attributes.description: Tribute this card to Special Summon 1 "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" from your hand.

attributes.name: Mind Control
attributes.description: Take control of 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field until the End Phase. This monster cannot declare an attack or be Tributed.

attributes.name: Golden Homunculus
attributes.description: Increase the ATK and DEF of this card by 300 points for each of your cards that is removed from play.

attributes.name: Helios - The Primordial Sun
attributes.description: The ATK and DEF of this card become the number of monsters that are removed from play x 100 points.

attributes.name: Helios Duo Megistus
attributes.description: This card can be Special Summoned by Tributing 1 "Helios - The Primordial Sun" on your side of the field. The ATK and DEF of this card become the number of monsters that are removed from play x 200 points. If this card is destroyed as a result of battle and sent to the Graveyard, this card will be Special Summoned during the End Phase, increasing the ATK and DEF by 300 points.

attributes.name: Testament of the Arcane Lords
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card must be Tribute Summoned by Tributing 3 Spellcaster-Type monsters on your side of the field. If this card attacks your opponent's Life Points directly and makes them 0, the controller of this card wins the Match.

attributes.name: Tyr, the Vanquishing Warlord
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. To Tribute Summon this card, you must Tribute 3 Fairy-Type monsters. If this card attacks your opponent directly and reduces their Life Points to 0, you win the Match.

attributes.name: Get Your Game On!
attributes.description: You can only play this card if you were present at the 2007 Yu-Gi-Oh! TRADING CARD GAME World Championship. The ATK of all your "Elemental Hero" and "Neo-Spacian" monsters on the field is doubled.

attributes.name: Chimaera, the Master of Beasts
attributes.description: This card cannot be special Summoned. This card must be Tribute Summoned by Tributing 3 Beast-Type monsters on your side of the field. If this card attacks your opponent's Life Points directly and makes them 0, the controller of this card wins the Match.

attributes.name: Emperor of Lightning
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card must be Tribute Summoned by Tributing 3 Thunder-Type monsters on your side of the field. If this card attacks your opponent's Life Points directly and makes them 0, the controller of this card wins the Match.

attributes.name: Aggiba, the Malevolent Sh'nn S'yo
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. To Tribute Summon this card you must Tribute 3 Fiend-Type monsters. If this card attacks your opponent directly and reduces their Life Points to 0, you win the Match.

attributes.name: Skuna, the Leonine Rakan
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. To Tribute Summon this card you must Tribute 3 Beast-Warrior-Type monsters. If this card attacks your opponent and reduces their Life Points to 0, you win the Match.

attributes.name: Kanan the Swordmistress
attributes.description: A lady warrior armed with sword and shield, she floats lightly and stings sharply.

attributes.name: Ulevo
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card must be Tribute Summoned by offering 3 Winged Beast-Type monsters on your side of the field as Tributes. If this card attacks your opponent's Life Points directly and makes them 0, the controller of this card wins the Match.

attributes.name: Meteo the Matchless
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card must be Tribute Summoned by offering 3 Beast-Warrior-Type monsters on your side of the field as Tributes. If this card attacks your opponent's Life Points directly and makes them 0, the controller of this card wins the Match.

attributes.name: Sengenjin
attributes.description: An unstoppable savage that carries Millennium Items.

attributes.name: Shiba-Warrior Taro
attributes.description: This card cannot be destroyed by battle. When a card on the field is destroyed by battle or by a card effect, return this face-up card to its owner's hand.

attributes.name: Blizzard Dragon
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can select 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field. The selected monster cannot change its battle position or declare an attack until the end of your opponent's next turn.

attributes.name: Metal Shooter
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned, place 2 counters on it. This card gains 800 ATK for each of these counters on it. If this card would be destroyed by a card effect, remove 1 of this card's counters instead.

attributes.name: Des Mosquito
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned or Special Summoned, place 2 counters on it. This card gains 500 ATK for each of these counters on it. If this card would be destroyed by battle, remove 1 of this card's counters instead.

attributes.name: Thunder King Rai-Oh
attributes.description: Neither player can add cards from their Deck to their hand except by drawing them. You can send this face-up card to the Graveyard to negate the Special Summon of 1 of your opponent monsters, and destroy it.

attributes.name: Winged Kuriboh LV9
attributes.description: You can Special Summon this card from your hand as part of a Chain of 2 or more Links. If Spell Cards are activated, remove them from play instead of sending them to the Graveyard. The ATK and DEF of this card are each equal to the number of Spell Cards in your opponent's Graveyard x 500. You can only control 1 "Winged Kuriboh LV9".

attributes.name: Elemental Hero Absolute Zero
attributes.description:
1 "Elemental Hero", "Destiny Hero" or "Evil Hero" monster + 1 WATER monster
This monster cannot be Special Summoned except by Fusion Summon. This card gains 500 ATK for each WATER monster on the field other than "Elemental Hero Absolute Zero". When this card is removed from the field, destroy all monsters your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Alector, Sovereign of Birds
attributes.description: If your opponent controls 2 or more face-up monsters with the same Attribute, you can Special Summon this card from your hand. Once per turn, you can select 1 face-up card on the field. Negate the effect(s) of the selected card during this turn. There can only be 1 face-up "Alector, Sovereign of Birds" on the field.

attributes.name: Skelengel
attributes.description: FLIP: Draw 1 card from your Deck.

attributes.name: Cyber-Tech Alligator
attributes.description: The winged dragon is strenghtened with metal. This monster is the master of cyborgs from where dragons are destroyed.

attributes.name: Expressroid
attributes.description: When you Summon this card, you can add 2 "roid" monsters from your Graveyard to your hand, except "Expressroid".

attributes.name: Storm Caller
attributes.description: Opponent's monsters that are destroyed in battle by Psychic-Type monsters (except this card) can be placed on top of your opponent's Deck instead of being sent to the Graveyard. If this card is destroyed by a card effect, this card's controller takes damage equal to the original ATK of this card.

attributes.name: Psychic Jumper
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can pay 1000 Life Points to select 1 face-up Psychic-Type monster you control (other than a "Psychic Jumper") and 1 face-up 1 monster your opponent controls, and switch control of those monsters. Their battle positions cannot be changed for the rest of the turn.

attributes.name: Nettles
attributes.description: If this face-up card would be destroyed, you can destroy 1 other face-up Plant-Type monster you control instead.

attributes.name: Gigantic Cephalotus
attributes.description: This card gains 200 ATK each time a Plant-Type monster is sent from the field to either player's Graveyard.

attributes.name: Horseytail
attributes.description: If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon 1 "Horse Tail Token" (Plant-Type/WIND/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) to your opponent's side of the field in Defense Position. If that Token is destroyed by battle with a Plant-Type monster, the controller of that Token randomly sends 1 card in their hand to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Botanical Girl
attributes.description: When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard, you can add 1 Plant-Type monster with 1000 DEF or less from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Cursed Fig
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can select 2 face-down Spell or Trap Cards on the field. While this card is in the Graveyard, the selected card(s) cannot be activated.

attributes.name: Tytannial, Princess of Camellias
attributes.description: You can Tribute 1 Plant-Type monster to negate the activation and effect of a Spell, Trap or Effect Monster that targets 1 card on the field and destroy it.

attributes.name: Zombie Mammoth
attributes.description: If there are no Zombie-Type monsters in your Graveyard, destroy this card. When this face-up card is destroyed, you take damage equal to its original ATK.

attributes.name: Plaguespreader Zombie
attributes.description: You can Special Summon this card from your Graveyard by placing 1 card from your hand on top of your Deck. When this card is removed from the field after being Special Summoned by this effect, it is removed from play.

attributes.name: Goblin Decoy Squad
attributes.description: When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, you can draw 1 card. If this card attacks, it is changed to Defense Position at the end of the Battle Phase. This card's battle position cannot be changed until the end of your next turn, except with a card effect.

attributes.name: Comrade Swordsman of Landstar
attributes.description: Warrior-Type monsters you control gain 400 ATK.

attributes.name: Hanewata
attributes.description: You can discard this card to reduce all Effect Damage you take this turn to 0. You can activate this effect during your opponent's turn.

attributes.name: The White Stone of Legend
attributes.description: When this card is sent to the Graveyard, add 1 "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Tiger Dragon
attributes.description: If you Tribute Summon this card by Tributing a Dragon-Type monster, you can destroy up to 2 face-down Spell or Trap Cards your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Jade Knight
attributes.description: Machine-Type monsters you control with an ATK of 1200 or less cannot be destroyed by the effects of Trap Cards. If this face-up card is destroyed by battle and is sent to the Graveyard, you can add 1 Level 4 LIGHT Machine-Type monster from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Iron Chain Dragon
attributes.description:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
You can remove all "Iron Chain" monsters in your Graveyard from play to have this card gain 200 ATK for each one removed until the End Phase. If this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, you can send the top 3 cards of your opponent's Deck to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Psychic Lifetrancer
attributes.description:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
Once per turn, you can remove 1 Psychic-Type monster in your Graveyard from play to gain 1200 Life Points.

attributes.name: Queen of Thorns
attributes.description:
1 Tuner + 1 or more Plant-Type non-Tuner monsters
While this card is face-up on the field, each player pays 1000 Life Points for each non Plant-Type monster they Normal Summons or Special Summons from their hand.

attributes.name: Doomkaiser Dragon
attributes.description:
"Plaguespreader Zombie" + 1 or more Zombie-Type non-Tuner monsters
When this card is Special Summoned, you can select 1 Zombie-Type monster in your opponent's Graveyard and Special Summon it to your side of the field in Attack Position. When this card is removed from the field, destroy that monster.

attributes.name: Revived King Ha Des
attributes.description:
"Plaguespreader Zombie" + 1 or more Zombie-Type non-Tuner monsters
The effects of Effect Monsters destroyed by battle by Zombie-Type monsters you control are negated.

attributes.name: Card Rotator
attributes.description: Activate only by sending 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard. Switch the battle positions of all monsters your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Seed of Deception

attributes.name: Mark of the Rose

During your End Phase, give control of the equipped monster to your opponent. During your Standby Phase, gain control of the equipped monster.

attributes.name: Black Garden
attributes.description: When a monster is successfully Normal or Special Summoned, except by the effect of "Black Garden", halve that monster's ATK, and Special Summon 1 "Rose Token" (Plant-Type/DARK/Level 2/ATK 800/DEF 800) in Attack Position to the side of the field of the opponent of the summoning player. You can destroy this card and all face-up Plant-Type monsters on the field to select 1 monster in your Graveyard with the same ATK as the combined ATK of the destroyed monster(s) and Special Summon it.

attributes.name: Factory of 100 Machines
attributes.description: Remove all "Morphtronic" monsters in your Graveyard from play. Target Machine-Type monster you control gains 200 ATK for each removed monster.

attributes.name: Morphtronic Accelerator
attributes.description: Return 1 "Morphtronic" monster from your hand to your Deck. Destroy 1 card on the field, then draw 1 card.

attributes.name: Morphtronic Cord
attributes.description: Equip only to a "Morphtronic" monster. Each time the equipped monster's battle position is changed, destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card on the field.

attributes.name: Morphtronic Engine
attributes.description: Equip only to a Level 3 "Morphtronic" monster. Its ATK becomes double its original ATK. During your second Standby Phase after this card's activation, destroy this card, and take damage equal to the original ATK of the equipped monster.

attributes.name: Poison Chain
attributes.description: If you did not declare an attack during this turn, during your End Phase, you can send a number of cards from the top of your opponent's Deck to the Graveyard equal to the number of face-up "Iron Chain" monsters you control.

attributes.name: Paralyzing Chain
attributes.description: Each time a card(s) is sent from your opponent's Deck to the Graveyard, inflict 300 damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Teleport
attributes.description: Once per turn, if your opponent controls a monster, and you control no monsters, you can pay 800 Life Points to Special Summon 1 Psychic-Type monster from your hand.

attributes.name: Psychokinesis
attributes.description: Activate only if you control at least 1 face-up Psychic-Type monster. Destroy 1 card on the field, and take 1000 damage.

attributes.name: Miracle Fertilizer
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can Special Summon 1 Plant-Type monster from your Graveyard. During a turn you use this effect, you cannot Normal Summon or Set. When a monster Special Summoned by this card's effect is removed from the field, destroy this card.

attributes.name: Fragrance Storm
attributes.description: Destroy 1 face-up Plant-Type monster on the field and draw 1 card. If the card is a Plant-Type monster, you can reveal it to your opponent to draw 1 more card.

attributes.name: The World Tree
attributes.description:
When a Plant-Type monster on the field is destroyed, place 1 Flower Counter on this card. By removing any number of Flower Counters from this card during your turn, the corresponding effect is applied:
- 1: Until the End Phase of the turn, target Plant-Type monster face-up gains 400 ATK and DEF
- 2: Destroy 1 card on the field.
- 3: Select 1 Plant-Type monster in your Graveyard and Special Summon it.

attributes.name: Everliving Underworld Cannon
attributes.description: Once during each player's turn, when a Zombie-Type monster is Special Summoned to your side of the field, inflict 800 damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Secret Village of the Spellcasters
attributes.description: If you control only Spellcaster-Type monsters, your opponent cannot activate Spell Cards. If you control no Spellcaster-Type monsters, you cannot activate Spell Cards.

attributes.name: Omega Goggles
attributes.description: Equip only to a monster you control. Once per turn, you can reveal 1 random card in your opponent's hand. If you do this, the equipped monster cannot attack this turn.

attributes.name: Battle Mania
