attributes.name: Confusion Chaff
attributes.description: Activate only during your opponent's Battle Phase when a second direct attack is declared. The monster that declared the first direct attack becomes the attack target, and you proceed directly to damage calculation.

attributes.name: Urgent Tuning
attributes.description: Activate only during a Battle Phase. Perform 1 Synchro Summon for 1 Synchro Monster.

attributes.name: Synchro Strike
attributes.description: Target Synchro Monster gains 500 ATK for each Synchro Material Monster used to Summon it, until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Prideful Roar
attributes.description: During Damage Calculation when your monster is battling with an opponent's monster that has a higher ATK, you can activate this card by paying Life Points equal to the difference between the two ATKs. During Damage Calculation only, your monster gains ATK equal to the difference in ATK + 300.

attributes.name: Revival Gift
attributes.description: Special Summon 1 Tuner Monster from your Graveyard. Any effect(s) of the Special Summoned monster are negated. Then, Special Summon 2 "Gift Fiend Tokens" (Fiend-Type/DARK/Level 3/ATK 1500/DEF 1500) to your opponent's side of the field.

attributes.name: Lineage of Destruction
attributes.description: Activate only by selecting 1 face-up Level 8 monster you control during a turn a Defense Position monster your opponent controls is destroyed. During this turn, the selected monster can attack twice during the same Battle Phase.

attributes.name: Doppelganger
attributes.description: When you take damage from the effect of a monster your opponent controls, inflict the same amount of damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Morphtransition
attributes.description: Activate only when a "Morphtronic" monster you control is selected as an attack target. Negate the attack and change the battle position of the "Morphtronic" monster that was selected as the attack target.

attributes.name: Morphtronic Monitron
attributes.description: When you Summon a "Morphtronic" monster(s), you can change them to Defense Position.

attributes.name: Psychic Trigger
attributes.description: Activate only when your Life Points are lower than your opponent's. Remove 2 Psychic-Type monsters in your Graveyard from play, then draw 2 cards.

attributes.name: Pollinosis
attributes.description: Activate by Tributing 1 Plant-Type monster. Negate an activation of a Spell / Trap Card / Normal Summon / Special Summon and destroy the Spell Card, Trap Card, or Summoned monster.

attributes.name: Bamboo Scrap
attributes.description: Tribute 1 Plant-Type monster. Special Summon 2 "Plant Tokens" (Plant-Type/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 800/DEF 500) to your opponent's side of the field in Defense Position.

attributes.name: Plant Food Chain
attributes.description: After activation, this card becomes an Equip Card, and is equipped to a Plant-Type monster you control. The equipped monster gains 500 ATK. If this Equip Card is destroyed by a card effect, you can select 1 Plant-Type monster in your Graveyard and Special Summon it.

attributes.name: Trap of the Imperial Tomb
attributes.description: Activate only when a Zombie-Type monster was Special Summoned from your opponent's Graveyard to your side of the field. Destroy 2 cards on the field.

attributes.name: DNA Checkup
attributes.description: Activate by selecting 1 face-down monster you control. Your opponent declare 2 Attributes, and you then reveal the selected monster. If the monster has the same Attribute as an Attribute your opponent declared, your opponent draws 2 cards. If not, you draw 2 cards.

attributes.name: Gozen Match
attributes.description: Each player sends monsters from their side of the field to the Graveyard until they only control 1 Attribute. Neither player can control more than 1 Attribute.

attributes.name: Giant Trap Hole
attributes.description: Activate only when 2 or more monsters are Special Summoned at the same time. Destroy all monsters on the field.

attributes.name: Seed of Flame
attributes.description: When this card you control is destroyed by card effect and sent to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Plant-Type monster except "Seed of Flame", from your Graveyard. Special Summon 1 "Seed Token" (Plant-Type/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) to your opponent's side of the field in Defense Position. This Token cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon.

attributes.name: Cactus Fighter
attributes.description: If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle, Special Summon 1 "Needle Token" (Plant/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 500/DEF 500) to your opponent's side of the field in Defense Position.

attributes.name: Overdrive Teleporter
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. You can pay 2000 Life Points to Special Summon 2 Level 3 Psychic-Type monsters from your Deck. This effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field.

attributes.name: Rai-Jin
attributes.description: All LIGHT monsters you control gain 100 ATK for each LIGHT Monster in your Graveyard. During your End Phase, destroy 1 LIGHT monster you control. There can only be 1 face-up "Rai-Jin" on the field.

attributes.name: Rai-Mei
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and is sent to the Graveyard, you can add 1 Level 2 or lower LIGHT monster from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Gladiator Beast Retiari
attributes.description: When this card is Special Summoned by the effect of a "Gladiator Beast" monster, you can remove from play 1 card from your opponent's Graveyard. At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card attacked or was attacked, you can return this card to your Deck to Special Summon 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster from your Deck except "Gladiator Beast Retiari".

attributes.name: Night's End Sorcerer
attributes.description: When this card is Special Summoned, you can remove up to 2 cards from your opponent's Graveyard from play.

attributes.name: Tempest Magician
attributes.description:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner Spellcaster-Type monsters
When this card is Synchro Summoned, place 1 Spell Counter on it. Once per turn, you can discard any number of cards to place 1 Spell Counter on a monster(s) you control for each card you discarded. You can remove all Spell Counters on the field to inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each removed Spell Counter.

attributes.name: Treacherous Trap Hole
attributes.description: Destroy 2 Monsters on the field. You cannot activate this card if you have any Trap Cards in your Graveyard.

attributes.name: Puppet Master
attributes.description: When this card is Tribute Summoned you can pay 2000 Life Points to Special Summon 2 Fiend-Type monsters from your Graveyard. They cannot attack this turn.

attributes.name: Time Machine
attributes.description: Activate only when a monster is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard. Special Summon that monster to the same side of the field it was on, in the same battle position it was in when destroyed.

attributes.name: Virus Cannon
attributes.description: Tribute any number of non-Token monsters you control. For each Tributed monster, your opponent selects 1 Spell Card from their Deck and sends it to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Machine Lord Ur
attributes.description: This card can attack each monster your opponent controls once. If this card battles, reduce Battle Damage inflicted to your opponent's Life Points to 0.

attributes.name: Mosaic Manticore
attributes.description: During the Standby Phase of your next turn after you Tribute Summon this card, Special Summon the monsters Tributed to Summon it from your Graveyard. They cannot declare an attack, and their effects are negated.

attributes.name: Goka, the Pyre of Malice
attributes.description: If you control a face-up FIRE monster, you may Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Special Summoned by this effect, destroy 1 FIRE monster you control. During each of your Standby Phases, Special Summon 1 "Fireball Token" (Pyro-Type/FIRE/Level 1/ATK 100/DEF 100) in Defense Position. You can Tribute 1 other FIRE monster to have this card gain 500 ATK until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Red Ogre
attributes.description: When this monster is Normal Summoned, by discarding any number of cards, return the same number of cards on the field to their owners' hand.

attributes.name: Neos Wiseman
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by sending 1 "Elemental Hero Neos" and 1 "Yubel" you control to the Graveyard. When this card battles, at the end of the Damage Step, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the opponent's monster, and you gain Life Points equal to that monster's DEF. This card cannot be destroyed by a card effect.

attributes.name: Elemental Hero Divine Neos
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned except by a Fusion Summon of any 5 "Neos", "Neo-Spacian", "Elemental Hero", "Destiny Hero" or "Evil Hero" monsters, including at least 1 "Neos" monster, 1 "Neo-Spacian" monster and 1 "Hero" monster. Once per turn you can remove from play 1 "Neos", "Neo-Spacian", "Elemental Hero", "Destiny Hero" or "Evil Hero" monster from your Graveyard, to have this card gain 500 ATK. IT also gains the removed monster's effect until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Botanical Lion
attributes.description: This card gains 300 ATK for each Plant-Type monster you control. Control of this face-up card cannot switch.

attributes.name: Rose, Warrior of Revenge
attributes.description: When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, inflict 300 damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Destiny Hero - Plasma
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by Tributing 3 monsters you control.  Once per turn, select your opponent's monster and equip it to this card (you can only equip 1 monster at a time to this card).  This card gains ATK equal to half the equipped monster. While this card is face-up on the field, negate all the effect of face-up Effect Monsters your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Elemental Hero Plasma Vice
attributes.description:
"Elemental Hero Sparkman" + "Elemental Hero Bladedge"
This monster cannot be Special Summoned except by Fusion Summon. During battle between this attacking card and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of this card, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent. By discarding 1 card from your hand, destroy 1 monster in Attack Position your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Stardust Dragon
attributes.description:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
You can Tribute this card to negate the activation of a Spell Card, Trap Card or Effect Monster's effect that destroys a card(s) on the field and destroy that card. If you negate an effect this way, you can Special Summon this card from your Graveyard during your End Phase.

attributes.name: Red Dragon Archfiend
attributes.description:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
If this card attacks a Defense Position monster your opponent controls, destroy all Defense Position monsters your opponent controls after damage calculation. During your End Phase destroy all other monsters you control that did not declare an attack this turn.

attributes.name: Turbo Warrior
attributes.description:
1 "Turbo Synchron" + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
If this card attacks a Level 6 or higher Synchro Monster, the ATK of that monster is halved. This card cannot be targeted by the effect of a Level 6 or lower Effect Monster.

attributes.name: Black Rose Dragon
attributes.description:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
When this card is Synchro Summoned, you can destroy all cards on the field. Once per turn, you can remove 1 Plant-Type monster in your Graveyard from play to change 1 Defense Position monster your opponent controls to Attack Position, and make its ATK 0.

attributes.name: Majestic Star Dragon
attributes.description: "Majestic Dragon" + "Stardust Dragon" + 1 non-Tuner monster{NK}You can Tribute this card to negate the activation of an opponent's Spell Card, Trap Card or Effect Monster's effect and destroy all cards your opponent controls. Once per turn, you can negate the effect(s) of 1 face-up monster your opponent controls until the End Phase. Also, if the negated effect can be activated, you can activate it once as this card's effect. Return this card to the Extra Deck during the End Phase, and Special Summon 1 "Stardust Dragon" from your Graveyard.

attributes.name: Earthbound Immortal Wiraqocha Rasca
attributes.description: There can only be 1 face-up "Earthbound Immortal" monster on the field. If there is no face-up Field Spell Card on the field, destroy this card. Your opponent cannot select this card as an attack target. This card can attack your opponent directly. When this card is Normal Summoned, return up to 3 cards you control to your Deck, except this card, and discard the same number of cards from your opponent's hand at random. This card gains 1000 ATK for each card discarded for this effect.

attributes.name: Total Defense Shogun
attributes.description: This card is changed to Defense Position when it is Normal Summoned or Flip Summoned successfully. This card can attack while it is in Defense Position. If this card attacks while in Defense Position, apply the ATK of this card for damage calculation.

attributes.name: Blade Knight
attributes.description: If you have 1 or less cards in your hand, increase the ATK of this card on the field by 400 points. Also, if this card is the only monster on your side of the field, negate the effects of Flip Effect Monsters destroyed by this card as a result of battle.

attributes.name: Command Knight
attributes.description: While at least 1 other monster exists on your side of the field, your opponent cannot select this card as an attack target. Also, as long as this card remains face-up on the field, increase the ATK of all your Warrior-Type monsters by 400 points.

attributes.name: Swift Gaia the Fierce Knight
attributes.description: If this is the only card in your hand, you can Summon this card in face-up Attack Position without Tributing monsters. This is treated as a Normal Summon.

attributes.name: Insect Queen
attributes.description: You cannot declare an attack with this card without Tributing 1 monster on your side of the field. Increase the ATK of this card by 200 points for each face-up Insect-Type monster on the field. Special Summon 1 "Insect Monster Token" (Insect-Type/EARTH/1 Star/ATK 100/DEF 100) in Attack Position on your side of the field during the End Phase of each turn that this card destroys your opponent's monster.

attributes.name: Obnoxious Celtic Guard
attributes.description: This card is not destroyed as a result of battle when this card battles with a monster with an ATK of 1900 or more. (Damage calculation is applied normally.)

attributes.name: Gilford the Lightning
attributes.description: If you Tribute Summon this card by Tributing 3 monsters, destroy all monsters on your opponent's side of the field.

attributes.name: Exarion Universe
attributes.description: You can only activate this effect during a Battle Step of your turn. Decrease the ATK of this card by 400 points, then during battle between this attacking card and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of this card, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points. This effect continues until the End Phase of the turn this effect is activated.

attributes.name: Vorse Raider
attributes.description: This wicked Beast-Warrior does every horrid thing imaginable and loves it! His axe bears the marks of his countless victims.

attributes.name: Rocket Warrior
attributes.description: This effect is only active during the Battle Phase of your turn. Battle Damage to this card and this card's controller that they take from a battle involving this card becomes 0. After damage calculation, decrease the ATK of the monster that was attacked by this card by 500 points until the end of this turn.

attributes.name: Panther Warrior
attributes.description: This card cannot attack unless you Tribute 1 monster on your side of the field.

attributes.name: Dark Sage
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned from your hand or your Deck by Tributing 1 "Dark Magician" on your side of the field when you succeed in the effect of "Time Wizard". At that time, select 1 Spell Card from your Deck, add it to your hand, and then shuffle your Deck.

attributes.name: Big Shield Gardna
attributes.description: Negate the activation of a Spell Card that designates this 1 face-down monster. At that time, flip this card into face-up Defense Position. If this card is attacked, change the Battle Position of this card to Attack Position at the end of the Damage Step.

attributes.name: Makyura the Destructor
attributes.description: During the turn this card is sent to the Graveyard, the owner of this card can activate Trap Card(s) from his/her hand.

attributes.name: Exchange
attributes.description: Both players show their hands to each other and select 1 card from each other's hand. Add the selected card to your hand and you can use it in this Duel. (When the cards are sent to the Graveyard, they are sent to the Graveyard of the original owner.)

attributes.name: Toon Masked Sorcerer
attributes.description: This card cannot attack during the turn that it is Normal Summoned, Flip Summoned, or Special Summoned. When "Toon World" on the field is destroyed, destroy this card. If "Toon World" is on your side of the field and your opponent does not control a Toon Monster, this card can attack your opponent's Life Points directly. When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, draw 1 card from your Deck.

attributes.name: Toon Defense
attributes.description: When your opponent's monster attacks a Level 4 or lower Toon Monster on your side of the field, you can make the attack a direct attack to your Life Points.

attributes.name: Emes the Infinity
attributes.description: Each time this card destroys an opponent's monster and sends it to the Graveyard as a result of battle, increase the ATK of this card by 700 points.

attributes.name: D.D. Assailant
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed as a result of battle with your opponent's monster, remove from play both this card and the opponent's monster that destroyed this card.

attributes.name: Twinheaded Beast
attributes.description: This card can attack twice during the same Battle Phase.

attributes.name: Vampire Lord
attributes.description: Each time this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, declare 1 card type (Monster, Spell, or Trap). Your opponent selects 1 card of that type from their Deck and sends it to the Graveyard. Also, if this card is destroyed and sent to your Graveyard by your opponent's card effect, it is Special Summoned to the field during your next Standby Phase.

attributes.name: Battle Footballer
attributes.description: A cyborg with high defense power. Originally it was invented for a football machine.

attributes.name: Nin-Ken Dog
attributes.description: A Ninja dog who has mastered extreme Ninjutsu. Through hard training, it learned the technique to metamorphose into a human being.

attributes.name: Acrobat Monkey
attributes.description: An autonomous monkey type robot which was developed with cutting-edge technology. It moves very acrobatically.

attributes.name: Arsenal Summoner
attributes.description: FLIP: Add 1 card that includes "Guardian" in its card name from your Deck to your hand. You cannot add "Celtic Guardian", "Winged Dragon, Guardian of the Fortress #1", "Winged Dragon, Guardian of the Fortress #2", "Guardian of the Labyrinth", or "The Reliable Guardian".

attributes.name: Guardian Elma
attributes.description: This card can only be Normal Summoned, Flip Summoned, or Special Summoned when there is a "Butterfly Dagger - Elma" on your side of the field. When this card is Normal Summoned or Special Summoned successfully, you can equip 1 appropriate Equip Spell Card in your Graveyard to this card.

attributes.name: Guardian Ceal
attributes.description: This card can only be Normal Summoned, Flip Summoned, or Special Summoned when there is a "Shooting Star Bow - Ceal" on your side of the field. Send an Equip Card on your side of the field equipped to this card to the Graveyard to destroy 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field.

attributes.name: Guardian Grarl
attributes.description: This card can only be Normal Summoned, Flip Summoned, or Special Summoned when there is a "Gravity Axe - Grarl" on your side of the field. If this is the only card in your hand, you can Special Summon it.

attributes.name: Guardian Baou
attributes.description: This card can only be Normal Summoned, Flip Summoned, or Special Summoned when there is a "Wicked-Breaking Flamberge - Baou" on your side of the field. Each time this card destroys 1 of your opponent's monsters and sends it to the Graveyard as a result of battle, increase the ATK of this card by 1000 points. Also, the effects of an Effect Monster that this card destroys as a result of battle are negated.

attributes.name: Guardian Kay'est
attributes.description: This card can only be Normal Summoned, Flip Summoned, or Special Summoned when there is a "Rod of Silence - Kay'est" on your side of the field. This card is unaffected by any Spell Cards. Also, this card cannot be an attack target of your opponent's monsters.

attributes.name: Guardian Tryce
attributes.description: This card can only be Normal Summoned, Flip Summoned, or Special Summoned when there is a "Twin Swords of Flashing Light - Tryce" on your side of the field. When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, Special Summon to your side of the field the monster in the Graveyard that was used for the Tribute Summon of this card.

attributes.name: Cyber Raider
attributes.description:
When this card is Normal Summoned, Flip Summoned, or Special Summoned successfully, select and activate 1 of the following effects:
- Select 1 Equip Card equipped to 1 monster on the field and destroy it.
- Select 1 Equip Card equipped to 1 monster on the field and equip it to this card.

attributes.name: Reflect Bounder
attributes.description: When this face-up Attack Position card is attacked by a monster on your opponent's side of the field, before damage calculation is resolved in the Damage Step, this card inflicts damage to your opponent's Life Points equal to the ATK of the attacking monster. Then, after damage calculation is resolved, this card is destroyed.

attributes.name: Little-Winguard
attributes.description: Once during each of your End Phases, you can change the battle position of this card.

attributes.name: Des Feral Imp
attributes.description: FLIP: Select 1 card from your Graveyard, add it to your Deck, and shuffle your Deck.

attributes.name: Different Dimension Dragon
attributes.description: This card cannot be destroyed by the effect of a Spell or Trap Card that does not target it. This card is not destroyed as a result of battle against a monster with an ATK of 1900 or less.

attributes.name: Shinato, King of a Higher Plane
attributes.description: This card can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "Shinato's Ark". You must also Tribute monsters whose total Levels equal 8 or more from the field or your hand. When this card destroys a Defense Position monster and sends it to the Graveyard as a result of battle, inflict damage to your opponent's Life Points equal to the original ATK of the destroyed monster.

attributes.name: Dark Flare Knight
attributes.description:
"Dark Magician" + "Flame Swordsman"
Any damage to this card's controller caused as a result of battle involving this monster becomes 0. When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, Special Summon 1 "Mirage Knight" from your hand or Deck.

attributes.name: Mirage Knight
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by the effect of "Dark Flare Knight". When this card battles another monster, during damage calculation increase the ATK of this card by the original ATK of the opponent's monster. During the End Phase after this card was involved in battle, remove this card from play.

attributes.name: Berserk Dragon
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by the effect of "A Deal with Dark Ruler". This card can attack all monsters on your opponent's side of the field once each. Decrease the ATK of this card by 500 points during the End Phase of each of your turns.

attributes.name: Exodia Necross
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by the effect of "Contract with Exodia". This card is not destroyed as a result of battle or by the effects of Spell or Trap Cards, and during each of your Standby Phases, increase the ATK of this card by 500 points. This card is destroyed when any of "Exodia the Forbidden One", "Right Arm of the Forbidden One", "Left Arm of the Forbidden One", "Right Leg of the Forbidden One" or "Left Leg of the Forbidden One" is not in your Graveyard.

attributes.name: Gyaku-Gire Panda
attributes.description: Increase the ATK of this card by 500 points for each monster on your opponent's side of the field. When this card attacks with an ATK that is higher than the DEF of your opponent's Defense Position monster, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Blindly Loyal Goblin
attributes.description: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, control of this card cannot switch.

attributes.name: Despair from the Dark
attributes.description: When this card is sent from your hand or Deck to your Graveyard by your opponent's card effect, Special Summon this card to the field.

attributes.name: Maju Garzett
attributes.description: The ATK of this card becomes equal to the combined original ATK of the 2 monsters you Tributed for the Tribute Summon of this card.

attributes.name: Fear from the Dark
attributes.description: When this card is sent from your hand or Deck to your Graveyard by your opponent's card effect, Special Summon this card to the field.

attributes.name: Dark Scorpion - Chick the Yellow
attributes.description:
When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, you can select and activate 1 of the following effects:
- Return 1 card on the field to its owner's hand.
- Pick up 1 card on the top of your opponent's Deck (Your opponent does not look at the card). Select the top or the bottom of the Deck and return the card there.

attributes.name: D.D. Warrior Lady
attributes.description: When this card battles with your opponent's monster, after damage calculation you can remove from play the opponent's monster and this card.

attributes.name: Thousand Needles
attributes.description: When this Defense Position card is attacked and if the DEF of this card is higher than the ATK of the attacking monster, destroy the attacking monster at the end of the Damage Step.

attributes.name: Shinato's Ark
attributes.description: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Shinato, King of a Higher Plane". You must also Tribute monsters whose total Levels equal 8 or more from the field or your hand.

attributes.name: A Deal with Dark Ruler
attributes.description: You can only activate this card during a turn in which a Level 8 or higher monster on your side of the field was sent to the Graveyard. Special Summon 1 "Berserk Dragon" from your hand or Deck.

attributes.name: Contract with Exodia
attributes.description: You can only activate this card when you have "Exodia the Forbidden One", "Right Arm of the Forbidden One", "Left Arm of the Forbidden One", "Right Leg of the Forbidden One", and "Left Leg of the Forbidden One" in your Graveyard. Special Summon 1 "Exodia Necross" from your hand.

attributes.name: Butterfly Dagger - Elma
attributes.description: Increase the ATK of a monster equipped with this card by 300 points. When this card is equipped to a monster, and is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, this card can be returned to the owner's hand.

attributes.name: Shooting Star Bow - Ceal
attributes.description: Decrease the ATK of a monster equipped with this card by 1000 points. A monster equipped with this card can attack your opponent's Life Points directly.

attributes.name: Gravity Axe - Grarl
attributes.description: Increase the ATK of a monster equipped with this card by 500 points. As long as this card remains on the field, monsters on your opponent's side of the field cannot change their battle positions.

attributes.name: Wicked-Breaking Flamberge - Baou
attributes.description: Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard to equip this card. Increase the ATK of the equipped monster by 500 points. If a monster equipped with this card destroys a monster as a result of battle, the effect of that monster is negated.

attributes.name: Rod of Silence - Kay'est
attributes.description: Increase the DEF of a monster equipped with this card by 500 points. Negate the effect of a Spell Card (excluding this card) that targets the monster equipped with this card and destroy the Spell Card.

attributes.name: Twin Swords of Flashing Light - Tryce
attributes.description: Send 1 card from your hand to your Graveyard to equip this card. Decrease the ATK of a monster equipped with this card by 500 points. A monster equipped with this card can attack twice during the same Battle Phase.

attributes.name: Precious Cards from Beyond
attributes.description: When you successfully Tribute Summon or Set a monster that required 2 or more Tributes, draw 2 cards from your Deck.

attributes.name: Rod of the Mind's Eye
attributes.description: If a monster equipped with this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, the damage becomes 1000 points.

attributes.name: Fairy of the Spring
attributes.description: Add 1 Equip Spell Card from your Graveyard to your hand. You cannot activate that Equip Spell Card this turn.

attributes.name: Token Thanksgiving
attributes.description: Destroy all tokens on the field. Increase your Life Points by the number of tokens destroyed x 800 points.

attributes.name: Morale Boost
attributes.description: Each time a player equips an Equip Spell Card, increase the Life Points of the controller of that Equip Spell Card by 1000 points. Each time an Equip Spell Card is removed from the field, the controller of that Equip Spell Card takes 1000 points of damage.

attributes.name: Non-Spellcasting Area
attributes.description: All face-up Monster Cards on the field, except for Effect Monsters, are unaffected by any Spell Card (excluding this card).

attributes.name: Different Dimension Gate
attributes.description: Select 1 Monster Card each from you and your opponent's sides of the field and remove them from play. When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, return those monsters to the field in the same battle position as when they were removed from play.

attributes.name: Final Attack Orders
attributes.description: As long as this card remains on the field, all face-up monsters on the field are changed to Attack Position and their battle positions cannot be changed.

attributes.name: Staunch Defender
attributes.description: You can only activate this card when your opponent declares an attack. Select 1 face-up monster on your side of the field. During this turn, your opponent can only designate the selected monster as an attack target and your opponent must attack the selected monster with all face-up monsters.

attributes.name: Ojama Trio
attributes.description: Special Summon 3 "Ojama Tokens" (Beast-Type/LIGHT/2 Stars/ATK 0/DEF 1000) in Defense Position on your opponent's side of the field. The tokens cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon. When an "Ojama Token" is destroyed, the controller takes 300 points of damage.

attributes.name: Arsenal Robber
attributes.description: Your opponent selects 1 Equip Spell Card from his/her Deck and sends it to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Skill Drain
attributes.description: Pay 1000 Life Points. As long as this card remains on the field, the effects of all face-up Effect Monsters on the field are negated.

attributes.name: Really Eternal Rest
attributes.description: Destroy all monsters equipped with Equip Cards.

attributes.name: Kaiser Glider
attributes.description: This card is not destroyed as a result of battle when this card battles with a monster with the same ATK. When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, return 1 monster on the field to its owner's hand.

attributes.name: Interdimensional Matter Transporter
attributes.description: Select 1 face-up monster on your side of the field and remove it from play until the End Phase of the turn this card is activated.

attributes.name: Cost Down
attributes.description: Discard 1 card from your hand. Downgrade all Monster Cards in your hand by 2 Levels until the End Phase of the turn this card is activated.

attributes.name: Gagagigo
attributes.description: This young evildoer used to have an evil heart, but by meeting a special person, he discovered justice.

attributes.name: D.D. Trainer
attributes.description: A poor goblin that was sucked into a different dimension. However, he's doing his best with his new destiny.

attributes.name: Ojama Green
attributes.description: He's one of the Ojama Trio. It's said that he butts in by any means necessary. It's also said that when the three are together, something happens.

attributes.name: Archfiend Soldier
attributes.description: An expert at battle who belongs to a crack diabolical unit. He's famous because he always gets the job done.

attributes.name: Pandemonium Watchbear
attributes.description: As long as this card remains face-up on your side of the field, "Pandemonium" on your side of the field is not destroyed by your opponent's card effects.

attributes.name: Sasuke Samurai #2
attributes.description: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can pay 800 Life Points. If you do this, until the End Phase, Spell and Trap Cards cannot be activated.

attributes.name: Dark Scorpion - Gorg the Strong
attributes.description:
When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, you can select and activate 1 of the following effects:
- Return 1 Monster Card on your opponent's side of the field to the top of its owner's Deck.
- Send 1 card from the top of your opponent's Deck to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Dark Scorpion - Meanae the Thorn
attributes.description:
When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, you can select and activate 1 of the following effects:
- Add 1 card that includes "Dark Scorpion" in its card name, or is named "Cliff the Trap Remover", from your Deck to your hand.
- Add 1 card that includes "Dark Scorpion" in its card name, or is named "Cliff the Trap Remover", from your Graveyard to your hand.

attributes.name: Outstanding Dog Marron
attributes.description: When this card is sent to your Graveyard, add it to your Deck and shuffle it.

attributes.name: Great Maju Garzett
attributes.description: The ATK of this card becomes twice the original ATK of 1 monster that you Tributed for the Tribute Summon of this card.

attributes.name: Iron Blacksmith Kotetsu
attributes.description: FLIP: Select 1 Equip Spell Card from your Deck and add it to your hand.

attributes.name: Goblin of Greed
attributes.description: As long as this card remains face-up on your side of the field, neither player can activate an effect by discarding from his/her hand.

attributes.name: Mefist the Infernal General
attributes.description: When this card attacks with an ATK that is higher than the DEF of your opponent's Defense Position monster, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points. When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, discard 1 card randomly from your opponent's hand.

attributes.name: Vilepawn Archfiend
attributes.description: The controller of this card pays 500 Life Points during each of his/her Standby Phases (this is not optional). When this card is targeted by the effect of a card controlled by your opponent, when resolving the effect, roll a six-sided die. If the result is 3, negate the effect and destroy the opponent's card. As long as this card remains on the field, your opponent cannot attack any Archfiend Monster Card on your side of the field except "Vilepawn Archfiend".

attributes.name: Shadowknight Archfiend
attributes.description: The controller of this card pays 900 Life Points during each of his/her Standby Phases (this is not optional). When this card is targeted by the effect of a card controlled by your opponent, when resolving the effect, roll a six-sided die. If the result is 3, negate the effect and destroy the opponent's card. The Battle Damage this card inflicts to your opponent is halved.

attributes.name: Darkbishop Archfiend
attributes.description: The controller of this card pays 500 Life Points during each of his/her Standby Phases (this is not optional). When an Archfiend Monster Card on your side of the field is targeted by the effect of a card controlled by your opponent, when resolving the effect, roll a six-sided die. If the result is 1, 3, or 6, negate the effect and destroy the opponent's card.

attributes.name: Desrook Archfiend
attributes.description: The controller of this card pays 500 Life Points during each of his/her Standby Phases (this is not optional). When this card is targeted by the effect of a card controlled by your opponent, when resolving the effect, roll a six-sided die. If the result is 3, negate the effect and destroy the opponent's card. When a "Terrorking Archfiend" on your side of the field is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, you can send this card from your hand to the Graveyard to Special Summon the "Terrorking Archfiend".

attributes.name: Infernalqueen Archfiend
attributes.description: The controller of this card pays 500 Life Points during each of his/her Standby Phases (this is not optional). When this card is targeted by the effect of a card controlled by your opponent, when resolving the effect, roll a six-sided die. If the result is 2 or 5, negate the effect and destroy the opponent's card. As long as this card remains on the field, during each Standby Phase, increase the ATK of 1 Archfiend Monster Card by 1000 points until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Terrorking Archfiend
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Flip Summoned unless you have an Archfiend Monster Card on your side of the field. The controller of this card pays 800 Life Points during each of his/her Standby Phases (this is not optional). When this card is targeted by the effect of a card controlled by your opponent, when resolving the effect, roll a six-sided die. If the result is 2 or 5, negate the effect and destroy the opponent's card. The effects of an Effect Monster that this card destroyed as a result of battle are negated.

attributes.name: Skull Archfiend of Lightning
attributes.description: The controller of this card pays 500 Life Points during each of his/her Standby Phases (this is not optional). When this card is targeted by the effect of a card controlled by your opponent, when resolving the effect, roll a six-sided die. If the result is 1, 3, or 6, negate the effect and destroy the opponent's card.

attributes.name: Metallizing Parasite - Lunatite
attributes.description: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you control this monster on the field, you can equip it to a face-up monster on your side of the field as an Equip Card, OR unequip the Union equipment and Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. While equipped to a monster by this card's effect, that monster will be unaffected by the effects of Spell Cards controlled by your opponent. (1 monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the monster that this card is equipped to is destroyed as a result of battle, destroy this card instead.)

attributes.name: Tsukuyomi
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card returns to the owner's hand during the End Phase of the turn that it is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up. When this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up, select 1 face-up monster on the field and flip it into face-down Defense Position.

attributes.name: Mudora
attributes.description: The ATK of this card increases by 200 points for every Fairy-Type monster in your Graveyard.

attributes.name: Keldo
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, select 2 cards from your opponent's Graveyard, add them to your opponent's Deck and the Deck is then shuffled.

attributes.name: Kelbek
attributes.description: A monster that attacks this card returns to its owner's hand. Damage calculation is applied normally.

attributes.name: Zolga
attributes.description: When you Tribute Summon a monster by Tributing this card, increase the Life Points of the player who controlled this card on the field by 2000 points.

attributes.name: Agido
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, roll a six-sided die. You can Special Summon 1 Fairy-Type monster from your Graveyard whose Level is equal to the number rolled. (If the result is 6, you can Special Summon a Level 6 or higher monster.)

attributes.name: Legendary Flame Lord
attributes.description: This card can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "Incandescent Ordeal". You must also Tribute monsters whose total Levels equal 7 or more from the field or your hand. Each time you or your opponent activates 1 Spell Card, put 1 Spell Counter on this card. Remove 3 Spell Counters from this card to destroy all monsters on the field except this card.

attributes.name: Dark Master - Zorc
attributes.description: This card can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "Contract with the Dark Master". You must also Tribute monsters whose total Levels equal 8 or more from the field or your hand. During your turn, you can roll 1 six-sided die. If the result is 1 or 2, destroy all monsters on your opponent's side of the field. If the result is 3, 4, or 5, destroy 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field. If the result is 6, destroy all monsters on your side of the field.

attributes.name: Spell Reproduction
attributes.description: Send 2 Spell Cards from your hand to the Graveyard. Select 1 Spell Card from your Graveyard and add it to your hand.

attributes.name: Dragged Down into the Grave
attributes.description: You and your opponent look at each other's hands, select 1 card from each other's hands and discard them to the Graveyard, and each draw 1 card.

attributes.name: Incandescent Ordeal
attributes.description: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Legendary Flame Lord". You must also Tribute monsters whose total Levels equal 7 or more from the field or your hand.

attributes.name: Contract with the Abyss
attributes.description: This card is used to Ritual Summon any DARK Ritual Monster. You must also Tribute monsters from the field or your hand whose total Levels equal the Level of the Ritual Monster you are Ritual Summoning.

attributes.name: Contract with the Dark Master
attributes.description: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Dark Master - Zorc". You must also Tribute monsters whose total Levels equal 8 or more from the field or your hand.

attributes.name: Falling Down
attributes.description: Destroy this card if there is no Archfiend card on your side of the field. Take control of 1 of your opponent's monsters that is equipped with this card. You take 800 points of damage during each of your opponent's Standby Phases.

attributes.name: Checkmate
attributes.description: Tribute 1 Archfiend monster on your side of the field. During this turn, 1 "Terrorking Archfiend" on your side of the field can attack your opponent's Life Points directly.

attributes.name: Cestus of Dagla
attributes.description: You can only equip this card to a Fairy-Type monster. Increase the ATK of a monster equipped with this card by 500 points. When the monster equipped with this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, increase your Life Points by an equal amount.

attributes.name: Final Countdown
attributes.description: Pay 2000 Life Points. After 20 turns have passed after you activate this card (counting the turn you activate this card as the 1st turn), you win the duel.

attributes.name: Archfiend's Oath
attributes.description: Once per turn you can pay 500 Life Points to declare 1 card name. Pick up the top card from your Deck and if the card name is the one you declared, add it to your hand. If not, send the card you picked up to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Mustering of the Dark Scorpions
attributes.description: You can only activate this card when there is a face-up "Don Zaloog"(s) on your side of the field. You can Special Summon from your hand any of the cards that include "Dark Scorpion" in their card name, or are named "Cliff the Trap Remover". (You can only Special Summon up to 1 card with each card name.)

attributes.name: Pandemonium
attributes.description: Neither player has to pay Life Points during the Standby Phase for Archfiend monsters. Each time a player's Archfiend Monster Card(s) are destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, except as a result of battle, that player can select 1 Archfiend Monster Card from his/her Deck that has a lower Level than the destroyed card and add it to his/her hand.

attributes.name: Altar for Tribute
attributes.description: Select 1 monster on your side of the field and send it to the Graveyard. Increase your Life Points by an amount equal to the original ATK of the monster.

attributes.name: Frozen Soul
attributes.description: You can only activate this card when your Life Points are at least 2000 lower than your opponent's. Skip your opponent's next Battle Phase.

attributes.name: Battle-Scarred
attributes.description: Select 1 Archfiend monster on your side of the field to activate this card. Your opponent also pays the same Life Points that you pay for the selected monster during the Standby Phase. If this card is removed from the field, destroy the selected monster. When the selected monster is removed from the field, destroy this card.

attributes.name: Dark Scorpion Combination
attributes.description: You can only activate this card when there are "Don Zaloog", "Cliff the Trap Remover", "Dark Scorpion - Chick the Yellow", "Dark Scorpion - Gorg the Strong", and "Dark Scorpion - Meanae the Thorn" face-up on your side of the field. During this turn, any of these 5 cards can attack your opponent's Life Points directly. In that case, the Battle Damage inflicted to your opponent by each of those cards becomes 400 points.

attributes.name: Archfiend's Roar
attributes.description: Pay 500 Life Points to activate this card. Special Summon 1 Archfiend Monster Card from your Graveyard. This monster cannot be Tributed under any conditions and is destroyed during the End Phase of this turn.

attributes.name: Dice Re-Roll
attributes.description: Once this turn, negate 1 six-sided die roll and re-roll it.

attributes.name: Spell Vanishing
attributes.description: Discard 2 cards from your hand. Negate the activation of a Spell Card and destroy it. Also, look at your opponent's hand and Deck and if you find any Spell Cards of the same name as the destroyed Spell Card, send all of them to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Sakuretsu Armor
attributes.description: You can only activate this card when your opponent declares an attack. Destroy the attacking monster.

attributes.name: Ray of Hope
attributes.description: Add 2 LIGHT monsters from your Graveyard to your Deck and shuffle it.

attributes.name: Blast Held by a Tribute
attributes.description: You can only activate this card when your opponent declares an attack with a monster on his/her side of the field that has been Tribute Summoned or Set. Destroy all face-up Attack Position monsters on your opponent's side of the field and inflict 1000 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Judgment of Anubis
attributes.description: Discard 1 card from your hand. Negate the activation and the effect of a Spell Card controlled by your opponent that has the effect of destroying Spell and/or Trap Card(s) on the field and destroy it. After that, you can destroy 1 face-up monster on your opponent's side of the field and inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster.

attributes.name: Seiyaryu
attributes.description: A mystical dragon that burns away the unworthy with its mystic flames.

attributes.name: Acid Trap Hole
attributes.description: Flip 1 face-down Defense Position monster face-up. If the monster's DEF is 2000 points or less, the monster is destroyed. If the DEF is more than 2000 points, return the monster to its face-down Defense Position.

attributes.name: Salamandra
attributes.description: A FIRE monster equipped with this card increases its ATK by 700 points.

attributes.name: Vice Dragon
attributes.description: If your opponent controls a monster and you control no monsters, you can Special Summon this card from your hand. If you do, its original ATK and DEF are halved.

attributes.name: Breath of Light
attributes.description: Destroy all face-up Rock-Type monsters on the field.

attributes.name: Machine King
attributes.description: Increase the ATK of this card by 100 points for each face-up Machine-Type monster on the field.

attributes.name: Toon Gemini Elf
attributes.description: This card cannot attack during the turn that it is Normal Summoned, Flip Summoned, or Special Summoned. When "Toon World" on the field is destroyed, destroy this card. If "Toon World" is on your side of the field and your opponent does not control a Toon Monster, this card can attack your opponent's Life Points directly. When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, your opponent discards 1 random card from their hand.

attributes.name: Toon Goblin Attack Force
attributes.description: This card cannot attack during the turn that it is Normal Summoned, Flip Summoned, or Special Summoned. When "Toon World" on the field is destroyed, destroy this card. If "Toon World" is on your side of the field and your opponent does not control a Toon Monster, this card can attack your opponent's Life Points directly. If this card attacks, it is changed to Defense Position at the end of the Battle Phase, and you cannot change this Battle Position until the end of your next turn.

attributes.name: Acid Rain
attributes.description: Destroy all face-up Machine-Type monsters on the field.

attributes.name: Last Day of Witch
attributes.description: Destroy all face-up Spellcaster-Type monsters on the field.

attributes.name: Gorz the Emissary of Darkness
attributes.description:
When you take damage from a card your opponent controls while you control no cards, you can Special Summon this card from your hand. Then activate the appropriate effect, based on the type of damage:
- Battle Damage: Special Summon 1 "Emissary of Darkness Token" (Fairy-Type/LIGHT/Level 7/ATK ?/DEF ?). Its ATK and DEF are each equal to the amount of battle damage you took.
- Effect Damage: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the damage you took.

attributes.name: The Winged Dragon of Ra
attributes.description: Spirits sing of a powerful creature that rules over all that is mystic.

attributes.name: Widespread Ruin
attributes.description: You can only activate this card when your opponent declares an attack. Destroy 1 monster with the highest ATK among your opponent's Attack Position monsters.

attributes.name: Alpha the Magnet Warrior
attributes.description: Alpha, Beta, and Gamma meld as one to form a powerful monster.

attributes.name: Beta the Magnet Warrior
attributes.description: Alpha, Beta, and Gamma meld as one to form a powerful monster.

attributes.name: Gamma the Magnet Warrior
attributes.description: Alpha, Beta, and Gamma meld as one to form a powerful monster.

attributes.name: Card Trooper
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can send up to 3 cards from the top of your Deck to the Graveyard. This card gains 500 ATK for each card sent to the Graveyard this way, until the end of this turn. When this card on your side of the field is destroyed and sent to your Graveyard, draw 1 card.

attributes.name: Light Laser
attributes.description: Equip only to a LIGHT Warrior-Type monster. Remove from play any monsters that battle with it at the end of the Damage Step.

attributes.name: Burial from a Different Dimension
attributes.description: Select up to 3 Monster Cards that are removed from play, and return them to their owners' Graveyards.

attributes.name: Edge Hammer
attributes.description: Tribute 1 "Elemental Hero Bladedge". Destroy 1 monster your opponent controls, and inflict damage to your opponent equal to the original ATK of that monster.

attributes.name: Kid Guard
attributes.description: Tribute 1 "Hero Kid". Negate the attack of a monster your opponent controls, and add 1 "Elemental Hero" monster from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Infernal Dragon
attributes.description: If this card attacks, it is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard during the End Phase. When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard from the field, you can Special Summon this card by Tributing 1 monster.

attributes.name: Ruthless Denial
attributes.description: Select 1 monster you control and send it to the Graveyard, and send 1 random card in your opponent's hand to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Return Soul
attributes.description: Activate only during the End Phase. You can return up to 3 monsters destroyed this turn from the Graveyard to their owners' Decks.

attributes.name: Damage Polarizer
attributes.description: Activate only when an effect that inflicts damage is activated. Negate its activation and effect, and each player draws 1 card.

attributes.name: Fusion Guard
attributes.description: Activate only when an effect that inflicts damage is activated. Negate its activation and effect, and randomly send 1 Fusion Monster from your Fusion Deck to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Destiny Hero - Malicious
attributes.description: By removing from play this card while it's in your Graveyard, select 1 "Destiny Hero - Malicious" from your Deck, and Special Summon it.

attributes.name: Destiny Draw
attributes.description: Discard 1 "Destiny Hero" card. Draw 2 cards.

attributes.name: Over Destiny
attributes.description: Select 1 "Destiny Hero" monster in your Graveyard. Special Summon 1 "Destiny Hero" monster from your Deck whose Level is less than or equal to half the selected monsters's. The Special Summoned monster is destroyed at the end of this turn.

attributes.name: D - Counter
attributes.description: Activate only when a "Destiny Hero" monster you control is selected as an attack target. Destroy the attacking monster.

attributes.name: Eternal Dread
attributes.description: Put 2 Clock Counters on "Clock Tower Prison".

attributes.name: Evil Hero Infernal Prodigy
attributes.description: If you control no monsters, you can Special Summon this card from your hand in face-up Attack Position. If you Tribute this card to Tribute Summon an "Elemental Hero", "Destiny Hero", or "Evil Hero" monster, draw 1 card during this turn's End Phase.

attributes.name: Armor Breaker
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can equip this card to a Warrior-Type monster you control, OR unequip it to Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. While equipped to a monster by this effect, when that monster inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, destroy 1 card on the field. (A monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle, this card is destroyed instead.)

attributes.name: Evil Hero Wild Cyclone
attributes.description:
"Elemental Hero Avian" + "Elemental Hero Wildheart"
This monster cannot be Special Summoned except with "Dark Fusion"". If this card attacks, your opponent cannot activate any Spell or Trap Cards until the end of the Damage Step. When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, destroy all face-down Spell and Trap Cards your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Evil Hero Infernal Sniper
attributes.description:
"Elemental Hero Clayman" + "Elemental Hero Burstinatrix"
This card cannot be Special Summoned except by the effect of "Dark Fusion". While this card in face-up Defense Position on the field, during your Standby Phase inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. This card cannot be destroyed by the effect(s) of Spell Cards.

attributes.name: Evil Hero Malicious Fiend
attributes.description:
"Evil Hero Malicious Edge" + 1 Level 6 or higher Fiend-Type monster
This monster cannot be Special Summoned except with "Dark Fusion". During your opponent's Battle Phase, all monsters they control are changed to face-up Attack Position, and each monster they control must attack this card.

attributes.name: Dark Calling
attributes.description: Remove from play, from your hand or your Graveyard, the Fusion Material Monsters listed on a Fusion Monster Card that can only be Special Summoned with "Dark Fusion", and Special Summon that monster from your Fusion Deck. (This Special Summon is treated as a Fusion Summon with "Dark Fusion".)

attributes.name: Revoke Fusion
attributes.description: Discard 1 "Polymerization" to the Graveyard. Send 1 Fusion Monster from your Fusion Deck to your Graveyard and Special Summon 1 monster from your hand that is listed as a Fusion Material Monster on that card. The Special Summoned monster is sent to the Graveyard during the End Phase of this turn.

attributes.name: Hero's Rule 2
attributes.description: Negate the activation of an Effect Monster, Spell or Trap Card that targets a card(s) in the Graveyard, and destroy it.

attributes.name: Phantom Skyblaster
attributes.description: When you Normal or Flip Summon this card, you can Special Summon any number of "Skyblaster Tokens" (Fiend-Type/DARK/Level 4/ATK 500/DEF 500), but not more than the number of monsters you control. During your Standby Phase, you can inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each "Skyblaster" monster you control. If you activate this effect, "Skyblaster" monsters you control cannot attack this turn.

attributes.name: Grave Squirmer
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, destroy 1 card on the field.

attributes.name: Hand Destruction
attributes.description: Each player sends 2 cards from their hand to the Graveyard and draws 2 cards.

attributes.name: Crystal Release
attributes.description: Equip only to a "Crystal Beast" monster. It gains 800 ATK. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard, you can place 1 "Crystal Beast" monster from your Deck in your Spell and Trap Card Zone, face-up, as a Continuous Spell Card.

attributes.name: Crystal Tree
attributes.description: Each time a "Crystal Beast" monster(s) is placed in either player's Spell and Trap Card Zone, place 1 Crystal Counter on this card. You can send this card to the Graveyard to take a number of "Crystal Beast" monsters from your Deck equal to the number of Crystal Counters on this card, then place those monsters in your Spell and Trap Card Zone, face-up, as Continuous Spell Cards.

attributes.name: Crystal Counter
attributes.description: Send all cards in your Spell and Trap Card Zone to the Graveyard. Place as many "Crystal Beast" monsters as possible from your Graveyard in your Spell and Trap Card Zone, face-up, as Continuous Spell Cards. During the End Phase, destroy all face-up "Crystal Beast" cards you control.

attributes.name: Crystal Pair
attributes.description: Activate only when a "Crystal Beast" monster you control is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard. Place 1 "Crystal Beast" monster from your Deck in your Spell and Trap Card Zone, face-up, as a Continuous Spell Card. You take no Battle Damage this turn.

attributes.name: Fortress Warrior
attributes.description: You take no battle damage from battles involving this card.  Once per turn, if this card would be destroyed by battle, it is not destroyed.  (Damage calculation is applied normally.)

attributes.name: Tuningware
attributes.description: If this card is used for a Synchro Summon, you can treat it as a Level 2 monster. If this card is sent to the Graveyard for a Synchro Summon, draw 1 card.

attributes.name: Armory Arm
attributes.description:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
Once per turn, you can equip this card to a monster OR unequip it to Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. While equipped to a monster by this effect, that monster gains 1000 ATK. When the equipped monster destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the destroyed monster's ATK.

attributes.name: Give and Take
attributes.description: Special Summon 1 monster from your Graveyard to your opponent's side of the field in Defense Position, and increase the Level of 1 monster you control by the Level of the Special Summoned monster, until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Limiter Overload
attributes.description: When this card is sent to the Graveyard, Special Summon 1 "Speed Warrior" from your hand, Deck or Graveyard.

attributes.name: Gauntlet Warrior
attributes.description: You can Tribute this card to have all face-up Warrior-Type monsters you control gain 500 ATK and DEF until the end of the next Damage Step they battle. This effect can be activated during either player's turn.

attributes.name: Eccentric Boy
attributes.description: When using this card as a Synchro Material Monster, the other Synchro Material Monsters is 1 monster in your hand. The Synchro Monster that used this card as a Synchro Material Monster cannot activate its effects, its effect(s) is negated, and is removed from play when removed from the field.

attributes.name: Junk Archer
attributes.description:
"Junk Synchron" + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
Once per turn you can remove 1 monster your opponent controls from play. During the End Phase, the removed monster returns to the opponent's side of the field in the same Battle Position.

attributes.name: Scrubbed Raid
attributes.description: During the Battle Phase, you can send 1 card you control to the Graveyard, except this card, to end the Battle Phase.

attributes.name: Tuner's Barrier
attributes.description: Select 1 face-up Tuner monster you control. That monster cannot be destroyed by battle or by card effects, until the End Phase of the next turn.

attributes.name: Elemental Hero Steam Healer
attributes.description:
"Elemental Hero Burstinatrix" + "Elemental Hero Bubbleman"
This monster cannot be Special Summoned except by Fusion Summon. When this card destroys a monster as a result of battle and sends it to the Graveyard, increase your Life Points by the ATK of the destroyed monster.

attributes.name: Burst Return
attributes.description: You can only activate this card while there is a face-up "Elemental Hero Burstinatrix" on your side of the field. Return to the owner's hand(s) all monster(s) on the field that include "Elemental Hero" in their card name, except "Elemental Hero Burstinatrix".

attributes.name: Bubble Blaster
attributes.description: You can only equip this card to "E-Hero Bubbleman". Raise the equipped monster's attack by 800 points. If this equipped monster is destroyed as a result of battle, destory this card instead and reduce the battle damage to the equipped monster to 0.

attributes.name: Bubble Illusion
attributes.description: You can only activate this card while there is a face-up "Elemental Hero Bubbleman" on your side of the field. During this turn, you can activate 1 Trap Card from your hand.

attributes.name: Clay Charge
attributes.description: You can only activate this card when an "Elemental Hero Clayman" on your side of the field is selected as an attack target. (If it is face-down, pick up and show the card to your opponent.) Destroy the attacking monster and the selected "Elemental Hero Clayman" to inflict 800 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Armed Dragon LV10
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by Tributing 1 "Armed Dragon LV7" on your side of the field. By sending 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard, destroy all face-up monsters on your opponent's side of the field.

attributes.name: Magical Mallet
attributes.description: Add any number of cards from your hand to the Deck and shuffle it. Then draw the same number of cards you added to the Deck.

attributes.name: Inferno Reckless Summon
attributes.description: You can only activate this card when 1 monster with an ATK of 1500 points or less is Special Summoned to your side of the field while there is a face-up monster on your opponent's side of the field. Special Summon all cards with the same name as the Summoned monster from your hand, Deck, and Graveyard in face-up Attack Position. Your opponent selects 1 monster on their side of the field and Special Summons all cards with that same name from their hand, Deck, and Graveyard.

attributes.name: Ring of Defense
attributes.description: You can only activate this card in response to the activation of a Trap Card effect that inflicts damage. Make the effect damage of that Trap Card 0.

attributes.name: The Grave of Enkindling
attributes.description: You can only activate this card when a monster on your side of the field is destroyed as a result of battle and sent to the Graveyard. You and your opponent each select 1 monster from your respective Graveyards and Special Summon them in Defense Position. Neither monster Special Summoned by this card's effect can change its battle position while it is face-up on the field, except with a card effect.

attributes.name: Card Ejector
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can select and remove from play 1 card from your opponent's Graveyard.

attributes.name: Elemental Hero Prisma
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can reveal 1 Fusion Monster from your Fusion Deck and send 1 of the Fusion Material Monsters listed on that card from your Deck to the Graveyard.  Until the End Phase, this card's name is treated as the sent monster's name.

attributes.name: Stardust Dragon/Assault Mode
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except with its own effect or with "Assault Mode Activate". When the effect of a Spell, Trap, or Effect Monster is activated, you can Tribute this card to negate the activation and effect of that card, and destroy it. During the End Phase of the turn in which this effect is used, you can Special Summon this card from your Graveyard. When this card on the field is destroyed, you can Special Summon 1 "Stardust Dragon" from your Graveyard.

attributes.name: Starlight Road
attributes.description: Activate only when an effect is activated that would destroy 2 or more cards you control. Negate the effect and destroy that card. Then, you can Special Summon 1 "Stardust Dragon" from your Extra Deck.

attributes.name: Blockman
attributes.description: By Tributing this face-up card, Special Summon in Defense Position a number of "Block Tokens" (Rock-Type/EARTH/Level 4/ATK 1000/DEF 1500) equal to the number of turns this card has been face-up on your side of the field. These tokens cannot declare an attack.

attributes.name: Treasure Map
attributes.description: You can only activate this card in response to the activation of an effect that would return this card from the field to the hand. Draw 2 cards from your Deck and discard 1 card from your hand.

attributes.name: Hero Spirit
attributes.description: You can only activate this card during the Battle Phase of a turn in which a monster on your side of the field that included "Elemental Hero" in its card name was destroyed as a result of battle. Make the Battle Damage from 1 of your opponent's monsters 0.

attributes.name: Malefic Blue-Eyes White Dragon
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by removing from play 1 "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" from your Deck. There can only be 1 face-up "Malefic" monster on the field. Other monsters you control cannot attack. If there is no face-up Field Spell Card on the field, destroy this card.

attributes.name: Des Frog
attributes.description: When this card is Tribute Summoned successfully, you can Special Summon "Des Frog"(s) from your hand or Deck up to the same number of "T.A.D.P.O.L.E."(s) in your Graveyard.

attributes.name: Ally of Justice Catastor
attributes.description:
1 Tuner + 1 or more Non Tuner monsters
If this card battles a non-DARK monster, destroy that monster without applying damage calculation.

attributes.name: Graceful Dice
attributes.description: Roll 1 six-sided die. The result is multiplied by 100 points and added to the ATK and DEF of all monsters you control until the end of your turn. Monsters summoned after this card's activation are excluded.

attributes.name: Skull Dice
attributes.description: Roll 1 six-sided die. The result is multiplied by 100 points and subtracted from the ATK and DEF of all monsters in your opponent's control until the end of your turn. Monsters summoned after this card's activation are excluded.

attributes.name: Zure, Knight of Dark World
attributes.description: The name of this illustrious knight is known by all residents of Dark World. He never oppresses the commoners.

attributes.name: V-Tiger Jet
attributes.description: This ace fighter is unbeatable in a dogfight. It combines with other monsters to launch an array of encircling attacks.

attributes.name: Blade Skater
attributes.description: An image of beauty on the ice, this gorgeous warrior rips her opponents into pieces with her stylish Accel Slicer attack.

attributes.name: Queen's Knight
attributes.description: This knight catches her opponents off guard, dominating them with swift yet graceful attacks.

attributes.name: Jack's Knight
attributes.description: A strong master swordsman. His loyalty is to justice, his duty to protect the weak.

attributes.name: King's Knight
attributes.description: While "Queen's Knight" is on your side of the field, when this card is Normal Summoned, you can Special Summon 1 "Jack's Knight" from your Deck.

attributes.name: Elemental Hero Bladedge
attributes.description: During battle between this attacking card and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of this card, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Elemental Hero Wildheart
attributes.description: This card is unaffected by the effects of Trap Cards.

attributes.name: Reborn Zombie
attributes.description: While you have no cards in your hand, this card is not destroyed as a result of battle while in Attack Position. (Damage calculation is applied normally.)

attributes.name: Chthonian Soldier
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by your opponent's attacking monster and sent to the Graveyard, inflict the Battle Damage you took from this battle to your opponent's Life Points as well.

attributes.name: W-Wing Catapult
attributes.description: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you control this card on the field, you can equip it to your "V-Tiger Jet" as an Equip Card, OR unequip the Union equipment and Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. While equipped to a monster by this card's effect, increase the ATK and DEF of the equipped monster by 400 points. (1 monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the equipped monster is destroyed as a result of battle, destroy this card instead.)

attributes.name: Infernal Incinerator
attributes.description: This card can only be Normal Summoned or Set by discarding all card(s) in your hand to the Graveyard except this card, as well as Tributing 1 card with ATK 2000 or higher from your side of the field. Increase the ATK of this monster by 200 points for each monster on your opponent's side of the field. Decrease the ATK of this card by 500 points for each monster on your side of the field, except this card.

attributes.name: Hydrogeddon
attributes.description: When this card destroys an opponent's monster as a result of battle and sends it to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon 1 "Hydrogeddon" from your Deck.

attributes.name: Oxygeddon
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed as a result of battle with a Pyro-Type monster and sent to the Graveyard, inflict 800 points of damage to both players' Life Points.

attributes.name: Water Dragon
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by the effect of "Bonding - H2O". While this card is face-up on the field, the ATK of FIRE monsters and Pyro-Type monsters become 0. When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon 2 "Hydrogeddon"s and 1 "Oxygeddon" from your Graveyard.

attributes.name: Etoile Cyber
attributes.description: If this card attacks your opponent's Life Points directly, increase the ATK of this card by 500 points during the Damage Step only.

attributes.name: B.E.S. Tetran
attributes.description: Put 3 counters on this card when you Normal Summon it. This card is not destroyed as a result of battle. If this card battles a monster, remove 1 counter from this card at the end of the Damage Step. If this card battles without a counter, destroy this card at the end of the Damage Step. Also, by removing 1 counter on this card, destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card on the field. You can only use this effect once per turn.

attributes.name: Nanobreaker
attributes.description: If this card attacks a face-up Level 3 or lower monster, destroy the monster with this card's effect without applying Damage Calculation.

attributes.name: Rapid-Fire Magician
attributes.description: While this card is face-up on the field, inflict 400 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points each time you activate 1 Normal Spell Card.

attributes.name: Beiige, Vanguard of Dark World
attributes.description: If this card is discarded from the hand to the Graveyard by a card effect, Special Summon this card to your side of the field.

attributes.name: Broww, Huntsman of Dark World
attributes.description: If this card is discarded from the hand to the Graveyard by a card effect, draw 1 card from your Deck. If this card is discarded from the hand to the Graveyard by your opponent's card effect, draw 1 more card from your Deck.

attributes.name: Brron, Mad King of Dark World
attributes.description: When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, you can select 1 card in your hand and discard it to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Sillva, Warlord of Dark World
attributes.description: If this card is discarded from the hand to the Graveyard by a card effect, Special Summon this card to your side of the field. If this card is discarded from the hand to the Graveyard by your opponent's card effect, your opponent selects 2 cards in their hand, and returns them to the bottom of their Deck in any order.

attributes.name: Goldd, Wu-Lord of Dark World
attributes.description: If this card is discarded from the hand to the Graveyard by a card effect, Special Summon this card to your side of the field. If this card is discarded from the hand to the Graveyard by your opponent's card effect, you can select up to 2 cards on your opponent's side of the field and destroy them.

attributes.name: Scarr, Scout of Dark World
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed as a result of battle and sent to the Graveyard, add 1 Level 4 or lower monster that includes "Dark World" in its card name from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Familiar-Possessed - Aussa
attributes.description: By sending 1 "Aussa the Earth Charmer" and 1 EARTH monster from your side of the field to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon this card from your hand or Deck. If you Special Summon this card in this way, this card gets the following effect: During battle between this attacking card and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of this card, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Familiar-Possessed - Eria

- WIND: If this card destroyed your opponent's monster as a result of battle, it can attack once again in a row.

attributes.description: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, each time a Beast-Type monster(s) on the field is destroyed, increase the ATK of this card by 500 points.

attributes.name: Catnipped Kitty
attributes.description: This card cannot be attacked if there is another Beast-Type monster on your side of the field. Make the DEF of 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field 0 until the End Phase. This effect can only be used once per turn.

attributes.name: Behemoth the King of All Animals
attributes.description: This card can be Normal Summoned or Set with 1 Tribute Monster. In that case, the original ATK of this card becomes 2000. When this card is Tribute Summoned successfully, you can return from your Graveyard to the owner's hand a number of Beast-Type monsters equal to the number of Tributed monsters.

attributes.name: Big-Tusked Mammoth
attributes.description: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, monsters on your opponent's side of the field cannot attack during the same turn that they are Normal Summoned, Flip Summoned, or Special Summoned.

attributes.name: Kangaroo Champ
attributes.description: A monster that battles with this card is changed to Defense Position after damage calculation.

attributes.name: Hyena
attributes.description: When this card is sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, you can Special Summon any "Hyena"(s) from your Deck to the field. Then shuffle your Deck.

attributes.name: Blade Rabbit
attributes.description: When this card is changed from Attack Position to face-up Defense Position, destroy 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field.

attributes.name: Mecha-Dog Marron
