When this card on the field is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard except as a result of battle, inflict 1000 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Blast Magician
attributes.description: Each time you or your opponent activates 1 Spell Card, put 1 Spell Counter on this card. By removing any number of Spell Counters from this card, destroy 1 face-up monster on the field with an ATK equal to or less than 700 points x the number of removed Spell Counters.

attributes.name: Chiron the Mage
attributes.description: Discard 1 Spell Card from your hand. Destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card on your opponent's side of the field. This effect can only be used once per turn.

attributes.name: Gearfried the Swordmaster
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by the effect of "Release Restraint". When this card is equipped with an Equip Card, destroy 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field.

attributes.name: Armed Samurai - Ben Kei
attributes.description: In addition to a normal attack, this card can attack during the same Battle Phase as many times as the number of Equip Cards equipped to this card.

attributes.name: Shadowslayer
attributes.description: If the only cards on your opponent's Monster Card Zones are Defense Position monsters, this card can attack your opponent's Life Points directly.

attributes.name: Golem Sentry

attributes.name: Abare Ushioni
attributes.description: Toss a coin and call it. If you call it right, inflict 1000 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points. If you call it wrong, you take 1000 points of damage. You can only use this effect once per turn, during your Main Phase.

attributes.name: The Light - Hex-Sealed Fusion
attributes.description: You can substitute this card for any 1 Fusion Material Monster. When you do this, the other Fusion Material Monster(s) must be the correct one(s). Tribute Fusion Material Monsters on the field, including this card, to Special Summon 1 LIGHT Fusion Monster from your Fusion Deck.

attributes.name: The Dark - Hex-Sealed Fusion
attributes.description: You can substitute this card for any 1 Fusion Material Monster. When you do this, the other Fusion Material Monster(s) must be the correct one(s). Tribute Fusion Material Monsters on the field, including this card, to Special Summon 1 DARK Fusion Monster from your Fusion Deck.

attributes.name: The Earth - Hex-Sealed Fusion
attributes.description: You can substitute this card for any 1 Fusion Material Monster. When you do this, the other Fusion Material Monster(s) must be the correct one(s). Tribute Fusion Material Monsters on the field, including this card, to Special Summon 1 EARTH Fusion Monster from your Fusion Deck.

attributes.name: Whirlwind Prodigy
attributes.description: If you Tribute Summon a WIND monster, you can treat this 1 monster as 2 Tribute Monsters for the Tribute Summon.

attributes.name: Flame Ruler
attributes.description: If you Tribute Summon a FIRE monster, you can treat this 1 monster as 2 Tribute Monsters for the Tribute Summon.

attributes.name: Firebird
attributes.description: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, each time a Winged Beast-Type monster(s) on your side of the field is destroyed, increase the ATK of this card by 500 points.

attributes.name: Rescue Cat
attributes.description: Send this face-up card on your side of the field to the Graveyard to Special Summon 2 Level 3 or lower Beast-Type monsters from your Deck to the field. The monsters Special Summoned in this way are destroyed during the End Phase.

attributes.name: Brain Jacker
attributes.description: FLIP: Equip this card to a monster on your opponent's side of the field and treat it as an Equip Card. Take control of the monster that is equipped with this card. Increase your opponent's Life Points by 500 points during each of his/her Standby Phases.

attributes.name: Gatling Dragon
attributes.description:
"Barrel Dragon" + "Blowback Dragon"
Toss a coin 3 times. Destroy a number of monsters on the field equal to the number of Heads. This effect can only be used once per turn, during your Main Phase.

attributes.name: King Dragun
attributes.description:
"Lord of D." + "Divine Dragon Ragnarok"
As long as this card remains face-up on the field, your opponent cannot target Dragon-Type monsters for the effect of a Spell, Trap, or Monster Card. Once per turn, you can Special Summon 1 Dragon-Type monster from your hand to your side of the field.

attributes.name: A Feather of the Phoenix

attributes.description: Each time a Beast-Type monster inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, inflict 500 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.description: Each time a Spell Card is activated, increase the Life Points of this card's controller by 500 points.

attributes.name: Lightning Vortex
attributes.description: Discard 1 card from your hand. Destroy all face-up monsters on your opponent's side of the field.

attributes.name: Meteor of Destruction
attributes.description: Inflict 1000 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points. You cannot activate this card if your opponent's Life Points are 3000 or less.

attributes.name: Swords of Concealing Light
attributes.description: When you activate this card, change all monsters on your opponent's side of the field to face-down Defense Position. While this card is face-up on the field, monsters on your opponent's side of the field cannot change their battle positions, except with a card effect. Destroy this card during your 2nd Standby Phase after activation.

attributes.name: Spiral Spear Strike
attributes.description: When "Gaia the Fierce Knight", "Swift Gaia the Fierce Knight" or "Gaia the Dragon Champion" on your side of the field attacks a Defense Position monster, if the ATK of that card is higher than the DEF of the Defense Position monster, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points. If "Gaia the Dragon Champion" inflicts Battle Damage with this effect, draw 2 cards from your Deck and discard 1 card from your hand.

attributes.name: Release Restraint
attributes.description: Tribute 1 "Gearfried the Iron Knight" on your side of the field to Special Summon 1 "Gearfried the Swordmaster" from your hand or Deck.

attributes.name: Centrifugal Field

attributes.name: Fulfillment of the Contract

attributes.name: Re-Fusion
attributes.description: Pay 800 Life Points. Select 1 Fusion Monster from your Graveyard, Special Summon it to your side of the field and equip it with this card. When this card is destroyed, remove the equipped monster from play.

attributes.name: The Big March of Animals

attributes.name: Cross Counter
attributes.description: If the DEF of an attacked Defense Position monster is higher than the ATK of your opponent's attacking monster, the Battle Damage inflicted to your opponent is doubled. Destroy the attacking monster after damage calculation.

attributes.description: The face-up monster(s) with the highest ATK on the field is unaffected by any Spell Cards. When "Pole Position" is removed from the field, destroy the face-up monster(s) with the highest ATK on the field.

attributes.name: Penalty Game!
attributes.description:
When your opponent has 4 cards in his/her hand, select and activate 1 of the following effects:
- Your opponent cannot draw during his/her next Draw Phase.
- Your opponent cannot activate any Spell and/or Trap Cards during this turn.

attributes.name: Threatening Roar
attributes.description: Your opponent cannot declare an attack during this turn.

attributes.name: Phoenix Wing Wind Blast
attributes.description: Discard 1 card from your hand. Return 1 card on your opponent's side of the field to the top of the owner's Deck.

attributes.name: D.D. Dynamite

Check all monsters on your opponent's side of the field, your opponent's hand, and all cards he/she draws (until the end of your opponent's 3rd turn after this card's activation), and destroy all monsters with an ATK of 1500 or less.

attributes.name: Elemental Burst

When attacking with a monster equipped with this card, you can further increase its ATK by an amount equal to half the ATK of your target.

attributes.name: Crystal Beast Amethyst Cat

If this card is destroyed while it is in a Monster Card Zone, you can place it face-up in your Spell and Trap Card Zone as a Continuous Spell Card, instead of sending it to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Crystal Beast Emerald Tortoise

If this card is destroyed while it is in a Monster Card Zone, you can place it face-up in your Spell and Trap Card Zone as a Continuous Spell Card, instead of sending it to the Graveyard.

attributes.description: If this card attacks an opponent's monster, it gains 400 ATK during the Damage Step only. If this card is destroyed while it is in a Monster Card Zone as a Continuous Spell Card, instead of sending it to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Crystal Beast Amber Mammoth

If this card is destroyed while it is in a Monster Card Zone, you can place it face-up in your Spell and Trap Card Zone as a Continuous Spell Card, instead of sending it to the Graveyard.

If this card is destroyed while it is in a Monster Card Zone, you can place it face-up in your Spell and Trap Card Zone as a Continuous Spell Card, instead of sending it to the Graveyard.

When this card destroys a monster and sends it to the Graveyard, destroy all monsters your opponent controls and inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each monster destroyed by this effect.

LIGHT Fairy-Type monster: Negate the effects of all Spell Cards.
DARK Fiend-Type monster: Negate the effects of all Trap Cards.

Then, Special Summon as many "Crystal Beast" monsters as possible from your Graveyard, up to the number of your opponent's cards that were sent to the Graveyard by this card's effect.

attributes.name: Blaze Accelerator

attributes.name: Tri-Blaze Accelerator

attributes.name: Field Barrier
attributes.description: Field Spell Cards cannot be destroyed. Also, a new Field Spell cannot be activated. You can only control 1 face-up "Field Barrier" at a time.

attributes.name: "A" Cell Breeding Device
attributes.description: During each of your Standby Phases, put 1 A-Counter on 1 face-up monster your opponent controls.

attributes.description: If your opponent's monster battles an "Alien" monster you control, the opponent's monster loses 300 ATK and DEF during damage calculation only.

attributes.name: Ancient City - Rainbow Ruins
attributes.description:
This card gets these effects, based on the number of "Crystal Beast" monsters in your Spell and Trap Card Zone.
1+: This card cannot be destroyed by a card effect.
2+: Once per turn, you can halve the Battle Damage you take.
3+: You can send a "Crystal Beast" monster you control to the Graveyard to negate the activation of a Spell or Trap Card and destroy it.
4+: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can draw 1 card.
5+: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can Special Summon 1 "Crystal Beast" card from your Spell and Trap Card Zone.

attributes.name: Triggered Summon

attributes.description: Activate only when your opponent's monster declares an attack. You can select 1 "Ancient City - Rainbow Ruins" from your Deck and activate it. If your opponent had an active Field Spell Card when this card was activated, they can draw 1 card.

attributes.description: Send 1 "Crystal Beast" card from your Spell and Trap Card Zone to the Graveyard. Destroy 1 of your opponent controls.

attributes.description: Return up to 3 "Volcanic" Monster Cards from your Graveyard to you Deck.

attributes.name: Mass Hypnosis

attributes.name: Gem Flash Energy
attributes.description: During each of your Standby Phases, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the number of face-up Continuous Spell Cards on the field x 300.

attributes.name: Diablos, King of the Abyss

During your opponent's Draw Phase, before their draw, look at the top card of their Deck, then put that card on the top or the bottom of their Deck.

attributes.name: Lich Lord, King of the Underworld

attributes.name: Prometheus, King of the Shadows

attributes.name: Mist Archfiend

attributes.name: Plague Wolf
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can change this card's ATK to twice its original ATK. If you do this, destroy this card during the End Phase.

attributes.name: Sword of Dark Rites

attributes.name: Eradicator Epidemic Virus

Check all Spell and Trap Cards on your opponent's side of the field, your opponent's hand, and all cards they draw (until the end of your opponent's 3rd turn after this card's activation), and destroy all cards of the chosen type.

attributes.name: Phantom Beast Rock-Lizard

When this card destroys a monster by battle, inflict 500 damage to your opponent. When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard by your opponent's card effect, inflict 2000 damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Winged Rhynos
attributes.description: When a Trap Card is activated, you can return this face-up card from the field to its owner's hand.

attributes.name: Slifer the Sky Dragon
attributes.description: The heavens twist and thunder roars, signaling the coming of this ancient creature, and the dwan of true power.

attributes.name: Obelisk the Tormentor
attributes.description: The descent of this mighty creature shall be heralded by burning winds and twisted land. And with the coming of this horror, those who draw breath shall know the ture meaning of eternal slumber.

attributes.name: Gladiator Beast Octavius
attributes.description: When this card is Special Summoned by the effect of a "Gladiator Beast" monster, destroy 1 face-down Spell or Trap Card.  At the end of your Battle Phase, if this card attacked or was attacked, return this card to your Deck unless you discard 1 card.

attributes.name: Chamberlain of the Six Samurai
attributes.description: The Six Samurai are supported from the shadows by this silent, mysterious warrior. His past is unknown to them, but his countless scars are proof of his experience.

attributes.name: Cloudian - Smoke Ball
attributes.description: Smoke Balls are newly born Cloudians. They fear being alone, and would rather swing and sway in the sky with their friends.

attributes.name: Evil Hero Malicious Edge
attributes.description: If your opponent controls a monster, you can Normal Summon this card with 1 Tribute. During battle between this attacking card and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of this card, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Evil Hero Infernal Gainer
attributes.description: During your Main Phase 1, you can remove this card from play and select 1 face-up Fiend-Type monster you control.  That monster can attack twice during each Battle Phase. Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position during your second Standby Phase after you activate this effect.

attributes.name: Cloudian - Eye of the Typhoon
attributes.description: This card cannot be destroyed by battle. If this card is in face-up Defense Position, destroy it. When this card declares an attacks, change the battle positions of all face-up monsters, except "Cloudian" monsters.

attributes.name: Cloudian - Ghost Fog
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. All Battle Damage to either player from a battle involving this monster becomes 0. If this card is destroyed by battle, distribute new Fog Counters equal to the Level of the monster that destroyed it among face-up monsters.

attributes.name: Cloudian - Nimbusman
attributes.description: This card cannot be destroyed by battle. If this card is in face-up Defense Position, destroy it.  You can Tribute any number of WATER monsters for the Tribute Summon of this card.  When this card is Tribute Summoned, place 1 Fog Counter on it for each WATER monster you Tributed. This card gains 500 ATK for each Fog Counter on the field.

attributes.name: Cloudian - Sheep Cloud
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, Special Summon 2 "Cloudian Tokens" (Fairy-Type/WATER/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Defense Position. These Tokens cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon, unless it is for a "Cloudian" monsters.

attributes.name: Cloudian - Poison Cloud
attributes.description: When this face-up card attacks or is attacked, and is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, destroy the monster that destroyed it, and then inflict 800 damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Cloudian - Acid Cloud
attributes.description: This card cannot be destroyed by battle.  If this card is in face-up Defense Position, destroy it.  When you Normal Summon this card, place 1 Fog Counter on it for each "Cloudian" monster on the field.  You can remove 2 Fog Counters from this card to destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card.

attributes.name: Cloudian - Cirrostratus
attributes.description: This card cannot be destroyed by battle.  If this card is in face-up Defense Position, destroy it.  When you Normal Summon this card, place 1 Fog Counter on it for each "Cloudian" monster on the field.  You can remove 2 Fog Counters from this card to destroy 1 monster on the field.

attributes.name: Cloudian - Altus
attributes.description: This card cannot be destroyed by battle.  If this card is in face-up Defense Position, destroy it.  When you Normal Summon this card, place 1 Fog Counter on it for each "Cloudian" monster on the field.  You can remove 3 Fog Counters from anywhere on the field to discard 1 random card from your opponent's hand.

attributes.name: Cloudian - Turbulence
attributes.description: This card cannot be destroyed in battle.   If this card is in face-up Defense Position, destroy it.  When you Normal Summon this card, place 1 Fog Counter on it for each "Cloudian" monster on the field.  You can remove 1 Fog Counter from this card to Special Summon 1 "Cloudian - Smoke Ball" from your Deck or either player's Graveyard.

attributes.name: Truckroid
attributes.description: When this card destroys a monster your opponent controls by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, equip it to this card. This card gains ATK equal to the combined ATK of the equipped cards.

attributes.name: Stealthroid
attributes.description: If this card attacks, destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card at the end of the Battle Phase if you control another "roid" monster.

attributes.name: Gladiator Beast Alexander
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned except by the effect of "Gladiator Beast Dimacari".  If this card was Special Summoned, it is unaffected by the effects of Spell Cards.  At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card attacked or was attacked, you can return it to the Deck to Special Summon 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster from your Deck, except "Gladiator Beast Alexander".

attributes.name: Gladiator Beast Spartacus
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned except by the effect of "Gladiator Beast Hoplomus".  When this card is Special Summoned, add 1 "Gladiator Beast's" Equip Spell Card from your Deck to your hand.  At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card attacked or was attacked, you can return it to the Deck to Special Summon 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster from your Deck, except "Gladiator Beast Spartacus".

attributes.name: Gladiator Beast Murmillo
attributes.description: When this card is Special Summoned by the effect of a "Gladiator Beast" monster, destroy 1 face-up monster.  At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card attacked or was attacked, you can return it to the Deck to Special Summon 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster from your Deck, except "Gladiator Beast Murmillo".

attributes.name: Gladiator Beast Bestiari
attributes.description: When this card is Special Summoned by the effect of a "Gladiator Beast" monster, destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card.  At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card attacked or was attacked, you can return it to the Deck to Special Summon 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster from your Deck, except "Gladiator Beast Bestiari".

attributes.name: Gladiator Beast Laquari
attributes.description: If this card was Special Summoned by the effect of a "Gladiator Beast" monster, its original ATK is 2100.  At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card attacked or was attacked, you can return it to the Deck to Special Summon 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster from your Deck, except "Gladial Beast Laquari".

attributes.name: Gladiator Beast Hoplomus
attributes.description: If this card was Special Summoned by the effect of a "Gladiator Beast" monster, its original DEF is 2400.  At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card attacked or was attacked, you can return it to the Deck to Special Summon 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster from your Deck, except "Gladiator Beast Hoplomus".

attributes.name: Gladiator Beast Dimacari
attributes.description: If this card was Special Summoned by the effect of a "Gladiator Beast" monster, it can attack twice during each Battle Phase.  At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card attacked or was attacked, you can return it to the Deck to Special Summon 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster from your Deck, except "Gladiator Beast Dimacari".

attributes.name: Gladiator Beast Secutor
attributes.description: If this card was Special Summoned by the effect of a "Gladiator Beast" monster, at the end of any Battle Phase, if this card attacked or was attacked, Special Summon 2 "Gladiator Beast" monsters from your Deck, except "Gladiator Beast Secutor".

attributes.name: Test Ape
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Gladiator Beast" monster from your Deck.

attributes.name: Witch Doctor of Sparta
attributes.description: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent each time a monster(s) is Special Summoned from either player's Deck.

attributes.name: Infinity Dark
attributes.description:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have be treated as an Effect Monster with this effect:
- When this card declares an attack, you can change the battle position of 1 face-up monster your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Magical Reflect Slime
attributes.description:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have be treated as an Effect Monster with this effect:
- Your opponent takes all Battle Damage that you would have taken from a battle involving this card.

attributes.name: Ancient Gear Knight
attributes.description:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have be treated as an Effect Monster with this effect:
- If this card attacks, your opponent cannot activate Spell or Trap Cards until the end of the Damage Step.

attributes.name: Goblin Black Ops
attributes.description: This card can attack your opponents directly.  If this card attacks, it is changed to Defense Position at the end of the Battle Phase.  This card's battle position cannot be changed until the end of your next turn, except with a card effect.

attributes.name: Gambler of Legend
attributes.description:
Once per turn, you can toss a coin 3 times and apply the appropriate effect.
- 3 Heads: Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.
- 2 Heads: Discard 1 random card from your opponent's hand.
- 1 Heads: Destroy 1 card you control.
- 3 Tails: Discard your entire hand.

attributes.name: Enishi, Shien's Chancellor
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set.  This card cannot be Special Summoned except by removing from play 2 "Six Samurai" monsters from your Graveyard.  Once per turn, you can destroy 1 face-up monster.  If you activate this effect, this card cannot attack this turn.

attributes.name: Spirit of the Six Samurai
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can equip this card to a "Six Samurai" monster you control, OR unequip it to Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position.  When equipped to a monster by this card's effect, that monster gains 500 ATK and DEF.  When the equipped monster destroys an opponent's monster by battle, draw 1 card.  (A monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time.  If the equipped monster would be destroyed, destroy this card instead.)

attributes.name: Alien Telepath
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can remove 1 A-Counter from an opponent's monster to destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card.  (If a monster with an A-Counter battles an "Alien" monster, it loses 300 ATK and DEF for each A-Counter during damage calculation only.)

attributes.name: Alien Hypno
attributes.description:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have be treated as an Effect Monster with this effect:
- During your Main Phase, you can select 1 monster your opponent controls with an A-Counter on it, and take control of it while this card is on the field. During each of your End Phases, remove 1 A-Counter from each controlled monster. If all A-Counters are removed from one of these monsters, destroy it.

attributes.name: Elemental Hero Chaos Neos
attributes.description:
"Elemental Hero Neos" + "Neo-Spacian Dark Panther" + "Neo-Spacian Glow Moss"
This card can only be Special Summoned from your Fusion Deck by returning the above cards you control to the Deck (You do not use "Polymerization"). During the End Phase, return this card to the Fusion Deck, then Set all face-up monsters currently on the field. Once per turn, you can toss a coin 3 times and apply the appropriate effect:
- 3 Heads: Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.
- 2 Heads: This turn, the effects of all face-up monsters your opponent controls are negated.
- 1 Head: Return all monsters you control to their owner's hand.

attributes.name: Evil Hero Inferno Wing
attributes.description:
"Elemental Hero Avian" + "Elemental Hero Burstinatrix"
This monster cannot be Special Summoned except with "Dark Fusion". During battle between this attacking card and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of this card, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent. When this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, inflict damage to your opponent equal to either the ATK or DEF of the destroyed monster, whichever is higher.

attributes.name: Evil Hero Lightning Golem
attributes.description:
"Elemental Hero Sparkman" + "Elemental Hero Clayman"
This monster cannot be Special Summoned except with "Dark Fusion". Once per turn, you can destroy 1 monster on the field.

attributes.name: Evil Hero Dark Gaia
attributes.description:
1 Fiend-Type monster + 1 Rock-Type monster
This monster cannot be Special Summoned except with "Dark Fusion". The original ATK of this card is equal to the combined ATK of the Fusion Material Monsters used to Fusion Summon it. When this card declares an attack, change all Defense Position monsters your opponent controls to face-up Attack Position. (Flip Effects are not activated at this time.)

attributes.name: Super Vehicroid - Stealth Union
attributes.description:
"Truckroid" + "Expressroid" + "Drillroid" + "Stealthroid"
When this card attacks, its original ATK is halved until the end of the Damage Step. During battle between this attacking card and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of this card, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent. Once per turn, you can select 1 monster you control, except a Machine-Type monster, and equip it to this card. While equipped by this effect, this card can attack all monsters your opponent controls once each.

attributes.name: Superalloy Beast Raptinus
attributes.description:
1 Gemini Monster + 1 Gemini Monster
All Gemini monsters on the field are treated as Effect Monsters, and gain their effects.

attributes.name: Gladiator Beast Gaiodiaz
attributes.description:
"Gladiator Beast Spartacus" + 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster
This card can only be Special Summoned from your Fusion Deck by returning the above cards you control to the Deck. (You do not use "Polymerization"). When this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the DEF of the destroyed monster. At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card attacked or was attacked, you can return it to the Deck to Special Summon 2 "Gladiator Beast" monsters from your Deck, except "Gladiator Beast Spartacus".

attributes.name: Gladiator Beast Heraklinos
attributes.description:
"Gladiator Beast Laqueri" + 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster + 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster
This card can only be Special Summoned from your Fusion Deck, by returning the above cards you control to the Deck. (You do not use "Polymerization".) While this card is face-up on the field, by discarding 1 card from your hand, negate the activation and effect of a Spell or Trap Card, and destroy it.

attributes.name: Contact Out
attributes.description: Return 1 "Neos" Fusion Monster you control  to the Fusion Deck. If all the Fusion Material Monsters listed on that Fusion Monster are in your Deck, you can Special Summon them.

attributes.name: Swing of Memories
attributes.description: Special Summon 1 Normal Monster from your Graveyard. It is destroyed during the End Phase of this turn.

attributes.name: Dark Fusion
attributes.description: Send from your hand or your side of the field to the Graveyard, Fusion Material Monsters that are listed on a Fiend-Type Fusion Monster Card, and Special Summon that Fusion Monster from your Fusion Deck.  (This Special Summon is treated as a Fusion Summon).  The Special Summoned monster cannot be targeted by the effects of other Monsters, Spells, and Traps this turn.

attributes.name: Diamond-Dust Cyclone
attributes.description: Select 1 monster with 4 or more Fog Counters. Destroy it and then draw 1 card for every 4 Fog Counters that were on it.

attributes.name: Summon Cloud
attributes.description: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you don't control any monsters, you can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Cloudian" monster from your hand or either player's Graveyard.  If you Special Summon a monster from the Graveyard with this effect, destroy this card.

attributes.name: Lucky Cloud
attributes.description: During the End Phase, if you Summoned 2 or more "Cloudian" monsters with the same card name this turn, draw 2 cards.

attributes.name: Fog Control
attributes.description: Tribute 1 face-up "Cloudian" monster you control.  Place 3 Fog Counters one 1 face-up monster.

attributes.name: Cloudian Squall
attributes.description: During each of your Standby Phase, place 1 Fog Counter on every face-up monster.

attributes.name: Super Double Summon
attributes.description: Select 1 Gemini monster you control and Normal Summon it. During the End Phase of this turn, return it to your hand.

attributes.name: Colosseum - Cage of the Gladiator Beasts
attributes.description: Place 1 counter on this card each time a monster is Special Summoned from either player's Deck.  All "Gladiator Beast" monsters gain 100 ATK and DEF for each of these counters on this card.  If this card would be destroyed by a card effect, you can discard 1 "Colosseum - Cage of the Gladiator Beasts" to prevent this card from being destroyed.

attributes.name: Gladiator Beast's Battle Halberd
attributes.description: Equip only to a "Gladiator Beast" monster.  When it attacks, destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card at the end of the Damage Step. When the equipped monster is returned from your side of the field to the Deck, and this card is sent to the Graveyard, return this card to your hand.

attributes.name: Gladiator Beast's Battle Gladius
attributes.description: Equip only to a "Gladiator Beast" monster. It gains 300 ATK.  When the equipped monster is returned from your side of the field to the Deck and this card is sent to the Graveyard, return this card to your hand.

attributes.name: Gladiator Beast's Battle Manica
attributes.description: Equip only to a "Gladiator Beast" monster. It cannot be destroyed by battle. (Damage calculation is applied normally).  When the equipped monster is returned from your side of the field to the Deck and this card is sent to the Graveyard, return this card to your hand.

attributes.name: Gladiator Beast's Respite
attributes.description: Return 2 "Gladiator Beast" cards from your hand to the Deck, then draw 3 cards.

attributes.name: Gladiator's Return
attributes.description: Return 3 "Gladiator Beast" monsters from your Graveyard to your Deck, then draw 1 card.

attributes.name: Soul Devouring Bamboo Sword
attributes.description: Select 1 monster equipped with "Bamboo Sword" Equip Spell.  If it inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent while equipped with a "Bamboo Sword" card, they skip their next Draw Phase.  Destroy this card during your second Standby Phase after activation.

attributes.name: Cunning of the Six Samurai
attributes.description: Send 1 face-up "Six Samurai" monster you control to the Graveyard.  Special Summon 1 "Six Samurai" monster from either player's Graveyard.

attributes.name: "A" Cell Incubator
attributes.description: Each time an A-Counter(s) is removed from play by a card effect, place 1 A-Counter on this card.  When this card is destroyed, distribute the A-Counter(s) on this card among face-up monsters.

attributes.name: Over Limit
attributes.description: Pay 500 Life Points.  Special Summon from both player's Graveyards as many Normal Monsters as possible with 1000 or less ATK that were destroyed by battle this turn.

attributes.name: No Entry!
attributes.description: Change all Attack Position monsters to Defense Position.

attributes.name: Natural Disaster
attributes.description: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent each time a card(s) they control is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard by the effect of a "Cloudian" monster.

attributes.name: Rain Storm
attributes.description:
Select 1 "Cloudian" monster you control. Reduce the monster's ATK by 1000 or 2000, and apply the appropriate effect:
- 1000 points: Destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card your opponent controls.
- 2000 points: Destroy 2 Spell or Trap Cards your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Updraft
attributes.description: Remove all Fog Counters from the field.  Inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each Fog Counter you removed.

attributes.name: Release from Stone
attributes.description: Select 1 of your removed from play Rock-Type monsters that is removed from play, and Special Summon it.  When this card is removed from the field, destroy that monster.  When that monster is destroyed, destroy this card.

attributes.name: Light-Imprisoning Mirror
attributes.description: When the effect of a LIGHT monster activates on the field or in the Graveyard, negate it.

attributes.name: Shadow-Imprisoning Mirror
attributes.description: When the effect of a DARK monster activates on the field or in the Graveyard, negate it.

attributes.name: Disarm
attributes.description: Return 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster from your hand to the Deck, and negate the activation and effect of a Spell Card, and destroy it.

attributes.name: Parry
attributes.description: Return 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster from your hand to the Deck, and negate the activation and effect of a Trap Card, and destroy it.

attributes.name: Swiftstrike Armor
attributes.description: During your Draw Phase, if you draw a "Six Samurai" Monster Card, you can Special Summon it.

attributes.name: Double-Edged Sword Technique
attributes.description: Select 2 "Six Samurai" monsters from your Graveyard, and Special Summon them in face-up Attack Position.  Destroy them during the End Phase of this turn, and take damage equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster(s).

attributes.name: Energy-Absorbing Monolith
attributes.description: Chain this card to an opponent's card effect that would inflict damage to you.  That damage is negated, and you gain Life Points equal to the amount you would have taken.

attributes.name: Cell Explosion Virus
attributes.description: Activate only when an opponent's monster with an A-Counter(s) declares an attack.  Destroy all Attack Position monsters your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Detonator Circle "A"
attributes.description: Destroy 1 face-up monster on the field with an A-Counter(s), and then inflict 1000 damage to each player.

attributes.name: Interdimensional Warp
attributes.description: Select a monster you control and a monster with an A-Counter(s) your opponent controls.  Switch control of those monsters.

attributes.name: Foolish Revival
attributes.description: Select 1 monster from your opponent's Graveyard, and Special Summon it in face-up Defense Position on your opponent's side of the field.

attributes.name: An Unfortunate Report
attributes.description: Your opponent conducts their next Battle Phase twice.

attributes.name: Gladiator Beast Torax
attributes.description: If this card was Special Summoned by the effect of a "Gladiator Beast" monster, at the end of any Battle Phase that this card attacked, or was attacked, you can return it to the Deck to draw 1 card.

attributes.name: Test Tiger
attributes.description: If you control a "Gladiator Beast" monster, you can Special Summon this card. You can tribute this card to return 1 "Gladiator Beast" you control to the Deck, and then Special Summon 1 "Gladiator Beast" from your Deck. The Special Summoned monster is treated as if it were Special Summoned by the effect of a "Gladiator Beast".

attributes.name: Defensive Tactics
attributes.description: Activate only if you control a "Gladiator Beast" monster.  Monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle this turn, and any Battle Damage you take is reduced to 0.  Put this card on the bottom of your Deck.

attributes.name: Dragon Ice
attributes.description: When your opponent Special Summons a monster, you can discard 1 card to Special Summon this card from your hand or Graveyard. There can only be 1 face-up "Dragon Ice" monster on the field.

attributes.name: Tongue Twister
attributes.description: If this card was Tribute Summoned, when it is sent from the field to the Graveyard, draw 2 cards and remove this card from play.

attributes.name: Skreech
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle, select 2 WATER monsters from your deck and send them to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Royal Firestorm Guards
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned, select 4 Pyro-Type monsters in your Graveyard.  Return those cards to your Deck, then draw 2 cards.

attributes.name: Veil of Darkness
attributes.description: During your Draw Phase, if you draw a DARK monster, you can reveal it and send it to the Graveyard to draw 1 more card.

attributes.name: Security Orb
attributes.description: Activate only when your opponent's monster declares an attack.  Change the battle position of that monster.  When this face-down card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard by the effect of a Spell or Trap Card your opponent controls, destroy 1 monster on the field.

attributes.name: Necroface
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned, shuffle all removed from play cards back into their owner's Decks.  This card gains 100 ATK for each of those cards.  When this card is removed from play, both players remove from play the top 5 cards of their Decks.

attributes.name: Gil Garth
attributes.description: This steel-armored terror machine ruthlessly strikes down enemies with its giant katana.

attributes.name: Soul Taker
attributes.description: Destroy 1 face-up monster your opponent controls.  Then, your opponent gains 1000 Life Points.

attributes.name: Magic Formula
attributes.description: Equip only to "Dark Magician" or "Dark Magician Girl".  The equipped monster gains 700 ATK.  When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard, gain 1000 Life Points.

attributes.name: Silent Doom
attributes.description: Special Summon 1 Normal Monster from your Graveyard in face-up Defense Position.  It cannot attack.

attributes.name: Phantom of Chaos
attributes.description: Any Battle Damage this monster inflicts to your opponent becomes 0. Once per turn, you can remove from play 1 Effect Monster in your Graveyard. Until the End Phase, this card's name is treated as that monster's name, and it gains that monster's effect(s) and ATK.

attributes.name: Vortex Trooper
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned, you can shuffle 2 cards from your hand into your Deck, then draw 2 cards. When this card is destroyed, draw 1 card.

attributes.name: Mist Valley Watcher
attributes.description: Descendant of a family that has served as Mist Valley watchmen over the generations. Never missed a single thing that happened in the valley, no matter how minute.

attributes.name: Amazoness Archer
attributes.description: Tribute 2 monsters on your side of the field to inflict 1200 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Reese the Ice Mistress
attributes.description: This card cannot be destroyed by battle with a Level 4 or higher monster.

attributes.name: Numbing Grub in the Ice Barrier
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned, select 1 unused Monster Card Zone. While this card is face-up on the field, the selected Monster Card Zone cannot be used.

attributes.name: Mist Condor
attributes.description: You can Special Summon this card from your hand by returning 1 face-up "Mist Valley" monster you control to your hand. If you do, this card's ATK becomes 1700.

attributes.name: Mist Valley Windmaster
attributes.description: Activate only if both players have 5 or more cards in their hand. Both players send cards from their hands to their Graveyards until each player has 4 cards. This effect can only be used once per turn.

attributes.name: Worm Falco
attributes.description: FLIP: Change all face-up Reptile-Type "Worm" monsters you control to face-down Defense Position, except this card.

attributes.name: Worm Gulse
attributes.description: Each time a face-down Defense Position monster is flipped face-up, place 1 Worm Counter on this card. This card gains 300 ATK for each Worm Counter on it.

attributes.name: Worm Hope
attributes.description: FLIP: When this card is flipped face-up by an opponent's monster's attack , draw 1 card. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard, send 1 card in your hand to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Phantom Beast Cross-Wing
attributes.description: While this card is in the Graveyard, "Gazelle the King of Mythical Beasts" and all "Phantom Beast" monsters on the field gain 300 ATK.

attributes.name: Phantom Beast Wild-Horn
attributes.description: During battle between this attacking card and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of this card, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Phantom Beast Thunder-Pegasus
attributes.description: Activate only when your opponent's monster declares an attack. By removing from play this card in your Graveyard, make the Battle Damage taken by 1 "Gazelle the King of Mythical Beasts" or "Phantom Beast" monster 0. When this happens, that monster is not destroyed by battle.

attributes.name: Brain Crusher
attributes.description: Once per turn, if this card destroyed an opponent's monster by battle and sent it to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon 1 of those destroyed monsters from the Graveyard during the End Phase.

attributes.name: Hunter Owl
attributes.description: This card gains 500 ATK for each WIND monster on your side of the field. While there is another WIND monster on your side of the field, your opponent cannot select this card as an attack target.

attributes.name: Masked Chopper
attributes.description: If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle, inflict 2000 damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Mad Reloader
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, send 2 cards from your hand to the Graveyard to draw 2 cards.

attributes.name: Dark Bribe
attributes.description: Negate the activation and effect of an opponent's Spell or Trap Card and destroy it. Your opponent draws 1 card.

attributes.name: Chaos Burst
attributes.description: Activate only by Tributing 1 monster when your opponent's monster declares an attack.  Destroy the attacking monster.  Then inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Nurse Reficule the Fallen One
attributes.description: Any effect that would cause your opponent to gain Life Points instead inflicts the same amount of damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Dark Cure
attributes.description: When your opponent Summons a monster(s), they gain Life Points equal to half the ATK of 1 of the Summoned monsters of your choice.

attributes.name: Brutal Potion
attributes.description: This card becomes an Equip Card, and equips to 1 monster you control. Once per turn, when you inflict damage to your opponent with a card effect the equipped monster gains 1000 ATK until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Gallis the Star Beast
attributes.description: You can reveal this card in your hand to send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard. If that card is a monster, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its Level x 200, and Special Summon this card from your hand. If it is not a monster, destroy this card.

attributes.name: Red-Eyes Wyvern

attributes.description: You can only activate this card when your opponent's monster declares an attack. Remove from play all monsters in Defense Position on your opponent's side of the field.

attributes.description: Select 1 face-up monster on your side of the field. Increase the ATK and DEF of the monster by an amount equal to the number of cards in your opponent's hand x 200 points, until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Giga Gagagigo
attributes.description: In order to fight tremendous evil, he gained formidable power through body reconstruction, but lost his heart and his redemption.

attributes.name: Mad Dog of Darkness
attributes.description: He used to be a normal dog who played around in a park, but was corrupted by the powers of darkness.

attributes.name: Neo Bug
attributes.description: A huge bug-like monster said to come from another planet. It gathers in swarms.

attributes.name: Sea Serpent Warrior of Darkness
attributes.description: A warrior who defends the world of the Sea of Darkness. He prides himself on his fighting prowess both on the ground and, of course, in the water.

attributes.name: Terrorking Salmon
attributes.description: A feared salmon, master of the Sea of Darkness. Its roe is the best delicacy in the World of Darkness.

attributes.name: Blazing Inpachi
attributes.description: A wicked wooden spirit now burning in flames. Its fire attack is powerful, but it will soon be nothing but ashes.

attributes.name: Burning Algae
attributes.description: When this card is sent to the Graveyard, increase your opponent's Life Points by 1000 points.

attributes.name: The Thing in the Crater
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed and sent from the field to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon 1 Pyro-Type Monster from your hand.

attributes.name: Molten Zombie
attributes.description: When this card is Special Summoned from the Graveyard, the controller of this card draws 1 card.

attributes.name: Dark Magician of Chaos
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned or Special Summoned, you can add 1 Spell Card from your Graveyard to your hand. A monster that is destroyed by this monster as a result of battle is removed from play instead of going to the Graveyard. If this face-up card is destroyed or removed from the field, it is removed from play.

attributes.name: Gora Turtle of Illusion
attributes.description: Negate the effect of Spell and Trap Cards controlled by your opponent that target this face-up card on the field.

attributes.name: Manticore of Darkness
attributes.description: During the End Phase of the turn this card is sent to the Graveyard, send 1 Beast, Beast-Warrior or Winged Beast-Type Monster Card from your hand or your side of the field to the Graveyard to Special Summon this card from the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Stealth Bird
attributes.description: You can flip this card into face-down Defense Position once per turn during your Main Phase. When this card is Flip Summoned, inflict 1000 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Sacred Crane
attributes.description: When this card is Special Summoned, the controller of this card draws 1 card.

attributes.name: Enraged Battle Ox
attributes.description: During battle between attacking Beast, Beast-Warrior or Winged Beast-Type monsters on your side of the field and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of the attacking monster, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Don Turtle
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned or Flip Summoned, you can Special Summon any number of "Don Turtle"(s) from your hand.

attributes.name: Balloon Lizard
attributes.description: Put 1 counter on this card during each of your Standby Phases. When this card is destroyed, inflict damage to the controller of the card that destroyed it equal to the number of counters x 400 points.

attributes.name: Dark Driceratops
attributes.description: During battle between this attacking card and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of this card, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Hyper Hammerhead
attributes.description: When this monster battles an opponent's monster, if the opponent's monster is not destroyed as a result of the battle, the opponent's monster is returned to its owner's hand at the end of the Damage Step.

attributes.name: Black Tyranno
attributes.description: If the only cards on your opponent's side of the field are Defense Position Monster Cards, this card can attack your opponent's Life Points directly.

attributes.name: Anti-Aircraft Flower
attributes.description: By tributing 1 Insect-Type monster on your side of the field, inflict 800 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Prickle Fairy
attributes.description: While this card is face-up on your side of the field, your opponent cannot attack Insect-Type monsters. The battle position of a monster that battles with this card is changed to Defense Position at the end of the Damage Step.

attributes.name: Pinch Hopper
attributes.description: When this card on your side of the field is sent to your Graveyard, you can Special Summon 1 Insect-Type Monster from your hand.

attributes.name: Skull-Mark Ladybug
attributes.description: When this card is sent to the Graveyard, increase your Life Points by 1000 points.

attributes.name: Insect Princess
attributes.description: While this card is face-up on the field, battle positions of all face-up Insect-Type monsters on your opponent's side of the field are changed into Attack Position. Each time this card destroys an Insect-Type monster as a result of battle, increase the ATK of this card by 500 points.

attributes.name: Amphibious Bugroth MK-3
attributes.description: While "Umi" is face-up on the field, this card can attack your opponent's Life Points directly.

attributes.name: Torpedo Fish
attributes.description: While "Umi" is face-up on the field, this card is unaffected by any Spell Cards.

attributes.name: Levia-Dragon - Daedalus
attributes.description: By sending "Umi" on your side of the field to the Graveyard, destroy all cards on the field except this card.

attributes.name: Orca Mega-Fortress of Darkness
attributes.description: By Tributing 1 "Torpedo Fish" on your side of the field, destroy 1 monster on the field. By Tributing 1 "Cannonball Spear Shellfish" on your side of the field, destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card on the field.

attributes.name: Cannonball Spear Shellfish
attributes.description: While "Umi" is face-up on the field, this card is unaffected by any Spell Cards.

attributes.name: Mataza the Zapper
attributes.description: This monster can attack twice during the same Battle Phase. While this card is face-up on the field, control of this card cannot switch.

attributes.name: Guardian Angel Joan
attributes.description: When this card destroys a monster and sends it to the Graveyard as a result of battle, increase your Life Points by an amount equal to the original ATK of the destroyed monster.

attributes.name: Manju of the Ten Thousand Hands
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned or Flip Summoned, you can select 1 Ritual Monster Card or 1 Ritual Spell Card from your Deck and add it to your hand.

attributes.name: Getsu Fuhma
attributes.description: If a monster that battles with this monster is a Fiend or Zombie-Type monster, destroy that monster at the end of the Damage Step.

attributes.name: Ryu Kokki
attributes.description: If a monster that battles with this monster is a Warrior or Spellcaster-Type monster, destroy that monster at the end of the Damage Step.

attributes.name: Gryphon's Feather Duster
attributes.description: Destroy all Spell and Trap Cards on your side of the field. Increase your Life Points by the number of destroyed cards x 500 points.

attributes.name: Stray Lambs
attributes.description: If you activate this card, you cannot Normal Summon, Flip Summon or Special Summon during this turn. Special Summon 2 "Lamb Tokens" (Beast-Type/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Defense Position on your side of the field.

attributes.name: Smashing Ground
attributes.description: Destroy 1 monster with the highest DEF on your opponent's side of the field.

attributes.name: Dimension Fusion
attributes.description: Pay 2000 Life Points. Both players Special Summon as many of their removed from play monsters as possible.

attributes.name: Dedication through Light and Darkness
attributes.description: You can only activate this card by Tributing "Dark Magician" on your side of the field. Select 1 "Dark Magician of Chaos" from your hand, your Graveyard or your Deck and Special Summon it.

attributes.name: Salvage
attributes.description: Add 2 WATER monsters in your Graveyard with an ATK of 1500 or less each to your hand.

attributes.name: Ultra Evolution Pill
attributes.description: Tribute 1 Reptile-Type monster on your side of the field. Special Summon 1 Dinosaur-Type Monster from your hand.

attributes.name: Multiplication of Ants
attributes.description: Tribute 1 Insect-Type Monster on your side of the field. Special Summon 2 "Army Ant Tokens" (Insect-Type/EARTH/Level 4/ATK 500/DEF 1200) on your side of the field. The tokens cannot be used as a Tribute for a Tribute Summon.

attributes.name: Earth Chant
attributes.description: This card is used to Ritual Summon any EARTH Ritual Monster. You must also Tribute monsters from the field or your hand whose total Levels equal the Level of the Ritual Monster you are attempting to Ritual Summon.

attributes.name: Jade Insect Whistle
attributes.description: Your opponent selects 1 Insect-Type Monster from their Deck. After shuffling the Deck, place the card on top of the Deck.

attributes.name: Destruction Ring
attributes.description: Destroy 1 face-up monster on your side of the field to inflict 1000 points of damage to both players' Life Points.

attributes.name: Fiend's Hand Mirror
attributes.description: Switch the opponent's Spell Card effect that targets 1 Spell or Trap Card to another correct target.

attributes.name: Compulsory Evacuation Device
attributes.description: Return 1 monster on the field to its owner's hand.

attributes.name: A Hero Emerges
attributes.description: You can only activate this card when your opponent declares an attack. Select 1 random card from your hand. If it is a Monster Card, Special Summon it on your side of the field. If not, send it to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Self-Destruct Button
attributes.description: You can only activate this card while your Life Points are lower than your opponent's Life Points and the difference is 7000 points or more. Both players' Life Points become 0.

attributes.name: Curse of Darkness
attributes.description: Each time a Spell Card is activated, the controller of that Spell Card takes 1000 points of damage.

attributes.name: Begone, Knave!
attributes.description: If a monster inflicts Battle Damage to a player, return the monster to its owner's hand.

attributes.name: DNA Transplant
attributes.description: Declare 1 Attribute when you activate this card. While this card is face-up on the field, the Attribute of all face-up monsters on the field becomes the one you declared.

attributes.name: Robbin' Zombie
attributes.description: Each time 1 monster on your side of the field inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, your opponent sends 1 card from the top of their Deck to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Trap Jammer
attributes.description: You can only activate this card when your opponent activates a Trap Card during the Battle Phase. Negate the activation of the Trap Card and destroy it.

attributes.name: Invader of Darkness
attributes.description: While this card is face-up on the field, your opponent cannot activate Quick-Play Spell Cards.

attributes.name: Archfiend of Gilfer
attributes.description: When this card is sent to the Graveyard, you can activate its effect. You can then equip it to a monster on the field, and this card will be treated as an Equip Spell Card that decreases the ATK of the equipped monster by 500 points.

attributes.name: Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon
attributes.description: "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" + "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" + "Blue-Eyes White Dragon"

attributes.name: Unity
attributes.description: Select 1 monster on your side of the field. The DEF of the selected monster becomes equal to the combined original DEF of all face-up monsters on your side of the field, until the end of this turn.

attributes.name: Yu-Jo Friendship
attributes.description: Offer your opponent a handshake. If they accept your handshake, each player's Life Points become half the combined Life Points of both players. If you have "Unity" in your hand and show it to your opponent, they must accept the handshake.

attributes.name: Judgment of the Pharaoh
attributes.description:
Pay half your Life Points. Select and activate an appropriate effect which can be applied:

- If "Yu-Jo Friendship" is in your Graveyard, until the end of this turn: your opponent cannot Normal Summon, Set, Flip Summon, or Special Summon a monster(s), or activate an Effect Monster's effect, and their monster's effects are negated.

- If "Unity" is in your Graveyard, until the end of this turn: negate the effects of all Spell and Trap Cards on your opponent's side of the field, and your opponent cannot activate Set Spell or Trap cards.

attributes.name: Magician's Valkyria
attributes.description: Your opponent cannot select another Spellcaster-Type monster on your side of the field as an attack target.

attributes.name: Toon Dark Magician Girl
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned while "Toon World" is on your side of the field. You can Special Summon this monster from your hand, but Tributes are required for monsters level 5 or more. When "Toon World" on the field is destroyed, this card is also destroyed. If your opponent doesn't control a Toon Monster, this card can attack your opponent's Life Points directly. If a face-up Toon Monster is on your opponent's side of the field, you must select the Toon Monster as an attack target. Increase the ATK of this card by 300 points for each "Dark Magician" or "Magician of Black Chaos" in either player's Graveyard.

attributes.name: Victory Dragon
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. To Tribute Summon this card, you must Tribute 3 Dragon-Type monsters. If this card attacks your opponent directly and reduces their Life Points to 0, you win the Match.

attributes.name: Elemental Hero Stratos
attributes.description:
When this card is Normal or Special Summoned, you can select and activate 1 of these effects:

- Destroy Spell or Trap Cards on the field up to the number of "Elemental Hero" and "Destiny Hero" monsters you control (not counting this card).

- Select and add 1 "Elemental Hero" or "Destiny Hero" monster from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Elemental Hero Ocean
attributes.description: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase you can return 1 "Elemental Hero" or "Destiny Hero" monster from your side of the field or your Graveyard to it's owners hand.

attributes.name: Green Baboon, Defender of the Forest
attributes.description: When a Beast-Type monster you control is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, you can pay 1000 Life Points to Special Summon this card from your hand or the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Dreadscythe Harvester
attributes.description: You can Tribute 1 Insect-Type monster to have this card gain 500 ATK until the end of the turn.

attributes.name: The Wicked Avatar
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set except by Tributing 3 monsters. Your opponent cannot activate Spell or Trap Cards until the end of their 2nd turn after this card is Normal Summoned. The ATK and DEF of this card are each 100 points higher than the highest ATK on the field (except "The Wicked Avatar").

attributes.name: The Wicked Dreadroot
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set except by Tributing 3 monsters. Halve the ATK and DEF of all monsters on the field, except this card.

attributes.name: Blast Sphere
attributes.description: If your opponent's monster attacks this face-down Defense Position card, this card becomes an Equip Card equipped to the attacking monster, without applying damage calculation. Destroy the equipped monster and this card during the Standby Phase of your opponent's next turn, and inflict damage to your opponent equal to the equipped monster's ATK.

attributes.name: Copycat
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned, Flip Summoned, or Special Summoned, select 1 monster your opponent controls. This card's ATK and DEF become equal to the selected monster's original ATK and DEF.

attributes.name: Relieve Monster
attributes.description: Activate only when your opponent declares an attack. Return 1 monster you control to its owner's hand, then Special Summon 1 Level 4 monster from your hand.

attributes.name: Cloning
attributes.description: Activate only when your opponent Normal Summons or Flip Summons a monster. Special Summon 1 "Clone Token" that has the same original Level, Type, Attribute, ATK, and DEF as the Summoned monster. When that monster is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, destroy this token.

attributes.name: Van'Dalgyon the Dark Dragon Lord
attributes.description:
After a Counter Trap Card you control negates the activation of an opponent's card(s) or effect(s), you can Special Summon this card from your hand. Then activate the appropriate effects, based on the type of card negated:
-Spell: Inflict 1500 damage to your opponent.
-Trap: Select and destroy 1 card your opponent controls.
-Effect Monster: Select 1 monster in your Graveyard and Special Summon it.

attributes.name: Cyber Dinosaur
attributes.description: When your opponent Special Summons a monster from their hand, you can Special Summon this card from your hand.

attributes.name: Exodius the Ultimate Forbidden Lord
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by returning all monsters from your Graveyard to your Deck. When this card declares an attack, send 1 Monster Card from your hand or Deck to the Graveyard. This card has 1000 ATK for each Normal Monster in your Graveyard. When this card is removed from the field, remove it from play. If there are 5 different "Forbidden One" cards in your Graveyard that were sent there by this card's effect, you win the Duel.

attributes.name: Dragonic Knight
attributes.description: When the effect of an opponent's monster is activated that targets and destroys a card(s) you control, you can send the targeted card(s) to the Graveyard to Special Summon this card from your hand.

attributes.name: Arcana Force Ex - the Light Ruler
attributes.description:
This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by sending 3 monsters you control to the Graveyard. When this card is successfully Special Summoned, toss a coin. This card gains one of the following effects based on the result:
- Heads: When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, you can return 1 card in your Graveyard to your hand.
- Tails: Negate the activation and effect of a Spell, Trap or Effect Monster that targets this card and destroy it. For each card's activation negated this way, this card loses 1000 ATK.

attributes.name: Gandora the Dragon of Destruction
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. You can pay half of your Life Points to remove from play all cards on the field except this card. For every card that is removed by this effect, this card gains 300 ATK. This card is sent to the Graveyard at the End Phase of the turn it was Summoned.

attributes.name: Dandylion
attributes.description: When this card is sent to the Graveyard, Special Summon 2 "Fluff Tokens" (Plant-Type/WIND/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Defense Position. These Tokens cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon during the turn they are Special Summoned.

attributes.name: Red-Eyes Darkness Metal Dragon
attributes.description: You can remove from play 1 Dragon-Type monster you control to Special Summon this card. Once per turn, you can Special Summon 1 Dragon-Type monster, except "Red-Eyes Darkness Metal Dragon", from your hand or Graveyard.

attributes.name: Chimeratech Fortress Dragon
attributes.description: "Cyber Dragon" + 1 or more Machine-Type monsters. This monster cannot be used as a Fusion Material Monster. You can only Special Summon this card from your Extra Deck by sending the above cards from either side of the field to the Graveyard. (You do not use "Polymerization".) The original ATK of this card is equal to 1000 x the number of Fusion Material Monsters used to Special Summon it.

attributes.name: Beast King Barbaros
attributes.description: You can Normal Summon or Set this card without Tributing. If you do, its original ATK becomes 1900. You can Tribute 3 monsters to Tribute Summon this card. When you do, destroy all cards your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Tragoedia
attributes.description: You can Special Summon this card from your hand when you take Battle Damage . This card gains 600 ATK and DEF for each card in your hand. Once per turn, you can send 1 monster from your hand to the Graveyard to take control of 1 face-up monster your opponent controls with the same Level as the sent monster. Once per turn, you can select 1 monster in your Graveyard; this card's Level becomes the same as that monster's, until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Genesis Dragon
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can send 1 Dragon-Type Monster from your hand to the Graveyard to add 1 Dragon-Type Monster from your Graveyard to your hand. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard, you can return all Dragon-Type Monsters from your Graveyard to your Deck.

attributes.name: Orichalcos Shunoros
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned from your hand if a Normal Monster you control is destroyed by battle. This card gains 1000 ATK for each monster your opponent controls. Face-up Level 4 Normal Monsters on the field cannot be destroyed by card effects.

attributes.name: Darkness Neosphere
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by sending 1 Fiend-Type monster you control and 1 Fiend-Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard when your opponent's monster declares an attack. This card cannot be destroyed by battle. Once per turn, you can return all face-up Trap Cards you control to the hand.

attributes.name: Cyber Eltanin
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by removing from play all LIGHT Machine-Type monsters you control and that are in your Graveyard. This card's ATK and DEF become equal to the number of monsters removed from play when it was Special Summoned x 500. When this card is Special Summoned, send all other face-up monsters on the field to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Hundred-Eyes Dragon
attributes.description:
1 DARK Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner Fiend-Type monsters
Once per turn, you can activate this card's effect by removing from play 1 Level 6 or lower DARK Effect Monster from your Graveyard. Until the End Phase, treat this card's name as that monster's name, and this card gains the same effects as that monster while face-up on the field. When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, add 1 "Earthbound Immortal" monster from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Golem Dragon
attributes.description: Your opponent cannot select another Dragon-Type monster you control as an attack target.

attributes.name: The Tyrant Neptune
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. You can Tribute Summon this card by Tributing 1 monster. This card gains the total ATK and DEF of the monsters Tributed for its Tribute Summon. When this card is Tribute Summoned, select 1 of the Tributed Effect Monsters in the Graveyard. Treat this card's name as that monster's name, and this card gains the same effects as that monster.

attributes.name: Transforming Sphere
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can select 1 face-up Defense Position monster your opponent controls. Discard 1 card and equip the opponent's selected monster to this card (you can only equip 1 monster at a time to this card with this effect). This card gains ATK of the equipped monster. If this card attacks, it is changed to Defense Position at the end of the Battle Phase. During the End Phase, the monster equipped with this card by this card's effect is Special Summoned to your opponent's side of the field in face-up Defense Position.

attributes.name: Malefic Stardust Dragon
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by removing from play 1 "Stardust Dragon" from your Extra Deck. There can only be 1 face-up "Malefic" monster on the field. Field Spell Cards cannot be destroyed by card effects. Other monsters you control cannot attack. If there is no face-up Field Spell Card on the field, destroy this card.

attributes.name: Light and Darkness Dragon
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. While this card is face-up on the field, its Attribute is also treated as DARK. When a Spell or Trap Card is activated, or the effect of an Effect Monster is activated, that activation is negated and this card loses 500 ATK and DEF. When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, select 1 monster in your Graveyard. Then destroy all cards you control, and Special Summon that monster.

attributes.name: Tri-Horned Dragon
attributes.description: An unworthy dragon with three sharp horns sprouting from its head.

attributes.name: Skull Servant
attributes.description: A skeletal ghost that isn't strong but can mean trouble in large numbers.

attributes.name: Basic Insect
attributes.description: Usually found traveling in swarms, this creature's ideal environment is the forest.

attributes.name: Dark Gray
attributes.description: Entirely gray, this beast has rarely been seen by mortal eyes.

attributes.name: Trial of Nightmare
attributes.description: This fiend passes judgment on enemies that are locked in coffins.

attributes.name: Nemuriko
attributes.description: A child-like creature that controls a sleep fiend to beckon enemies into eternal slumber.

attributes.name: The 13th Grave
attributes.description: A zombie that suddenly appeared from plot #13 - an empty grave.

attributes.name: Charubin the Fire Knight
attributes.description: "Monster Egg" + "Hinotama Soul"

attributes.name: Monster Egg
attributes.description: A warrior hidden within an egg that attacks enemies by flinging eggshells.

attributes.name: Firegrass
attributes.description: A fire-breathing plant found growing near volcanoes.

attributes.name: Darkfire Dragon
attributes.description: "Firegrass" + "Petit Dragon"

attributes.name: Dark King of the Abyss
attributes.description: It's said that this King of the Netherworld once had the power to rule over the dark.

attributes.name: Fiend Reflection #2
attributes.description: A bird-beast that summons reinforcements with a hand mirror.

attributes.name: Fusionist
attributes.description: "Petit Angel" + "Mystical Sheep #2"

attributes.name: Turtle Tiger
attributes.description: A tiger encased in a protective shell that attacks with razor-sharp fangs.

attributes.name: Petit Dragon
attributes.description: A very small dragon known for its vicious attacks.

attributes.name: Petit Angel
attributes.description: A quick-moving and tiny fairy that's very difficult to hit.

attributes.name: Hinotama Soul
attributes.description: An intensely hot flame creature that rams anything standing in its way.

attributes.name: Kagemusha of the Blue Flame
attributes.description: Serving as a double for the Ruler of the Blue Flame, he's a master swordsman that wields a fine blade.

attributes.name: Flame Ghost
attributes.description: "Skull Servant" + "Dissolverock"

attributes.name: Two-Mouth Darkruler
attributes.description: A dinosaur with two deadly jaws, it stores electricity in its horn and releases high voltage bolts from the mouth on its back.

attributes.name: Dissolverock
attributes.description: A monster born in the lava pits, it generates intense heat that can melt away its enemies.

attributes.name: Root Water
attributes.description: An amphibian capable of calling up a massive tidal wave from the dark seas to wipe out enemy monsters.

attributes.name: The Furious Sea King
attributes.description: Grand King of the Seven Seas, he's able to summon massive tidal waves to drown the enemy.

attributes.name: Green Phantom King
attributes.description: This youthful king of the forests lives in a green world, abundant with trees and wildlife.

attributes.name: Ray & Temperature
attributes.description: The Sun and the North Wind join hands to deliver a devastating combination of heat and gale-force winds.

attributes.name: King Fog
attributes.description: A fiend that dwells in a blinding curtain of smoke.

attributes.name: Mystical Sheep #2
attributes.description: A monstrous sheep with a long tail for hypnotizing enemies.

attributes.name: Kurama
attributes.description: A vicious bird that attacks from the skies with its whip-like tail.

attributes.name: Legendary Sword
attributes.description: Increase the ATK and DEF of a Warrior-Type monster equipped with this card by 300 points.

attributes.name: Beast Fangs
attributes.description: Increase the ATK and DEF of a Beast-Type monster equipped with this card by 300 points.

attributes.name: Violet Crystal
attributes.description: Increase the ATK and DEF of a Zombie-Type monster equipped with this card by 300 points.

attributes.name: Power of Kaishin
attributes.description: Increase the ATK and DEF of an Aqua-Type monster equipped with this card by 300 points.

attributes.name: Forest
attributes.description: Increase the ATK and DEF of all Insect, Beast, Plant, and Beast-Warrior-Type monsters by 200 points.

attributes.name: Wasteland
attributes.description: Increase the ATK and DEF of all Dinosaur, Zombie, and Rock-Type monsters by 200 points.

attributes.name: Umi
attributes.description: Increase the ATK and DEF of all Fish, Sea Serpent, Thunder, and Aqua-Type monsters by 200 points. Decrease the ATK and DEF of all Machine and Pyro-Type monsters by 200 points.

attributes.name: Raigeki
attributes.description: Destroy all monsters on your opponent's side of the field.

attributes.name: Red Medicine
attributes.description: Increase your Life Points by 500 points.

attributes.name: Sparks
attributes.description: Inflict 200 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Hinotama
attributes.description: Inflict 500 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Tyhone
attributes.description: Capable of firing cannonballs from its mouth for long-range attacks, this creature is particularly effective in mountain battles.

attributes.name: Gravedigger Ghoul
attributes.description: Select up to 2 Monster Card(s) from your opponent's Graveyard. Remove the selected card(s) from play.

attributes.name: Karbonala Warrior
attributes.description: "M-Warrior #1" + "M-Warrior #2"

attributes.name: Reaper of the Cards
attributes.description: FLIP: Select 1 Trap Card on the field and destroy it. If the selected card is Set, pick up and see the card. If it is a Trap Card, it is destroyed. If it is a Spell Card, return it to its original position.

attributes.name: Larvas
attributes.description: A fast-moving, bird-like creature that strangles opposing monsters with its long, thin arms.

attributes.name: Hard Armor
attributes.description: A living suit of armor that attacks enemies with a bone-jarring tackle.

attributes.name: Man Eater
attributes.description: Man-eating plant with poison feelers for attacking enemies.

attributes.name: M-Warrior #1
attributes.description: Specializing in combination attacks, this warrior uses magnetism to block an enemy's escape.

attributes.name: M-Warrior #2
attributes.description: Specializing in combination attacks, this warrior is equipped with a tough, magnetically coated armor.

attributes.name: Armaill

attributes.name: Gaia the Dragon Champion
attributes.description: "Gaia The Fierce Knight" + "Curse of Dragon"

attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card returns to the owner's hand during the End Phase of the turn that this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up. When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, your opponent skips their next Draw Phase.

attributes.name: Dark Ruler Ha Des
attributes.description: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, the effects of Effect Monsters destroyed as a result of battle by Fiend-Type monsters on your side of the field are negated. This card cannot be Special Summoned from the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Dark Balter the Terrible
attributes.description:
"Possessed Dark Soul" + "Frontier Wiseman"
A Fusion Summon of this monster can only be conducted with the above Fusion Material Monsters. When a Normal Spell Card is activated, negate the effect by paying 1000 Life Points. The effect of an Effect Monster that this monster destroys as a result of battle is negated.

attributes.name: Lesser Fiend
attributes.description: As long as this monster remains face-up on the field, monsters destroyed by this monster as a result of battle are removed from play instead of being sent to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Possessed Dark Soul

attributes.name: Winged Minion
