attributes.name: Skull Knight #2
attributes.description: If you Tribute Summon a Fiend-Type monster by Tributing this monster, Special Summon 1 "Skull Knight #2" from your Deck. Then shuffle your Deck.

attributes.name: Ryu-Kishin Clown
attributes.description: When this card is Summoned (including Flip Summon and Special Summon), select 1 face-up monster on the field and change its battle position.

attributes.name: Twin-Headed Wolf
attributes.description: When there is another face-up Fiend-Type monster on your side of the field, negate the effect of Flip Effect Monsters destroyed by this card as a result of battle.

attributes.name: Opticlops
attributes.description: A one-eyed giant that serves the "Dark Ruler Ha Des", it skewers its enemies with its sharp horn, shattering them to pieces.

attributes.name: Bark of Dark Ruler
attributes.description: You can only activate this card during the Damage Step of a Battle Phase if a Fiend-Type monster on your side of the field battles. Pay Life Points (in multiples of 100 points) to decrease 1 of your opponent's monster's ATK and DEF by the same amount of points until the End Phase of that turn.

attributes.name: Fatal Abacus
attributes.description: Each time 1 monster is sent from the field to the Graveyard, inflict 500 points of damage per card to the respective card owner's Life Points.

attributes.name: Life Absorbing Machine
attributes.description: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, during your Standby Phase increase your Life Points by an amount equal to half of the total Life Points you paid in your last turn.

attributes.name: The Puppet Magic of Dark Ruler

attributes.name: Soul Demolition
attributes.description: You can only activate this card's effect when you have a Fiend-Type monster on your side of the field. Pay 500 Life Points to use this effect. Both players select 1 Monster Card from their opponent's Graveyard. Remove the selected cards from play.

attributes.name: Double Snare
attributes.description: Destroy 1 face-up card on the field that has an effect that negates Trap Cards' effects.

attributes.name: Freed the Matchless General
attributes.description: Negate the effect of any Spell Card that targets this card and destroy it. As long as this card remains face-up on the field, you can add 1 Level 4 or lower Warrior-Type monster from your Deck to your hand per turn instead of drawing 1 card from your Deck during your Draw Phase. Then shuffle your Deck.

attributes.name: Throwstone Unit
attributes.description: Tribute 1 Warrior-Type monster on your side of the field to destroy 1 face-up monster on the field whose DEF is equal to or less than the ATK of "Throwstone Unit".

attributes.name: Marauding Captain
attributes.description: While this monster is face-up on the field, your opponent cannot select another Warrior-Type monster on your side of the field as an attack target. When this monster is Normal Summoned, you can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower monster from your hand.

attributes.name: Ryu Senshi
attributes.description:
"Warrior Dai Grepher" + "Spirit Ryu"
A Fusion Summon of this monster can only be conducted with the above Fusion Material Monsters. As long as this card remains face-up on the field, negate the effect of a Normal Trap Card by paying 1000 Life Points. Negate the effects of a Spell Card that targets this card and destroy it.

attributes.name: Warrior Dai Grepher
attributes.description: The warrior who can manipulate dragons. Nobody knows his mysterious past.

attributes.name: Mysterious Guard
attributes.description: FLIP: Return 1 face-up monster on the field to the top of its owner's Deck. Also, if there is a face-up Warrior-Type monster on your side of the field, you can return another face-up monster to its owner's hand.

attributes.name: Frontier Wiseman
attributes.description: As long as this card remains face-up on your side of the field, negate the effects of Spell Cards that target face-up Warrior-Type monsters on your side of the field and destroy the Spell Cards.

attributes.name: Exiled Force
attributes.description: By Tributing this face-up card, destroy 1 monster on the field.

attributes.name: The Hunter with 7 Weapons
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned, declare 1 Type of monster. When battling that Type of monster, increase the ATK of this card by 1000 points during Damage Calculation.

attributes.name: Shadow Tamer
attributes.description: FLIP: Take control of 1 face-up Fiend-Type monster on your opponent's side of the field until the end of the End Phase.

attributes.name: Dragon Manipulator
attributes.description: FLIP: Take control of 1 face-up Dragon-Type monster on your opponent's side of the field until the end of the End Phase.

attributes.name: The A. Forces
attributes.description: Increase the ATK of all Warrior-Type monsters on your side of the field by 200 points for each face-up Warrior-Type and Spellcaster-Type monster on your side of the field.

attributes.name: Reinforcement of the Army
attributes.description: Add 1 Level 4 or lower Warrior-Type monster from your Deck to your hand. Then shuffle your Deck.

attributes.name: Array of Revealing Light
attributes.description: Declare 1 Type of monster. Any monster of the declared Type cannot declare an attack during the turn it is Normal Summoned, Flip Summoned or Special Summoned.

attributes.name: The Warrior Returning Alive
attributes.description: Select 1 Warrior-Type monster in your Graveyard and add it to your hand.

attributes.name: Ready for Intercepting

attributes.name: A Feint Plan
attributes.description: A player cannot attack face-down monsters during this turn.

attributes.name: Emergency Provisions
attributes.description: Send Spell or Trap Cards on your side of the field to the Graveyard except this card. Increase your Life Points by 1000 points for each card sent to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Tyrant Dragon
attributes.description: When there is a monster on your opponent's side of the field after this monster's first attack of your Battle Phase, this monster can attack once again during the same Battle Phase. In addition, negate the effect of a Trap Card that targets this card and destroy it. If this card is Special Summoned from the Graveyard by another card's effect, you must Tribute 1 Dragon-Type monster on your side of the field.

attributes.name: Spear Dragon
attributes.description: When this card attacks with an ATK that is higher than the DEF of a Defense Position monster, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points. If this card attacks, it is changed to Defense Position at the end of the Damage Step.

attributes.name: Spirit Ryu
attributes.description: You can only activate this effect during your Battle Step, if this card battles during your turn. Discard 1 Dragon-Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard to increase the ATK and DEF of this card by 1000 points until the End Step.

attributes.name: The Dragon Dwelling in the Cave
attributes.description: A huge dragon dwelling in a cave. It is horrible when it gets angry, although it is usually quiet. It is said to preserve certain treasures.

attributes.name: Lizard Soldier
attributes.description: A beast soldier derived from dragons, it is small for a Dragon-Type. Moving very quickly, this monster is an excellent strategist.

attributes.name: Fiend Skull Dragon
attributes.description:
"Cave Dragon" + "Lesser Fiend"
A Fusion Summon of this monster can only be conducted with the above Fusion Material Monsters. As long as this card remains face-up on the field, negate the effects of Flip Effect Monsters. Negate the effects of a Trap Card that targets this card and destroy it.

attributes.name: Cave Dragon
attributes.description: If there is a monster on your side of the field, you cannot Normal Summon this monster. In addition, if there are no Dragon-Type monsters except this card on your side of the field, this card cannot declare an attack.

attributes.name: Gray Wing

attributes.name: Troop Dragon

attributes.name: The Dragon's Bead
attributes.description: Discard 1 card from your hand. Negate the effect of a Trap Card that targets 1 face-up Dragon-Type monster and destroy the Trap Card.

attributes.name: A Wingbeat of Giant Dragon

attributes.name: Dragon's Gunfire

You can only activate this card when you have a face-up Dragon-Type monster on your side of the field. Select and activate 1 of the following effects:
- Inflict 800 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.
- Destroy 1 face-up monster with a DEF of 800 points or less.

attributes.name: Stamping Destruction
attributes.description: You can only activate this card when you have a face-up Dragon-Type monster on your side of the field. Destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card on the field and inflict 500 points of damage to the controller of that card.

attributes.name: Super Rejuvenation
attributes.description: During the End Phase of the turn this card is activated, draw 1 card from your Deck for each Dragon-Type monster discarded from your hand and/or Tributed during this turn.

attributes.name: Dragon's Rage
attributes.description: When a Dragon-Type monster on your side of the field attacks with an ATK that is higher than the DEF of a Defense Position monster, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Burst Breath
attributes.description: Tribute 1 Dragon-Type monster on your side of the field. Destroy all face-up monsters on the field whose DEF is equal to or less than the ATK of the Tributed monster.

attributes.name: Robolady

attributes.name: Roboyarou

attributes.name: Gradius' Option

The ATK and DEF of this card becomes the same as the ATK and DEF of the selected "Gradius". If the selected "Gradius" is removed from the field, destroy this card.

attributes.name: Woodland Sprite

attributes.description: When this card attacks with an ATK that is higher than the DEF of a Defense Position monster, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points. When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, draw 1 card from your Deck.
