attributes.name: Maharaghi
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card returns to the owner's hand during the End Phase of the turn that this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up. If this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up, see 1 card on the top of your Deck during your next Draw Phase before you draw, and return the card to the top or the bottom of your Deck.

attributes.name: Inaba White Rabbit
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card returns to the owner's hand during the End Phase of the turn that this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up. This monster attacks your opponent's Life Points directly.

attributes.name: Susa Soldier
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card returns to the owner's hand during the End Phase of the turn that this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up. The Battle Damage this card inflicts to your opponent's Life Points is halved.

attributes.name: Yamata Dragon
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card returns to the owner's hand during the End Phase of the turn that this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up. When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, draw cards from your Deck until you have 5 cards in your hand.

attributes.name: Great Long Nose
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card returns to the owner's hand during the End Phase of the turn that this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up. If this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, your opponent skips their next Battle Phase.

attributes.name: Otohime
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card returns to the owner's hand during the End Phase of the turn that this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up. When this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up, you can change the battle position of 1 face-up monster on your opponent's side of the field.

attributes.name: Hino-Kagu-Tsuchi
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card returns to the owner's hand during the End Phase of the turn that this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up. If this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, your opponent discards all cards in their hand during the next Draw Phase, before they draw.

attributes.name: Asura Priest
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card returns to the owner's hand during the End Phase of the turn that this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up. This card can attack all monsters on your opponent's side of the field once each. This monster cannot attack your opponent directly if it attacks any monsters first.

attributes.name: Fushi No Tori
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card returns to the owner's hand during the End Phase of the turn that this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up. When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, increase your Life Points by an amount equal to the Battle Damage.

attributes.name: Super Robolady
attributes.description:
"Robolady" + "Roboyarou"
You can Special Summon "Super Roboyarou" by returning this card from the field to the Fusion Deck. You cannot use this effect during the same turn this monster is Special Summoned. In addition, increase the ATK of this monster by 1000 points during the Damage Step when this monster attacks your opponent directly.

attributes.name: Super Roboyarou
attributes.description:
"Roboyarou" + "Robolady"
You can Special Summon "Super Robolady" by returning this card from the field to the Fusion Deck. You cannot use this effect during the same turn this monster is Special Summoned. In addition, increase the ATK of this monster by 1000 points during the Damage Step when this monster battles with a monster.

attributes.name: Fengsheng Mirror
attributes.description: Look at your opponent's hand. Select and discard 1 Spirit monster to the Graveyard if Spirit monsters exist in his/her hand.

attributes.name: Spring of Rebirth
attributes.description: Increase your Life Points by 500 points every time monsters return from the field to the owner's hand.

attributes.name: Heart of Clear Water
attributes.description: If the equipped monster's ATK is 1300 or higher, this card is destroyed. The monster equipped with this card is not destroyed as a result of battle or by the effect of a card that targets the monster. (Damage calculation is applied normally.)

attributes.name: A Legendary Ocean
attributes.description: This card's name is treated as "Umi". Downgrade all WATER monsters in both players' hands and on the field by 1 Level. Increase the ATK and DEF of all WATER monsters by 200 points.

attributes.name: Fusion Sword Murasame Blade
attributes.description: You can only equip this card to a Warrior-Type monster. Increase the ATK of the equipped monster by 800 points. This card cannot be destroyed by effects that destroy Spell Cards.

attributes.name: Smoke Grenade of the Thief
attributes.description: When this Equip Spell Card is active and is destroyed by a card effect, look at your opponent's hand. Select 1 card from their hand and discard it to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Creature Swap
attributes.description: Both players select 1 monster from their respective sides of the field and switch control of those monsters with each other. The selected monsters cannot change their battle positions this turn.

attributes.name: Spiritual Energy Settle Machine
attributes.description: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, all Spirit monsters remain face-up on the field and do not return to their owners' hands during the End Phase even if they are Normal Summoned or flipped face-up. Discard 1 card from your hand during each of your End Phases. If you do not, destroy this card. When this card is removed from the field, all face-up Spirit monsters return to the owners' hands.

attributes.name: Second Coin Toss
attributes.description: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, you can negate the effects of a card requiring a coin toss once per turn and redo the coin toss.

attributes.name: Convulsion of Nature
attributes.description: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, both players must turn their respective Decks upside down and proceed with the current Duel.

attributes.name: The Secret of the Bandit
attributes.description: This card can only be activated during Main Phase 1. Select 1 face-up monster on the field. Each time the selected monster inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points this turn, your opponent discards 1 random card.

attributes.name: After the Struggle
attributes.description: This card can only be activated during Main Phase 1. All monsters on both sides of the field that have been involved in damage calculation are destroyed during the End Step of the turn.

attributes.name: Magic Reflector
attributes.description: Select 1 Spell Card that remains face-up on the field and put 1 counter on it. If the selected card is destroyed, the counter is removed instead of the card being destroyed.

attributes.name: Blast with Chain
attributes.description: After activation, this card is treated as an Equip Card that increases the ATK of the equipped monster by 500 points. Equip a monster on your side of the field with this card. If this card is destroyed by the effect of another card while it is an Equip Card, select 1 card on the field and destroy it.

attributes.name: Disappear
attributes.description: Remove from play 1 card from your opponent's Graveyard.

attributes.name: Bubble Crash
attributes.description: This card can only be activated when any player has 6 or more cards on the field and/or in their hand. The player(s) then select and send cards to their respective Graveyards until the amount remaining on the field and in their hand is 5.

attributes.name: Royal Oppression
attributes.description: Pay 800 Life Points. Negate the Special Summon of a monster(s), and the effect that Special Summoned the monster(s), and destroy both. Both you and your opponent can use this effect.

attributes.name: Bottomless Trap Hole
attributes.description: When your opponent Normal Summons, Flip Summons, or Special Summons a monster(s) with an ATK of 1500 or more, destroy and remove from play the monster(s).

attributes.name: Bad Reaction to Simochi
attributes.description: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, any effect of increasing your opponent's Life Points is changed to inflict the same amount of points in damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Ominous Fortunetelling
attributes.description: During your Standby Phase, select 1 random card from your opponent's hand. Call the type of card (Monster, Spell, or Trap). If you call it right, inflict 700 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points. You can use this effect only once per turn.

attributes.name: Spirit's Invitation
attributes.description: Each time your Spirit monster returns to your hand, select 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field and return it to its owner's hand. Pay 500 Life Points during each of your Standby Phases. If you do not, destroy this card.

attributes.name: Nutrient Z
attributes.description: This card can only be activated during your opponent's Damage Step. During this turn, if you take Battle Damage of 2000 points or more, increase your Life Points by 4000 points before the damage is subtracted from your Life Points.

attributes.name: Drop Off
attributes.description: This card can only be activated during your opponent's Draw Phase. Your opponent immediately discards from their hand to the Graveyard the card they drew.

attributes.name: Fiend Comedian
attributes.description: Toss a coin and call it. If you call it right, all your opponent's cards in the Graveyard are removed from play immediately. If you call it wrong, send a number of cards equal to the cards in your opponent's Graveyard from your Deck to your Graveyard.

attributes.name: Last Turn
attributes.description: This card can only be activated during your opponent's turn when your Life Points are 1000 or less. Select 1 monster on your side of the field and send all other cards on the field and in their respective owners' hands to their respective Graveyards. After that, your opponent selects and Special Summons 1 monster from their Deck in face-up Attack Position and attacks your selected monster. (Any Battle Damage from this battle is treated as 0.) The player whose monster remains alone on the field at the End Phase of this turn wins the Duel. Any other case results in a DRAW.

attributes.name: Injection Fairy Lily
attributes.description: This card's effect can only be activated during the Damage Step of either player's turn when this card battles. Pay 2000 Life Points to increase the ATK of this monster by 3000 points during the Damage Step only.

attributes.name: Guardian of Order
attributes.description: If you control 2 or more LIGHT monsters, you can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only control 1 "Guardian of Order".

attributes.name: Honest
attributes.description: During your Main Phase, you can return this card from the field to its owner's hand. During either player's Damage Step, when a face-up LIGHT monster you control battles, you can send this card from your hand to the Graveyard to have that monster gain ATK equal to the ATK of the opponent's monster it is battling, until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Cross Porter
attributes.description: You can send 1 monster you control to the Graveyard and Special Summon 1 "Neo-Spacian" monster from your hand. When this card is sent to the Graveyard, you can add 1 "Neo-Spacian" monster from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Miracle Flipper
attributes.description: If you control a "Miracle Flipper", you cannot Summon this card.  Your opponent cannot select another face-up monster as an attack target.  If this card is destroyed by battle, Special Summon it to your opponent's side of the field at the end of the Battle Phase.  If this card is destroyed by the effect of a Spell or Trap Card, destroy 1 monster your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Destiny Hero - Dread Servant
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned, place 1 Clock Counter on "Clock Tower Prison".  When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card you control.

attributes.name: Volcanic Queen
attributes.description:
This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned from your hand to your opponent's side of the field by Tributing 1 monster your opponent controls. If you Special Summon this card, you cannot Special Summon or Set this turn.
Once per turn, you can send 1 other card you control to the Graveyard to inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. During your End Phase. either Tribute 1 other monster or take 1000 damage.

attributes.name: Jinzo - Returner
attributes.description: This card can attack your opponent directly.  When this card is sent to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon 1 "Jinzo" from your Graveyard.  Destroy it during your End Phase.

attributes.name: Jinzo - Lord
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set.  This card cannot be Special Summoned except by sending 1 face-up "Jinzo" you control to the Graveyard.  Trap Cards cannot be activated, and the effects of all Trap Cards on the field are negated.  Once per turn, you can destroy all face-up Trap Cards and inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each card destroyed by this effect.

attributes.name: Arcana Force 0 - The Fool
attributes.description:
This card cannot be destroyed by battle This card cannot be switched to Defense Position, except with a card effect. When this card is Summoned, toss a coin:
- Heads: Negate the effects of your Spells, Traps and Effect Monsters effects that target this card, and destroy them.
- Tails: Negate the effects of your opponent's Spells, Traps and Effect Monsters effects that target this card, and destroy them.

attributes.name: Arcana Force I - The Magician
attributes.description:
When this card is Summoned, toss a coin:
- Heads: When a Spell Card is activated, this card's ATK becomes double its original ATK until the End Phase of that turn.
- Tails: When a Spell Card is activated, your opponent gains 500 Life Points.

attributes.name: Arcana Force III - The Empress
attributes.description:
When this card is Summoned, toss a coin:
- Heads: Each time your opponent Normal Summons or Sets a monster, you can Special Summon 1 "Arcana Force" monster from your hand.
- Tails: Each time your opponent Normal Summons or Sets a monster, send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Arcana Force IV - The Emperor
attributes.description:
When this card is Summoned, toss a coin:
- Heads: All "Arcana Force" monsters you control gain 500 ATK.
- Tails: All "Arcana Force" monsters you control lose 500 ATK.

attributes.name: Arcana Force VI - The Lovers
attributes.description:
When this card is Summoned, toss a coin:
- Heads: This card can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of an "Arcana Force" monster.
- Tails: You cannot Tribute Summon "Arcana Force" monsters.

attributes.name: Arcana Force VII - The Chariot
attributes.description:
When this card is Summoned, toss a coin:
- Heads: If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle, you can Special Summon that monster to your side of the field.
- Tails: Your opponent gains control of this card.

attributes.name: Arcana Force XIV - Temperance
attributes.description:
During either player's turn, you can discard this card to reduce the damage you take from a battle to 0. When this card is Summoned, toss a coin:
- Heads: Halve all Battle Damage you take.
- Tails: Halve all Battle Damage your opponent takes.

attributes.name: Arcana Force XVIII - The Moon
attributes.description:
When this card is Summoned, toss a coin:
- Heads: During your Standby Phase, you can Special Summon 1 "Moon Token" (Fairy-Type/LIGHT/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0).
- Tails: During each of your End Phases, select 1 monster you control and give control of it to your opponent.

attributes.name: Arcana Force XXI - The World
attributes.description:
When this card is Summoned, toss a coin:
- Heads: During your End Phase, you can send 2 monsters you control to the Graveyard to skip your opponent's next turn.
- Tails: During your opponent's Draw Phase, add the top card of their Graveyard to their Hand.

attributes.name: Arcana Force EX - The Dark Ruler
attributes.description:
This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by sending 3 monsters you control to the Graveyard. When this card is Special Summoned, toss a coin:
- Heads: This card can attack twice during the same Battle Phase. If this card battles twice using this effect, it is changed to Defense Position at the end of the Battle Phase. This card's Battle Position cannot be changed until the end of your next turn, except with a card effect.
- Tails: If this card is destroyed, destroy all cards on the field.

attributes.name: Lyla, Lightsworn Sorceress
attributes.description: You can change this card from face-up Attack Position to face-up Defense Position and destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card your opponent controls.  If you activate this effect, this card's battle position cannot be changed until the end of your next turn, except with a card effect.  During each of your End Phases, send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Garoth, Lightsworn Warrior
attributes.description: Each time a card(s) is sent from your Deck to the Graveyard by the effect of a "Lightsworn" monster you control, except "Garoth, Lightsworn Warrior", send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.  Then, draw 1 card for each "Lightsworn" monster sent to the Graveyard by this effect.

attributes.name: Lumina, Lightsworn Summoner
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can discard 1 card to Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Lightsworn" monster from your Graveyard.  During each of your End Phases, send the top 3 cards on your Deck to Graveyard.

attributes.name: Ryko, Lightsworn Hunter
attributes.description: FLIP: You can destroy 1 card on the field.  Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Wulf, Lightsworn Beast
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set.  When this card is sent from your Deck to your Graveyard, Special Summon it.

attributes.name: Celestia, Lightsworn Angel
attributes.description: When you Tribute Summon this card by Tributing a "Lightsworn" monster, you can send the top 4 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard to destroy up to 2 cards your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Gragonith, Lightsworn Dragon
attributes.description: This card gains 300 ATK and DEF for each "Lightsworn" monster with a different name in your Graveyard.  During battle between this attacking card and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of this card, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent.  During each of your End Phases, send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Judgment Dragon
attributes.description:
This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except when there are a total of 4 or more different "Lightsworn" monsters in your Graveyard. By paying 1000 Life Points, destroy all cards on the field except this card. During your End Phase, send 4 cards from the top of your Deck to the Graveyard.

[UNCONFIRMED]

attributes.name: Dark Valkyria
attributes.description:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it be treated as an Effect Monster with this effect:
- One time only, you can place 1 Spell Counter on this card. This card gains 300 ATK for each Spell Counter on it. You can remove 1 Spell Counter from this card to destroy 1 monster on the field.

attributes.name: Substitoad
attributes.description: You can Tribute 1 monster to Special Summon 1 "Frog" monster from your deck, except "Frog the Jam".  "Frog" monsters, except for "Frog the Jam", cannot be destroyed by battle.

attributes.name: Unifrog
attributes.description: This card can attack your opponent directly.  When this card successfully attacks directly, if you control a "Frog" monster other than "Frog the Jam" or "Unifrog", you can destroy 1 Spell or Trap your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Batteryman Charger
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned, you can Special Summon 1 "Batteryman" monster, except "Batteryman Charger", from your hand or Deck.  This card gains 300 ATK and DEF for each Thunder-Type monster you control.

attributes.name: Batteryman Industrial Strength
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set.  This card cannot be Special Summoned except by removing from play 2 "Batteryman" monsters in your Graveyard.  Once per turn, you can remove from play 1 Thunder-Type monster in your Graveyard to destroy 1 monster and 1 Spell or Trap Card on the field.

attributes.name: Batteryman Micro-Cell
attributes.description: FLIP: Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Batteryman" monster from your Deck, except "Battery Man - Micro Cell".  After this card has been flipped face-up, when it is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, draw 1 card.

attributes.name: Goblin Recon Squad
attributes.description: If this card successfully attacks directly, you can look at 1 random card in your opponent's hand.  If it is a Spell Card, send it to the Graveyard.  If this card attacks, it is changed to Defense Position at the end of the Battle Phase.  This card's battle position cannot be changed until the end of your next turn, except with a card effect.

attributes.name: Interplanetary Invader "A"
attributes.description: Gain control of a monster that attacks this face-up Attack Position monster at the end of the Battle Phase.

attributes.name: Diskblade Rider
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can remove from play 1 Normal Trap Card from your Graveyard.  This card gains 500 ATK until the End Phase of your opponent's turn.

attributes.name: Golden Ladybug
attributes.description: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase, you can reveal this card in your hand to gain 500 Life Points.  If you do, this card remains revealed while it is in your hand, until the End Phase.

attributes.name: DUCKER Mobile Cannon
attributes.description: FLIP: Select 1 Level 4 monster in your Graveyard and add it to your hand.

attributes.name: The Lady in Wight
attributes.description: Face-up Level 3 or lower Zombie-Type monsters you control, except "The Lady in Wight", cannot be destroyed by battle and are unaffected by the effects of Spell and Trap Cards.  This card's name is treated as "Skull Servant" while it is in the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Simorgh, Bird of Ancestry
attributes.description: Both players Tribute Summon WIND monsters with 1 less Tribute than required.  If you Tribute Summon this card by Tributing only WIND monsters, return up to 2 cards your opponent controls to their owner's hand.  This card is treated as a Normal Monster while in your hand.

attributes.name: Cloudian - Storm Dragon
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set.  This card can only be Special Summoned by removing from play 1 "Cloudian" monster from your Graveyard.  This card cannot be destroyed by battle.  If this card is in face-up Defense Position, destroy it.  Once per turn, you can place 1 Fog Counter on 1 monster on the field.

attributes.name: Phantom Dragon
attributes.description: When your opponent Special Summons a monster, you can Special Summon this card from your hand.  2 of your Monster Card Zones cannot be used.

attributes.name: Destiny End Dragoon
attributes.description:
"Destiny Hero - Plasma" + "Destiny Hero - Dogma"
A Fusion Summon of this monster can only be conducted with the above Fusion Material Monsters. Once per turn, you can destroy 1 monster your opponent controls and inflict damage to your opponent equal its ATK. If you activate this effect you cannot conduct your Battle Phase that turn. During your Standby Phase, if this card is in your Graveyard, you can remove from play 1 "Destiny Hero" card from your Graveyard to Special Summon this card.

attributes.name: Ultimate Ancient Gear Golem
attributes.description:
"Ancient Gear Golem" + 2 "Ancient Gear" monsters
This card cannot be Special Summoned except by Fusion Summon. During battle between this card and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of this card, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent. When this card attacks, your opponent cannot activate any Spell or Trap Cards until the end of the Damage Step. When this card is destroyed, Special Summon 1 "Ancient Gear Golem" from your Graveyard, ignoring the summoning conditions.
[UNCONFIRMED]

attributes.name: Gladiator Beast Gyzarus
attributes.description:
"Gladiator Beast Bestiari" + 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster
This card can only be Special Summoned from your Fusion Deck by returning the above cards you control to the Deck (You do not use "Polymerization"). When this card is successfully Special Summoned, you can destroy up to 2 cards on the field. At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card attacked or was attacked, you can return this card to the Fusion Deck to Special Summon 2 "Gladiator Beast" monsters from your Deck, except "Gladiator Beast Bestiari".

attributes.name: Hero Mask
attributes.description: Select 1 face-up monster you control.  Send 1 "Elemental Hero" monster from your Deck to your Graveyard and treat the selected monster's name as its name until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Space Gift
attributes.description: Draw 1 card for each "Neo-Spacian" monster you control with a different name.

attributes.name: Demise of the Land
attributes.description: Activate only when your opponent Special Summons a monster. Select 1 Field Spell Card from your Deck and activate it.

attributes.name: D - Formation
attributes.description: When a face-up "Destiny Hero" monster(s) you control is destroyed, place 1 D Counter on this card for each of those monsters. When you Normal or Special Summon a monster during your Main Phase, you can send this card with 2 or more D Counters to the Graveyard to add up to 2 cards with the same name as that monster from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand.

attributes.name: Spell Gear
attributes.description: Send 3 "Ancient Gear" cards you control to the Graveyard. You can Special Summon up to 1 "Ancient Gear Golem" from your hand and 1 from your Deck, ignoring the Summoning conditions. Then, destroy all monsters you control except "Ancient Gear Golems". You cannot Normal Summon or Set until the end of your next turn.

attributes.name: Cup of Ace
attributes.description:
Toss a coin:
- Heads: Draw 2 cards.
- Tails: Your opponent draws 2 cards.

attributes.name: Light Barrier
attributes.description:
During your Standby Phase, toss a coin. If the result is Tails, the following effects are negated until your next Standby Phase:
- When you Summon an "Arcana Force" monster, choose which effect to apply without tossing a coin. If an "Arcana Force" monster destroys an opponent's monster by battle, you gain Life Points equal to the destroyed monster's original ATK.

attributes.name: Solar Recharge
attributes.description: Discard 1 "Lightsworn" monster. Draw 2 cards, then send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Realm of Light
attributes.description: Each time a card(s) is sent from your Deck to the Graveyard, place 1 Shine Counter on this card. All "Lightsworn" monsters gain 100 ATK for each Shine Counter. If this card would be destroyed by a card effect, remove 2 Shine Counters instead.

attributes.name: Wetlands
attributes.description: All Aqua-Type/WATER/Level 2 or lower monsters gain 1200 ATK.

attributes.name: Quick Charger
attributes.description: Add 2 Level 4 or lower "Batteryman" monsters from your Graveyard to yoru hand.

attributes.name: Short Circuit
attributes.description: Activate only if you control 3 or more "Batteryman" monsters. Destroy all cards your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Light of Redemption
attributes.description: Pay 800 Life Points.  Add 1 of your removed from play LIGHT monsters to your hand.

attributes.name: Mystical Cards of Light
attributes.description: You cannot use 1 of your Spell and Trap Card Zones.  During your Draw Phase, if you control another "Mystical Cards of Light", you can draw 2 cards instead of 1 for your normal draw.

attributes.name: Level Tuning
attributes.description: Reduce the Level of all face-up monsters you control by 1, until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Deck Lockdown
attributes.description: Neither player can add cards to their hand except by drawing them, and cannot Special Summon monsters from the Deck. Detroy this card during your 2nd Standby Phasse after activation.

attributes.name: Ribbon of Rebirth
attributes.description: If the equipped monster is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, Special Summon it to your side of the field during the End Phase.

attributes.name: Golden Bamboo Sword
attributes.description: Activate only if you control a "Bamboo Sword" Equip Spell Card. Draw 2 cards.

attributes.name: Limit Reverse
attributes.description: Select 1 monster with 1000 or less ATK from your Graveyard, and Special Summon it in Attack Position. If that monster is changed to Defense Position, destroy it and this card. When this card is removed from the field, destroy that monster. When that monster is destroyed, destroy this card.

attributes.name: Hero Blast
attributes.description: Select 1 "Elemental Hero" Normal Monster from your Graveyard and add it to your hand. Then, destroy 1 face-up monster your opponent controls with ATK equal to or less than the selected monster's ATK.

attributes.name: Rainbow Gravity
attributes.description: Activate only if you have 7 "Crystal Beast" cards with different names on the field or in your Graveyard. Special Summon 1 "Rainbow Dragon" or "Rainbow Dark Dragon" from your Deck or Graveyard, ignoring the Summoning conditions.

attributes.name: D - Fortune
attributes.description: Activate only when your opponent declares a direct attack by removing from play "Destiny Hero" monster from your Graveyard. End the Battle Phase.

attributes.name: Reversal of Fate
attributes.description: Select 1 "Arcana Force" monster you control. That monster's effect is now treated as the opposite coin toss result.

attributes.name: Tour of Doom
attributes.description:
During your opponent's Standby Phase, toss a coin:
- Heads: Your opponent cannot Normal or Flip Summon until the End Phase.
- Tails: You cannot Normal Summon or Flip Summon during your next turn.

attributes.name: Arcana Call
attributes.description: Select 1 "Arcana Force" monster you control. Remove from play 1 "Arcana Force" monster from either player's Graveyard. Until the End Phase, the selected monster's effect becomes the removed monster's effect for the same coin toss result.

attributes.name: Light Spiral
attributes.description: Each time a card(s) is sent from your Deck to the Graveyard by the effect of a "Lightsworn" monster, remove from play the top card of your opponent's Deck.

attributes.name: Glorious Illusion
attributes.description: Select 1 "Lightsworn" monster from your Graveyard and Special Summon it in Attack Position. during each of your End phases, send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. When this card is removed from the field, destroy that monster. When that monster is removed from the field, destroy this card.

attributes.name: Destruction Jammer
attributes.description: Discard 1 card. Negate the activation of a Spell Card, Trap Card, or Effect Monster's effect that destroys a monster(s) on the field, and destroy that card.

attributes.name: Froggy Forcefield
attributes.description: Activate only when a face-up "Frog" monster you control, except "Frog the Jam", is selected as an attack target. Destroy all Attack Position monsters your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Portable Battery Pack
attributes.description: Select 2 "Batteryman" monsters from your Graveyard and Special summon them in Attack Position. When this card is removed from the field, destroy those monsters. When both of those monsters have been removed from the field, destroy this card.

attributes.name: Gladiator Lash
attributes.description: Activate only when you Special Summon a "Gladiator Beast" monster. Your opponent discards 1 card of their choice.

attributes.name: Raging Cloudian
attributes.description: Activate only when a "Cloudian" monster(s) you control is destroyed by its own effect and sent to the Graveyard. Special Summon 1 of those monsters from your Graveyard in Attack Position and place 1 Fog Counter on it. It cannot be changed to Defense Position by a card effect.

attributes.name: Sanguine Swamp
attributes.description: If you control any other Spell or Trap Cards, destroy this card. Face-down Spell and Trap Cards cannot be activated. Destroy this card during your 2nd Standby Phase after activation.

attributes.name: Lucky Chance
attributes.description: When an Effect Monster's effect that requires only 1 coin toss is activated, call Heads or Tails. If you call it right, draw 1 card.

attributes.name: Summon Limit
attributes.description: Neither player can Summon more than two times per turn.

attributes.name: Dice Try!
attributes.description: Negate the activation of an opponent's Spell Card, Trap Card, or Effect Monster's effect that requires a die roll, and destroy that card.

attributes.name: Aurkus, Lightsworn Druid
attributes.description: "Lightsworn" monsters cannot be targeted by effects. During each of your End Phases, send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Ehren, Lightsworn Monk
attributes.description: If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, return that monster to its owner's Deck before damage calculation. During each of your End Phases, send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Dark General Freed
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. Negate the effect of any Spell Card that targets a DARK Monster you control and destroy it.  You can add 1 Level 4 DARK monster from your Deck to your hand instead of conducting a normal draw in your Draw Phase.

attributes.name: Magical Exemplar
attributes.description: Each time a Spell Card is activated, place 2 Spell Counters on this card. Once per turn, you can remove any number of Spell Counters from this card to Special Summon a Spellcaster-Type monster from your hand or Graveyard whose Level is equal to the number of Spell Counters you removed.

attributes.name: Maniacal Servant
attributes.description: Once per turn during your opponent's Standby Phase, you can remove from play any number of DARK monsters from your Graveyard. This monster gains 500 DEF for each monster you removed, until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Nimble Musasabi
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, inflict 500 damage to your opponent. You can also Special Summon up to 2 "Nimble Musasabi" from your Deck to your opponent's side of the field in face-up Attack Position. This card cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon.

attributes.name: Flame Spirit Ignis
attributes.description: You can Tribute 1 face-up FIRE monster to inflict 100 damage to you opponent for each FIRE monster in your Graveyard.

attributes.name: Super-Ancient Dinobeast
attributes.description: You can Tribute Summon this card in face-up Attack Position by Tributing 1 Dinosaur-Type monster. When a Dinosaur-Type monster is Special Summoned from your Graveyard, you can draw 1 card.

attributes.name: Vanquishing Light
attributes.description: Tribute 1 "Lightsworn" monster. Negate th Summon of a monster and destroy it.

attributes.name: Tualatin
attributes.description: If you controlled 2 or more monsters at the start of your opponent's Battle Phase and all of them were destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon this card from your hand during that Battle Phase. If you do, choose an Attribute and destroy all face-up monsters with that Attribute. Your opponent cannot Normal or Special Summon monsters with that Attribute.

attributes.name: Divine Knight Ishzark
attributes.description: Any monster this card destroys by battle is removed from play.

attributes.name: Angel O7
attributes.description:
When this card is Tribute Summoned, it gains the following effect:
- The effects of Effect Monsters cannot be activated.

attributes.name: Union Attack
attributes.description: Select 1 face-up monster you control. During the Battle Phase this turn, that monster gains ATK equal to the total ATK of all other face-up Attack Position monsters you control. This turn, that monster inflicts no Battle Damage to your opponent, and other face-up Attack Position monsters cannot attack.

attributes.name: Owner's Seal
attributes.description: Return control of all monsters on the field to their original owners.

attributes.name: Helios Trice Megistus
attributes.description: You can Special Summon this card by Tributing 1 "Helious Duo Megistus". This card's ATK and DEF are each equal to the number of removed from play monsters x 300. After this card attacks, it can attack once more if your opponent controls a monster. If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, Special Summon it during the End Phase and it gains 500 ATK and DEF.

attributes.name: Dangerous Machine Type-6
attributes.description:
During each of your Standby Phases, roll a six-sided die:
- 1: Discard 1 card.
- 2: Your opponent discards 1 card.
- 3: Draw 1 card.
- 4: Your opponent draws 1 card.
- 5: Destroy 1 monster your opponent controls.
- 6: Destroy this card.

attributes.name: Maximum Six
attributes.description: When this card is Tribute Summoned, roll a six-sided die. This card gains ATK equal to the result of the die roll x 200.

attributes.name: Fog King
attributes.description: You can Normal Summon this card with 1 Tribute, or without a Tribute. The ATK of this card is equal to the combined original ATK of the monsters Tributed to Summon it. Neither player can Tribute monsters.

attributes.name: Fossil Dyna Pachycephalo
attributes.description: Neither player can Special Summon monsters. When this card is flipped face-up, destroy all Special Summoned monsters on the field.

attributes.name: Kuraz the Light Monarch
attributes.description: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned, you can destroy up to 2 cards on the field. For each card destroyed, that card's controller draws 1 card. This card cannot attack during the turn it is Normal or Special Summoned.

attributes.name: Soul Rope
attributes.description: Activate only by paying 1000 Life Points when a monster you control is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard. Special Summon 1 Level 4 monster from your Deck.

attributes.name: Gemini Elf
attributes.description: Elf twins that alternate their attacks.

attributes.name: The Masked Beast
attributes.description: This monster can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "Curse of the Masked Beast". You must also Tribute monsters whose total Level Stars equal 8 or more from the field or your hand.

attributes.name: Humanoid Slime
attributes.description: This slime apparently has some human genes in its genetic makeup.

attributes.name: Worm Drake
attributes.description: Once this monster wraps itself around a victim, there is no escape.

attributes.name: Humanoid Worm Drake
attributes.description: "Worm Drake" + "Humanoid Slime"

attributes.name: Revival Jam
attributes.description: When this card is sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, you can pay 1000 Life Points. Then, Special Summon this card in face-up Defense Position during your next Standby Phase.

attributes.name: Flying Fish
attributes.description: Three wishes are granted to those fortunate enough to see this monster in flight.

attributes.name: Amphibian Beast
attributes.description: On land or in the sea, the speed of this monster is unmatchable.

attributes.name: Shining Abyss
attributes.description: This monster employs the powers of both Light and Darkness.

attributes.name: Gadget Soldier
attributes.description: A rust-free machine warrior born to battle.

attributes.name: Grand Tiki Elder
attributes.description: A masked monster that wields the most deadly of curses.

attributes.name: Melchid the Four-Face Beast
attributes.description: This monster has four different masks for four different attacks.

attributes.name: Nuvia the Wicked
attributes.description: If this monster is Normal Summoned, destroy this card. If your opponent controls any monster, decrease the ATK of this card by 200 points for each monster on your opponents side of the field.

attributes.name: Chosen One
attributes.description: Select 1 Monster Card and 2 non-Monster Cards from your hand. Your opponent randomly selects 1 card among them. If it is a Monster Card, it is Special Summoned and send the remaining 2 cards to the Graveyard. If not, send all the cards to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Mask of Weakness
attributes.description: Decrease the ATK of 1 attacking monster by 700 points until the end of the turn.

attributes.name: Curse of the Masked Beast
attributes.description: This card is used to Ritual Summon "The Masked Beast". You must also Tribute monsters whose total Level Stars equal 8 or more from the field or your hand.

attributes.name: Mask of Dispel
attributes.description: Select 1 face-up Spell Card on the field. The controller of the Spell Card takes 500 points of damage during each of your Standby Phases. When the selected card is removed from the field, destroy this card.

attributes.name: Mask of Restrict
attributes.description: Neither player can Tribute any monster under any conditions.

attributes.name: Mask of the Accursed
attributes.description: The monster equipped with this card cannot attack. The controller of the equipped monster takes 500 points of damage during each of your Standby Phases.

attributes.name: Mask of Brutality
attributes.description: Increase the ATK of a monster equipped with this card by 1000 points and decrease its DEF by 1000 points. Pay 1000 Life Points during each of your Standby Phases. If you do not, destroy this card.

attributes.name: Return of the Doomed
attributes.description: Discard 1 Monster Card from your hand to the Graveyard. Return 1 of your monsters destroyed and sent to your Graveyard as a result of battle during this turn to your hand at the end of this turn.

attributes.name: Lightning Blade
attributes.description: You can only equip this card to a Warrior-Type monster. Increase the ATK of the equipped monster by 800 points and decrease the ATK of all WATER monsters on the field by 500 points.

attributes.name: Tornado Wall
attributes.description: This card can only be activated when "Umi" is active on the field. As long as "Umi" remains face-up on the field, any damage from attacking monsters to your Life Points becomes 0. When "Umi" is removed from the field, this card is also destroyed.

attributes.name: Fairy Box
attributes.description: Each time a monster on your opponent's side of the field attacks, toss a coin and call Heads or Tails. If you call it right, the attacking monster's ATK becomes 0 only during the Battle Phase. Pay 500 Life Points during each of your Standby Phases. If you do not, this card is destroyed.

attributes.name: Torrential Tribute
attributes.description: You can only activate this card when a monster is Normal Summoned, Flip Summoned or Special Summoned. Destroy all monsters on the field.

attributes.name: Jam Breeding Machine
attributes.description: During each of your Standby Phases, Special Summon 1 "Slime Token" (Aqua-Type/WATER/LEVEL 1/ATK 500/DEF 500) in Attack Position to your side of the field. As long as this card remains face-up on the field, you cannot Normal Summon, Flip Summon or Special Summon any other monster (except Slime Tokens).

attributes.name: Infinite Cards
attributes.description: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, there is no limit to the number of cards in both players' hands.

attributes.name: Jam Defender
attributes.description: When a monster on your opponent's side of the field attacks a monster on your side of the field and there is a face-up "Revival Jam" on your side of the field, you can switch the attack target to the "Revival Jam".

attributes.name: Card of Safe Return
attributes.description: When a monster is Special Summoned to the field from your Graveyard, you can draw 1 card from your Deck.

attributes.name: Lady Panther
attributes.description: Tribute this face-up card to return 1 of your monsters destroyed as a result of battle during this turn to the top of your Deck.

attributes.name: The Unfriendly Amazon
attributes.description: Tribute 1 of your monsters on the field (excluding this monster) during each of your Standby Phases. If you do not, this card is destroyed.

attributes.name: Amazon Archer
attributes.description: Tribute 2 monsters on your side of the field to inflict 1200 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Crimson Sentry
attributes.description: Tribute this face-up card to return 1 of your monsters destroyed as a result of battle during this turn to the bottom of your Deck.

attributes.name: Fire Princess
attributes.description: Each time you increase your Life Points, inflict 500 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Lady Assailant of Flames
attributes.description: FLIP: Remove 3 cards from the top of your Deck from play to inflict 800 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Fire Sorcerer
attributes.description: FLIP: Randomly select 2 cards from your hand and remove them from play to inflict 800 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Spirit of the Breeze
attributes.description: As long as this card remains in face-up Attack Position on your side of the field, increase your Life Points by 1000 points during each of your Standby Phases.

attributes.name: Dancing Fairy
attributes.description: As long as this card remains in face-up Defense Position on your side of the field, increase your Life Points by 1000 points during each of your Standby Phases.

attributes.name: Fairy Guardian
attributes.description: Tribute this face-up card to return 1 Spell Card sent to your Graveyard by your opponent's card effect during this turn to the bottom of your Deck.

attributes.name: Empress Mantis
attributes.description: Queen of an army of giant mantises whose command moves legions.

attributes.name: Cure Mermaid
attributes.description: As long as this card remains face-up on your side of the field, increase your Life Points by 800 points during each of your Standby Phases.

attributes.name: Hysteric Fairy
attributes.description: Tribute 2 monsters on your side of the field to increase your Life Points by 1000 points.

attributes.name: Bio-Mage
attributes.description: A mysterious priest created as a result of the latest advances in biotechnology.

attributes.name: The Forgiving Maiden
attributes.description: Tribute this face-up card to return to your hand 1 of your monsters destroyed as a result of battle during this turn.

attributes.name: St. Joan
attributes.description: "The Forgiving Maiden" + "Marie the Fallen One"

attributes.name: Marie the Fallen One
attributes.description: As long as this card is in the Graveyard, increase your Life Points by 200 points during each of your Standby Phases.

attributes.name: Jar of Greed
attributes.description: Draw 1 card from your Deck.

attributes.name: Scroll of Bewitchment
attributes.description: Select 1 Attribute. Change the Attribute of the equipped monster to the one you select.

attributes.name: United We Stand
attributes.description: Increase the ATK and DEF of the equipped monster by 800 points for each face-up monster you control.

attributes.name: Mage Power
attributes.description: Increase the ATK and DEF of the equipped monster by 500 points for each Spell and Trap Card on your side of the field.

attributes.name: Offerings to the Doomed
attributes.description: Destroy 1 face-up monster. Skip your next Draw Phase.

attributes.name: The Portrait's Secret
attributes.description: A portrait cursed by the artist, it is said to bring ill fortune to anyone who owns it.

attributes.name: The Gross Ghost of Fled Dreams
attributes.description: This monster feeds on the dreams of an unwary sleeper, dragging the victim into eternal slumber.

attributes.name: Headless Knight
attributes.description: A haunted spirit of a falsely accused knight who wanders in search of truth and justice.

attributes.name: Earthbound Spirit
attributes.description: A vengeful creature formed by the spirits of fallen warriors, it drags any who dare approach it into the deepest bowels of the earth.

attributes.name: The Earl of Demise
attributes.description: This gentlemanly creature is extremely wicked, feared by man and fiend alike.

attributes.name: Boneheimer
attributes.description: This monster wanders the seas, sucking dry any creatures it may encounter.

attributes.name: Flame Dancer
attributes.description: This monster moves while swinging its burning rope.

attributes.name: Spherous Lady
attributes.description: Many have been deceived by the beauty of this vampire.

attributes.name: Lightning Conger
attributes.description: This massive eel generates huge charges of electricity and unleashes them as thunderbolts.

attributes.name: Jowgen the Spiritualist
attributes.description: Discard 1 random card from your hand to the Graveyard to destroy all Special Summoned monsters on the field. As long as this card remains face-up on the field, no monsters can be Special Summoned.

attributes.name: Kycoo the Ghost Destroyer
attributes.description: Each time this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, you can remove from play up to 2 Monster Cards in your opponent's Graveyard. As long as this card remains face-up on the field, your opponent cannot remove from play any cards in either Graveyard.

attributes.name: Summoner of Illusions
attributes.description: FLIP: Tribute 1 monster on your side of the field (excluding this monster). Special Summon 1 Fusion Monster Card from your Fusion Deck. The Fusion Monster is destroyed at the end of the turn this effect is activated.

attributes.name: Bazoo the Soul-Eater
attributes.description: You can remove from play up to 3 Monster Cards in your Graveyard to increase the ATK of this monster by 300 points for each card removed from play, until the end of your opponent's next turn. This effect can only be used once during your turn.

attributes.name: Dark Necrofear
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by removing from play 3 Fiend-Type monsters in your Graveyard. If this card is destroyed as a result of battle or by your opponent's card effect while it is a Monster Card, it is treated as an Equip Card during the End Phase of this turn, and equip 1 of your opponent's monsters with this card. As long as it is equipped with this card, you control the equipped monster.

attributes.name: Soul of Purity and Light
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by removing from play 2 LIGHT monsters in your Graveyard. As long as this card remains face-up on the field, decrease the ATK of all monsters on your opponent's side of the field by 300 points during their Battle Phase.

attributes.name: Spirit of Flames
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by removing 1 FIRE monster in your Graveyard from play. Increase the ATK of this monster by 300 points during your Battle Phase.

attributes.name: Aqua Spirit
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by removing from play 1 WATER monster in your Graveyard. During each of your opponent's Standby Phases, you can change the battle position of 1 of your opponent's face-up Monster Cards. Once changed, the monster must remain in this position for the rest of the turn.

attributes.name: The Rock Spirit
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by removing from play 1 EARTH monster in your Graveyard. Increase the ATK of this monster by 300 points during your opponent's Battle Phase.

attributes.name: Garuda the Wind Spirit
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This monster can only be Special Summoned by removing 1 WIND monster in your Graveyard from play. As long as this monster remains face-up on the field, you may change the battle position of 1 of your opponent's face-up Monster Cards at each End Phase of your opponent's turn.

attributes.name: Gilasaurus
attributes.description: You can treat the Normal Summon of this card as a Special Summon. If you select Special Summon, your opponent can Special Summon 1 monster from their Graveyard.

attributes.name: Tornado Bird
attributes.description: FLIP: Return 2 Spell or Trap Cards on the field to their owners' hands.

attributes.name: Dreamsprite
attributes.description: When attacked by your opponent's monster, select another 1 of your Monster Cards and designate it as the attack's target, then calculate damage.

attributes.name: Zombyra the Dark
attributes.description: This card cannot attack a player directly. Each time this card destroys 1 monster as a result of battle, decrease the ATK of this card by 200 points.

attributes.name: Supply
attributes.description: FLIP: Return 2 Fusion Material Monsters that were sent to the Graveyard as a result of a Fusion Summon to your hand.

attributes.name: Maryokutai
attributes.description: You can only activate this card's effect during your opponent's turn. When your opponent activates a Spell Card, Tribute this face-up card to negate the activation of the Spell Card and destroy it.

attributes.name: The Last Warrior from Another Planet
attributes.description:
"Zombyra the Dark" + "Maryokutai"
When this card is Special Summoned, destroy all monsters on your side of the field except this card. As long as this card remains face-up on the field, neither player can Normal Summon, Flip Summon or Special Summon any monster.

attributes.name: Collected Power
attributes.description: Select 1 face-up monster on the field. Equip this monster with all face-up Equip Cards on the field. If the target of the Equip Card is not correct, destroy the Equip Card.

attributes.name: Dark Spirit of the Silent
attributes.description: This card can only be activated during your opponent's Battle Step. Negate the attack of 1 monster and select another 1 of your opponent's face-up monsters and have it attack. (If the new targeted attacking monster is in face-up Defense Position, change it to Attack Position.)

attributes.name: Royal Command
attributes.description: Negate the activation and effects of all Flip Effect monsters' effects.

attributes.name: Riryoku Field
attributes.description: Negate the activation of a Spell Card that targets 1 monster on the field and destroy the Spell Card.

attributes.name: Skull Lair
attributes.description: Remove from play any number of Monster Cards in your Graveyard to destroy 1 face-up monster on the field whose Level is equal to the number of the cards you removed from play.

attributes.name: Graverobber's Retribution
attributes.description: During each of your Standby Phases, inflict 100 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points for each of your opponent's monsters that have been removed from play.

attributes.name: Deal of Phantom
attributes.description: Select 1 face-up monster on the field. Increase the selected monster's ATK by 100 points for each monster in your Graveyard during the turn this card is activated. The number of monsters is applied when this card is activated.

attributes.name: Destruction Punch
attributes.description: If the ATK of an attacking monster on your opponent's side of the field is lower than the DEF of the attacked Defense Position monster, destroy the attacking monster at the end of the Damage Step. (Damage calculation is applied normally.)

attributes.name: Blind Destruction
attributes.description: During your Standby Phase, roll 1 six-sided die once. Destroy any monsters whose Level is equal to the number rolled. (If the number is "6", destroy all face-up Level 6 or higher monsters on the field.)

attributes.name: The Emperor's Holiday
attributes.description: Negate the effects of all Equip Cards.

attributes.name: Destiny Board
attributes.description: At the end of each of your opponent's turns, place 1 "Spirit Message" card from your hand or your Deck face-up on the field. If it is from your Deck, then shuffle your Deck. When "Spirit Message" cards "I", "N", "A", and "L" are all on your side of the field in their proper order, you are declared the winner. If any of your "Spirit Message" cards or "Destiny Board" are removed from the field, all your "Spirit Message" cards and "Destiny Board" on the field are sent to your Graveyard immediately.

attributes.name: Spirit Message "I"
attributes.description: This card can only be placed on the field by the effect of "Destiny Board".

attributes.name: Spirit Message "N"
attributes.description: This card can only be placed on the field by the effect of "Destiny Board".

attributes.name: Spirit Message "A"
attributes.description: This card can only be placed on the field by the effect of "Destiny Board".

attributes.name: Spirit Message "L"
attributes.description: This card can only be placed on the field by the effect of "Destiny Board".

attributes.name: The Dark Door
attributes.description: Both players can only attack with 1 monster during their respective Battle Phases.

attributes.name: Spiritualism
attributes.description: Return 1 Spell or Trap Card on your opponent's side of the field to the owner's hand. This card's activation and effect cannot be negated by any other card.

attributes.name: Cyclon Laser
attributes.description: You can only equip this card to "Gradius". Increase the ATK of "Gradius" by 300 points. When the equipped "Gradius" attacks with an ATK that is higher than the DEF of a Defense Position monster, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Bait Doll
attributes.description: Force the activation of 1 face-down Trap Card. If the timing of the activation of the Trap Card is incorrect, negate the effect and destroy it. If it is not a Trap Card, it is returned to its original position. After this card is activated, it is placed into the Deck (not the Graveyard). Then shuffle the Deck.

attributes.name: De-Fusion
attributes.description: Return 1 Fusion Monster on the field to the Fusion Deck. In addition, if all the Fusion Material Monsters that were used for the Fusion Summon of that Fusion Monster are in your Graveyard, you can Special Summon them all to the field.

attributes.name: Fusion Gate
attributes.description: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, a Fusion Monster can be Fusion Summoned without using "Polymerization". The Fusion Material monsters used in the Fusion Summon are not sent to the Graveyard, but are removed from play.

attributes.name: Ekibyo Drakmord
attributes.description: A monster equipped with this card cannot attack. At the end of the equipped monster's controller's 2nd turn after this card is activated, destroy the equipped monster. At that time, this card is returned to the owner's hand.

attributes.name: Miracle Dig
attributes.description: If 5 or more of your monsters are currently removed from play, return 3 of them to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Dragonic Attack
attributes.description: You can only equip this card to a Warrior-Type monster. Increase the ATK and DEF of the equipped monster by 500 points and it is treated as Dragon-Type.

attributes.name: Spirit Elimination
attributes.description: When monsters in the Graveyard are removed from play, remove monsters on your side of the field from play as substitutes. This card remains active until the end of the turn that it is activated. The substitutes remain removed from play.

attributes.name: Vengeful Bog Spirit
attributes.description: No monsters on the field can attack during the same turn that they are Normal Summoned, Flip Summoned or Special Summoned.

attributes.name: Magic Cylinder
attributes.description: Negate the attack of 1 of your opponent's monsters and inflict damage equal to the attacking monster's ATK to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Elemental Hero Electrum
attributes.description:
"Elemental Hero Avian" + "Elemental Hero Burstinatrix" + "Elemental Hero Clayman" + "Elemental Hero Bubbleman"
This monster cannot be Special Summoned except by Fusion Summon. The Attribute of this card is also treated as WIND, WATER, FIRE, and EARTH. When this card is Fusion Summoned, return all removed from play cards to their owners' Deck(s), then shuffle those Deck(s). Increase the ATK of this card by 300 points for each monster on your opponent's side of the field that shares an Attribute with this card.

attributes.name: Elemental Hero Mudballman
attributes.description:
"Elemental Hero Bubbleman" + "Elemental Hero Clayman"
This monster cannot be Special Summoned except by Fusion Summon.

attributes.name: The Flute of Summoning Kuriboh
attributes.description: Add 1 "Kuriboh" or 1 "Winged Kuriboh" from your Deck to your hand, OR Special Summon 1 "Kuriboh" or 1 "Winged Kuriboh" from your Deck to your side of the field.

attributes.name: Mist Body
attributes.description: A monster equipped with this card cannot be destroyed as a result of battle. (Damage calculation is applied normally.)

attributes.name: White-Horned Dragon
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned or Special Summoned, select up to 5 Spell Cards from your opponent's Graveyard and remove them from play. Increase the ATK of this card by 300 points for each card removed from play by this card's effect.

attributes.name: Meteor Dragon
attributes.description: This dragon appeared from the sky and crashed to the earth.

attributes.name: Gokibore
attributes.description: A large, spherical roach that attacks its enemies by rolling over them.

attributes.name: Metal Guardian
attributes.description: A fiend guarding the treasures of the netherworld, it's most at home in the dark.

attributes.name: Kaiser Dragon
attributes.description: "Winged Dragon, Guardian of the Fortress #1" + "Fairy Dragon"

attributes.name: Amphibious Bugroth
attributes.description: "Ground Attacker Bugroth" + "Sentinel of the Sea"

attributes.name: Aqua Dragon
attributes.description: "Fairy Dragon" + "Amazon of the Seas" + "Zone Eater"

attributes.name: Pragtical
attributes.description: "Trakodon" + "Flame Viper"

attributes.name: Zone Eater
attributes.description: A monster attacked by this card will be destroyed during the End Phase of the 5th turn after the attack.

attributes.name: Flame Viper
attributes.description: A fire-breathing snake whose speed makes it a difficult target.

attributes.name: Trakodon
attributes.description: A tiger-striped dragon that is often seen racing across the wasteland at tremendous speeds.

attributes.name: Dungeon Worm
attributes.description: Hidden under the floors of a labyrinth, it swallows any who pass above.

attributes.name: Moon Envoy
attributes.description: Many have fallen victim to this lunar warrior's crescent pike.

attributes.name: Stone Dragon
attributes.description: A dragon formed by huge boulders that are also used to attack the enemy.

attributes.name: Dark Magician Girl
attributes.description: Increase the ATK of this card by 300 points for each "Dark Magician" or "Magician of Black Chaos" in either player's Graveyard.

attributes.name: People Running About
attributes.description: Although they always suffer in silence, they swear an oath to inevitably revolt.

attributes.name: Oppressed People
attributes.description: They are oppressed, but believe they will have their freedom someday.

attributes.name: United Resistance
attributes.description: The people that gather to swear to fight their oppressors. A revolution is coming.

attributes.name: X-Head Cannon
attributes.description: A monster with a mighty cannon barrel, it is able to integrate its attacks. It attacks in many ways by combining and separating with other monsters.

attributes.name: Y-Dragon Head
attributes.description: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you control this card on the field, you can equip it to your "X-Head Cannon" as an Equip Card, OR unequip the Union equipment and Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. While equipped to a monster by this card's effect, increase the ATK/DEF of the equipped monster by 400 points. (1 monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the equipped monster is destroyed as a result of battle, destroy this card instead.)

attributes.name: Z-Metal Tank
attributes.description: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you control this card on the field, you can equip it to your "X-Head Cannon" or "Y-Dragon Head" as an Equip Card, OR unequip the Union equipment and Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. While equipped to a monster by this card's effect, increase the ATK/DEF of the equipped monster by 600 points. (1 monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the equipped monster is destroyed as a result of battle, destroy this card instead.)

attributes.name: Dark Blade
attributes.description: They say he is a dragon manipulating warrior from the dark world. His attack is tremendous, using his great swords with vicious power.

attributes.name: Pitch-Dark Dragon
attributes.description: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you control this card on the field, you can equip it to your "Dark Blade" as an Equip Card, OR unequip the Union equipment and Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. While equipped to a monster by this card's effect, increase the ATK/DEF of the equipped monster by 400 points. When it attacks with an ATK that is higher than the DEF of a Defense Position monster, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points. (1 monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the equipped monster is destroyed as a result of battle, destroy this card instead.)

attributes.name: Kiryu
attributes.description: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you control this card on the field, you can equip it to your "Dark Blade" as an Equip Card, OR unequip the Union equipment and Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. While equipped to a monster by this card's effect, increase the ATK/DEF of the equipped monster by 900 points, and you can Tribute this card to allow the equipped monster to attack your opponent's Life Points directly this turn. (1 monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the equipped monster is destroyed as a result of battle, destroy this card instead.)

attributes.name: Decayed Commander
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned successfully, you can Special Summon 1 "Zombie Tiger" from your hand. If this card successfully attacks your opponent's Life Points directly, your opponent discards 1 card randomly from his/her hand.

attributes.name: Zombie Tiger
attributes.description: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you control this card on the field, you can equip it to your "Decayed Commander" as an Equip Card, OR unequip the Union equipment and Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. While equipped to a monster by this card's effect, increase the ATK/DEF of the equipped monster by 500 points, and each time it destroys 1 of your opponent's monsters, your opponent discards 1 card randomly from his/her hand. (1 monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the equipped monster is destroyed as a result of battle, destroy this card instead.)

attributes.name: Giant Orc
attributes.description: If this card attacks, it is changed to Defense Position at the end of the Battle Phase. You cannot change this battle position until the end of your next turn.

attributes.name: Second Goblin
attributes.description: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you control this monster on the field, you can equip it to your "Giant Orc" as an Equip Card, OR unequip the Union equipment and Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. While equipped to a monster by this card's effect, you can change the equipped monster's battle position once per turn. (1 monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the equipped monster is destroyed as a result of battle, destroy this card instead.)

attributes.name: Vampire Orchis
attributes.description: When this monster is Normal Summoned successfully, you can Special Summon 1 "Des Dendle" from your hand.

attributes.name: Des Dendle
attributes.description: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you control this monster on the field, you can equip it to your "Vampire Orchis" as an Equip Card, OR unequip the Union equipment and Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. While equipped to a monster by this card's effect, each time the equipped monster destroys 1 of your opponent's monsters, Special Summon 1 "Wicked Plant Token" (Plant-Type/EARTH/1 Star/ATK 800/DEF 800). (1 monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the equipped monster is destroyed as a result of battle, destroy this card instead.)

attributes.name: Burning Beast
attributes.description: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you control this monster on the field, you can equip it to your "Freezing Beast" as an Equip Card, OR unequip the Union equipment and Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. While equipped to a monster by this card's effect, each time the equipped monster inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, destroy 1 face-up Spell or Trap Card on the field. (1 monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the equipped monster is destroyed as a result of battle, destroy this card instead.)

attributes.name: Freezing Beast
attributes.description: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you control this monster on the field, you can equip it to your "Burning Beast" as an Equip Card, OR unequip the Union equipment and Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. While equipped to a monster by this card's effect, each time the equipped monster inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, destroy 1 face-down Spell or Trap Card on the field. (1 monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the equipped monster is destroyed as a result of battle, destroy this card instead.)

attributes.name: Union Rider
attributes.description: You can take control of up to 1 Union Monster that is currently a monster on your opponent's side of the field, and equip it to this card. The Union Monster that is equipped to this card cannot be changed back to a monster using its own effect.

attributes.name: D.D. Crazy Beast
attributes.description: A monster that this card destroys as a result of battle is removed from play.

attributes.name: Spell Canceller
attributes.description: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, Spell Cards cannot be activated. The effects of all Spell Cards are also negated.

attributes.name: Neko Mane King
attributes.description: During your opponent's turn, when this card is sent to the Graveyard by the effect of your opponent's Spell, Trap, or Monster Card, your opponent's turn ends.

attributes.name: Helping Robo For Combat
attributes.description: Each time this card destroys your opponent's monster as a result of battle, draw 1 card, then select and return 1 card from your hand to the bottom of your Deck.

attributes.name: Dimension Jar
attributes.description: FLIP: Both players can remove from play up to 3 monsters from their opponent's Graveyard.

attributes.name: Great Phantom Thief
attributes.description: Each time this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, declare the name of 1 card. Then see your opponent's hand and discard all copies of the declared card in his/her hand to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Roulette Barrel
attributes.description: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can roll a six-sided die twice. Select one result and destroy 1 face-up monster on the field whose level is equal to the result.

attributes.name: Paladin of White Dragon
attributes.description: This monster can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "White Dragon Ritual." You must also Tribute monsters whose total Levels equal 4 or more from the field or your hand. When this monster attacks a face-down Defense Position monster, destroy the face-down monster with this card's effect. You can Tribute this card to Special Summon 1 "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" from your hand or your Deck. ("Blue-Eyes White Dragon" cannot attack during that turn.)

attributes.name: White Dragon Ritual
attributes.description: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Paladin of White Dragon". You must also Tribute monsters whose total Levels equal 4 or more from the field or your hand.

attributes.name: Frontline Base
attributes.description: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can Special Summon 1 Union Monster of Level 4 or lower from your hand.

attributes.name: Demotion
attributes.description: Downgrade the monster equipped with this card by 2 Levels.

attributes.name: Combination Attack
attributes.description: During a Battle Phase, you can use this effect on 1 monster that has attacked this turn and is equipped with a Union Monster. Change the Union Monster back to a monster in face-up Attack or Defense Position. Also, the monster that was equipped with the Union Monster may attack again this turn.

attributes.name: Kaiser Colosseum
attributes.description: If there is 1 or more monster(s) on the field of the controller of this card, his/her opponent cannot place a monster on the field if his/her number of monsters would exceed the number of monsters that are on the field of this card's controller. The cards that are already on the field before this card's activation are unaffected by this effect.

attributes.name: Autonomous Action Unit
attributes.description: Pay 1500 Life Points. Select 1 monster from your opponent's Graveyard, Special Summon it to your side of the field in Attack Position, and equip it with this card. When this card is removed from the field, destroy the equipped monster.

attributes.name: Poison of the Old Man
attributes.description:
Select and activate 1 of the following effects:
- Increase your Life Points by 1200 points.
- Inflict 800 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Ante
attributes.description: Each Player selects 1 card from his/her hand, then looks at the Level of the selected cards. The card with more Levels returns to the hand of the player who selected it. The player who selected the card with fewer Levels takes 1000 Life Points damage and sends the card to the Graveyard. If a non-Monster Card is selected, it is treated as Level 0. If they are the same Level, each player returns his/her card to his/her hand.

attributes.name: Dark Core
attributes.description: Discard 1 card from your hand. Remove 1 face-up monster on the field from play.

attributes.name: Raregold Armor
attributes.description: As long as you control the monster equipped with this card, your opponent cannot attack other monsters other than the equipped monster.

attributes.name: Metalsilver Armor
attributes.description: As long as you control the monster equipped with this card, your opponent cannot use the effect of a Spell, Trap, or Effect Monster that targets 1 monster, except the equipped monster.

attributes.name: Kishido Spirit
attributes.description: Monsters on your side of the field cannot be destroyed in a battle if the monsters' ATK are equal.

attributes.name: Tribute Doll
attributes.description: Tribute 1 monster on your side of the field to activate this card. Special Summon 1 Level 7 monster that can be Normal Summoned from your hand. That monster cannot attack this turn.

attributes.name: Wave-Motion Cannon
attributes.description: Send this card on the field to the Graveyard during your Main Phase. Inflict damage to your opponent's Life Points equal to the number of your Standby Phases that have passed after this card's activation x 1000 points.

attributes.name: Huge Revolution
attributes.description: This card can only be activated during your Main Phase when "People Running About," "Oppressed People," and "United Resistance" are face-up on your side of the field. Send all cards in your opponent's hand to the Graveyard and destroy all cards your opponent controls on the field.

attributes.name: Thunder of Ruler
attributes.description: You can only activate this card during your opponent's Standby Phase. Your opponent cannot conduct his/her Battle Phase this turn.

attributes.name: Spell Shield Type-8
attributes.description:
Select and activate 1 of the following effects:
- Negate the activation and the effect of a Spell Card that targets 1 monster on the field and destroy the Spell Card.
