attributes.name: Book of Moon
attributes.description: Flip 1 face-up monster on the field into face-down Defense Position.

attributes.name: Mirage of Nightmare
attributes.description: During your opponent's Standby Phase, draw cards until you have 4 cards in your hand. During your Standby Phase, discard to the Graveyard the same number of random cards you drew with this card's effect.

attributes.name: Secret Pass to the Treasures
attributes.description: Select 1 face-up monster with an ATK equal to 1000 points or less on your side of the field. During the turn this card is activated, the selected monster can attack your opponent's Life Points directly.

attributes.name: Call of the Mummy
attributes.description: If there is no monster on your side of the field, you can Special Summon 1 Zombie-Type monster from your hand. You can only use this effect once per turn.

attributes.name: Timidity
attributes.description: Neither player can destroy Set Spell and Trap Cards on the field until your opponent's next End Phase.

attributes.name: Pyramid Energy
attributes.description:
You can select and activate 1 of the following effects:
- Increase the ATK of all face-up monsters on your side of the field by 200 points until the End Phase of the turn this card is activated.
- Increase the DEF of all face-up monsters on your side of the field by 500 points until the End Phase of the turn this card is activated.

attributes.name: Tutan Mask
attributes.description: Negate the activation and the effect of a Spell or Trap Card that targets 1 face-up Zombie-Type monster and destroy it.

attributes.name: Ordeal of a Traveler
attributes.description: You can only activate this card's effect when your opponent declares an attack. Your opponent selects 1 random card in your hand and calls the type of the card (Monster, Spell, or Trap). If your opponent calls it wrong, the attacking monster is returned to its owner's hand.

attributes.name: Bottomless Shifting Sand
attributes.description: At the end of your opponent's turn, destroy the face-up monster(s) with the highest ATK on the field. During your own Standby Phase, if you have 4 or less cards in your hand, this card is destroyed.

attributes.name: Curse of Royal
attributes.description: Negate the activation and the effect of a Spell or Trap Card that includes the effect of destroying 1 Spell or Trap Card and destroy it.

attributes.name: Needle Ceiling
attributes.description: You can only activate this card when there are 4 or more monsters on the field. Destroy all face-up monsters on the field.

attributes.name: Statue of the Wicked
attributes.description: When this face-down card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, Special Summon 1 "Wicked Token" (Fiend-Type/DARK/Level 4/ATK 1000/DEF 1000) on your side of the field.

attributes.name: Dark Coffin
attributes.description:
When this face-down card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, your opponent selects and executes 1 of the following effects:
- Discard 1 random card in their hand.
- Select 1 monster on their side of the field and destroy it.

attributes.name: Needle Wall
attributes.description: During your Standby Phase, roll a six-sided die once. Treat your opponent's Monster Card Zones as #'s 1-5, counting from your right. Destroy the monster that is in the same Monster Card Zone as the die result. If the result is 6, roll again.

attributes.name: Trap Dustshoot
attributes.description: You can only activate this card when your opponent has 4 or more cards in their hand. Look at your opponent's hand, then select 1 Monster Card and return it to its owner's Deck. Then shuffle the Deck.

attributes.name: Pyro Clock of Destiny
attributes.description: Move the turn count forward by 1 turn. The turn in which this card is activated continues as normal.

attributes.name: Reckless Greed
attributes.description: Draw 2 cards, and after that skip your next 2 Draw Phases.

attributes.name: Pharaoh's Treasure
attributes.description: After activation, put this card face-up in your Deck and shuffle it. When you draw this card, send it to the Graveyard and add 1 card in your Graveyard (except this card) to your hand.

attributes.name: Master Kyonshee
attributes.description: A wandering Kyonshee searching for a strong rival to defeat. They say he was known as the master of all martial arts.

attributes.name: Kabazauls
attributes.description: A huge monster in the shape of a hippopotamus. The sneezing from his gigantic body is so fierce that people mistake it for a hurricane.

attributes.name: Inpachi
attributes.description: A log that attacks lost travelers in the forest. Originally a big tree, it was cut down and possessed by a wicked spirit.

attributes.name: Dark Jeroid
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned, Flip Summoned, or Special Summoned successfully, select 1 face-up monster on the field. As long as the monster remains face-up on the field, decrease its ATK by 800 points.

attributes.name: Newdoria
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, destroy 1 monster on the field.

attributes.name: Helpoemer
attributes.description: If this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, this card's effect is activated. As long as this card is in the Graveyard, your opponent discards 1 card randomly from his/her hand at the end of his/her Battle Phase. This card cannot be Special Summoned from the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Gravekeeper's Spy
attributes.description: FLIP: Special Summon 1 Monster Card that includes "Gravekeeper's" in its card name with an ATK of 1500 or less from your Deck.

attributes.name: Gravekeeper's Curse
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned, Flip Summoned, or Special Summoned, inflict 500 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Gravekeeper's Guard
attributes.description: FLIP: Return 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field to its owner's hand.

attributes.name: Gravekeeper's Spear Soldier
attributes.description: When this card attacks with an ATK that is higher than the DEF of your opponent's Defense Position monster, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Gravekeeper's Vassal
attributes.description: The Battle Damage this card inflicts to your opponent's Life Points is treated as Effect Damage instead.

attributes.name: Gravekeeper's Watcher
attributes.description: When your opponent activates a card that includes an effect whereby your opponent discards from his/her hand, send this card from your hand to the Graveyard to negate the activation and the effect of the card and destroy it.

attributes.name: Gravekeeper's Chief
attributes.description: You can only have 1 "Gravekeeper's Chief" on your side of the field. As long as this card remains on the field, your Graveyard is unaffected by the effect of "Necrovalley". If you Tribute Summon this card successfully, you can Special Summon 1 Monster Card that includes "Gravekeeper's" in its card name from your Graveyard to the field.

attributes.name: Gravekeeper's Cannonholder
attributes.description: Tribute 1 Monster Card on your side of the field that includes "Gravekeeper's" in its card name to inflict 700 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points. You cannot Tribute "Gravekeeper's Cannonholder" for this effect.

attributes.name: Gravekeeper's Assailant
attributes.description: You cannot activate this card's effect unless "Necrovalley" is on the field. When this card declares an attack, you can change the battle position of 1 face-up monster on your opponent's side of the field.

attributes.name: A Man with Wdjat
attributes.description: When you Normal Summon this card, and during each of your Standby Phases, select 1 Set card on your opponent's side of the field. Pick it up and look at it, then return it to its original position.

attributes.name: Mystical Knight of Jackal
attributes.description: When this card destroys 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field and sends it to your opponent's Graveyard as a result of battle, you can then return the card to the top of your opponent's Deck.

attributes.name: A Cat of Ill Omen
attributes.description: FLIP: Select 1 Trap Card from your Deck and place it on top of your Deck. If "Necrovalley" is on the field, you can add the selected Trap Card to your hand instead.

attributes.name: Yomi Ship
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, destroy the monster that destroyed this card.

attributes.name: Winged Sage Falcos
attributes.description: You can return your opponent's face-up Attack Position monster, that this card destroyed and sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, to the top of your opponent's Deck.

attributes.name: An Owl of Luck
attributes.description: FLIP: Select 1 Field Spell Card from your Deck and place it on top of your Deck. If "Necrovalley" is on the field, you can add the selected Field Spell Card to your hand instead.

attributes.name: Charm of Shabti
attributes.description: Discard this card from your hand. Until the End Phase, make the Battle Damage to monsters that include "Gravekeeper's" in their card name 0.

attributes.name: Cobra Jar
attributes.description: FLIP: Special Summon 1 "Poisonous Snake Token" (Reptile-Type/EARTH/3 Stars/ATK 1200/DEF 1200). When the "Poisonous Snake Token" is destroyed as a result of battle, inflict 500 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Spirit Reaper
attributes.description: This card is not destroyed as a result of battle. Destroy this card when it is targeted by the effect of a Spell, Trap, or Effect Monster. If this card successfully attacks your opponent's Life Points directly, your opponent discards 1 card randomly from his/her hand.

attributes.name: Nightmare Horse
attributes.description: This card can attack your opponent's Life Points directly even if there is a monster on your opponent's side of the field.

attributes.name: Reaper on the Nightmare
attributes.description:
"Spirit Reaper" + "Nightmare Horse"
This card is not destroyed as a result of battle. Destroy this card when it is targeted by the effect of a Spell, Trap, or Effect Monster. This card can attack your opponent's Life Points directly even if there is a monster on your opponent's side of the field. If this card successfully attacks your opponent's Life Points directly, your opponent discards 1 card randomly from his/her hand.

attributes.name: Dark Designator
attributes.description: Declare 1 Monster Card name. If the declared card is in your opponent's Deck, add 1 of that card to your opponent's hand.

attributes.name: Card Shuffle
attributes.description: Pay 300 Life Points to use this card's effect. Shuffle either your or your opponent's Deck. You can only use this effect during your turn, once per turn.

attributes.name: Reasoning
attributes.description: Your opponent declares a monster Level. Then pick up cards from the top of your Deck until a monster that can be Normal Summoned is picked up. If that monster is the same Level as the one declared by your opponent, send all picked up cards to the Graveyard. If not, Special Summon the picked up monster and send the remaining cards to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Dark Room of Nightmare
attributes.description: Each time damage, except Battle Damage, is inflicted to your opponent's Life Points, inflict 300 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points. This card's effect is not applied to the effect of "Dark Room of Nightmare".

attributes.name: Different Dimension Capsule
attributes.description: Select 1 card from your Deck and remove it from play face-down. During your 2nd Standby Phase after activation, destroy this card and add the removed card to your hand.

attributes.name: Necrovalley
attributes.description: As long as this card remains on the field, negate the effects of Spell, Trap, and Monster Cards that affect a card(s) in the Graveyard, and neither player can remove cards in the Graveyards from play. Also, as long as this card remains on the field, increase the ATK and DEF of all monsters that include "Gravekeeper's" in their card name by 500 points.

attributes.name: Buster Rancher
attributes.description: Only a monster with an ATK of 1000 points or less can be equipped with this card. During damage calculation, increase the ATK of the monster equipped with this card by 2500 points if the opponent's monster that battles it is in Attack Position and its ATK is 2500 or more, OR if the opponent's monster that battles it is in Defense Position and its DEF is 2500 or more.

attributes.name: Hieroglyph Lithograph
attributes.description: Pay 1000 Life Points. During the current Duel, your hand size limit becomes 7.

attributes.name: Dark Snake Syndrome
attributes.description: Inflict damage to both players' Life Points during each of your Standby Phases. The first damage begins at 200 points and is doubled during each of your following Standby Phases.

attributes.name: Terraforming
attributes.description: Add 1 Field Spell Card from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Banner of Courage
attributes.description: During your Battle Phase only, increase the ATK of all monsters on your side of the field by 200 points.

attributes.name: Metamorphosis
attributes.description: Tribute 1 monster on your side of the field. Special Summon 1 Fusion Monster of the same Level as the Tributed monster from your Fusion Deck.

attributes.name: Royal Tribute
attributes.description: This card can only be activated when "Necrovalley" is on your side of the field. Both players discard all Monster Cards in their hands to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Reversal Quiz
attributes.description: Send all cards in your hand and on your side of the field to the Graveyard. Call the type of card (Spell, Trap, or Monster) on top of your Deck. If you call it right, exchange your current Life Points with your opponent's current ones.

attributes.name: Coffin Seller
attributes.description: Each time Monster Card(s) are sent to your opponent's Graveyard, inflict 300 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Curse of Aging
attributes.description: Discard 1 card from your hand. Decrease the ATK and DEF of all monsters on your opponent's side of the field by 500 points until the end of the turn this card is activated.

attributes.name: Barrel Behind the Door
attributes.description: You can only activate this card when an effect that inflicts damage to your Life Points is activated (except Battle Damage). Switch the Effect Damage you receive to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Raigeki Break
attributes.description: Discard 1 card from your hand. Destroy 1 card on the field.

attributes.name: Narrow Pass
attributes.description: This card can only be activated when both players have 2 monsters or less on their respective sides of the field. Both players can only Normal Summon up to 2 additional monsters on their sides of the field.

attributes.name: Disturbance Strategy
attributes.description: Your opponent adds all cards in his/her hand to the Deck and shuffles the Deck. Your opponent then draws the same number of cards that he/she added to the Deck.

attributes.name: Trap of Board Eraser
attributes.description: You can only activate this card when an effect that inflicts damage to your Life Points is activated (except Battle Damage). Negate the Effect Damage you receive and your opponent then selects 1 card from his/her hand and discards it.

attributes.name: Rite of Spirit
attributes.description: Select 1 Monster Card that includes "Gravekeeper's" in its card name from your Graveyard and Special Summon it. This card's activation and effect are unaffected by "Necrovalley".

attributes.name: Non Aggression Area
attributes.description: You can only activate this card during your Standby Phase. Discard 1 card from your hand. Your opponent cannot Normal Summon, Set and/or Special Summon during his/her next turn.

attributes.name: D. Tribe
attributes.description: All monsters on your side of the field are treated as Dragon-Types until the End Phase of this turn.

attributes.name: Byser Shock
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned, Flip Summoned, or Special Summoned, return all Set cards on the field to their owner's respective hands.

attributes.name: Question
attributes.description: When activating this card, your opponent cannot check cards in the Graveyard. Your opponent calls the name of the first monster found at the bottom of your Graveyard. If he/she calls it right, the monster is removed from play. If he/she calls it wrong, the monster is Special Summoned to your side of the field.

attributes.name: Rope of Life
attributes.description: When 1 of your monsters is sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, discard your entire hand to activate this card. Special Summon the monster to the field, increasing the ATK of the monster by 800 points.

attributes.name: Nightmare Wheel
attributes.description: Select 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field. As long as this card remains face-up on the field, the selected monster cannot attack or change its battle position. During each of your Standby Phases, this card inflicts 500 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points. When the selected monster is removed from the field, destroy this card.

attributes.name: Lava Golem
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by Tributing 2 monsters on your opponent's side of the field, and is Special Summoned to your opponent's side of the field. This card inflicts 1000 points of damage to the Life Points of this card's controller during each of his/her Standby Phases. If you Special Summon this monster, you cannot Normal Summon or Set a monster during the same turn.

attributes.name: Elemental Hero Neos
attributes.description: A new Elemental Hero has arrived from Neo-Space! When he initiates a Contact Fusion with a Neo-Spacian his unknown powers are unleashed.

attributes.name: Sabersaurus
attributes.description: This normally gentle dinosaur enjoys relaxing in its nest in the prairies. If it becomes angered, it turns terribly ferocious.

attributes.name: Neo-Spacian Aqua Dolphin
attributes.description: Once per turn, by discarding 1 card from your hand, look at your opponent's hand and select 1 Monster Card in it. If there is a monster on your side of the field with ATK greater than or equal to the ATK of the selected monster, destroy the selected Monster Card and inflict 500 damage to your opponent. If there is no monster on your side of the field with ATK greater than or equal to the ATK of the selected monster, take 500 damage.

attributes.name: Neo-Spacian Flare Scarab
attributes.description: This card gains 400 ATK for each Spell and Trap Card on your opponent's side of the field.

attributes.name: Neo-Spacian Dark Panther
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can select 1 face-up monster on your opponent's side of the field. While this card is face-up on your side of the field, until the end of this turn this card's name is treated as the selected monster's name, and it gets the selected monster's effect(s).

attributes.name: Chrysalis Dolphin
attributes.description: By Tributing this card while "Neo-Space" is on the field, Special Summon 1 "Neo-Spacian Aqua Dolphin" from your hand or Deck.

attributes.name: Rallis the Star Bird
attributes.description: This card gains ATK equal to the Level of the monster that it battles x 200 during the Damage Step only. If this card attacks, it is removed from play at the end of the Damage Step and returned to your side of the field in face-up Attack Position at the beginning of your next turn's Battle Phase.

attributes.name: Submarineroid
attributes.description: This card can attack your opponent directly. When it does, any Battle Damage this card inflicts to your opponent becomes the original ATK of this card. You can change this card to Defense Position at the end of the Damage Step.

attributes.name: Ambulanceroid
attributes.description: When a "roid" monster is added from your Graveyard to your hand, you can Special Summon that monster.

attributes.name: Decoyroid
attributes.description: While this card is face-up on your side of the field, your opponent cannot select a face-up monster as an attack target except "Decoyroid".

attributes.name: Rescueroid
attributes.description: While this card is face-up on your side of the field, when a "roid" monster on your side of the field is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can return that monster to the hand.

attributes.name: Destiny Hero - Double Dude
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card can attack twice during the same Battle Phase. If this card is destroyed, you can Special Summon 2 "Double Dude Tokens" (Warrior-Type/DARK/Level 4/ATK 1000/DEF 1000) during your next Standby Phase.

attributes.name: Destiny Hero - Defender
attributes.description: If this card is in face-up Defense Position during your opponent's Standby Phase, your opponent draws 1 card.

attributes.name: Destiny Hero - Dogma
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by Tributing 3 monsters, including at least 1 "Destiny Hero" monster. If this card is Special Summoned, halve your opponent's Life Points during your opponent's next Standby Phase.

attributes.name: Destiny Hero - Blade Master
attributes.description: During your opponent's Battle Phase, by discarding this card from your hand, all face-up "Destiny Hero" monsters on your side of the field gain 800 ATK until the end of this turn.

attributes.name: Destiny Hero - Fear Monger
attributes.description: If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, Special Summon 1 "Destiny Hero" monster from your Graveyard (except a "Destiny Hero - Fear Monger") during your next Standby Phase.

attributes.name: Destiny Hero - Dasher
attributes.description: Once per turn, by Tributing 1 monster, this card gains 1000 ATK until the end of this turn. If this card attacks, it is changed to Defense Position at the end of the Battle Phase. While this card is in the Graveyard, one time only, when you draw a Monster Card during your Draw Phase you can show it to your opponent and Special Summon it.

attributes.name: Black Ptera
attributes.description: When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard, except when destroyed by battle, it is returned to the owner's hand.

attributes.name: Black Stego
attributes.description: When this card is selected as an attack target by your opponent's monster, this card is changed to Defense Position.

attributes.name: Ultimate Tyranno
attributes.description: If this card is in Attack Position at the beginning of your Battle Phase, first, you can and must attack all monsters on your opponent's side of the field once each with this card.

attributes.name: Miracle Jurassic Egg
attributes.description: While this card is face-up on your side of the field, this card cannot be removed from play. Place 2 counters on this card each time a Dinosaur-Type Monster Card is sent to your Graveyard. By Tributing this card, select and Special Summon 1 Dinosaur-Type monster from your Deck whose Level is equal to or lower than the number of counters on this card when it was Tributed.

attributes.name: Babycerasaurus
attributes.description: If this card is destroyed by an effect and sent to the Graveyard, select 1 Level 4 or lower Dinosaur-Type monster from your Deck and Special Summon it.

attributes.name: Bitelon
attributes.description: During battle between this attacking card and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of this card, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Alien Grey
attributes.description: FLIP: Place 1 A-Counter on 1 face-up monster on your opponent's side of the field. (If a monster with an A-Counter battles an "Alien" monster, it loses 300 ATK and DEF for each A-Counter during damage calculation only.) After this card has been flipped face-up, when it is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, draw 1 card.

attributes.name: Alien Skull
attributes.description: You can Tribute 1 face-up Level 3 or lower monster on your opponent's side of the field to Special Summon this card to your opponent's side of the field. If you Special Summon this monster this way, place 1 A-Counter on this card, and you cannot Normal Summon or Set the same turn. (If a monster with an A-Counter battles an "Alien" monster, it loses 300 ATK and DEF for each A-Counter during damage calculation only.)

attributes.name: Alien Hunter
attributes.description: If this card destroys a monster with an A-Counter by battle, it can attack once again in a row.

attributes.name: Alien Warrior
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, place 2 A-Counters on the monster that destroyed it. (If a monster with an A-Counter battles an "Alien" monster, it loses 300 ATK and DEF for each A-Counter during damage calculation only.)

attributes.name: Alien Mother
attributes.description: If this card destroys a monster with an A-Counter by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, Special Summon the destroyed monster to your side of the field at the end of the Battle Phase. When this card is removed from the field, all monsters that were Special Summoned by this card's effect are destroyed.

attributes.name: Cosmic Horror Gangi'el
attributes.description: If you're Tributing a monster on your side of the field that is owned by your opponent, this card can be Normal Summoned with 1 Tribute. Once per turn, you can place 1 A-Counter on a monster on your opponent's side of the field. (If a monster with an A-Counter battles an "Alien" monster, it loses 300 ATK and DEF for each A-Counter during damage calculation only.)

attributes.name: Flying Saucer Muusik'i
attributes.description: While this card is face-up on the field, you can select and add 1 "Alien" card from your Deck to your hand instead of conducting your normal draw during your Draw Phase.

attributes.name: Elemental Hero Aqua Neos
attributes.description:
"Elemental Hero Neos" + "Neo-Spacian Aqua Dolphin"
This card can only be Special Summoned from your Fusion Deck by returning the above cards from your side of the field to the Deck. (You do not use "Polymerization".) Once per turn, by discarding 1 card from your hand, select 1 random card from your opponent's hand and destroy it. This card returns to the Fusion Deck during the End Phase.

attributes.name: Elemental Hero Flare Neos
attributes.description:
"Elemental Hero Neos" + "Neo-Spacian Flare Scarab"
This card can only be Special Summoned from your Fusion Deck by returning the above cards from your side of the field to the Deck. (You do not use "Polymerization".) This card gains 400 ATK for each Spell and Trap Card on the field. This card returns to the Fusion Deck during the End Phase.

attributes.name: Elemental Hero Dark Neos
attributes.description:
"Elemental Hero Neos" + "Neo-Spacian Dark Panther"
This card can only be Special Summoned from your Fusion Deck by returning the above cards from your side of the field to the Deck. (You do not use "Polymerization".) You can select 1 face-up Effect Monster on the field if it's not already selected by this card. While this card is face-up on your side of the field, the selected monster's effect is negated until it is removed from the field. (You can select up to 1 monster at a time with this effect.) This card returns to the Fusion Deck during the End Phase.

attributes.name: Chimeratech Overdragon
attributes.description:
"Cyber Dragon" + 1 or more Machine-Type monsters
This monster cannot be Special Summoned except by Fusion Summon. When this card is Fusion Summoned, send all the cards on your side of the field to the Graveyard except this card. The original ATK and DEF of this card become the number of Fusion Material Monsters you used for the Fusion Summon of this card x 800 points. This card can attack as many of your opponent's monsters each turn as the number of Fusion Material Monsters you used for the Fusion Summon of this card.

attributes.name: Ambulance Rescueroid
attributes.description:
"Rescueroid" + "Ambulanceroid"
This monster cannot be Special Summoned except by Fusion Summon. Once per turn, when a monster on your side of the field is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon that monster in Defense Position.

attributes.name: Super Vehicroid Jumbo Drill
attributes.description:
"Steamroid" + "Drillroid" + "Submarineroid"
A Fusion Summon of this card can only be conducted with the above Fusion Material Monsters. During battle between this attacking card and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of this card, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Contact
attributes.description: Send all "Chrysalis" monsters from your side of the field to the Graveyard, and Special Summon 1 monster from your hand or Deck that is written in the card text of those cards.

attributes.name: Fake Hero
attributes.description: Special Summon 1 "Elemental Hero" monster from your hand. This turn, that monster cannot attack, and returns to its owner's hand during the End Phase.

attributes.name: Spell Calling
attributes.description: When this face-down card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard by the effect of a Spell or Trap Card controlled by your opponent, select 1 Quick-Play Spell Card from your Deck and Set it after showing it to your opponent.

attributes.name: Vehicroid Connection Zone
attributes.description: Send to the Graveyard, from your side of the field or your hand, Fusion Material Monsters that are listed on a "Vehicroid" Fusion Monster Card, and Special Summon that Fusion Monster from your Fusion Deck. (This Special Summon is treated as a Fusion Summon.) The Fusion Monster Special Summoned by this card cannot be destroyed by the effects of Spells, Traps, and Effect Monsters, and its effects cannot be negated.

attributes.name: D - Spirit
attributes.description: If there are no face-up "Destiny Hero" monsters on your side of the field, you can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Destiny Hero" monster from your hand.

attributes.name: Overload Fusion
attributes.description: Remove from play, from your side of the field or your Graveyard, Fusion Material Monsters that are listed on a DARK Machine-Type Fusion Monster Card, and Special Summon that 1 Fusion Monster from your Fusion Deck. (This Special Summon is treated as a Fusion Summon.)

attributes.name: Cyclone Blade
attributes.description: Equip only to a "Destiny Hero" monster. If the equipped monster attacks, destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card on the field at the end of the Damage Step.

attributes.name: Future Fusion
attributes.description: Send, from your Deck to the Graveyard, Fusion Material Monsters that are listed on a Fusion Monster Card, and select that 1 Fusion Monster from your Fusion Deck. Special Summon the selected Fusion Monster during your 2nd Standby Phase after this card's activation. (This Special Summon is treated as a Fusion Summon.) When this card is removed from the field, destroy that monster.  When the monster is destroyed, destroy this card.

attributes.name: Common Soul
attributes.description: Select 1 face-up monster on the field to activate this card. Special Summon 1 "Neo-Spacian" monster from your hand to the same side of the field as the selected monster. The selected monster gains ATK equal to the ATK of the monster that was Special Summoned by this effect. When this card is removed from the field, return the monster that was Special Summoned by this card's effect to the hand.

attributes.name: Neo Space
attributes.description: "Elemental Hero Neos" and all Fusion Monsters that list "Elemental Hero Neos" as a Fusion Material Monster gain 500 ATK. Fusion Monsters that list "Elemental Hero Neos" as a Fusion Material Monster do not have to have their effects activated that return them to the Fusion Deck during the End Phase.

attributes.name: Mausoleum of the Emperor
attributes.description: Both players can Normal Summon or Set monsters without Tribute(s) by paying 1000 Life Points x the number of monsters needed to Tribute Summon them.

attributes.name: Dark City
attributes.description: When a "Destiny Hero" monster attacks, if its ATK is lower than the ATK of the attack target, the attacking monster gains 1000 ATK during damage calculation only.

attributes.name: Destiny Mirage
attributes.description: Activate only when a "Destiny Hero" monster on your side of the field is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard by your opponent's card effect. Special Summon to your side of the field all "Destiny Hero" monsters that were destroyed and sent to the Graveyard this turn.

attributes.name: D - Chain
attributes.description: After activation, this card is treated as an Equip Card, and equip it to a "Destiny Hero" monster on your side of the field. The equipped monster gains 500 ATK. When the equipped monster destroys a monster your opponent controls by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Crop Circles

Select from your Deck 1 "Alien" monster whose Level is equal to the total Levels of the sent monsters, and Special Summon it. If you fail to find a monster to Special Summon, you take 2000 damage.

attributes.name: The Paths of Destiny

attributes.name: Orbital Bombardment
attributes.description: Send 1 "Alien" monster from your side of the field to the Graveyard to activate this card. Destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card on the field.

Unless the selected card or a card with the same name is Normal Summoned or activated by the end of your next turn, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. If the selected card or a card with the same name is Normal Summoned or activated by the end of your next turn, you take 1000 damage.

attributes.name: Wonder Garage
attributes.description: When this face-down card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Machine-Type "roid" monster from your hand.

attributes.name: Cyber Summon Blaster

attributes.name: Fossil Excavation

When this card is removed from the field, destroy that monster. When the monster is destroyed, destroy this card.

attributes.name: Synthetic Seraphim

attributes.name: Brainwashing Beam

During each of your End Phases, remove 1 A-Counter from that controlled monster. If all A-Counters are removed from that monster, or that monster is destroyed, destroy this card.

"Elemental Hero Heat" + "Elemental Hero Lady Heat"

"Relinquished" + "Thousand-Eyes Idol"

attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon 2 "Regenerating Rose Tokens" (Plant-Type/DARK/Level 3/ATK 1200/DEF 1200).

attributes.name: Yubel
attributes.description: This card cannot be destroyed by battle. You take no Battle Damage from battles involving this card. When this face-up Attack Position card is attacked by an opponent's monster, before damage calculation inflict damage to your opponent equal to that monster's ATK. During your End Phase, Tribute 1 monster or destroy this card. When this card is destroyed, except by its own effect, you can Special Summon 1 "Yubel - Terror Incarnate" from your hand, Deck, or Graveyard.

attributes.name: Yubel - Terror Incarnate
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except with the effect of "Yubel". This card cannot be destroyed by battle. You take no Battle Damage from battles involving this card. When this face-up Attack Position card is attacked by an opponent's monster, before damage calculation inflict damage to your opponent equal to that monster's ATK. During your End Phase, destroy all other monsters on the field. When this face-up card is removed from the field, you can Special Summon 1 "Yubel - The Ultimate Nightmare" from your hand, Deck, or Graveyard.

attributes.name: Yubel - The Ultimate Nightmare
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except with the effect of "Yubel - Terror Incarnate". This card cannot be destroyed by battle. You take no Battle Damage from battles involving this card. If this face-up Attack Position card battles an opponent's monster, inflict damage equal to its ATK to your opponent and destroy that monster at the end of the Damage Step.

attributes.name: Armored Cybern
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can equip this card to a "Cyber Dragon" you control, or to a Fusion Monster you control that lists "Cyber Dragon" as a Fusion Material Monster, OR unequip it to Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. Once per turn, while equipped to a monster by this effect, you can decrease the equipped monster's ATK by 1000 and destroy 1 face-up monster. (A monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the equipped monster would be destroyed, destroy this card instead.)

attributes.name: Cyber Valley
attributes.description:
You can use 1 of the following 3 effects:
- When this card is selected as an attack target by an opponent's monster, you can remove this card from play to draw 1 card and end the Battle Phase.
- You can remove from play this card and 1 face-up monster you control, and draw 2 cards.
- You can remove from play this card and 1 card from your hand, and place 1 card from your Graveyard on top of your Deck.

attributes.name: Cyber Ouroboros
attributes.description: When this card is removed from play, you can send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard to draw 1 card.

attributes.name: Volcanic Counter
attributes.description: When you take Battle Damage while this card is in your Graveyard, remove it from play. Then, if there is a FIRE monster other than "Volcanic Counter" in your Graveyard, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the amount of Battle Damage you took.

attributes.name: Fire Trooper
attributes.description: When this card is Summoned, you can send it to the Graveyard to inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Destiny Hero - Dunker
attributes.description: You can send 1 "Destiny Hero" card from your hand to the Graveyard to inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Destiny Hero - Departed
attributes.description: During your Standby Phase, if this card is in your Graveyard, Special Summon it in face-up Attack Position on your opponent's side of the field. If this card is destroyed by battle, remove it from play instead of sending it to the Graveyard. If a card effect would send this card to the Graveyard from the hand or Deck, remove it from play instead.

attributes.name: Dark Horus
attributes.description: Once per turn, when a Spell Card is activated during your opponent's Main Phase, you can Special Summon 1 Level 4 DARK monster from your Graveyard.

attributes.name: The Dark Creator
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned, by having 5 or more DARK monsters in your Graveyard while you control no monsters. Once per turn, you can remove from play 1 DARK monster from your Graveyard to Special Summon 1 DARK monster from your Graveyard.

attributes.name: Dark Nephthys
attributes.description: If this card is in your hand and there are 3 or more DARK monsters in your Graveyard, you can remove from play 2 of them to send it to the Graveyard. If this card is sent to the Graveyard by this effect, Special Summon it during your next Standby Phase. When this card is Special Summoned, destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card.

attributes.name: Dark Armed Dragon
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by having exactly 3 DARK monsters in your Graveyard. You can remove from play 1 DARK monster from your Graveyard to destroy 1 card on the field.

attributes.name: Dark Crusader
attributes.description: You can send 1 DARK monster from your hand to the Graveyard to have this card gain 400 ATK.

attributes.name: Armageddon Knight
attributes.description: When this card is Summoned, you can send 1 DARK monster from your Deck to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Doomsday Horror
attributes.description: The ATK and DEF of this card are each equal to the number of removed from play DARK monsters x 300. When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, return all removed from play DARK monsters to their owners' Graveyards.

attributes.name: Obsidian Dragon
attributes.description: Negate the effects of Spell and Trap Cards that target only 1 face-up DARK monster you control, and destroy them.

attributes.name: Shadowpriestess of Ohm
attributes.description: You can Tribute 1 face-up DARK monster you control to inflict 800 damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Gemini Lancer
attributes.description:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it be treated as an Effect Monster with this effect:
- During battle between this attacking card and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of this card, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Gigaplant
attributes.description:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it be treated as an Effect Monster with this effect:
- Once per turn, you can Special Summon 1 Insect-Type or Plant-Type monster from your hand or Graveyard.

attributes.name: Future Samurai
attributes.description:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it be treated as an Effect Monster with this effect:
- Once per turn, you can remove from play 1 monster from your Graveyard to destroy 1 face-up monster.

attributes.name: Vengeful Shinobi
attributes.description: When this face-up Attack Position card is selected as an attack target, draw 1 card.

attributes.name: The Immortal Bushi
attributes.description: This card cannot be Tributed, except for the Tribute Summon of a Warrior-Type monster. During your Standby Phase, if this card is in your Graveyard and you control no monsters, you can Special Summon it. You cannot activate this effect if there are any monsters in your Graveyard that are not Warrior-Type.

attributes.name: Field-Commander Rahz
attributes.description: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned, select 1 Level 4 or lower Warrior-Type monster from your Deck, except "Field-Commander Rahz", and place it on top of your Deck.

attributes.name: Gladiator Beast Darius
attributes.description: When this card is Special Summoned by the effect of a "Gladiator Beast" monster, you can select 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster from your Graveyard and Special Summon it. That monster's effect(s) is negated, and it is returned to your Deck when this card is removed from the field. At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card attacked or was attacked, you can return it to the Deck to Special Summon 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster from your Deck, except "Gladiator Beast Darius".

attributes.name: Imprisoned Queen Archfiend
attributes.description: This card's controller pays 1000 Life Points during each of their Standby Phases (this is not optional). During your Standby Phase, if "Pandemonium" is on the field and this card is in your Graveyard, 1 Level 4 or lower Fiend-Type monster gains 1000 ATK until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Black Veloci
attributes.description: If this card attacks an opponent's monster, this card gains 400 ATK during the Damage Step only. If this card is attacked by an opponent's monster, this card loses 400 ATK during the Damage Step only.

attributes.name: Superancient Deepsea King Coelacanth
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can discard 1 card to Special Summon as many Level 4 or lower Fish-Type monsters as possible from your Deck. A monster Special Summoned by this effect cannot declare an attack and its effect(s) is negated while on the field. If this card is targeted by a Spell, Trap, or Effect Monster's effect, you can Tribute 1 other Fish-Type monster to negate the effect and destroy that card.

attributes.name: Cannon Soldier MK-2
attributes.description: You can Tribute 2 monsters to inflict 1500 damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: The Calculator
attributes.description: This card's ATK is equal to the combined Levels of all monsters you control x 300.

attributes.name: Sea Koala
attributes.description: Once per turn, if you control another Beast-Type monster, you can reduce the ATK of 1 monster your opponent controls to 0 until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Blue Thunder T-45
attributes.description: When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle, Special Summon 1 "Thunder Option Token" (Machine-Type/LIGHT/Level 4/ATK 1500/DEF 1500). This Token cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon.

attributes.name: Magnetic Mosquito
attributes.description: FLIP: Destroy all face-up Machine-Type monsters on the field.

attributes.name: Earth Effigy
attributes.description: This card can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of an EARTH Normal Monster.

attributes.name: Wind Effigy
attributes.description: This card can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a WIND Normal Monster.

attributes.name: Neo-Spacian Twinkle Moss
attributes.description:
This card's name is also treated as "Neo-Spacian Glow Moss". This card cannot be Special Summoned except with "NEX". When this card attacks or is attacked, draw 1 card. Reveal that card, and based on its type apply the proper effect:
- Monster: End the Battle Phase.
- Spell: You can change this card's attack to a direct attack.
- Trap: This monster is changed to Defense Position.

attributes.name: Elemental Hero Storm Neos
attributes.description:
"Elemental Hero Neos" + "Neo-Spacian Air Hummingbird" + "Neo-Spacian Aqua Dolphin"
This card can only be Special Summoned from your Fusion Deck by returning the above cards you control to the Deck. (You do not use "Polymerization".) Once per turn, you can destroy all Spell and Trap Cards on the field. This card returns to the Fusion Deck during the End Phase. When this card is returned to the Fusion Deck by this effect, return all cards on the field to the Deck.

attributes.name: Rainbow Neos
attributes.description:
"Elemental Hero Neos" + "Rainbow Dragon" or "Rainbow Dark Dragon"
This card cannot be Special Summoned, except by Fusion Summon with the above Fusion Material Monsters. Once per turn, you can activate 1 of the following effects:
- Send 1 monster you control to the Graveyard to return all monsters your opponent controls to the Deck.
- Send 1 Spell or Trap Card you control to the Graveyard to return all Spell and Trap Cards your opponent controls to the Deck.
- Send 1 card from the top of your Deck to the Graveyard to return all cards in your opponent's Graveyard to the Deck.

attributes.name: Rainbow Veil
attributes.description: If the equipped monster battles an opponent's monster, while that monster is on the field its effect(s) is negated during the Battle Phase only.

attributes.name: Super Polymerization
attributes.description: Discard 1 card. Send, from either side of the field to the Graveyard, Fusion Material Monsters that are listed on a Fusion Monster Card, and Special Summon that Monster from your Fusion Deck. (This Special Summon is treated as a Fusion Summon.) Spells, Traps and Effect Monsters' effects cannot be activated in response to this card's activation.

attributes.name: Vicious Claw
attributes.description: The equipped monster gains 300 ATK. If the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle, return this card to its owner's hand instead. Then, destroy 1 monster, except the one that battled the equipped monster, and inflict 600 damage to your opponent. After that, Special Summon 1 "Evil Token" (Fiend-Type/DARK/Level 7/ATK 2500/DEF 2500) on your opponent's side of the field. During the turn this card is returned to your hand, you cannot use "Vicious Claw" from your hand.

attributes.name: Instant Neo Space
attributes.description: Equip only to a Fusion Monster that lists "Elemental Hero Neos" as a Fusion Material Monster. The equipped monster does not have to have its effect activated that returns itself to the Fusion Deck during the End Phase. When the equipped monster is removed from the field, you can Special Summon 1 "Elemental Hero Neos" from your hand, Deck or Graveyard.

attributes.name: Mirage Tube
attributes.description: This card cannot be activated from your hand. Activate only when a face-up monster you control is selected as an attack target. Inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Spell Chronicle
attributes.description: Send all cards in your hand to the Graveyard. Select and remove from play 5 Spell or Trap Cards from your Deck. Each time your opponent activates a Spell Card, place 1 Chronicle Counter on this card. You can remove 2 Chronicle Counters from this card to have your opponent select 1 of the cards removed from play with this card's effect, and add it to your hand. When this card is removed from the field, you take 500 damage for each card that is still removed from play due to this card's effect.

attributes.name: Dimension Explosion
attributes.description: Return 1 face-up Fusion Monster you control to the Fusion Deck. Both players select up to 2 of their monsters that are removed from play, and Special Summon them.

attributes.name: Cybernetic Zone
attributes.description: Select 1 face-up Machine-Type Fusion Monster you control and remove it from play until the End Phase of this turn. When that monster is returned to the field, double its ATK. During your next Standby Phase, destroy it.

attributes.name: The Beginning of the End
attributes.description: Activate only if there are 7 or more DARK monsters in your Graveyard. Remove from play 5 DARK monsters from your Graveyard to draw 3 cards.

attributes.name: Dark Eruption
attributes.description: Add 1 DARK monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Graveyard to your hand.

attributes.name: Fires of Doomsday
attributes.description: If you activate this card, you cannot Summon other monsters this turn. Special Summon 2 "Doomsday Tokens" (Fiend-Type/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Defense Position. These tokens cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon, unless it is for a DARK monster.

attributes.name: Unleash Your Power!
attributes.description: All Gemini Monsters that were on your side of the field when this card was activated are treated as Effect Monsters, and gain their effect(s). During the End Phase of this turn, Set all monsters affected by this card's effect.

attributes.name: Chain Summoning
attributes.description: Activate only as Chain Link 3 or higher. You can Normal Summon or Set up to 3 times this turn. You cannot activate this card if multiple cards/effects with the same name are in that Chain.

attributes.name: Acidic Downpour
attributes.description: All EARTH monsters lose 500 ATK and gain 400 DEF.

attributes.name: Six Samurai United
attributes.description: Each time a "Six Samurai" monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned, place 1 Bushido Counter on this card (max. 2). You can send this card to the Graveyard to draw 1 card for each Bushido Counter on this card.

attributes.name: Gladiator Beast's Battle Archfiend Shield
attributes.description: Equip only to a "Gladiator Beast" monster. If the equipped monster would be destroyed, this card is destroyed instead. When the equipped monster is returned from your side of the field to the Deck and this card is sent to the Graveyard, return this card to your hand.

attributes.name: Gladiator Proving Ground
attributes.description: Add 1 Level 4 or lower "Gladiator Beast" monster from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Dark World Grimoire
attributes.description: During your End Phase, if you discard a Monster Card(s) to the Graveyard because you had more than 6 cards in your hand, you can Special Summon 1 of those monsters.

attributes.name: Rainbow Path
attributes.description: Activate only by sending 1 "Crystal Beast" card from your Spell and Trap Card Zone to the Graveyard when an opponent's monster declares an attack. Negate the attack, then you can add 1 "Rainbow Dragon" or "Rainbow Dark Dragon" from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Rainbow Life
attributes.description: Discard 1 card. Until the end of this turn, whenever you would take damage you gain that amount of Life Points instead.

attributes.name: Sinister Seeds
attributes.description: Activate only when a face-up Attack Position monster you control is destroyed by battle. Special Summon 1 "Sinister Seed Token" (Plant-Type/DARK/Level 1/ATK 100/DEF 100) for every 500 points of Battle Damage you took from that battle.

attributes.name: Hate Buster
attributes.description: Activate only when a face-up Fiend-Type monster you control is selected as an attack target. Destroy the attacking monster and the attack target monster, and inflict damage to your opponent equal to the original ATK of the attacking monster.

attributes.name: Chain Material
attributes.description: Any time you Fusion Summon a monster this turn, you can remove from play, from your side of the field, Deck, hand or Graveyard, Fusion Material Monsters that are listed on the Fusion Monster Card, and use them as Fusion Material Monsters. You cannot attack during the turn this card is activated. If you used this effect for a Fusion Summon, the Summoned Fusion Monster(s) is destroyed during the End Phase.

attributes.name: Alchemy Cycle
attributes.description: The original ATK of all face-up monsters you control becomes 0, until the End Phase. Each time a monster that had its original ATK reduced to 0 by this effect is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, draw 1 card.

attributes.name: Cybernetic Hidden Technology
attributes.description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack, you can send 1 "Cyber Dragon" you control, or a Fusion Monster you control that lists "Cyber Dragon" as a Fusion Material Monster to the Graveyard. Destroy the attacking monster.

attributes.name: Dark Spirit Art - Greed
attributes.description: Tribute 1 DARK monster. Draw 2 cards. Your opponent can negate this effect by revealing 1 Spell Card in their hand.

attributes.name: Dark Illusion
attributes.description: Negate the activation of a Spell Card, Trap Card, or Effect Monster's effect that targets a face-up DARK monster, and destroy that card.

attributes.name: Escape from the Dark Dimension
attributes.description: Select 1 of your removed from play DARK monsters and Special Summon it. When this card is removed from the field, destroy and remove from play that monster. When that monster is destroyed, destroy this card.

attributes.name: Gemini Trap Hole
attributes.description: Activate only when a Gemini Monster that is treated as an Effect Monster is destroyed by battle. Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Drastic Drop Off
attributes.description: Activate only when your opponent adds a card(s) from their Deck to their hand, including drawing a card(s). Your opponent discards 1 of those cards.

attributes.name: All-Out Attacks
attributes.description: All monsters that are Special Summoned are changed to face-up Attack Position and must attack, if able, during the turn they are Special Summoned.

attributes.name: Double Tag Team
attributes.description: Activate only when you Special Summon a "Gladiator Beast" monster. Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Gladiator Beast" monster from your hand or Deck.

attributes.name: Offering to the Snake Deity
attributes.description: Destroy 1 Reptile-Type monster you control and 2 cards your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Cry Havoc!
attributes.description: You can remove from play 1 monster from your Graveyard to Normal Summon or Set 1 Normal Monster from your hand. You can only activate this effect during your Main Phase.

attributes.name: Transmigration Break
attributes.description: Any cards that would be returned to the Deck from the Graveyard are removed from play instead.

attributes.name: Fine
attributes.description: Discard 2 cards.

attributes.name: Darklord Zerato
attributes.description: If there are 4 or more DARK monsters with different names in your Graveyard, you can Tribute Summon this monster by Tributing 1 DARK monster. You can send 1 DARK monster from your hand to the Graveyard to destroy all monsters your opponent controls. If you activate this effect, destroy this card during the End Phase of this turn.

attributes.name: Darknight Parshath
attributes.description: When this card destroys an opponent's monster, you can remove from play 1 DARK monster from your Graveyard to draw 1 card. This card gains 100 ATK for each DARK monster in your Graveyard.

attributes.name: Deepsea Macrotrema
attributes.description: When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard, all face-up WATER monsters you control gain 500 ATK until the end of this turn.

attributes.name: Allure of Darkness
attributes.description: Draw 2 cards, then remove from play 1 DARK monster from your hand. If you don't have any DARK monsters in your hand to remove, send all cards in your hand to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Metabo Globster
attributes.description: When you Tribute this card for the Tribute Summon of a DARK monster, Special Summon 3 "Metabo Tokens" (Fiend-Type/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Defense Position. These tokens cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon.

attributes.name: Golden Flying Fish
attributes.description: You can Tribute 1 other Fish-Type monster to destroy 1 card on the field.

attributes.name: Prime Material Dragon
attributes.description: Any effect that would inflict damage to a player instead increases their Life Points by the same amount. When a card's effect to destoy a monster(s) on the field is activated, you can send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard to negate its activation and destroy the card.

attributes.name: Lonefire Blossom
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can Tribute 1 face-up Plant-Type monster to Special Summon 1 Plant-Type monster from your Deck.

attributes.name: Aztekipede, The Worm Warrior
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by removing from play 1 Insect-Type monster from your Graveyard. When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, send the top card of their Deck to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Vampire's Curse
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can pay 500 Life Points. If you do, Special Summon it during the next turn's Standby Phase. When this card is Special Summoned this way, it gains 500 ATK.

attributes.name: Castle Gate
attributes.description: This card cannot be destroyed by battle. Once per turn, if this card is in face-up Attack Position, you can Tribute 1 Level 5 or lower monster to inflict damage to your opponent equal to that monster's original ATK.

attributes.name: Dark-Eyes Illusionist
attributes.description: FLIP: Select 1 monster. While this card remains face-up on the field that monster cannot attack.

attributes.name: Legendary Fiend
attributes.description: During each of your Standby Phases, this card gains 700 ATK.

attributes.name: Metal Reflect Slime
attributes.description: After activation, Special Summon this card in Defense Position; it is treated as an Effect Monster Card (Aqua-Type/WATER/Level 10/ATK 0/DEF 3000). This card cannot attack. (This card is still treated as a Trap Card.)

attributes.name: Zoma the Spirit
attributes.description: After activation, Special Summon this card in Defense Position; it is treated as an Effect Monster Card (Zombie-Type/DARK/Level 4/ATK 1800/DEF 500). If this card is destroyed by battle, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the monster that destroyed it. (This card is still treated as a Trap Card.)

attributes.name: Call of the Earthbound
attributes.description: Activate only when an opponent's monster declares an attack. You select the target of the attack.

attributes.name: Dark Red Enchanter
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned, put 2 Spell Counters onit. Each time a Spell Card is activated, put 1 Spell Counter on this card. It gains 300 ATK for each Spell Counter on it. Once per turn, you can remove 2 Spell Counters from this card to make your opponent discard 1 random card.

attributes.name: Goblin Zombie
attributes.description: When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, send the top card of their Deck to the Graveyard. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard, add 1 Zombie-Type monster with 1200 or less DEF from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Belial - Marquis of Darkness
attributes.description: Your opponent cannot select any monster you control, except "Belial - Marquis of Darkness", as an attack target, or as a target of a Spell or Trap Card.

attributes.name: Dark Grepher
attributes.description: You can discard 1 Level 5 or higher DARK monster to Special Summon this card from your hand. Once per turn, you can discard 1 DARK monster to send 1 DARK from your Deck to your Graveyard.

attributes.name: Woodborg Inpachi
attributes.description: The new form of the enigmatic Inpachi, remodeled by cutting-edge Dark World technology. Maneuverability has been sacrificed for strong armor, which was considered more important.

attributes.name: Mighty Guard
attributes.description: A machine soldier that was developed as a guard. It is made of rust-proof metal.

attributes.name: Bokoichi the Freightening Car
attributes.description: A freight car that is exclusively for Dekoichi. It can transport anything, but most cargo arrives broken.

attributes.name: Harpie Girl
attributes.description: A Harpie chick who aspires to flit about beautifully and gorgeously, but attack sharply.

attributes.name: The Creator
attributes.description: Select 1 monster from your Graveyard. Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard and Special Summon the selected monster. You can only use this effect once per turn. This card cannot be Special Summoned from the Graveyard.

attributes.name: The Creator Incarnate
attributes.description: Tribute this card to Special Summon 1 "The Creator" from your hand.

attributes.name: Ultimate Insect LV3
attributes.description: If this card was Special Summoned by the effect of "Ultimate Insect LV1", as long as this card remains on the field, decrease the ATK of all your opponent's monsters by 300 points. During your Standby Phase, send this face-up card to the Graveyard to Special Summon 1 "Ultimate Insect LV5" from your hand or Deck. (You cannot activate this effect the turn this card is Normal Summoned, Special Summoned, or flipped face-up.)

attributes.name: Mystic Swordsman LV6
attributes.description: If you Normal Summon this card, you must place it in face-down Defense Position. If this card attacks a face-down Defense Position monster, destroy the monster immediately with this card's effect without flipping it face-up or applying damage calculation. You can return the monster destroyed with this effect to the top of your opponent's Deck instead of sending it to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Silent Swordsman LV3
attributes.description: Negate the effects of your opponent's Spell Cards that designate this card. During your Standby Phase, send this face-up card to the Graveyard to Special Summon 1 "Silent Swordsman LV5" from your hand or Deck. (You cannot activate this effect the turn this card is Normal Summoned, Special Summoned, or flipped face-up.)

attributes.name: Nightmare Penguin
attributes.description: When this card is flipped face-up, return 1 card on your opponent's side of the field to the owner's hand. As long as this card remains face-up on the field, increase the ATK of all WATER monsters on your side of the field by 200 points.

attributes.name: Heavy Mech Support Platform
attributes.description: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you control this monster on the field, you can equip it to a face-up Machine-Type monster on your side of the field as an Equip Spell Card, OR unequip the Union equipment and Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. When equipped to a monster by this card's effect, that monster's ATK/DEF is increased by 500 points. (1 monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the monster that this card is equipped to is destroyed, this card is destroyed instead.)

attributes.name: Perfect Machine King
attributes.description: Increase the ATK of this card by 500 points for each Machine-Type monster on the field other than this card.

attributes.name: Element Magician
attributes.description:
This monster gets the following effect(s) while there is a monster(s) with the following Attribute(s) on the field:
- WATER: Control of this card cannot switch.
- WIND: If this card destroyed your opponent's monster as a result of battle, it can attack once again in a row.

attributes.name: Element Saurus
attributes.description:
This monster gets the following effect(s) while there is a monster(s) with the following Attribute(s) on the field:
- FIRE: Increase the ATK of this card by 500 points.
- EARTH: Negate the effect of an Effect Monster that is destroyed by this monster as a result of battle.

attributes.name: Roc from the Valley of Haze
attributes.description: When this card is sent directly from your hand to the Graveyard, add this card to the Deck and shuffle it.

attributes.name: Sasuke Samurai #4
attributes.description: If this card battles a monster, toss a coin and call heads or tails before damage calculation. If you call it right, destroy the opponent's monster with this effect.

attributes.name: Harpie Lady 1
attributes.description: This card's name is treated as "Harpie Lady". As long as this card remains on the field, increase the ATK of all WIND monsters by 300 points.

attributes.name: Harpie Lady 2
attributes.description: This card's name is treated as "Harpie Lady". Negate the effects of any Flip Effect Monsters that are destroyed by this monster as a result of battle.

attributes.name: Harpie Lady 3
attributes.description: This card's name is treated as "Harpie Lady". Your opponent's monster that battles with this card cannot declare an attack for your opponent's next 2 turns.

attributes.name: Raging Flame Sprite
attributes.description: This card can attack your opponent's Life Points directly. Each time this card successfully attacks directly, increase the ATK of this card by 1000 points.

attributes.name: Thestalos the Firestorm Monarch
attributes.description: When this card is Tribute Summoned successfully, randomly discard 1 card from your opponent's hand to the Graveyard. If the discarded card was a Monster Card, inflict damage to your opponent's Life Points equal to the Level of the monster x 100 points.

attributes.name: Eagle Eye
