attributes.description: You can send 1 Level 8 or higher monster from your hand to the Graveyard and Special Summon this card. If you Tribute this card for the Tribute Summon of a Level 7 or higher monster, that monster cannot be destroyed by card effects.

attributes.name: Moja
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can add 1 Level 4 Beast-Type monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

attributes.name: Beast Striker
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can discard 1 card to Special Summon 1 "Moja" from your Deck.

attributes.name: King of the Beasts
attributes.description: You can tribute 1 "Moja" you control to Special Summon this card from your Hand or Graveyard. There can only be 1 face-up "King of the Beasts" on the field.

attributes.name: Swallow's Nest
attributes.description: Tribute 1 face-up Winged Beast-Type monster you control to Special Summon 1 Winged Beast-Type monster from your Deck with the same Level as the Tributed monster.

attributes.name: Overwhelm
attributes.description: Activate only when you control a face-up Level 7 or higher monster that was Tribute Summoned. Negate the effect of a Trap Card or an Effect Monster Card and destroy it.

attributes.name: Berserking
attributes.description: Once per turn, during your Main Phase or your opponent's Battle Phase, you can select 2 face-up Beast-Type monsters on the Field. Until the end of the turn, 1 of the selected monsters loses half its ATK, and the other monster gains an equal amount of ATK.

attributes.name: Spell of Pain
attributes.description: Activate only when an effect is activated that would inflict effect damage to you. Switch the effect damage to your opponent's Life Points, instead.

attributes.name: Light End Dragon
attributes.description:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner LIGHT monsters
When this card attacks, you can have it lose 500 ATK and DEF (permanently) and have the opponent's monster that this card is battling lose 1500 ATK and DEF until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Chaos-End Master
attributes.description: If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon 1 Level 5 or higher monster with 1600 ATK or less from your Deck.

attributes.name: Sphere of Chaos
attributes.description: This card's Attribute is also treated as LIGHT. Once per turn, this card cannot be destroyed by battle. When this card is Tribute Summoned, you can add 1 Level 3 or lower monster from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Snowman Eater
attributes.description: When this card is flipped face-up, destroy 1 face-up monster on the field.

attributes.name: Tree Otter
attributes.description: Once per turn, if you control another face-up Beast-Type monster, you can have 1 face-up monster you control gain 1000 ATK until the End Phase.

attributes.name: Ojama Red
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned, you can Special Summon up to 4 "Ojama" monsters from your hand in Attack Position.

attributes.name: Ojama Blue
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can add 2 "Ojama" cards from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Ojama Country
attributes.description: Once per turn, by sending 1 "Ojama" card from your hand to the Graveyard, Special Summon 1 "Ojama" monster from your Graveyard. If you control a face-up "Ojama" monster, switch the Original ATK and DEF of all face-up monsters on the field.

attributes.name: Emperor Sem
attributes.description: While you control this face-up card, when you successfully Tribute Summon a monster, both players may select 1 card in their Graveyard and place it on top of their Deck.

attributes.name: Dark Magician Knight
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by the effect of "Knight's Title". If this card is Special Summoned successfully, select 1 card on the field and destroy it.

attributes.name: Knight's Title
attributes.description: Activate this card by offering 1 face-up "Dark Magician" on your side of the field as a Tribute. Special Summon 1 "Dark Magician Knight" from your hand, Deck or Graveyard.

attributes.name: Sage's Stone
attributes.description: You can only activate this card when there is a face-up "Dark Magician Girl" on your side of the field. Special Summon 1 "Dark Magician" from your hand or Deck.

attributes.name: Super Conductor Tyranno
attributes.description: Once per turn, by Tributing 1 monster, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. This monster cannot declare an attack if you used this effect this turn.

attributes.name: Big Evolution Pill
attributes.description: Tribute 1 Dinosaur-Type monster to activate this card. This card remains face-up on the field for 3 of your opponent's turns. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon or Set Dinosaur-Type monsters without Tributing.

attributes.name: Tail Swipe
attributes.description: Select 1 face-up Level 5 or higher Dinosaur-Type monster on your side of the field to activate this card. Select and return to the owner's hand(s) up to 2 monsters that are either lower Level than the selected monster or face-down on your opponent's side of the field.

attributes.name: Jurassic World
attributes.description: All face-up Dinosaur-Type monsters gain 300 ATK and DEF.

attributes.name: Hunting Instinct
attributes.description: Activate only when a monster is Special Summoned to your opponent's side of the field. Special Summon 1 Dinosaur-Type monster from your hand.

attributes.name: Survival Instinct
attributes.description: Select any number of Dinosaur-Type monsters in your Graveyard and remove them from play. Gain 400 Life Points for each Dinosaur-Type monster you removed.

attributes.name: Volcanic Eruption
attributes.description: Activate only during your End Phase while "Jurassic World" is on your side of the field. Destroy all cards on the field.

attributes.name: Seismic Shockwave
attributes.description: Activate only when a Dinosaur-Type monster on your side of the field is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard. Select 3 of your opponent's Spell and Trap Card Zones. You cannot select a Zone if a card is already in it. The selected Zones cannot be used. Destroy this card during your 3rd Standby Phase after activation. Then you can return 1 Dinosaur-Type monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

attributes.name: Five-Headed Dragon
attributes.description: The Fusion Material Monsters for this card are any 5 Dragon-Type monsters. This monster cannot be Special Summoned except by Fusion Summon. This card does not take any Battle Damage and cannot be destroyed by battle with an EARTH, WATER, FIRE, WIND, or DARK monster. (Battle Damage is still inflicted to players.)

attributes.name: Red-Eyes Darkness Dragon
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by Tributing 1 "Red-Eyes B. Dragon" on your side of the field. Increase the ATK of this card by 300 points for each Dragon-Type monster in your Graveyard.

attributes.name: Ancient Gear Gadjiltron Dragon
attributes.description:
If this card attacks, your opponent cannot activate any Spell or Trap Cards until the end of the Damage Step. If you Tribute Summon this card by Tributing any of the following monster(s), this card gets the appropriate effect(s):
- Green Gadget: During battle between this attacking card and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of this card, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent.
- Red Gadget: If this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, inflict 400 damage to your opponent.
- Yellow Gadget: If this card destroys your opponent's monster by battle, inflict 600 damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Ancient Gear Gadjiltron Chimera
attributes.description:
If you Tribute Summon this card by Tributing 1 of the following monsters, this card gains the appropriate effect:
- Green Gadget: This card gains 300 ATK.
- Red Gadget: If this card successfully attacks your opponent directly, inflict 500 damage to your opponent.
- Yellow Gadget: If this card destroys your opponent's monster by battle, inflict 700 damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Ancient Gear Engineer
attributes.description: Negate the effect of any Trap Card that targets this card, and destroy that Trap Card. If this card attacks, your opponent cannot activate any Spell or Trap Cards until the end of the Damage Step. When this card attacks, destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card on your opponent's side of the field at the end of the Damage Step.

attributes.name: Boot-Up Soldier - Dread Dynamo
attributes.description: While you have a face-up "Gadget" monster on your side of the field, this card gains 2000 ATK.

attributes.name: Green Gadget
attributes.description: When you Normal Summon or Special Summon this card, you can add 1 "Red Gadget" from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Red Gadget
attributes.description: When you Normal Summon or Special Summon this card, you can add 1 "Yellow Gadget" from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Yellow Gadget
attributes.description: When you Normal Summon or Special Summon this card, you can add 1 "Green Gadget" from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Ancient Gear Workshop
attributes.description: Add 1 "Ancient Gear" monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

attributes.name: Ancient Gear Tank
attributes.description: Equip only to an "Ancient Gear" monster. It gains 600 ATK. When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, inflict 600 damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Ancient Gear Explosive
attributes.description: Target 1 face-up "Ancient Gear" monster on your side of the field when you activate this card. Destroy the targeted monster and inflict damage equal to half its original ATK to your opponent.

attributes.name: Ancient Gear Fist
attributes.description: Equip only to an "Ancient Gear" monster. Destroy any monster that battles with it, at the end of the Damage Step.

attributes.name: Stronghold the Moving Fortress
attributes.description: After activation, Special Summon this card in Defense Position; it is treated as an Effect Monster Card (Machine-Type/EARTH/Level 4/ATK 0/DEF 2000). (This card is still treated as a Trap Card.) While "Green Gadget", "Red Gadget", and "Yellow Gadget" are all face-up on your side of the field, the ATK of this card becomes 3000.

attributes.name: Vampire Genesis
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by removing 1 "Vampire Lord" on your side of the field from play. Discard 1 Zombie-Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard to select and Special Summon 1 Zombie-Type monster from your Graveyard with a Level less than the discarded Zombie-Type monster. You can only use this effect once per turn.

attributes.name: Infernal Flame Emperor
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. When this card is Tribute Summoned successfully, you can remove from play up to 5 FIRE monsters in your Graveyard. Destroy a number of Spell or Trap Cards on the field equal to the number of cards that you remove from play by this effect.

attributes.name: Ocean Dragon Lord - Neo-Daedalus
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by Tributing 1 "Levia-Dragon - Daedalus" on your side of the field. Send "Umi" on your side of the field to the Graveyard to send all cards in both players' hands and on the field to the Graveyard, except this card.

attributes.name: Gilford the Legend
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. When this card is Normal Summoned, you can equip as many Equip Spell Cards from your Graveyard as possible to Warrior-Type monster(s) on your side of the field.

attributes.name: Warrior Lady of the Wasteland
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed as a result of battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon 1 EARTH Warrior-Type monster with an ATK of 1500 or less in face-up Attack Position from your Deck to your side of the field. Then shuffle your Deck.

attributes.name: Divine Sword - Phoenix Blade
attributes.description: You can only equip this card to a Warrior-Type monster. Increase the ATK of the equipped monster by 300 points. If this card is in your Graveyard during your Main Phase, by removing from play 2 Warrior-Type monsters from your Graveyard, add this card to your hand.

attributes.name: Dark Eradicator Warlock
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by Tributing 1 "Dark Magician" on your side of the field. While this card is face-up on the field, inflict 1000 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points each time either player activates 1 Normal Spell Card.

attributes.name: Mythical Beast Cerberus
attributes.description: Each time you or your opponent activates 1 Spell Card, put 1 Spell Counter on this card. Increase the ATK of this card by 500 points for each Spell Counter on this card. At the end of the Battle Phase of the turn this card battles, remove all Spell Counters from this card.

attributes.name: Ebon Magician Curran
attributes.description: During your Standby Phase, inflict 300 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points for each monster on your opponent's side of the field.

attributes.name: Magical Blast
attributes.description: You can only activate this card while there is a Spellcaster-Type monster(s) on your side of the field. Inflict 200 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points for each Spellcaster-Type monster on your side of the field. If this card is in the Graveyard, you can add this card to your hand instead of conducting your normal draw during your Draw Phase.

attributes.name: Magical Dimension
attributes.description: You can only activate this card while there is a face-up Spellcaster-Type monster(s) on your side of the field. Tribute 1 monster on your side of the field and Special Summon 1 Spellcaster-Type monster from your hand. Then you can destroy 1 monster on the field.

attributes.name: Mystic Box
attributes.description: Select 1 monster on each side of the field. Destroy the selected opponent's monster and shift control of your selected monster to your opponent.

attributes.name: Nightmare's Steelcage
attributes.description: This card remains face-up on the field for 2 of your opponent's turns. No monsters can attack. Destroy this card during your opponent's 2nd End Phase after this card was activated.

attributes.name: Exxod, Master of the Guard
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by Tributing 1 monster on your side of the field that includes "sphinx" in its card name. While this card is face-up on the field, each time an EARTH monster is Flip Summoned, inflict 1000 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Great Spirit
attributes.description: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can flip this card into face-down Defense Position. When this card is Flip Summoned, you can switch the original ATK and DEF of 1 face-up EARTH monster on the field until the end of this turn.

attributes.name: Canyon
attributes.description: If a Rock-Type monster in Defense Position is attacked, double any Battle Damage to the controller of the attacking monster.

attributes.name: Simorgh, Bird of Divinity
attributes.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. If you Tribute Summon this card, the Tributes must be WIND. While this card is face-up on the field, both players take 1000 points of damage during each player's End Phase. Decrease the damage each player takes when this happens by 500 points for each Spell and Trap Card that player controls.

attributes.name: Sonic Shooter
attributes.description: If there are no cards in your opponent's Spell and Trap Card Zones, this card can attack your opponent's Life Points directly. When it does, any Battle Damage this card inflicts to your opponent's Life Points becomes the original ATK of this card.

attributes.name: Hysteric Party
attributes.description: Discard 1 card from your hand. Special Summon as many "Harpie Lady" cards as possible from your Graveyard. When this card is removed from the field, destroy all the monsters that were Special Summoned by this card's effect.

attributes.name: Valkyrion the Magna Warrior
attributes.description: This card can only be Special Summoned by offering "Alpha the Magnet Warrior", "Beta the Magnet Warrior", and "Gamma the Magnet Warrior" from your hand or the field as a Tribute. If "Alpha the Magnet Warrior", "Beta the Magnet Warrior", and "Gamma the Magnet Warrior" exist in the Graveyard, you can offer this card as a Tribute to Special Summon these 3 cards to the field.

attributes.name: Sinister Serpent
attributes.description: During your Standby Phase, if a "Sinister Serpent" exists in your Graveyard, you can return the "Sinister Serpent" to your hand.

attributes.name: Harpie's Feather Duster
attributes.description: Destroys all of your opponent's Spell and Trap Cards on the field.

attributes.name: Caius the Shadow Monarch
attributes.description: When this card is Tribute Summoned, remove from play 1 card on the field. If it was a DARK Monster Card, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

attributes.name: Dimensional Alchemist

attributes.name: Samsara Kaiser
attributes.description: When you Tribute Summon a monster by Tributing this card, return this card to your hand.

attributes.name: D.D.R. - Different Dimension Reincarnation
attributes.description: Discard 1 card. Select 1 of your removed from play monsters, Special Summon it in Attack Position and equip it with this card. When this card is removed from the field, destroy the equipped monster.

attributes.name: By Order of the Emperor
attributes.description: You can choose to negate the activation of an Effect Monster's effect that activates when a monster is Normal Summoned (including itself). If you do, that Effect Monster's controller draws 1 card.

attributes.name: Red-Eyes B. Dragon
attributes.description: A ferocious dragon with a deadly attack.

attributes.name: Swordsman of Landstar
attributes.description: An amateur with a sword, this fairy warrior relies on its mysterious powers.

attributes.name: Baby Dragon
attributes.description: Much more than just a child, this dragon is gifted with untapped power.

attributes.name: Spirit of the Harp
attributes.description: A spirit that soothes the soul with the music of its heavenly harp.

attributes.name: Island Turtle
attributes.description: A huge turtle that is often mistaken for an island.

attributes.name: Flame Manipulator
attributes.description: This Spellcaster attacks enemies with fire-related spells such as "Sea of Flames" and "Wall of Fire".

attributes.name: Masaki the Legendary Swordsman
attributes.description: Legendary swordmaster Masaki is a veteran of over 100 battles.

attributes.name: 7 Colored Fish
attributes.description: A rare rainbow fish that has never been caught by mortal man.

attributes.name: Armored Lizard
attributes.description: A lizard with a very tough hide and a vicious bite.

attributes.name: Darkfire Soldier #1
attributes.description: An explosive expert from a special elite force.

attributes.name: Harpie's Brother
attributes.description: With eyes like a hawk and a flying speed exceeding Mach 5, this monster is a master of the sky.

attributes.name: Gearfried the Iron Knight
attributes.description: When an Equip Card is equipped to this card, destroy the Equip Card.

attributes.name: Karate Man
attributes.description: You can double the original ATK of this card once per turn. If you used this effect, destroy this card during the End Phase.

attributes.name: Milus Radiant
attributes.description: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, increase the ATK of all EARTH monsters by 500 points and decrease the ATK of all WIND monsters by 400 points.

attributes.name: Time Wizard

If you call it wrong, destroy all monsters on your side of the field, and you lose Life Points equal to half the total ATK of the destroyed monsters. You can only use this effect once per turn, during your Main Phase.

attributes.name: Maha Vailo
attributes.description: Increase the ATK of this card by 500 points for each Equip Card equipped to this card.

attributes.name: Magician of Faith
attributes.description: FLIP: Select 1 Spell Card from your Graveyard. Add the selected card to your hand.

attributes.name: Big Eye
attributes.description: FLIP: See the 5 cards from the top of your Deck, arrange them in any order desired, and replace them on top of the Deck.

attributes.name: Sangan
attributes.description: When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard, select 1 monster with an ATK of 1500 or less from your Deck, show it to your opponent, and add it to your hand. Then shuffle your Deck.

attributes.name: Princess of Tsurugi
attributes.description: FLIP: Inflict 500 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points for each Spell and Trap Card on your opponent's side of the field.

attributes.name: White Magical Hat
attributes.description: When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, your opponent discards 1 card randomly from his/her hand.

attributes.name: Penguin Soldier
attributes.description: FLIP: You can return up to 2 Monster Cards from the field to the owner's hand.

attributes.name: Thousand Dragon
attributes.description: "Time Wizard" + "Baby Dragon"

attributes.name: Flame Swordsman
attributes.description: "Flame Manipulator" + "Masaki the Legendary Swordsman"

attributes.name: Malevolent Nuzzler
attributes.description: Increase the ATK of a monster equipped with this card by 700 points. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard, if you pay 500 Life Points, this card returns to the top of your Deck.

attributes.name: Block Attack
attributes.description: Select 1 face-up Attack Position monster on your opponent's side of the field and change it to Defense Position.

attributes.name: Giant Trunade
attributes.description: Return all Spell and Trap Cards on the field to the respective owners' hands.

attributes.name: The Reliable Guardian
attributes.description: Increase 1 face-up monster's DEF by 700 points until the end of this turn.

attributes.name: Polymerization
attributes.description: Send Fusion Material Monsters that are listed by a Fusion Monster Card from your hand or your side of the field to the Graveyard, and Special Summon the Fusion Monster from your Fusion Deck.

attributes.name: Mountain
attributes.description: Increase the ATK and DEF of all Dragon, Winged Beast, and Thunder-Type monsters by 200 points.

attributes.name: Dragon Treasure
attributes.description: Increase the ATK and DEF of a Dragon-Type monster equipped with this card by 300 points.

attributes.name: Eternal Rest
attributes.description: Destroy all monsters equipped with Equip Cards.

attributes.name: Shield & Sword
attributes.description: Switch the original ATK and DEF of all face-up monsters on the field until the end of the End Phase. Any additions and subtractions to ATK and DEF due to card effects are applied to the new ATK and DEF. Monsters Summoned after this card's activation are excluded.

attributes.name: Scapegoat
attributes.description: If you activate this card, you cannot Normal Summon, Flip Summon or Special Summon during this turn. Special Summon 4 "Sheep Tokens" (Beast-Type/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Defense Position to your side of the field. The "Sheep Tokens" cannot be used as a Tribute for a Tribute Summon (or Set).

attributes.name: Seven Tools of the Bandit
attributes.description: Pay 1000 of your Life Points. Negate the activation of a Trap Card and destroy it.

attributes.name: Fake Trap
attributes.description: You can only activate this card when your opponent uses an effect of a Spell, Trap, or Effect Monster to destroy Trap Card(s) on your side of the field. Destroy this card as a substitute of those Trap Card(s) and the other Trap Card(s) are not destroyed. If a Set card(s) would have been destroyed, pick up and see the Set card(s).

attributes.name: Blue-Eyes White Dragon
attributes.description: This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction. Virtually invincible, very few have faced this awesome creature and lived to tell the tale.

attributes.name: Hitotsu-Me Giant
attributes.description: A one-eyed behemoth with thick, powerful arms made for delivering punishing blows.

attributes.name: Ryu-Kishin
attributes.description: A very elusive creature that looks like a harmless statue until it attacks.

attributes.name: The Wicked Worm Beast
attributes.description: This face-up card on the field is returned to the owner's hand during the End Phase of your turn.

attributes.name: Battle Ox
attributes.description: A monster with tremendous power, it destroys enemies with a swing of its axe.

attributes.name: Koumori Dragon
attributes.description: A vicious, fire-breathing dragon whose wicked flame corrupts the souls of its victims.

attributes.name: Judge Man
attributes.description: This club-wielding warrior battles to the end and will never surrender.

attributes.name: Rogue Doll
attributes.description: A deadly doll gifted with mystical power, it is particularly powerful when attacking against dark forces.

attributes.name: Kojikocy
attributes.description: A man-hunter with powerful arms that can crush boulders.

attributes.name: Uraby
attributes.description: Fast on its feet, this dinosaur rips enemies to shreds with its sharp claws.

attributes.name: Gyakutenno Megami
attributes.description: This fairy uses her mystical power to protect the weak and provide spiritual support.

attributes.name: Mystic Horseman
attributes.description: Half man and half horse, this monster is known for its extreme speed.

attributes.name: Terra the Terrible
attributes.description: Known as a swamp dweller, this creature is a minion of the dark forces.

attributes.name: Dark Titan of Terror
attributes.description: A fiend said to dwell in the world of dreams, it attacks enemies in their sleep.

attributes.name: Dark Assailant
attributes.description: Armed with the Psycho Sword, this sinister assassin rules the bad land.

attributes.name: Master & Expert
attributes.description: A deadly duo consisting of a beast master and its loyal servant.

attributes.name: Unknown Warrior of Fiend
attributes.description: The speed of this warrior creates an intense vacuum that can slice through a monster's hide.

attributes.name: Ogre of the Black Shadow
attributes.description: An ogre possessed by the powers of the dark. Few can withstand its rapid charge.

attributes.name: Dark Energy
attributes.description: Increase the ATK and DEF of a Fiend-Type monster equipped with this card by 300 points.

attributes.name: Invigoration
attributes.description: An Earth monster equipped with this card increases its ATK by 400 points and decreases its DEF by 200 points.

attributes.name: Ookazi
attributes.description: Inflict 800 points of Damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Ryu-Kishin Powered
attributes.description: A gargoyle enhanced by the powers of darkness. Very sharp talons make it a worthy opponent.

attributes.name: Swordstalker
attributes.description: A monster formed by the vengeful souls of those who passed away in battle.

attributes.name: La Jinn the Mystical Genie of the Lamp
attributes.description: A genie of the lamp that's at the beck and call of its master.

attributes.name: Rude Kaiser
attributes.description: With an axe in each hand, this monster delivers heavy damage.

attributes.name: Destroyer Golem
attributes.description: A golem with a massive right hand for crushing its victims.

attributes.name: Skull Red Bird
attributes.description: This monster swoops down and attacks with a rain of knives stored in its wings.

attributes.name: D. Human
attributes.description: Gifted with the power of dragons, this warrior wields a sword created from a dragon's fang.

attributes.name: Pale Beast
attributes.description: With skin tinged a bluish-white, this strange creature is a fearsome sight to behold.

attributes.name: The Inexperienced Spy
attributes.description: Select and see 1 card in your opponent's hand.

attributes.name: Ancient Telescope
attributes.description: See the top 5 cards of your opponent's Deck. Return the cards to the Deck in the same order.

attributes.name: Just Desserts
attributes.description: Inflict 500 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points for each monster on your opponent's side of the field.

attributes.name: Lord of D.
attributes.description: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, all Dragon-Type monsters cannot be targeted by Spell Cards, Trap Cards, or effects of monsters that designate a target.

attributes.name: The Flute of Summoning Dragon
attributes.description: You can only activate this card when "Lord of D." is face-up on the field. Special Summon up to 2 Dragon-Type monsters from your hand to your side of the field.

attributes.name: Mysterious Puppeteer
attributes.description: Each time you or your opponent Normal Summons or Flip Summons a monster, increase your Life Points by 500 points.

attributes.name: Sogen
attributes.description: Increase the ATK and DEF of all Beast-Warrior and Warrior-Type monsters by 200 points.

attributes.name: Hane-Hane
attributes.description: FLIP: Select 1 monster on the field and return it to its owner's hand.

attributes.name: Machina Fortress
attributes.description: You can discard Machine-Type monster(s) whose total Levels equal 8 or more to Special Summon this card from your hand or Graveyard. When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, select and destroy 1 card your opponent controls. When this face-up card you control is targeted by an opponent's Effect Monster's effect, look at your opponent's hand and discard 1 card from their hand.

attributes.name: Machina Gearframe
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can equip this card to a Machine-Type monster you control, OR unequip it to Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. When this card is Normal Summoned, you can add 1 "Machina" monster (except "Machina Gearframe") from your Deck to your hand. (A monster can only be equipped with 1 Union monster at a time. If the equipped monster would be destroyed, this card is destroyed instead.)

attributes.name: Machina Peacekeeper
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can equip this card to a Machine-Type monster you control, OR unequip it to Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. When this card is destroyed and sent from the field to the Graveyard, you can add 1 Union Monster from your Deck to your hand. (A monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the equipped monster would be destroyed, this card is destroyed instead.)

attributes.name: Scrap Recycler
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned or Special Summoned successfully, you can select 1 Machine-Type monster from your deck and send it to the Graveyard. Once per turn, you can return 2 Level 4 EARTH Machine-Type monsters in your Graveyard to your deck to draw 1 card.

attributes.name: Commander Covington
attributes.description: Send 1 each of "Machina Soldier", "Machina Sniper", and "Machina Defender" you control to the Graveyard to Special Summon 1 "Machina Force" from your hand or Deck.

attributes.name: Machina Soldier
attributes.description: If you control no monsters when this card is Normal Summoned, you may Special Summon 1 "Machina" monster other than "Machina Soldier" from your hand.

attributes.name: Machina Sniper
attributes.description: "Machina" monsters you control other than "Machina Sniper" cannot be selected as attack targets.

attributes.name: Machina Defender
attributes.description: FLIP: Add 1 "Commander Covington" from your Deck to your hand.

attributes.name: Machina Force
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by the effect of "Commander Covington". You must pay 1000 Life Points to declare an attack with this card. You can send this card from the field to the Graveyard to Special Summon 1 each of "Machina Soldier", "Machina Sniper", and "Machina Defender" from your Graveyard.

attributes.name: The Big Saturn
attributes.description: You cannot Special Summon this card from your hand or Deck. Once per turn, you can discard 1 card and pay 1000 Life Points to have this card gain 1000 ATK until the end of the turn. When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard by your opponent's card effect, inflict damage to both players equal to this card's ATK.

attributes.name: Machina Armored Unit
attributes.description: Once per turn, when a Machine-Type monster is destroyed by battle and sent to your Graveyard, you can Special Summon 1 Machine-Type monster with lower ATK and the same Attribute from your Deck.

attributes.name: Relinquished
attributes.description: Select 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field and equip it to this card (this effect can only be used once per turn and you can only equip 1 monster at a time to this card). The ATK and DEF of this card become the same amounts as the monster equipped to this card. If this card is destroyed as a result of battle, the equipped monster is destroyed instead, and any battle damage you received from the battle is also inflicted to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Red Archery Girl
attributes.description: A mermaid archer that hides in a protective shell, waiting for the right moment to strike.

attributes.name: Ryu-Ran
attributes.description: A vicious little dragon sheltered in an egg that looks deceptively harmless.

attributes.name: Illusionist Faceless Mage
attributes.description: Manipulates enemy attacks with the power of illusion.

attributes.name: Aqua Madoor
attributes.description: A wizard of the waters that conjures a liquid wall to crush any enemies that oppose him.

attributes.name: Toon Alligator
attributes.description: An alligator monster straight from the cartoons.

attributes.name: Sonic Bird
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned or Flip Summoned, you can select 1 Ritual Spell Card from your Deck and add it to your hand. Then shuffle your Deck.

attributes.name: Jigen Bakudan
attributes.description: FLIP: After this card is flipped, Tribute it during your Standby Phase to destroy all monsters on your side of the field and inflict damage equal to half of the total ATK of the destroyed cards (excluding this monster) to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Mask of Darkness
attributes.description: FLIP: Select 1 Trap Card from your Graveyard. Add the selected card to your hand.

attributes.name: Witch of the Black Forest
attributes.description: When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard, select 1 monster with a DEF of 1500 or less from your Deck, show it to your opponent, and add it to your hand. Then shuffle your Deck.

attributes.name: Muka Muka
attributes.description: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, increase the ATK and DEF of this card by 300 points for every card in the controller's hand.

attributes.name: Dream Clown
attributes.description: When this card is changed from Attack Position to Defense Position, destroy 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field.

attributes.name: Armed Ninja
attributes.description: FLIP: Select 1 Spell Card on the field and destroy it. If the selected card is Set, pick up and see the card. If it is a Spell Card, it is destroyed. If it is a Trap Card, return it to its original position.

attributes.name: Hiro's Shadow Scout
attributes.description: FLIP: Your opponent draws 3 cards. Both players look at the cards . If there are any Spell Cards among them, discard all those Spell Card(s) to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Blue-Eyes Toon Dragon
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned while "Toon World" is on your side of the field. You can Special Summon this monster from your hand, but Tributes are required for monsters Level 5 or more. This card cannot attack in the turn that it is Summoned. Unless you pay 500 Life Points, this monster cannot attack. When "Toon World" on the field is destroyed, this card is also destroyed. If your opponent doesn't control a Toon Monster, this card can attack your opponent's Life Points directly. If a face-up Toon Monster is on your opponent's side of the field, you must select the Toon Monster as an attack target.

attributes.name: Toon Summoned Skull
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned while "Toon World" is on your side of the field. You can Special Summon this monster from your hand, but Tributes are required for monsters Level 5 or more. This card cannot attack in the turn that it is Summoned. Unless you pay 500 Life Points, this monster cannot attack. When "Toon World" on the field is destroyed, this card is also destroyed. If your opponent doesn't control a Toon Monster, this card can attack your opponent's Life Points directly. If a face-up Toon Monster is on your opponent's side of the field, you must select the Toon Monster as an attack target.

attributes.name: Manga Ryu-Ran
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned while "Toon World" is on your side of the field. You can Special Summon this monster from your hand, but Tributes are required for monsters Level 5 or more. This card cannot attack in the turn that it is Summoned. Unless you pay 500 Life Points, this monster cannot attack. When "Toon World" on the field is destroyed, this card is also destroyed. If your opponent doesn't control a Toon Monster, this card can attack your opponent's Life Points directly. If a face-up Toon Monster is on your opponent's side of the field, you must select the Toon Monster as an attack target.

attributes.name: Toon Mermaid
attributes.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned while "Toon World" is on your side of the field. You can Special Summon this monster from your hand, but Tributes are required for monsters Level 5 or more. This card cannot attack in the turn that it is Summoned. Unless you pay 500 Life Points, this monster cannot attack. When "Toon World" on the field is destroyed, this card is also destroyed. If your opponent doesn't control a Toon Monster, this card can attack your opponent's Life Points directly. If a face-up Toon Monster is on your opponent's side of the field, you must select the Toon Monster as an attack target.

attributes.name: Toon World
attributes.description: Pay 1000 Life Points to activate this card.

attributes.name: Black Pendant
attributes.description: Increase the ATK of a monster equipped with this card by 500 points. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard, inflict 500 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

attributes.name: Stop Defense
attributes.description: Select 1 Defense Position monster on your opponent's side of the field and change it to Attack Position.

attributes.name: Mystical Space Typhoon
attributes.description: Destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card on the field.

attributes.name: Rush Recklessly
attributes.description: Increase 1 face-up monster's ATK by 700 points until the end of this turn.

attributes.name: Soul Release
attributes.description: Select up to 5 cards from either your or your opponent's Graveyard(s) and remove them from play.

attributes.name: Black Illusion Ritual
attributes.description: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Relinquished". You must also Tribute monsters whose total Levels equal 1 or more from the field or your hand.

attributes.name: Ring of Magnetism
attributes.description: You can only equip this card to a monster on your side of the field. Decrease the ATK and DEF of a monster equipped with this card by 500 points. In addition, all the monsters on your opponent's side of the field can only attack the monster equipped with this card, if they attack.

attributes.name: Graceful Charity
attributes.description: Draw 3 cards from your Deck, then discard any 2 cards from your hand.

attributes.name: Robbin' Goblin
attributes.description: Each time 1 monster on your side of the field inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, your opponent discards 1 random card from their hand.

attributes.name: Magic Jammer
attributes.description: Discard 1 card from your hand. Negate the activation of a Spell Card and destroy it.

attributes.name: Enchanted Javelin
attributes.description: Increase your Life Points by the ATK of 1 attacking monster.

attributes.name: Gryphon Wing
attributes.description: When your opponent activates "Harpie's Feather Duster", all of your opponent's Spell and Trap Cards are destroyed in place of your own.

attributes.name: Felgrand Dragon
attributes.description: This monster cannot be Special Summoned except from the Graveyard, and only if it was sent there from the field.  When this card is Special Summoned, select 1 monster in your Graveyard.  This card gains ATK equal to the Level of that monster x 200.

attributes.name: Darkblaze Dragon
attributes.description: When this card is Special Summoned from the Graveyard, its ATK and DEF increase to become twice its original ATK and DEF.  When this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster.

attributes.name: Herald of Creation
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can discard 1 card from your hand to add 1 Level 7 or higher monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

attributes.name: Decoy Dragon
attributes.description: When this card is selected as an attack target by your your opponent's monster, select 1 Level 7 or higher Dragon-Type monster from your Graveyard, Special Summon it, and switch the attack to that monster.

attributes.name: Trade-In
attributes.description: Discard 1 Level 8 monster from your hand. Draw 2 cards from your Deck.

attributes.name: Foolish Burial
attributes.description: Select 1 monster from your Deck and send it to the Graveyard.

attributes.name: Malevolent Catastrophe
attributes.description: Activate only when your opponent's monster declares an attack. Destroy all Spell and Trap Cards.

attributes.name: Endymion, the Master Magician
attributes.description: You can Special Summon this card from your hand or Graveyard by removing 6 Spell Counters from a "Magical Citadel of Endymion" you control. When you do, add 1 Spell Card from your Graveyard to your hand. Once per turn, you can discard 1 Spell Card to destroy 1 card on the field.

attributes.name: Disenchanter
attributes.description: Once per turn, you can remove 1 Spell Counter from anywhere on the field to return 1 face-up Spell Card to its owner's hand.

attributes.name: Defender, the Magical Knight
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned, place 1 Spell Counter on it (max. 1). Once per turn, if a face-up Spellcaster-Type monster(s) on the field would be destroyed, you can remove 1 Spell Counter from a card you control for each of those monsters instead.

attributes.name: Hannibal Necromancer
attributes.description: When this card is Normal Summoned, place 1 Spell Counter on it (max. 1). You can remove 1 Spell Counter from this card to destroy 1 face-up Trap Card.

attributes.name: Summoner Monk
attributes.description: This card cannot be Tributed. When this card is Normal or Flip Summoned, it is changed to Defense Position. Once per turn, you can discard 1 Spell Card to Special Summon 1 Level 4 monster from your Deck. It cannot attack this turn.

attributes.name: Magical Citadel of Endymion
attributes.description: Each time a Spell Card is activated, place 1 Spell Counter on this card. When a card with a Spell Counter(s) is destroyed, place its Spell Counters on this card. Once per turn, if you would activate a card's effect by removing a Spell Counter(s) from cards you control, you can remove Spell Counters from this card instead. If this card would be destroyed, you can remove 1 Spell Counter from this card instead.

attributes.name: Spell Power Grasp
attributes.description: Place 1 Spell Counter on a face-up card that you can place a Spell Counter on. Then you can add 1 "Spell Power Grasp" from your Deck to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Spell Power Grasp" per turn.

attributes.name: Phoenix Gearfried
attributes.description:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it be treated as an Effect Monster with this effect:
- If your opponent activates a Spell Card, you can select and Special Summon 1 Gemini Monster from your Graveyard. Also, you can send 1 face-up Equip Card you control to the Graveyard to negate the activation of a Spell or Trap Card that targets a monster on the field.

attributes.name: Evocator Chevalier
attributes.description:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it be treated as an Effect Monster with this effect:
- You can send 1 face-up Equip Spell Card you control to your Graveyard to destroy 1 card your opponent controls.

attributes.name: Featherizer
attributes.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can send 1 Gemini Monster from your Deck to the Graveyard, then draw 1 card.
